attribute.description: The value component of the Relative Distinguished Name (RDN).

attribute.name: eNBId
attribute.description: The ID of an RBS within a Public Land Mobile Network (PLMN).

attribute.name: gUGroupIdList
attribute.description: A list of all globally unique group IDs to which a neighboring RBS belongs. A globally unique ID refers to a pool area. The attribute is set during the RBS at X2 SETUP procedure.

attribute.name: userLabel
attribute.description: User-defined alphanumeric label, maximum 128 characters including spaces.

attribute.name: masterEnbFunctionId
attribute.description: The ID of the eNodeBFunction that this MO represents, in particular for automatically-created ExternalENbFunctionId managed objects.

attribute.name: anrCreated
attribute.description: Indicates if the MO is created by the Automated Neighbor Relations (ANR) function.
attribute.deprecated: Since L11B. Replaced by createdBy.

attribute.name: timeOfAnrCreation
attribute.description: The date and time when the MO was created by the Automated Neighbor Relations (ANR) function. Format: YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS
attribute.deprecated: Replaced by timeOfCreation. Since L11B.

attribute.name: timeOfAnrModification
attribute.description: The date and time when the MO was last modified by the Automated Neighbor Relations (ANR) function. Format: YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS
attribute.deprecated: Replaced by timeOfLastModification. Since L11B.

attribute.name: ctrlMode
attribute.description:
Indicates permission to change object attributes and to delete the object. If set to Manual, the operator can change and delete, and the Automated Neighbor Relations (ANR) function cannot make changes.
If set to Auto, the ANR function can change and delete, and the operator cannot, except to change the settings of this attribute.
When the object is created by the ANR function, the value is set to Auto. Otherwise the value may be changed only by the operator.
The setting of this attribute controls the object itself, but not related objects.
attribute.deprecated: Since L11B. Planned to be removed.

attribute.name: removingMonitoringStart
attribute.description: Indicates the time and date when the MO was started for monitoring for automatc removal by the (automatic neighbor relation) function. Format: YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS

attribute.name: createdBy
attribute.description: Indicates whether the MO has been created by the Automated Neighbor Relations (ANR) function or operator or X2

attribute.name: timeOfCreation
attribute.description: Indicates the time and date when the MO was created. Format: YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS

attribute.name: lastModification
attribute.description: Indicates whether the MO was last modified by the Automated Neighbor Relations (ANR) function or operator or X2 and if the MO is to be deleted who triggered the deletion

attribute.name: timeOfLastModification
attribute.description: Indicates the time and date when the MO was last modified. Format: YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS

class.name: EUtraNetwork
class.description: This managed object is a container for Managed Objects related to EUTRA networks.

attribute.name: EUtraNetworkId
attribute.description: The value component of the Relative Distinguished Name (RDN).

attribute.name: userLabel
attribute.description: User-defined alphanumeric label, maximum 128 characters including spaces.

class.name: PmEventService
class.description: This MO contains the parameters for Performance Monitoring (PM) event handling functions.

attribute.name: cellTraceDataLevel
attribute.description: Indicates if the ASN.1 contents should be included in the event data collection.
attribute.deprecated: Since L12A. Planned to be removed.

attribute.name: cellTraceHighPrioReserve
attribute.description:
The percentage of total cell trace storage (totalCellTraceStorageSize) reserved for high-priority scanners.
This means that no events from low-priority scanners are stored in the file when the storage limit is reached for the sum of the low-priority scanners:
totalCellTraceStorageSize - (cellTraceHighPrioReserv / 100) * totalCellTraceStorageSize.
High-priority scanner files are not limited to the reserved area for high priority scanners. These files can also be stored in the non-reserved area together with the low-priority scanner files. When the default value of zero is set, the high- and low-priority share the totalCellTraceStorageSize for storing cell trace events.

attribute.name: totalCellTraceStorageSize
attribute.description: Total available storage for the cell trace recording files.
attribute.dependencies: totalCellTraceStorageSize >= cellTraceFileSize AND totalCellTraceStorageSize <= totalEventStorageSize

attribute.name: cellTraceFileSize
attribute.description:
Maximum size of each cell trace recording file. The file size is valid for the compressed file.
If the cellTraceFileSize is reached within a specific Reporting Output Period (ROP), cell trace recording stops until the next ROP begins.
attribute.dependencies: cellTraceFileSize <= totalCellTraceStorageSize

attribute.name: totalEventStorageSize
attribute.description: The total storage that the observability mechanisms can use to store information about the collected event data. This means that the total size of the cell trace and UE trace files stored should be less that the value of this attribute.
attribute.dependencies: totalEventStorageSize >= totalCellTraceStorageSize + totalUeTraceStorageSize

attribute.name: ueTraceFileSize
attribute.description:
Maximum size of each UE trace recording file. The file size is valid for the compressed file.
If the ueTraceFileSize is reached within a specific Reporting Output Period (ROP), UE trace recording stops until the next ROP begins.
attribute.dependencies: ueTraceFileSize <= totalUeTraceStorageSize

attribute.name: PmEventServiceId
attribute.description: The value component of the RDN.

attribute.name: totalUeTraceStorageSize
attribute.description: Total available storage for the UE trace recording files.
attribute.dependencies: totalUeTraceStorageSize >= ueTraceFileSize AND totalUeTraceStorageSize <= totalEventStorageSize.

attribute.name: streamPortPmUeTrace
attribute.description: Port on target for UE trace streaming over the user datagram protocol port.

attribute.name: streamStatusPmCellTrace
attribute.description: List of status on PM Cell Trace streams and file writing

attribute.name: streamStatusPmUeTrace
attribute.description: List of status on PM Ue Trace streams and file writing

attribute.name: cellTraceMcsResolution
attribute.description: The time resolution in seconds for MCS events from baseband in Cell trace.

attribute.name: ueTraceMcsResolution
attribute.description: The time resolution in seconds for MCS events from baseband in UE trace.

class.name: Rrc
class.description: This MO models the manageable characteristics of the Radio Resource Control (RRC) protocol.

attribute.name: RrcId
attribute.description: The value component of the RDN.

attribute.name: t300
attribute.description:
Timer for supervision of RRC Connection Setup. Used by the UE.
Note: The parameter will take effect when System Information is updated.

attribute.name: t301
attribute.description:
Waiting time for RRC Connection Reestablishment or RRC Connection Reestablishment Reject after sending RRC Connection Reestablishment Request. Used by the UE.
Note: The parameter will take effect when System Information is updated

attribute.name: t302
attribute.description: Waiting time at reception of RRC Connection Reject including the IE ‘wait time’. Used by the UE. The value zero (0) means that a random waiting time set by the system is used.

attribute.name: t304
attribute.description: Time supervision of successful handover completion. Used by the UE.

attribute.name: t310
attribute.description:
Waiting time for radio link failure. Used by the UE.
Note: The parameter will take effect when System Information is updated

attribute.name: t311
attribute.description:
Waiting time to find a suitable E-UTRA cell where to perform RRC Connection Reestablishment, or a cell using another RAT. Used by the UE.
Note: The parameter will take effect when System Information is updated.

attribute.name: t320
attribute.description: Waiting time for cell reselection priority information provided by dedicated signaling. Used by the UE.

attribute.name: tRrcConnectionSetup
attribute.description: Waiting time for the RRC message RRC Connection Setup Complete. Used by the RBS.

attribute.name: tRrcConnectionReconfiguration
attribute.description: Waiting time for the RRC message RRC Connection Reconfiguration Complete. Used by the RBS.

attribute.name: n310
attribute.description: Maximum number of consecutive "out of sync" indications received from lower layers.

attribute.name: n311
attribute.description: Maximum number of consecutive "in-sync" indications received from lower layers

attribute.name: tRrcConnReest
attribute.description: Waiting time for the RRC message RRC Connection Reestablishment Complete. Used by the RBS.

attribute.name: tWaitForRrcConnReest
attribute.description: Waiting time for the RRC message RRC Connection Reestablishment Request upon detecting Radio Link Failure. Used by the RBS.

class.name: PmUeMeasControl
class.description: This managed object contains the settings for PM Initiated UE Measurements.

attribute.name: ueMeasIntraFreq1
attribute.description: The specification of the UE measurement initiated by activating the PM event UE_MEAS_INTRAFREQ1 in a Cell Trace scanner.

attribute.name: ueMeasIntraFreq2
attribute.description: The specification of the UE measurement initiated by activating the PM event UE_MEAS_INTRAFREQ2 in a Cell Trace or UE Trace scanner.

attribute.name: pmUeMeasRsrpServIntraFreq1
attribute.description:
Shows a histogram of the reported values for the reference signal received power (RSRP) measurements for the serving cell. A description of RSRP can be found in 3GPP specification 36.133.
PDF ranges: [0]: 0 <= RSRP_xx <= 15 [1]: 16 <= RSRP_xx <= 18 [2]: 19 <= RSRP_xx <= 21 [3]: 22 <= RSRP_xx <= 24 [4]: 25 <= RSRP_xx <= 27 [5]: 28 <= RSRP_xx <= 30 [6]: 31 <= RSRP_xx <= 33 [7]: 34 <= RSRP_xx <= 36 [8]: 37 <= RSRP_xx <= 39 [9]: 40 <= RSRP_xx <= 42 [10]: 43 <= RSRP_xx <= 45 [11]: 46 <= RSRP_xx <= 48 [12]: 49 <= RSRP_xx <= 51 [13]: 52 <= RSRP_xx <= 54 [14]: 55 <= RSRP_xx <= 57 [15]: 58 <= RSRP_xx <= 60 [16]: 61 <= RSRP_xx <= 97
attribute.condition: The counter is only stepped when PM Initiated UE Measurement is activated i.e. the event UE_MEAS_INTRAFREQ1 is activated. The counter is only triggered if the reports from the UE are according to the cell parameter configuration applied to the cell at the start of the ROP.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmUeMeasRsrqServIntraFreq1
attribute.description:
Shows a histogram of the reported values for the reference signal received quality (RSRQ) measurements for the serving cell. A description of RSRQ can be found in 3GPP specification 36.133.
PDF ranges: [0]: 0 <= RSRQ_xx <= 1 [1]: 2 <= RSRQ_xx <= 3 [2]: 4 <= RSRQ_xx <= 5 [3]: 6 <= RSRQ_xx <= 7 [4]: 8 <= RSRQ_xx <= 9 [5]: 10 <= RSRQ_xx <= 11 [6]: 12 <= RSRQ_xx <= 13 [7]: 14 <= RSRQ_xx <= 15 [8]: 16 <= RSRQ_xx <= 17 [9]: 18 <= RSRQ_xx <= 19 [10]: 20 <= RSRQ_xx <= 21 [11]: 22 <= RSRQ_xx <= 23 [12]: 24 <= RSRQ_xx <= 25 [13]: 26 <= RSRQ_xx <= 27 [14]: 28 <= RSRQ_xx <= 29 [15]: 30 <= RSRQ_xx <= 31 [16]: 32 <= RSRQ_xx <= 34
attribute.condition: The counter is only stepped when PM Initiated UE Measurement is activated i.e. the event UE_MEAS_INTRAFREQ1 is activated. The counter is only triggered if the reports from the UE are according to the cell parameter configuration applied to the cell at the start of the ROP.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmUeMeasRsrpDeltaIntraFreq1
attribute.description:
Shows a histogram of the delta values between reported serving and best target cell reference signal received power measurements (i.e. Delta = RSRP_SERVING - RSRP_BEST_TARGET). A description of RSRP can be found in 3GPP specification 36.133.
PDF ranges: [0]: delta RSRP_xx <= - 6 [1]: - 5 <= delta RSRP_xx <= - 4 [2]: - 3 <= delta RSRP_xx <= - 2 [3]: - 1 <= delta RSRP_xx <= - 1 [4]: 0 <= delta RSRP_xx <= 0 [5]: 1 <= delta RSRP_xx <= 1 [6]: 2 <= delta RSRP_xx <= 2 [7]: 3 <= delta RSRP_xx <= 3 [8]: 4 <= delta RSRP_xx <= 4 [9]: 5 <= delta RSRP_xx <= 6 [10]: 7 <= delta RSRP_xx <= 8 [11]: 9 <= delta RSRP_xx
attribute.condition: The counter is only stepped when PM Initiated UE Measurement is activated i.e. the event UE_MEAS_INTRAFREQ1 is activated. The counter is only triggered if the reports from the UE are according to the cell parameter configuration applied to the cell at the start of the ROP.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmUeMeasRsrqDeltaIntraFreq1
attribute.description:
Shows a histogram of the delta values between reported serving and best target cell reference signal received quality measurements (i.e. Delta = RSRQ_SERVING - RSRQ_BEST_TARGET). A description of RSRQ can be found in 3GPP specification 36.133.
PDF ranges: [0]: delta RSRQ_xx <= - 12 [1]: - 11 <= delta RSRQ_xx <= - 8 [2]: - 7 <= delta RSRQ_xx <= - 4 [3]: - 3 <= delta RSRQ_xx <= - 2 [4]: - 1 <= delta RSRQ_xx <= 0 [5]: 1 <= delta RSRQ_xx <= 2 [6]: 3 <= delta RSRQ_xx <= 4 [7]: 5 <= delta RSRQ_xx <= 6 [8]: 7 <= delta RSRQ_xx <= 8 [9]: 9 <= delta RSRQ_xx <= 12 [10]: 13 <= delta RSRQ_xx <= 16 [11]: 17 <= delta RSRQ_xx
attribute.condition: The counter is only stepped when PM Initiated UE Measurement is activated i.e. the event UE_MEAS_INTRAFREQ1 is activated. The counter is only triggered if the reports from the UE are according to the cell parameter configuration applied to the cell at the start of the ROP.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: PmUeMeasControlId
attribute.description: The value component of the Relative Distinguished Name (RDN).

attribute.name: pmZtemporary44
attribute.description: Normally this counter is not used, it can however sometimes be temporarily used for very late additions in a release. If so, for description see Network Impact Report in the CPI.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

class.name: ReportConfigEUtraBadCovPrim
class.description: This managed object contains the Report Configuration settings for primary bad coverage UE measurements.

attribute.name: a2ThresholdRsrpPrim
attribute.description: The primary Reference Signal Received Power (RSRP) threshold value for eventA2. Used only when triggerQuantityA2Prim is set to RSRP. Primary and secondary measurement attributes refer to the option to use different settings for two simultaneous measurements for eventA2.

attribute.name: a2ThresholdRsrqPrim
attribute.description: The primary Reference Signal Received Quality (RSRQ) threshold value for eventA2. Used only when triggerQuantityA2Prim is set to RSRQ. Primary and secondary measurement attributes refer to the option to use different settings for two simultaneous measurements for eventA2.

attribute.name: hysteresisA2Prim
attribute.description: The hysteresis value for the primary eventA2 measurement. Primary and secondary measurement parameters refer to the option to use different settings for two simultaneous measurements for eventA2.

attribute.name: maxReportCellsA2Prim
attribute.description: Maximum number of cells to include in the measurement report for the primary eventA2 measurement. Primary and secondary measurement parameters refer to the option to use different settings for two simultaneous measurements for eventA2.
attribute.deprecated: Since L13A. Planned to be removed.

attribute.name: reportAmountA2Prim
attribute.description: The number of reports for periodical reporting for the primary eventA2 measurement . Value 0 means that reports are sent as long as the event is fulfilled. Primary and secondary measurement parameters refer to the option to use different settings for two simultaneous measurements for eventA2.
attribute.deprecated: Since L11B. Planned to be removed.

attribute.name: reportIntervalA2Prim
attribute.description: The interval for event triggered periodical reporting for the primary eventA2 measurement. Primary and secondary measurement parameters refer to the option to use different settings for two simultaneous measurements for eventA2.
attribute.deprecated: Since L11B. Planned to be removed.

attribute.name: reportQuantityA2Prim
attribute.description: The quantities to include in the measurement report for the primary eventA2 measurement. The value 0 - sameAsTriggerQuantity means that the same quantity as triggerQuantity is included in the measurement report. The value 1 - both means that both Reference Symbol Received Power (RSRP) and Reference Symbol Received Quality (RSRQ) quantities are included in the measurement report. Primary and secondary measurement parameters refer to the option to use different settings for two simultaneous measurements for eventA2.
attribute.deprecated: Since L11B. Planned to be removed.

attribute.name: timeToTriggerA2Prim
attribute.description: The time-to-trigger value for the primary eventA2 measurement. Primary and secondary measurement parameters refer to the option to use different settings for two simultaneous measurements for eventA2.

attribute.name: triggerQuantityA2Prim
attribute.description: The quantity that triggers the eventA2 and eventA1 for the primary eventA2 and eventA1 measurement. Primary and secondary measurement parameters refer to the option to use different settings for two simultaneous measurements for eventA2 and eventA1.

attribute.name: ReportConfigEUtraBadCovPrimId
attribute.description: The value component of the Relative Distinguished Name (RDN).

class.name: ReportConfigEUtraBadCovSec
class.description: This managed object contains the Report Configuration settings for secondary bad coverage UE measurements.

attribute.name: a2ThresholdRsrpSec
attribute.description: The secondary Reference Signal Received Power (RSRP) threshold value for eventA2. Only used if triggerQuantityA2Sec is set to RSRP. Primary and secondary measurement parameters refer to the option to use different settings for two simultaneous measurements for eventA2.

attribute.name: a2ThresholdRsrqSec
attribute.description: The secondary Reference Signal Received Quality (RSRQ) threshold value for eventA2. Only used if triggerQuantityA2Sec is set to RSRQ. Primary and secondary measurement parameters refer to the option to use different settings for two simultaneous measurements for eventA2.

attribute.name: hysteresisA2Sec
attribute.description: The hysteresis value for the secondary eventA2 measurement. Primary and secondary measurement parameters refer to the option to use different settings for two simultaneous measurements for eventA2.

attribute.name: maxReportCellsA2Sec
attribute.description: Maximum number of cells to include in the measurement report for the secondary eventA2 measurement. Primary and secondary measurement parameters refer to the option to use different settings for two simultaneous measurements for eventA2.
attribute.deprecated: Since L13A. Planned to be removed.

attribute.name: reportAmountA2Sec
attribute.description: Number of reports for periodical reporting for the secondary eventA2 measurement. Value 0 means that reports are sent as long as the event is fulfilled. Primary and secondary measurement parameters refer to the option to use different settings for two simultaneous measurements for eventA2.
attribute.deprecated: Since L11B. Planned to be removed.

attribute.name: reportIntervalA2Sec
attribute.description: The interval for event-triggered periodical reporting for the secondary eventA2 measurement. Primary and secondary measurement parameters refer to the option to use different settings for two simultaneous measurements for eventA2.
attribute.deprecated: Since L11B. Planned to be removed.

attribute.name: reportQuantityA2Sec
attribute.description:
The quantities to include in the measurement report for the secondary eventA2 measurement.
The value 0, sameAsTriggerQuantity, means that the same quantity as triggerQuantity is included in the measurement report.
The value 1, both, means that both RSRP and RSRQ quantities are included in the measurement report.
Primary and secondary measurement parameters refer to the option to use different settings for two simultaneous measurements for eventA2.
attribute.deprecated: Since L11B. Planned to be removed.

attribute.name: timeToTriggerA2Sec
attribute.description: The time to trigger value for the secondary eventA2 measurement. Primary and secondary measurement parameters refer to the option to use different settings for two simultaneous measurements for eventA2.

attribute.name: triggerQuantityA2Sec
attribute.description: The quantity that triggers the eventA2 and eventA1 for the secondary eventA2 and eventA1 measurement. Primary and secondary measurement parameters refer to the option to use different settings for two simultaneous measurements for eventA2 and eventA1.

attribute.name: ReportConfigEUtraBadCovSecId
attribute.description: The value component of the Relative Distinguished Name (RDN).

class.name: ReportConfigEUtraBestCell
class.description: This managed object contains the Report Configuration settings for best cell UE measurements.

attribute.name: a3offset
attribute.description: The offset value for eventA3.

attribute.name: hysteresisA3
attribute.description: The hysteresis value for eventA3.

attribute.name: maxReportCellsA3
attribute.description: Max number of cells to include in the measurement report.

attribute.name: reportAmountA3
attribute.description: Number of reports when periodical reporting is used. Value of 0 means that reports are sent as long as the event is fulfilled.
attribute.deprecated: Since L11B. Planned to be removed.

attribute.name: reportIntervalA3
attribute.description: The interval for event triggered periodical reporting.
attribute.deprecated: Since L11B. Planned to be removed.

attribute.name: reportQuantityA3
attribute.description: The quantities to include in the measurement report.
attribute.deprecated: Since L11B. Planned to be removed.
attribute.dependencies: The value sameAsTriggerQuantity means that the same quantity as triggerQuantity is to be included in the measurement report. The value both means that both RSRP and RSRQ quantities is to be included in the measurement report.

attribute.name: timeToTriggerA3
attribute.description: The time-to-trigger value for eventA3. This attribute is modified by SON function HoOscCtrlRel.
attribute.dependencies: Read only if the license for Automatic HO Control on Relation Level is present and the feature is active.

attribute.name: triggerQuantityA3
attribute.description: The quantity that triggers the event.

attribute.name: ReportConfigEUtraBestCellId
attribute.description: The value component of the Relative Distinguished Name (RDN).

class.name: ReportConfigEUtraIntraFreqPm
class.description: This managed object contains the Report Configuration settings for UE measurements on EUTRA intra frequencies initiated by PM.

attribute.name: measSelectionEUtraPm
attribute.description:
The type of measurement for which this MO is currently configured. The options A1-A5 correspond to respective thresholds/offsets that trigger these events.
Selecting PERIODICAL results in periodical measurement reports with no specific trigger. PERIODICAL measurement reporting is limited to reporting the strongest cells.

attribute.name: a1ThresholdRsrpPm
attribute.description: The Reference Signal Received Power (RSRP) threshold value for eventA1 for PM-Initiated UE Measurements. Used only when triggerQuantityPm is set to RSRP and measSelectionEUtraPm is set to EVENT_A1.

attribute.name: a1ThresholdRsrqPm
attribute.description: The Reference Signal Received Quality (RSRQ) threshold value for eventA1 for PM-Initiated UE Measurements. Used only when triggerQuantityPm is set to RSRQ and measSelectionEUtraPm is set to EVENT_A1.

attribute.name: a2ThresholdRsrpPm
attribute.description: The Reference Signal Received Power (RSRP) threshold value for eventA2 for PM-Initiated UE Measurements. Used only when triggerQuantityPm is set to RSRP and measSelectionEUtraPm is set to EVENT_A2.

attribute.name: a2ThresholdRsrqPm
attribute.description: The Reference Signal Received Quality (RSRQ) threshold value for eventA2 for PM-Initiated UE Measurements. Used only when triggerQuantityPm is set to RSRQ and measSelectionEUtraPm is set to EVENT_A2.

attribute.name: a3OffsetPm
attribute.description: The offset value for eventA3, for PM Initiated UE Measurements. Only used if measSelectionEUtraPm is set to EVENT_A3.

attribute.name: a3ReportOnLeavePm
attribute.description: Indicates that the UE initiates the measurement reporting procedure when the leaving condition is met for a cell. Used only when measSelectionEUtraPm is set to EVENT_A3.

attribute.name: a4ThresholdRsrpPm
attribute.description: The Reference Signal Received Power (RSRP) threshold value for eventA4 for PM-Initiated UE Measurements. Used only when triggerQuantityPm is set to RSRP and measSelectionEUtraPm is set to EVENT_A4.

attribute.name: a4ThresholdRsrqPm
attribute.description: The Reference Signal Received Quality (RSRQ) threshold value for eventA4 for PM-Initiated UE Measurements. Used only when triggerQuantityPm is set to RSRQ and measSelectionEUtraPm is set to EVENT_A4.

attribute.name: a5ThresholdRsrpPm1
attribute.description: The Reference Signal Received Power (RSRP) threshold 1 value for eventA5 for PM-Initiated UE Measurements. Used only when triggerQuantityPm is set to RSRP and measSelectionEUtraPm is set to EVENT_A5.

attribute.name: a5ThresholdRsrqPm1
attribute.description: The Reference Signal Received Quality (RSRQ) threshold 1 value for eventA5 for PM-Initiated UE Measurements. Used only when triggerQuantityPm is set to RSRQ and measSelectionEUtraPm is set to EVENT_A5.

attribute.name: a5ThresholdRsrpPm2
attribute.description: The Reference Signal Received Power (RSRP) threshold 2 value for eventA5 for PM-Initiated UE Measurements. Used only when triggerQuantityPm is set to RSRP and measSelectionEUtraPm is set to EVENT_A5.

attribute.name: a5ThresholdRsrqPm2
attribute.description: The Reference Signal Received Quality (RSRQ) threshold 2 value for eventA5 for PM-Initiated UE Measurements. Used only when triggerQuantityPm is set to RSRQ and measSelectionEUtraPm is set to EVENT_A5.

attribute.name: triggerQuantityPm
attribute.description: The Reference Signal Received Power (RSRP) or Reference Signal Received Quality (RSRQ) quantity that triggers the PM-initiated E-UTRA measurements.

attribute.name: hysteresisPm
attribute.description: The hysteresis value for the condition triggering the entering and leaving measurement report for PM-Initiated UE Measurements. Used only when measSelectionEUtraPm is set to EVENT_A1, EVENT_A2, EVENT_A3, EVENT_A4 or EVENT_A5.

attribute.name: timeToTriggerPm
attribute.description: Time during which specific event criteria must be met to trigger a measurement report for PM-Initiated UE Measurements. Used only when measSelectionEUtraPm is set to EVENT_A1, EVENT_A2, EVENT_A3, EVENT_A4 or EVENT_A5.

attribute.name: reportQuantityPm
attribute.description:
The quantities to include in the measurement report for PM-Initiated UE Measurements.
The value 0, sameAsTriggerQuantity, means that the same quantity as triggerQuantityPm is included in the measurement report.
The value 1, both, means that both Reference Signal Received Power (RSRP) and Reference Signal Received Quality (RSRQ) quantities are included in the measurement report.

attribute.name: maxReportCellsPm
attribute.description: Maximum number of cells to include in the measurement report for the PM Initiated UE Measurements.

attribute.name: reportIntervalPm
attribute.description: The interval for event-triggered periodical reporting for PM-Initiated UE Measurements.

attribute.name: reportAmountPm
attribute.description: The number of periodical reports for PM-Initiated UE Measurements. Value 0 means that reports are sent as long as the event is fulfilled.

attribute.name: reservedBy
attribute.description: Contains a list of MO instances that reserve this MO instance.
attribute.dependencies: The managed object cannot be deleted if it is reserved.

attribute.name: ReportConfigEUtraIntraFreqPmId
attribute.description: The value component of the Relative Distinguished Name (RDN).

class.name: UeMeasControl
class.description: Models the manageable characteristics for UE measurements.

attribute.name: UeMeasControlId
attribute.description: The value component of the RDN.

attribute.name: bestCellReleaseActive
attribute.description: Indicates if the best cell release function is active.
attribute.deprecated: Since L11B. Planned to be removed.

attribute.name: sMeasure
attribute.description:
Serving cell quality threshold controlling whether or not the UE is required to perform measurements of intra-frequency, inter-frequency and inter-RAT neighbouring cells.
Value "0" indicates to disable s-Measure.
Corresponds to s-Measure in TS 36.331.

attribute.name: badCoverageMeasSelection
attribute.description: Indicates if primary, secondary or both A2 measurement thresholds are used. The option to use two measurements for eventA2 is needed since the UE is not always able to use both RSRP and RSRQ measurement quantities when moving in a cell. The primary measurements default to RSRP and secondary measurements default to RSRQ. Both primary and secondary measurements can use the same measurement quantity.
attribute.deprecated: Since L11B. Has no functional behaviour. Planned to be removed.

attribute.name: filterCoefficientEUtraRsrp
attribute.description: The filtering coefficient for E-UTRA using the measured quantity Reference Signal Received Power (RSRP). The coefficient filters measurements before event evaluation.

attribute.name: filterCoefficientEUtraRsrq
attribute.description: The filtering coefficient for E-UTRA using the measured quantity Reference Signal Received Quality (RSRQ). The coefficient filters measurements before event evaluation.

attribute.name: ueMeasurementsActive
attribute.description: Activates or deactivates A5/B2 measurements on EUTRAN inter-frequencies, GERAN, UTRA and CDMA2000 frequencies for mobility purposes.

attribute.name: measurementPriority
attribute.description: Prioritizes between Automated Neighbor Relations (ANR) measurements and Performance Management (PM) measurements.
attribute.deprecated: Since L13A. Planned to be removed.

attribute.name: a5B2MobilityTimer
attribute.description: The length of time the eNodeB waits for reports from A3/A5/B2 measurements configured in the UE for mobility reasons. If the value 0 is given, the timer will not be started.

attribute.name: maxTotalReportingCriteria
attribute.description: Restricts the total number of reporting criteria which can be concurrently assigned to a UE.

attribute.name: maxRepCriteriaIntraFreq
attribute.description: Restricts the number of reporting criteria which can be concurrently assigned to an UE, on E-UTRA frequencies that are the same as the serving frequency.

attribute.name: maxRepCriteriaInterFreq
attribute.description: Restricts the number of reporting criteria on E-UTRA frequencies other than the serving frequency which can be concurrently assigned to a UE.

attribute.name: maxRepCriteriaInterOther
attribute.description: Restricts the number of reporting criteria on E-UTRA frequencies of another type (FDD - TDD) than the serving frequency which can be concurrently assigned to a UE.

attribute.name: maxRepCriteriaUtranFDD
attribute.description: Restricts the number of reporting criteria on UTRAN FDD carrier frequencies which can currently be assigned to a UE.

attribute.name: maxRepCriteriaGeran
attribute.description: Restricts the number of reporting criteria on GERAN which can be concurrently assigned to a UE.

attribute.name: maxRepCriteriaCDMA2000Hrpd
attribute.description: Restricts the number of reporting criteria on CDMA2000 eHRPD which can be concurrently assigned to a UE.

attribute.name: maxFrequencyLayers
attribute.description: Restricts the number of the total number of carrier frequency layers that the UE shall be capable of monitoring using gaps.

attribute.name: maxMeasInterFreqEUtra
attribute.description: The number of measurements that can be concurrently performed by the UE on E-UTRA frequencies other than the serving cell frequency.

attribute.name: maxMeasEUtraOther
attribute.description: The number of measurements that can be concurrently performed by the UE on E-UTRA frequencies of a type (FDD - TDD) other than the serving cell frequency.

attribute.name: maxMeasGeran
attribute.description: The number of measurements that can be concurrently performed by the UE on GERAN measurement objects.

attribute.name: maxMeasUtraFdd
attribute.description: The number of measurements that can be concurrently performed by the UE on UTRA FDD measurement objects.

attribute.name: maxMeasCdma2000eHrpd
attribute.description: The number of measurements that can be concurrently performed by the UE on CDMA2000 eHRPD measurement objects.

attribute.name: filterCoefficientGeran
attribute.description: Specifies the filtering coefficient for GERAN measurements. Used to filter measurements before event evaluation.

attribute.name: filterCoefficientUtra
attribute.description: Specifies the filtering coefficient for UTRA measurements. Used to filter measurements before event evaluation.

attribute.name: measQuantityUtraFDD
attribute.description: Measurement quantity used for all types of UTRA FDD measurements.

attribute.name: zzzTemporary1
attribute.description: Temporary attributes are intended for temporary solutions, and their usage may vary depending on the installed software. It is strongly recommended to only set the attributes that correspond to a desired functionality and leave all other temporary attributes set to default value. Information in the descriptions about what attributes are in use may be overridden by the information in CPI Info documents. Note that a later release may use another attribute to control the functionality previously provided by a temporary attribute, or may remove the functionality altogether. In these cases, the change is documented in the NIR.

attribute.name: maxMeasUtraTdd
attribute.description: The number of measurements that can be concurrently performed by the UE on UTRA TDD measurement objects.

attribute.name: maxUtranCellsToMeasure
attribute.description: Defines the maximal number of UTRAN cells to perform mobility measurements upon.

attribute.name: csfbHoTargetSearchTimer
attribute.description: Length of time the eNodeB waits for reports from B1 measurements configured in the UE for CS Fallback reasons

attribute.name: maxMeasCdma20001xRtt
attribute.description: Number of measurements that can be concurrently performed by the UE on CDMA2000 1xRTT measurement objects

attribute.name: maxRepCriteriaCDMA20001xRtt
attribute.description: Number of reporting criteria on CDMA2000 1xRTT that can be concurrently assigned to UE The value restricts the number of reporting criteria on CDMA2000 1xRTT that can be concurrently assigned to UE.

class.name: UtraNetwork
class.description: This managed object represents a Utra network.

attribute.name: UtraNetworkId
attribute.description: The value component of the Relative Distinguished Name (RDN).

attribute.name: userLabel
attribute.description: Label for free use.

class.name: UtranFreqRelation
class.description:
This Managed Object represents a UTRAN FDD mobility relation between a EUtranCellFDD or EUtranCellTDD and an UtranFrequency. It contains parameters that are specific for this relation.
Deleting this MO while the parent EUtranCellFDD/EUtranCellTDD has operationalState set to ENABLED is not recommended as it may affect traffic.

attribute.name: anrMeasOn
attribute.description: ANR performs measurement on the referenced frequency if this parameter is set to true. Otherwise, ANR does not perform any measurements on this frequency.

attribute.name: UtranFreqRelationId
attribute.description: The value component of the Relative Distinguished Name (RDN).

attribute.name: userLabel
attribute.description: Label for free use.

attribute.name: utranFrequencyRef
attribute.description: Reference to the UTRAN frequency MO, UtranFreq.

attribute.name: threshXHigh
attribute.description: The threshold used by the UE when reselecting towards a higher priority frequency from the current serving frequency. Each UTRAN frequency may have a specific threshold. The threshold is specified as parameter Thresx,high in 3GPP TS 36.304.

attribute.name: threshXLow
attribute.description: The threshold used in reselection towards a lower frequency priority from a higher priority frequency. Each frequency of UTRAN may have a specific threshold. The threshold is specified as parameter Thresx,low in 3GPP TS 36.304.

attribute.name: qRxLevMin
attribute.description: The required minimum received Rx level in the UTRAN frequency used in cell reselection. Corresponds to parameter Qrxlevmin in 3GPP TS 36.304.

attribute.name: pMaxUtra
attribute.description: Used to calculate the parameter Pcompensation (defined in 3GPP TS 36.304) at cell reselection to a UTRAN cell.

attribute.name: qQualMin
attribute.description: Minimum required quality level in the cell (dB). Corresponds to parameter Qqualmin in 3GPP TS 25.304

attribute.name: cellReselectionPriority
attribute.description:
The absolute priority of the carrier frequency used by the cell reselection procedure. Corresponds to parameter priority in 3GPP TS 36.304.
Value 0 means lowest priority. The UE behavior when the field is empty if applicable, is specified in 3GPP TS 36.304.
attribute.dependencies: The value must be uniqe and not already used by other RAT, i.e. equal priorities between RATs are not supported.

attribute.name: allowedPlmnList
attribute.description:
List of all Public Land Mobile Network (PLMN) IDs allowed for this frequency relation.
A UE that does not support one of the IDs included in the allowedPlmnList does not measure on this frequency, according to the UE Handover Restriction List.
No values in allowedPlmnList imply that the frequency has no restrictions for PLMN.
The PLMN ID contains the following parts: 1. MobileCountryCode, MCC, 3 digits 2. MobileNetworkCode, MNC, 2 or 3 digits (the correct number of digits is set in the mncLength member of this Struct)
For example, if MCC=125 and MNC=46, then plmnId=12546.

attribute.name: includeInSystemInformation
attribute.description:
Indicates if the UTRAN frequency referred to is included in System Information.
When the includeInSystemInformation is set to false, the frequency is not included in SIB6.
A maximum of 16 frequencies each can be included in SIB6 for Frequency Division Duplex and Time Division Duplex.
attribute.deprecated: L11A. Has no functional behaviour.

attribute.name: csFallbackPrio
attribute.description: Prioritizes UTRAN frequencies among all frequencies related to the cell for UEs in connected mode. Sets the priority to which frequency/frequency group to make CS Falback to. The value -1 means the the frequency is excluded. The value 0 means the lowest priority. The value 7 means the highest priority.

attribute.name: connectedModeMobilityPrio
attribute.description: Prioritizes UTRA frequencies among all frequencies related to the cell for UEs in connected mode. (0 means the lowest priority. -1 means the frequency is excluded.)

attribute.name: qOffsetFreq
attribute.description: Indicates a frequency-specific offset to apply when evaluating triggering conditions for measurement reporting.

attribute.name: csFallbackPrioEC
attribute.description: Prioritizes UTRAN frequencies for emergency calls among all frequencies/frequency groups related to the cell for UEs in connected mode. Sets the priority to which frequency to make emergency call CS Fallback to. The value -1 means the the frequency is excluded. The value 0 means the lowest priority. The value 7 means the highest priority.

attribute.name: mobilityAction
attribute.description: The preferred way to transfer a UE in connected mode to a UTRAN FDD frequency in case of coverage triggered mobility.

attribute.name: mobilityActionCsfb
attribute.description: The preferred way to transfer a UE in connected mode to a UTRAN FDD frequency in case of CS Fallback.

attribute.name: threshXHighQ
attribute.description:
Specifies the quality level threshold used by the UE when reselecting towards a higher priority UTRA frequency than the current serving frequency.
Corresponds to ThreshX, HighQ in 3GPP TS 36.304
attribute.dependencies: This parameter is included in SIB6 if the threshServingLowQ in SIB3 is included in systemInformationBlockType3.

attribute.name: threshXLowQ
attribute.description:
Specifies the quality level threshold used by the UE when reselecting towards a lower priority UTRA frequency than the current serving frequency.
Corresponds to ThreshX, LowQ in 3GPP TS 36.304
attribute.dependencies: This parameter is included in SIB6 if the threshServingLowQ in SIB3 is included in systemInformationBlockType3.

attribute.name: voicePrio
attribute.description: Prioritizes UTRAN frequencies among all frequencies related to the cell for UEs in connected mode. Sets the priority to which frequency to perform mobility to for a voice session. The value -1 means the the frequency is excluded. The value 0 means the lowest priority. The value 7 means the highest priority.

attribute.name: utranFreqToQciProfileRelation
attribute.description: QCI profile relation The attribute encapsulates parameters for service specific load management for specific QCI profiles.

attribute.name: pmLbMeasuredUe
attribute.description: Number of UE selected for measurement qualifying for load balancing action to cells on the related UTRAN frequency Values are accumulated in each ROP and used to calculate the LB measurement success rate for the related cells.
attribute.condition: In each load balancing cycle, the number of UE selected to perform LB qualification measurements on the related UTRAN frequency is accumulated. Increment by zero if no UE is selected.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

class.name: UtranFrequency
class.description: This Managed Object contains information of a specific Utran frequency.

attribute.name: UtranFrequencyId
attribute.description: The value component of the Relative Distinguished Name (RDN).

attribute.name: reservedBy
attribute.description: Contains a list of MO instances that reserve this MO instance.

attribute.name: userLabel
attribute.description: Label for free use.

attribute.name: arfcnValueUtranDl
attribute.description: Indicates the ARFCN applicable for a downlink UTRA carrier frequency, as defined in 3GPP TS 25.331.

class.name: Paging
class.description: Contains the configuration parameters for the Paging function in the RBS and applies to all the cells.

attribute.name: PagingId
attribute.description: The value component of the RDN.

attribute.name: maxNoOfPagingRecords
attribute.description: The maximum allowed number of paging records included in one Radio Resource Control (RRC) paging message. It is the allowed maximum number of UE that can be paged per paging occasion.

attribute.name: defaultPagingCycle
attribute.description: The paging cycle (also referred to as T) used by the RBS and broadcast in system information type 2. If the UE-specific Discontinuous Reception (DRX) cycle is provided in S1AP paging and has a smaller value than defaultPagingCycle, the UE-specific DRX cycle overrides defaultPagingCycle.
attribute.dependencies: modificationPeriodCoeff * defaultPagingCycle must be equal or less than 1024 radio frames. See MO SysInfoCtrl for information about modificationPeriodCoeff.

attribute.name: nB
attribute.description:
Used to calculate the number and position of Paging Occasions (PO) and Paging Frames (PF).
The numerical value of nB depends on the value of the defaultPagingCycle (T) and can be set to one of the following values:
4T, 2T, T, 1/2T,1/4T, 1/8T, 1/16T, 1/32T
When nB is set to T, 2T or 4T, it determines the number of POs per PF, and the PO position in PF.
When nB is set to a value smaller than T, it affects the System Frame Number of the PF, the position of PO in the PF, and also distribution of UE into groups with the same PF.
When nB is set to a smaller value, the groups are fewer but larger, or more but smaller.
attribute.dependencies: nB=T4 can not be used in combination with specialSubframePattern = 5 on MO EUtranCellTDD, see 3GPP TS 36.213.

attribute.name: pagingDiscardTimer
attribute.description: The length of time a received paging is retained or queued in the RBS before it is discarded. The timer should be set to the same (or smaller) value as the paging resend timer in MME (T3413). This setting prevents the RBS from retaining or sending an old paging after the re-sent copy is received from the MME.

attribute.name: noOfDefPagCyclPrim
attribute.description: Number of consecutive "DefaultPagingCycles" in which paging for Earthquake and Tsunami Warning System (ETWS) Primary Notification shall be transmitted in the RBS.

class.name: Rcs
class.description: This MO models the manageable characteristics of the Radio Connection Supervision functionality.

attribute.name: RcsId
attribute.description: The value component of the RDN.

attribute.name: tInactivityTimer
attribute.description:
The time a UE can be inactive before it is released.
86400s = 24 hours
Special values: 0 is used to turn off the use of this timer. This means that a UE will not be released due to inactivity.

class.name: SecurityHandling
class.description: Models the manageable characteristics of the security handling except security handling during X2 handover and S1 handover. These characteristics are then used by all instances of the RRC dedicated protocol.

attribute.name: pmRrcSecFailUnexpectedMsg
attribute.description: The total number of unexpected RRC messages received in the RBS.
attribute.condition: The counter will be incremented every time an RRC message is received in a state where the message is not expected.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: SecurityHandlingId
attribute.description: The value component of the RDN.

attribute.name: integrityProtectionActive
attribute.description: Parameter for controlling if integrity protection of RRC messages is on or off in the RBS.

attribute.name: countWrapSupervisionActive
attribute.description: Parameter for controlling whether or not to supervise if COUNT-C is about to wrap.

attribute.name: countWrapThreshold
attribute.description: Sets the threshold for acting when COUNT-C is about to wrap.

attribute.name: rbIdSupervisionActive
attribute.description: Controls supervision when the same radio bearer ID with the same set of parameters occurs in the ciphering algorithm.

attribute.name: integrityProtectionAlgorithms
attribute.description: The priority of the algorithms 128-EIA1 (based on SNOW 3G), 128-EIA2 (based on AES) and 128-EIA3 (based on ZUC). A single algorithm or both algorithms can be used.
attribute.deprecated: Since L13A. Replaced by integrityProtectAlgoPrio.

attribute.name: pmRrcSecFailIntegrity
attribute.description: The total number of verification failures of RRC messages in the RBS.
attribute.condition: The counter will be incremented every time an RRC verification failure is reported.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: cipheringAlgorithms
attribute.description: The priority of ciphering algorithms 128-EEA1 (based on SNOW 3G), 128-EEA2 (based on AES), 128-EEA3 (based on ZUC), and EEA0 (null ciphering, no ciphering applied). It is also possible to specify that one or more of the algorithms should not be used at all.
attribute.deprecated: Since L13A. Replaced by cipheringAlgoPrio.

attribute.name: pmZtemporary45
attribute.description: Normally this counter is not used, it can however sometimes be temporarily used for very late additions in a release. If so, for description see Network Impact Report in the CPI.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: cipheringAlgoPrio
attribute.description: An array specifying the ciphering algorithms that should be allowed and their priority order. The array has a maximum length of 4 and a minimum length of 1. The algorithm in index zero has the highest priority. Each algorithm shall be written only once in the array.

attribute.name: integrityProtectAlgoPrio
attribute.description: An array specifying the integrity protection algorithms that should be allowed and their priority order. The array has a maximum length of 3 and a minimum length of 1. The algorithm in index zero has the highest priority. Each algorithm shall be written only once in the array.

class.name: GeraNetwork
class.description: This managed object represents a Gera network.

attribute.name: GeraNetworkId
attribute.description: The value component of the Relative Distinguished Name (RDN).

attribute.name: userLabel
attribute.description: Label for free use.

class.name: GeranFreqGroup
class.description: This managed object contains information about a set of Geran ARFCN values, which represents a group of Geran frequencies within the same band.

attribute.name: GeranFreqGroupId
attribute.description: The value component of the Relative Distinguished Name (RDN).

attribute.name: userLabel
attribute.description: Label for free use.

attribute.name: reservedBy
attribute.description: Contains a list of MO instances that reserve this MO instance.
attribute.dependencies: The MO may not be deleted if it is reserved.

attribute.name: frequencyGroupId
attribute.description: This ID identifies the GeranFreqGroup in the network.

class.name: GeranFreqGroupRelation
class.description:
This Managed Object represents a mobility relation between an EUtranCellFDD or an EUtranCellTDD and a GeranFreqGroup. It contains parameters that are specific for this relation.
Deleting this MO while the parent EUtranCellFDD/EUtranCellTDD has operationalState set to ENABLED is not recommended as it may affect traffic.

attribute.name: GeranFreqGroupRelationId
attribute.description: The value component of the Relative Distinguished Name (RDN).

attribute.name: userLabel
attribute.description: Label for free use.

attribute.name: geranFreqGroupRef
attribute.description: Reference to the GERAN frequency group MO, GeranFreqGroup.

attribute.name: qRxLevMin
attribute.description: The required minimum received Rx level in the GERAN frequency used in cell reselection. Corresponds to parameter Qrxlevmin in 3GPP TS 36.304.

attribute.name: pMaxGeran
attribute.description: Calculates the parameter Pcompensation (defined in 3GPP TS 36.304) at cell reselection to a GERAN cell. Value 1000 means the parameter is not included in system information.

attribute.name: threshXHigh
attribute.description: The threshold used by the UE when reselecting towards a higher priority frequency from the current serving frequency. Each frequency of GERAN may have a specific threshold. Corresponds to parameter Thresx,high in 3GPP TS 36.304.

attribute.name: threshXLow
attribute.description: The threshold used by UE when reselecting towards a lower priority frequency from the current serving frequency. Corresponds to parameter Thresx,low in 3GPP TS 36.304.

attribute.name: nccPermitted
attribute.description:
Field encoded as a bit map.
Bit N is set to 0 if a BCCH carrier with NCC = N-1 is not permitted for monitoring.
Bit N is set to 1 if the BCCH carrier with NCC = N-1 is permitted for monitoring.
Bit N = 1 to 8; bit 1 of the bitmap is the right-most bit of the bit string.

attribute.name: cellReselectionPriority
attribute.description: Absolute priority of the radio access technology. 0 means lowest priority. Corresponds to parameter priority in 3GPP TS 36.304.
attribute.dependencies: The value must be uniqe and not already used by other RAT, i.e. equal priorities between RATs are not supported.

attribute.name: allowedPlmnList
attribute.description:
Lists all Public Land Mobile Network (PLMN) IDs allowed for this frequency relation.
A UE that does not support one of the IDs included in allowedPlmnList does not measure on this frequency, according to the UE Handover Restriction List.
No values in the list imply that the frequency has no restrictions for PLMN.
The PLMN identity contains the following parts: 1. MobileCountryCode, MCC, 3 digits 2. MobileNetworkCode, MNC, 2 or 3 digits (the correct number of digits is set in the mncLength member of this Struct)
For example, if MCC=125 and MNC=46, then plmnId=12546.

attribute.name: includeInSystemInformation
attribute.description:
Indicates if the GERAN frequency group referred to is included in System Information.
When the includeinSystemInformation is set to false, the GERAN frequency group is not included in SIB7. A maximum of 16 GERAN frequency groups can be included in SIB7.
attribute.deprecated: L11A. Has no functional behaviour.

attribute.name: csFallbackPrio
attribute.description: Prioritizes GERAN Frequency group among all frequencies related to the cell for UEs in connected mode. Sets the priority to which frequency/frequency group to make CS Fallback to. The value -1 means the the frequency is excluded. The value 0 means the lowest priority. The value 7 means the highest priority.

attribute.name: connectedModeMobilityPrio
attribute.description: Prioritizes GERAN frequencies among all frequencies related to the cell for UEs in connected mode. (0 means the lowest priority. -1 means the frequency is excluded.)

attribute.name: qOffsetFreq
attribute.description: Indicates a frequency-specific offset to apply when evaluating triggering conditions for measurement reporting.

attribute.name: csFallbackPrioEC
attribute.description: Prioritizes GERAN Frequency group among all frequencies/frequency groups for emergency calls related to the cell for UEs in connected mode. Sets the priority to which frequency group to make emergency call CS Fallback to. The value -1 means the the frequency is excluded. The value 0 means the lowest priority. The value 7 means the highest priority.

attribute.name: mobilityActionCsfb
attribute.description: The preferred way to transfer a UE in connected mode to a GERAN frequency group in case of CS Fallback.

attribute.name: mobilityAction
attribute.description: The preferred way to transfer a UE in connected mode to a GERAN frequency group in case of coverage triggered mobility.

attribute.name: anrMeasOn
attribute.description: ANR performs measurement on the referenced frequency if this parameter is set to true. Otherwise, ANR does not perform any measurements on this frequency.

class.name: GeranFrequency
class.description: This Managed Object contains information of a specific Geran frequency.

attribute.name: GeranFrequencyId
attribute.description: The value component of the Relative Distinguished Name (RDN).

attribute.name: userLabel
attribute.description: Label for free use.

attribute.name: bandIndicator
attribute.description:
Indicates how to interpret an associated GERAN carrier ARFCN.
The parameter indicates the GERAN frequency band when the ARFCN value is either a DCS 1800 or a PCS 1900 carrier frequency. For ARFCN values not associated with one of these bands, the indicator has no meaning.

attribute.name: arfcnValueGeranDl
attribute.description: The GERAN BCCH carrier frequency.

class.name: ExternalCdma2000Cell
class.description: The MO represents a CDMA2000 HRPD cell.

attribute.name: ExternalCdma2000CellId
attribute.description: The value component of the Relative Distinguished Name (RDN).

attribute.name: pnOffset
attribute.description: The CDMA physical cell identity.

attribute.name: userLabel
attribute.description: Label for free use.

attribute.name: cellGlobalIdHrpd
attribute.description:
The IPv6 address for a CDMA2000 HRPD cell. The input format is eight groups of four digits and characters each, separated by colons.
Ex. 2001:0db8:0000:0000:0000:0000:1428:07ab

attribute.name: reservedBy
attribute.description: Contains a list of MO instances that reserve this MO instance.
attribute.dependencies: The MO may not be deleted if it is reserved.

class.name: ExternalEUtranCellFDD
class.description: This managed object represents a neighbor EUTRAN cell (FDD) in another ENodeB in any MME pool.

attribute.name: ExternalEUtranCellFDDId
attribute.description: The value component of the Relative Distinguished Name (RDN).

attribute.name: localCellId
attribute.description: RBS internal ID attribute for the ExternalEUtranCellFDD. Must be unique in the RBS. Together with the Node ID and Public Land Mobile Network (PLMN) ID this is a globally unique eUTRAN Cell ID (ECGI).

attribute.name: physicalLayerCellIdGroup
attribute.description: The physical-layer cell-identity group. Physical-layer cell IDs are grouped into 168 unique physical-layer cell-identity groups, each group containing 3 unique subidentities.

attribute.name: physicalLayerSubCellId
attribute.description: The unique subidentity within a group. Physical-layer cell identities are grouped into 168 unique physical-layer cell-identity groups, each group containing 3 unique subidentities.

attribute.name: reservedBy
attribute.description: Lists EUtranCellRelation managed object instances that reserve this managed object instance.
attribute.dependencies: The managed object cannot be deleted if it is reserved.

attribute.name: userLabel
attribute.description: User-defined alphanumeric label, maximum 128 characters including spaces.

attribute.name: tac
attribute.description: The Tracking Area Code of an external cell.

attribute.name: bPlmnList
attribute.description:
Lists all broadcast Public Land Mobile Network (PLMN) IDs for a cell that is served by a neighboring RBS.
The PLMN identity contains the following parts: 1. MobileCountryCode, MCC, 3 digits 2. MobileNetworkCode, MNC, 2 or 3 digits (the correct number of digits is set in the mncLength member of this Struct)
Example: If MCC=125 and MNC=46, then plmnId=12546.
This attribute is set by the RBS at X2 SETUP procedure.
attribute.deprecated: Replaced by activePlmnList Since L11A.

attribute.name: dlChannelBandwidth
attribute.description: The downlink channel bandwidth in a cell that is served by a neighboring RBS. The parameter is set by the RBS at X2 SETUP procedure.

attribute.name: anrCreated
attribute.description: Indicates if the MO was created by the Automated Neighbor Relations (ANR) function.
attribute.deprecated: Since L11B. Replaced by createdBy.

attribute.name: isRemoveAllowed
attribute.description: Indicates if the Automated Neighbor Relations (ANR) function is allowed to remove this object. The setting does not restrict operator removal of the object. Objects created by ANR have this attribute set to true initially.

attribute.name: masterEUtranCellFDDId
attribute.description: The identity of the EUtranCellFDD represented by this MO, for managed objects automatically created by ExternalEUtranCellFDD.

attribute.name: timeOfAnrCreation
attribute.description: The date and time when the MO was created by the Automated Neighbor Relations (ANR) function. Format: YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS
attribute.deprecated: Replaced by timeOfCreation. Since L11B.

attribute.name: timeOfAnrModification
attribute.description: The date and time when the MO was last modified by the Automated Neighbor Relations (ANR) function. Format: YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS
attribute.deprecated: Replaced by timeOfLastModification. Since L11B.

attribute.name: ctrlMode
attribute.description:
Indicates permission to change attributes on the object and to delete the object.
When set to Manual, the operator can change and delete, and the Automated Neighbor Relations (ANR) function cannot make changes.
When set to Auto, the ANR function can change and delete, and the operator cannot, except to change the settings of this attribute.
When the object is created by the ANR function, the value is set to Auto. This value may be changed only by the operator. The setting of this attribute controls the object itself, but not related objects.
attribute.deprecated: Since L11B. Planned to be removed.

attribute.name: ulChannelBandwidth
attribute.description: The uplink channel bandwidth in a cell that is served by a neighboring RBS. The attribute is set by the RBS at X2 SETUP procedure.

attribute.name: eutranFrequencyRef
attribute.description: Reference to the EUTRAN frequency MO, EUtranFrequency. Cannot be changed as long as this MO is refered to by a EUtranCellRelation MO.

attribute.name: removingMonitoringStart
attribute.description: Indicates the time and date when the MO was started for monitoring for automatc removal by the (automatic neighbor relation) function. Format: YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS

attribute.name: activePlmnList
attribute.description: Lists the Public Land Mobile Network (PLMN) IDs of the External E-UTRAN Cell. The list may include up to 6 PLMNs. Tracks activePlmnList in the corresponding instance of EUtranCellFDD/TDD in another RBS. The list is updated via X2 or OSS-RC, or manually.

attribute.name: createdBy
attribute.description: Indicates whether the MO has been created by the Automated Neighbor Relations (ANR) function or operator or X2

attribute.name: timeOfCreation
attribute.description: Indicates the time and date when the MO was created. Format: YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS

attribute.name: lastModification
attribute.description: Indicates whether the MO was last modified by the Automated Neighbor Relations (ANR) function or operator or X2 and if the MO is to be deleted who triggered the deletion

attribute.name: timeOfLastModification
attribute.description: Indicates the time and date when the MO was last modified. Format: YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS

attribute.name: pciConflict
attribute.description: A PCI confusion exists if a source cell has relations to two neighbours cells where both neighbours cells have the same PCI and frequency. A PCI collision exists if a source cell has a relation to a neighbour cell where both the source cell and neighbour cell has the same PCI and frequency.

attribute.name: pciConflictCell
attribute.description: Indicates the CGI of the other cell that is involved in the PCI collision/confusion. This value is only valid if the attribute pciConflict is "YES" or "YES_CONFLICTING_CELL".

attribute.name: csgPhysCellId
attribute.description: Physical Cell Identity for the CSG (Closed Subscriber Group). It is the start physical cell ID in the SIB4. If value is equal to 1000, it means that csg-PhysCellIdRange IE is not presented in SIB4.
attribute.dependencies: This attribute has a dependency to csgPhysCellIdRange.

attribute.name: csgPhysCellIdRange
attribute.description: It is the range of Physical Cell Identity for the CSG (Closed Subscriber Group). The information is broadcasted in SIB4.
attribute.dependencies: If csgPhyscellId != 1000, csgPhysCellId + csgPhysCellIdRange <= 504

attribute.name: pciDetectingCell
attribute.description: Indicates the CGI of the cell that detected the PCI collision/confusion. This value is only valid if the corresponding attribute pciConflict is "YES" or "YES_CONFLICTING_CELL". The first cell in the pciDetectingCell list corresponds to the first cell in the pciConflictCell list and the first value of pciConflict. The second cell in the pciDetectingCell list corresponds to the second cell in the pciConflictCell list and the first value of pciConflict.

parameter.name: earfcn
parameter.description: Changes the frequency of the external cell. If not already existing an instance of EUtranFrequency with corresponding EUtranFreqRelation is created. For all EUtranCells within the eNB with existing cell relations to the updated external cell, new EUtranCellRelation instances are created.

parameter.name: earfcn
parameter.description: Return type: sequence of struct performedOperation Changes the frequency of the external cell. This means it should change the value of the attribute eutranFrequencyRef to refer to the correct EUtranFrequency MO (creating it if necessary). It also includes moving the EUtranCellRelation MO:s to the corresponding EUtranFrequencyRelation MO. Returns a list of performed operations.

attribute.name: indicatorState
attribute.description: Check the alarms and based on that information distribute the correct indicator status to the Status Indicator. Valid values: • OFF = No fault exist in the node or in remote units • STEADY_ON = A fault exist in the node. • SLOW_BLINK = Fault in remote unit.
attribute.deprecated: Since L13A. Replaced by NodeManagementFunction::indicatorState.

attribute.name: timeAndPhaseSynchCritical
attribute.description: Indicates if the cell can operate as an asynchronous cell under error conditions.

attribute.name: ENodeBFunctionId
attribute.description: The value component of the RDN.

attribute.name: userLabel
attribute.description: Label for free use.

attribute.name: sctpRef
attribute.description: Refers to the SCTP instance that is used to configure the SCTP host for S1 and X2 connections.

attribute.name: dnsLookupOnTai
attribute.description:
Controls if the Tracking Area Identity (TAI) is used to get IP addresses of MME nodes from the Domain Name System (DNS).
The RBS uses TAI to automatically obtain all MME IP addresses from the DNS when dnsLookupOnTai is switched on, or at RBS start or restart.
The MME IP address list is refreshed periodically and MME connections released and setup according to the new list. The MME IP address list can also be refreshed from OSS-RC.

attribute.name: dnsLookupTimer
attribute.description: The interval to perform DNS Lookup to get potential new IP addresses of MME nodes. DNS lookup is performed for the TAI domain name. If the value is set to zero, then no periodic DNS Lookup is done.

attribute.name: dscpLabel
attribute.description: Static mapping of DiffServ label for control messages, Performance Management (PM), and Non-Access Stratum (NAS).
attribute.dependencies: Will only be used then dscpUsage is active.

attribute.name: collectTraceStatus
attribute.description: Status of trace collection, initiated with operation collectTraces.
attribute.deprecated: Since L13A. Replaced by NodeManagementFunction::collectTraceStatus.

attribute.name: eNBId
attribute.description: The ENodeB ID that forms part of the Cell Global Identity, and is also used to identify the node over the S1 interface.

attribute.name: eNodeBPlmnId
attribute.description:
The ENodeB Public Land Mobile Network (PLMN) ID that forms part of the ENodeB Global ID used to identify the node over the S1 interface.
Note: default PLMNIdentity is not a valid PLMN Identity. S1 interface will not be setup with the default PLMNIdentity.

attribute.name: oaMLinkSuperVisionActive
attribute.description: Controls enabling and disabling the supervision function that restarts the RBS when the O&M link is disabled.
attribute.deprecated: Since L13A. Replaced by NodeManagementFunction::oaMLinkSuperVisionActive.

attribute.name: x2BlackList
attribute.description: A list of blacklisted RBS IDs. X2 may not be set up to any neighbor RBS in the blacklist.
attribute.disturbances: If an eNB is added to the list, any termPointToEnb for this external eNB is removed.

attribute.name: x2retryTimerMaxAuto
attribute.description: See attribute x2RetryTimerStart.

attribute.name: x2retryTimerStart
attribute.description:
After failed X2 setup and after X2 link break the x2RetryTimer is used to control the time till next retry. x2RetryTimer is used for DNS, SCTP, X2AP retries and x2IpAddrViaS1.
After first failed setup or missing IP address from DNS, x2RetryTimer = max(x2RetryTimerStart,W), where W is the timeToWait received in x2SetupFail. If W is not received, W=0.
After link break, x2RetryTimer = random(0,x2RetryTimerStart). If the first setup after link break fails, the timer values according to the above and below paragraphs shall apply as for failed inital setup.
After 2nd and following fails, if the X2 connection is not being setup by ANR in the S-RBS, x2RetryTimer = max(x2RetryTimerStart,W).
After 2nd and following fails, if the X2 connection is being setup by ANR in the S-RBS, x2RetryTimer = max(min[2^(n-2)*x2RetryTimerStart, x2retryTimerMaxAuto], W), where n is failure number.
Each W is only used in the first retry after it is received.

attribute.name: x2WhiteList
attribute.description: The list of whitelisted RBS IDs. Automated Neighbor Relations (ANR) is not allowed to disconnect X2 for any neighbor RBS in the whitelist.

attribute.name: pmHwUtilDl
attribute.deprecated: Since L12B. Planned to be removed.
attribute.condition: The PDF shall be updated each TTI with the percentage of hardware resources used.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmHwUtilUl
attribute.deprecated: Since L12B. Planned to be removed.
attribute.condition: The PDF shall be updated each TTI with the percentage of PDCCH resources used.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: s1RetryTimer
attribute.description: Defines the frequency to perform re-establishment of SCTP and S1-AP connection, when the connection to a MME is lost.

attribute.name: tHODataFwdReordering
attribute.description: Target eNodeB supervision of the DL data forwarding activity. The timer is started when DL data on S1-U is received. At expiry the tunnel end-point for DL forwarding is locally released.
attribute.deprecated: Since L13A. Has no functional behaviour, planned to be removed.

attribute.name: ulSchedulerDynamicBWAllocationEnabled
attribute.description: Specifies if the advanced UL scheduler is enabled

attribute.name: upIpAccessHostRef
attribute.description: Refers to the IpAccessHostEt instance to use for configuring the IP access host for S1 and X2 user plane connections. This attribute must contain a valid MO reference if the IPsec function is used.

attribute.name: x2IpAddrViaS1Active
attribute.description: Indicates if the function X2 IP addresses over S1 is active in the RBS.

attribute.name: nnsfMode
attribute.description:
The mode used by the RBS for the non-access stratum node selection.
Regardless of the mode used, the function attempts to:
- Reconnect every UE to its registered MME in any of the tracking areas of the cell.
- Distribute the UEs that are not reconnected among MMEs that serve the Public Land Mobile Network selected by each UE.

attribute.name: dlTransNwBandwidth
attribute.description: Downlink transport network bandwidth for LTE.
attribute.deprecated: Replaced by AdmissionControl::dlTransNwBandwidth. Since L11B.

attribute.name: ulTransNwBandwidth
attribute.description: Uplink transport network bandwidth for LTE.
attribute.deprecated: Replaced by AdmissionControl::ulTransNwBandwidth. Since L11B.

attribute.name: dlAccGbrAdmThresh
attribute.description: Admission threshold on accumulated Guaranteed Bit Rate (GBR) in the downlink, expressed as a fraction of the downlink transport network bandwidth for LTE.
attribute.deprecated: Since L11B. Replaced by AdmissionControl::dlGbrAdmThresh.
attribute.dependencies: The downlink transport network bandwidth for LTE needs to be configured into attribute ENodeBFunction::dlTransNwBandwidth.

attribute.name: ulAccGbrAdmThresh
attribute.description: Admission threshold on accumulated Guaranteed Bit Rate (GBR) in the uplink, expressed as a fraction of the uplink transport network bandwidth for LTE.
attribute.deprecated: Replaced by AdmissionControl::ulGbrAdmThresh. Since L11B.
attribute.dependencies: The uplink transport network bandwidth for LTE needs to be configured into attribute ENodeBFunction::ulTransNwBandwidth.

attribute.name: ipAddress
attribute.description: The IP address of the host. This is a mirrored value of the attribute ipAddress, MO IpAccessHostEt.

attribute.name: pmPdcpPktDiscDlEth
attribute.description: Total number of downlink DRB packets (PDCP SDUs) discarded in the Ethernet part of the eNB.
attribute.deprecated: Since L12B. Planned to be removed.
attribute.condition: Discarded PDCP SDUs in the Ethernet part between GTP-u and PDCP layer.
attribute.scanner: Primary

attribute.name: collectLogsStatus
attribute.description: Status of logs collection, initiated with operation collectAutIntLogs.
attribute.deprecated: Since L13A. Replaced by NodeManagementFunction::collectLogsStatus.

attribute.name: schedulingStrategy
attribute.description: The scheduling strategy that is used in the RBS.
attribute.deprecated: Since L12A. Planned to be removed.

attribute.name: rrcConnReestActive
attribute.description: Indicates if the feature RRC Connection Reestablishment is ACTIVATED or DEACTIVATED.

attribute.name: zzzTemporary1
attribute.description: Temporary attributes are intended for temporary solutions, and their usage may vary depending on the installed software. It is strongly recommended to only set the attributes that correspond to a desired functionality and leave all other temporary attributes set to default value. Information in the descriptions about what attributes are in use may be overridden by the information in CPI Info documents. Note that a later release may use another attribute to control the functionality previously provided by a temporary attribute, or may remove the functionality altogether. In these cases, the change is documented in the NIR.

attribute.name: zzzTemporary2
attribute.description: Temporary attributes are intended for temporary solutions, and their usage may vary depending on the installed software. It is strongly recommended to only set the attributes that correspond to a desired functionality and leave all other temporary attributes set to default value. Information in the descriptions about what attributes are in use may be overridden by the information in CPI Info documents. Note that a later release may use another attribute to control the functionality previously provided by a temporary attribute, or may remove the functionality altogether. In these cases, the change is documented in the NIR.

attribute.name: zzzTemporary3
attribute.description: Temporary attributes are intended for temporary solutions, and their usage may vary depending on the installed software. It is strongly recommended to only set the attributes that correspond to a desired functionality and leave all other temporary attributes set to default value. Information in the descriptions about what attributes are in use may be overridden by the information in CPI Info documents. Note that a later release may use another attribute to control the functionality previously provided by a temporary attribute, or may remove the functionality altogether. In these cases, the change is documented in the NIR.

attribute.name: zzzTemporary4
attribute.description: Temporary attributes are intended for temporary solutions, and their usage may vary depending on the installed software. It is strongly recommended to only set the attributes that correspond to a desired functionality and leave all other temporary attributes set to default value. Information in the descriptions about what attributes are in use may be overridden by the information in CPI Info documents. Note that a later release may use another attribute to control the functionality previously provided by a temporary attribute, or may remove the functionality altogether. In these cases, the change is documented in the NIR.
