attribute.name: pmZtemporary34
attribute.description: Normally this counter is not used, it can however sometimes be temporarily used for very late additions in a release. If so, for description see Network Impact Report in the CPI.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmZtemporary35
attribute.description: Normally this counter is not used, it can however sometimes be temporarily used for very late additions in a release. If so, for description see Network Impact Report in the CPI.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: x2SetupTwoWayRelations
attribute.description: This parameter indicates if two way relations shall be setup during X2 setup and eNB configuration. The RBS creates a two-way relation for each entry in the received neighbour information that contains a relation to a source cell. Neighbour information is sent in X2 setup and eNB configuration. Neighbour information is eUtranCellRelations per source cell from the sending node.

attribute.name: technicianPresent
attribute.description: Indicates that a technician on site has pushed the Maintenance Button. Persistently stored attribute not handled by CV.
attribute.deprecated: Since L13A. Replaced by NodeManagementFunction::technicianPresent.

attribute.name: alarmSuppressed
attribute.description: Indicates that all alarms in the node are suppressed. Alarm suppression can be started on site via a push on the Maintenance Button or off site via OSS-RC. Persistently stored attribute not handled by CV.
attribute.deprecated: Since L13A. Replaced by NodeManagementFunction::alarmSuppressed.
attribute.dependencies: Remote management applications can only change this attribute if attribute ENodeBFunction::technicianPresent=false.

attribute.name: timePhaseMaxDeviation
attribute.description: Defines the maximum allowed time/phase deviation for time/phase synchronization of the eNodeB.
attribute.dependencies: This parameter is relevant when the parameter timeAndPhaseSynchCritical has the value true.

attribute.name: pmRohcCidDlSum
attribute.description: Sum of all downlink sample values recorded for the number of Robust Header Compression context IDs
attribute.deprecated: Since L12B. Planned to be removed.
attribute.condition: At each time sampled measurement, the result is added to the existing aggregated value.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmRohcCidDlSamp
attribute.description: Counts the number of times the corresponding downlink Sum counters has been incremented. Associated ACC pmCounter pmRohcCidDlSum.
attribute.deprecated: Since L12B. Planned to be removed.
attribute.condition: The counter is increased at every occasion when the corresponding sum counter is increased.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmRohcCidUlSum
attribute.description: Sum of all uplink sample values recorded for the number of Robust Header Compression context IDs
attribute.deprecated: Since L12B. Planned to be removed.
attribute.condition: At each time sampled measurement, the result is added to the existing aggregated value.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmRohcCidUlSamp
attribute.description: Counts the number of times the corresponding uplink Sum counters has been incremented. Associated ACC pmCounter pmRohcCidUlSum.
attribute.deprecated: Since L12B. Planned to be removed.
attribute.condition: The counter is increased at every occasion when the corresponding sum counter is increased.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: licCapDistrMethod
attribute.description: Used to set how the licensed capacity will be distributed between the baseband processing resources

attribute.name: pmPagS1Received
attribute.description: This counter counts the number of received S1AP Paging messages in the RBS.
attribute.condition: When a S1AP Paging is received from an MME which is correct and complete. S1AP Paging messages containing ASN.1 errors are not counted.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmPagS1Discarded
attribute.description: The number of S1AP Paging messages that are discarded (and not routed to any cell) due to that the maximum number of incoming S1AP Paging messages during a certain time interval is reached. This counter is a subset of pmPagS1Received.
attribute.condition: An S1AP Paging message is discarded due to max intensity of incoming S1AP Paging messages is reached.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: s1HODirDataPathAvail
attribute.description: S1 Handover data forwarding can be of two types, direct and indirect. Direct forwarding requires direct connectivity between source and target eNodeB. This parameter is used to indicate if such direct connectivity exist.
attribute.dependencies: Optional Feature Data Forwarding at S1 Handover

attribute.name: randCdma20001xRtt
attribute.description: Rand initial value used for authentication input to the RAND generation algorithm in eNodeB The RAND-CDMA2000 concerns a random value, generated by the eNodeB, to be passed to the UE and MME.

attribute.name: minRandc
attribute.description: Rand range datatype is the eight most significant bit (MSB) of the Rand used for authentication The RandcRange attribute controls the minimum and maximum random number values that can be generated. Typically a range of random numbers is allocated to each system using this attribute.
attribute.dependencies: minRandc < maxRandc

attribute.name: maxRandc
attribute.description: Rand range datatype is the eight most significant bit (MSB) of the Rand used for authentication The RandcRange attribute controls the minimum and maximum random number values that can be generated. Typically a range of random numbers is allocated to each system using this attribute.
attribute.dependencies: maxRandc > minRandc

attribute.name: randUpdateInterval
attribute.description: Random number update interval This attribute specifies the time interval in minutes between random number generation. When this interval expires, the eNodeB generates a new random number between MinRandc and MaxRandc.

action.name: updateMMEConnection
action.description:
This action shall make it possible to order the RBS to make a new DNS lookup to get possible new MME Pool addresses. The orderCode has two different options:
- Retain: This option will retain all connections that were included in DNS response and the connections that weren’t included in the response will be removed. For the IP addresses that were unknown for the RBS, the RBS will establish connections to those MMEs.
- Renew All existing: The RBS performs a DNS lookup. Release all S1 connections to the MMEs and connect to the MMEs that are included in the DNS response.
This action should be used only when dnsLookupOnTai has the value ON. The action is rejected if dnsLookupState has the value OFF.
Transaction Required: Yes.

action.name: collectTraces
action.description:
Starts traces collection. Log files from the RBS node are collected and stored into a gzipped file, /c/logfiles/CollectTraces.log.zip. The same file is used every time, that is if a result file exists it is overwritten. If the action is started when a trace collection is already ongoing a ActionAlreadyInProgressException is thrown. Attribute collectTraceStatus shows the status of this operation.
Transaction Required: No.
action.deprecated: Since L13A. Replaced by action collectTraces on NodeManagementFunction.

action.name: createIratCellAndRel
action.description:
This MO action is used for creation of ExternalUtranCellFDD/ExternalUtranCellTDD/UtranCellRelation or ExternalGeranCell/GeranCellRelation. The returnType is struct with the name; performedOperation.
Transaction Required: Yes.

parameter.name: arfcn
parameter.description: Arfcn is arfcnValueUtranDl for Utran. Arfcn is arfcnValueGeranDl for Geran.

parameter.name: bandindicatorGeran
parameter.description: Bandindicator for Geran. Bandindicator is not used for Utran.

parameter.name: pci
parameter.description: Indicates the physical layer identity of the cell. That is, the primary scrambling code for Utran. For Geran, pci is bcc and ncc.

parameter.name: sourcePlmnId
parameter.description: The plmnId of the source cell.

parameter.name: sourceEnbId
parameter.description: The eNBId of the source cell.

parameter.name: sourceCellid
parameter.description: The cellId of the source cell.

parameter.name: targetPlmnId
parameter.description: The plmnId of the target cell.

parameter.name: targetRncId
parameter.description: The eNBId of the target cell.

parameter.name: targetCellid
parameter.description: The cellId of the target cell.

parameter.name: rat
parameter.description: ExternalUtranCellFdds and UtranCellRelation are requested to be created if RAT is equal to UTRAN. ExternalGeranCellFdds and GeranCellRelation are requested to be created if RAT is equal to GERAN.

parameter.name: locationAreaCode
parameter.description: The Location Area Code of the external UTRAN cell and external Geran cell.

parameter.name: routingAreaCode
parameter.description: The Routing Area Code of the external UTRAN cell and external Geran cell.

parameter.name: coverageIndicator
parameter.description: Defines whether the coverage areas of the EUTRAN cell and the UTRAN FDD cell are indicated to overlap (have approximately the same coverage area) or not.

action.name: collectAutIntLogs
action.description:
Starts collection log files that are relevant to autointegration. The action runs COLI commands to produce a set of log files in the RBS node. The log files are collected and stored into the directory /c/logfiles/autointegration. For each log file, the same filename is used every time which means that old files are overwritten. If the action is started when a trace collection is already ongoing a ActionAlreadyInProgressException is thrown. Note that other logs and traces that are already filebased are not covered by this action. Attribute collectLogsStatus shows the status of this operation.
Transaction Required: No.
action.deprecated: Since L13A. Replaced by action collectAutIntLogs on NodeManagementFunction.

action.name: collectDynamicCellStatus
action.description:
Returns a snapshot of the traffic status of the node divided per cell, in the form; number of attached UEs and set up radio bearers.
Transaction Required: No.

parameter.name: dynamicCellStatusOutput
parameter.description: Specifies the format of the returned information. It can be either of: - Unformatted text, suitable for on-screen reading. - Formatted text, suitable for automated interpretation, currently JSON (JavaScript Object Notation).

action.name: clearTechnicianPresent
action.description: Resets the attribute technicianPresent to false.
action.deprecated: Since L13A. Replaced by action clearTechnicianPresent on NodeManagementFunction.

class.name: EUtranCellFDD
class.description: This MO represents a Cell and contains parameters needed by the cell. It also contains parameters for the mandatory common channels.

attribute.name: pmRlcArqDlAck
attribute.description:
The total number of successful RLC PDU transmissions (ACKs) in the downlink direction.
When carrier aggregation is used, the total number of successful RLC PDU transmissions (ACKs) in the downlink direction is registered on the UE's primary component carrier (PCell).
attribute.condition: Continuous measurement for Radio Bearers aggregated to cell level.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmRlcArqDlNack
attribute.description:
The total number of unsuccessful RLC PDU and RLC PDU segment transmissions (NACKs) in the downlink direction.
When carrier aggregation is used, the total number of unsuccessful RLC PDU and RLC PDU segment transmissions (NACKs) in the downlink direction is registered on the UE's primary component carrier (PCell).
attribute.condition: Continuous measurement for Radio Bearers aggregated to cell level.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmUeThpTimeDl
attribute.description:
The effective DL transport time comprises those periods from when the first part of the PDCP SDU of the DL buffer was transmitted on Uu until the buffer is emptied, excluding the TTI emptying the buffer.
When carrier aggregation is used, a PDCP SDU can be sent over multiple cells (PCell/SCell(s)). The effective DL transport time, comprising those periods from when the first part of the PDCP SDU of the DL buffer was transmitted on Uu until the buffer is emptied, excluding the TTI emptying the buffer, is registered on PCell.
attribute.condition: Continuous measurement for UEs aggregated to cell level.
attribute.scanner: Primary

attribute.name: pmPdcpVolDlCmpHdrQci
attribute.description:
The total volume of compressed PDCP SDU headers that has been transmitted from the Robust Header Compression entity in the downlink direction per QCI.
When carrier aggregation is used, a PDCP SDU can be sent over multiple cells (PCell/SCell(s)). The total volume of compressed PDCP SDU headers that has been transmitted from the Robust Header Compression entity in the downlink direction per QCI is measured on PCell.
Compressed: True
attribute.condition: Continuous measurement for DRBs aggregated to cell level.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmPdcpVolDlDrb
attribute.description:
The total volume (PDCP SDU) on Data Radio Bearers that has been transferred (acknowledged by the UE) in the downlink direction.
When carrier aggregation is used, a PDCP SDU can be sent over multiple cells (PCell/SCell(s)). The total volume (PDCP SDU) on Data Radio Bearers that has been transferred (acknowledged by the UE) in the downlink direction is measured on PCell.
attribute.condition: Continuous measurement for DRBs aggregated to cell level.
attribute.scanner: Primary

attribute.name: pmPdcpVolDlDrbLastTTI
attribute.description:
The total volume (PDCP SDU) on Data Radio Bearers that has been transferred (acknowledged by the UE) in the downlink direction in the last TTI when a buffer is emptied.
When carrier aggregation is used, a PDCP SDU can be sent over multiple cells (PCell/SCell(s)). The total volume (PDCP SDU) on Data Radio Bearers that has been transferred (acknowledged by the UE) in the downlink direction in the last TTI when a buffer is emptied is measured on PCell.
attribute.condition: Continuous measurement for UEs aggregated to cell level.
attribute.scanner: Primary

attribute.name: pmPdcpVolDlDrbLastTTIQci
attribute.description:
The total DL PDCP SDU volume per QCI that is transmitted in the last TTI when the buffer for a DRB that maps to the given QCI is emptied.
When carrier aggregation is used, a PDCP SDU can be sent over multiple cells (PCell/SCell(s)). The total DL PDCP SDU volume per QCI that is transmitted in the last TTI when the buffer for a DRB that maps to the given QCI is emptied is measured on PCell.
Compressed: True
attribute.condition: The bin accumulates the DL PDCP SDU volume per QCI that is transmitted in the last TTI when the buffer for a DRB that maps to the given QCI is emptied.
attribute.scanner: Primary

attribute.name: pmPdcpVolDlDrbQci
attribute.description:
The total volume (PDCP SDU) that has been transferred (acknowledged by the UE) on Data Radio Bearers in the downlink direction per QCI.
When carrier aggregation is used, a PDCP SDU can be sent over multiple cells (PCell/SCell(s)). The total volume (PDCP SDU) that has been transferred (acknowledged by the UE) on Data Radio Bearers in the downlink direction per QCI is measured on PCell.
Compressed: True
attribute.condition: The counter accumulates acknowledged DL PDCP volume per QCI.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmPdcpVolDlDrbTrans
attribute.description:
The total volume (PDCP SDU) on Data Radio Bearers that has been transmitted in the downlink direction in the PDCP layer.
When carrier aggregation is used, a PDCP SDU can be sent over multiple cells (PCell/SCell(s)). The total volume (PDCP SDU) on Data Radio Bearers that has been transmitted in the downlink direction in the PDCP layer is measured on PCell.
attribute.condition: Continuous measurement for DRBs aggregated to cell level.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmPdcpVolDlDrbTransPlmn0
attribute.description:
The total volume (PDCP SDU) on Data Radio Bearers that has been transmitted in the downlink direction in the PDCP layer for the UEs served by PLMN0.
PLMN0 refers to the PLMN configured in the attribute eNodeBPlmnId located on ENodeBFunction.
When carrier aggregation is used, a PDCP SDU can be sent over multiple cells (PCell/SCell(s)). The total volume (PDCP SDU) on Data Radio Bearers that has been transmitted in the downlink direction in the PDCP layer for the UEs served by PLMN0 is measured on PCell.
attribute.condition: Traffic volume counter accumulates transferred volume from PDCP to RLC layer for Plmn0.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmPdcpVolDlDrbTransPlmn1
attribute.description:
The total volume (PDCP SDU) on Data Radio Bearers that has been transmitted in the downlink direction in the PDCP layer for the UEs served by PLMN1.
PLMN1 refers to the PLMN configured in the attribute additionalPlmnList[0] located on EUtranCellFDD or EUtranCellTDD.
When carrier aggregation is used, a PDCP SDU can be sent over multiple cells (PCell/SCell(s)). The total volume (PDCP SDU) on Data Radio Bearers that has been transmitted in the downlink direction in the PDCP layer for the UEs served by PLMN1 is measured on PCell.
attribute.condition: Traffic volume counter accumulates transferred volume from PDCP to RLC layer for Plmn1.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmPdcpVolDlDrbTransPlmn2
attribute.description:
The total volume (PDCP SDU) on Data Radio Bearers that has been transmitted in the downlink direction in the PDCP layer for the UEs served by PLMN2.
PLMN2 refers to the PLMN configured in the attribute additionalPlmnList[1] located on EUtranCellFDD or EUtranCellTDD.
When carrier aggregation is used, a PDCP SDU can be sent over multiple cells (PCell/SCell(s)). The total volume (PDCP SDU) on Data Radio Bearers that has been transmitted in the downlink direction in the PDCP layer for the UEs served by PLMN2 is measured on PCell.
attribute.condition: Traffic volume counter accumulates transferred volume from PDCP to RLC layer for Plmn2.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmPdcpVolDlDrbTransPlmn3
attribute.description:
The total volume (PDCP SDU) on Data Radio Bearers that has been transmitted in the downlink direction in the PDCP layer for the UEs served by PLMN3.
PLMN3 refers to the PLMN configured in the attribute additionalPlmnList[2] located on EUtranCellFDD or EUtranCellTDD.
When carrier aggregation is used, a PDCP SDU can be sent over multiple cells (PCell/SCell(s)). The total volume (PDCP SDU) on Data Radio Bearers that has been transmitted in the downlink direction in the PDCP layer for the UEs served by PLMN3 is measured on PCell.
attribute.condition: Traffic volume counter accumulates transferred volume from PDCP to RLC layer for Plmn3.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmPdcpVolDlDrbTransPlmn4
attribute.description:
The total volume (PDCP SDU) on Data Radio Bearers that has been transmitted in the downlink direction in the PDCP layer for the UEs served by PLMN4.
PLMN4 refers to the PLMN configured in the attribute additionalPlmnList[3] located on EUtranCellFDD or EUtranCellTDD.
When carrier aggregation is used, a PDCP SDU can be sent over multiple cells (PCell/SCell(s)). The total volume (PDCP SDU) on Data Radio Bearers that has been transmitted in the downlink direction in the PDCP layer for the UEs served by PLMN4 is measured on PCell.
attribute.condition: Traffic volume counter accumulates transferred volume from PDCP to RLC layer for Plmn4.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmPdcpVolDlDrbTransPlmn5
attribute.description:
The total volume (PDCP SDU) on Data Radio Bearers that has been transmitted in the downlink direction in the PDCP layer for the UEs served by PLMN5.
PLMN5 refers to the PLMN configured in the attribute additionalPlmnList[4] located on EUtranCellFDD or EUtranCellTDD.
When carrier aggregation is used, a PDCP SDU can be sent over multiple cells (PCell/SCell(s)). The total volume (PDCP SDU) on Data Radio Bearers that has been transmitted in the downlink direction in the PDCP layer for the UEs served by PLMN5 is measured on PCell.
attribute.condition: Traffic volume counter accumulates transferred volume from PDCP to RLC layer for Plmn5.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmPdcpVolDlDrbTransPlmn6
attribute.description:
The total volume (PDCP SDU) on Data Radio Bearers that has been transmitted in the downlink direction in the PDCP layer for the UEs served by PLMN6.
PLMN6 refers to an unexpected PLMN, that is, a PLMN that cannot be associated with any PLMN configured in the ENodeBFunction or cell.
When carrier aggregation is used, a PDCP SDU can be sent over multiple cells (PCell/SCell(s)). The total volume (PDCP SDU) on Data Radio Bearers that has been transmitted in the downlink direction in the PDCP layer for the UEs served by PLMN6 is measured on PCell.
attribute.condition: Traffic volume counter accumulates transferred volume from PDCP to RLC layer for Plmn6.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmPdcpVolDlDrbTransQci
attribute.description:
The total volume (PDCP SDU) on Data Radio Bearers that has been transmitted in the downlink direction in the PDCP layer per QCI.
When carrier aggregation is used, a PDCP SDU can be sent over multiple cells (PCell/SCell(s)). The total volume (PDCP SDU) on Data Radio Bearers that has been transmitted in the downlink direction in the PDCP layer per QCI is measured on PCell.
Compressed: True
attribute.condition: Continuous measurement after Robust Header Compression for DRBs aggregated to cell level.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmPdcpVolDlDrbTransUm
attribute.description:
The total volume (PDCP SDU) on Data Radio Bearers for RLC UM that has been transmitted in the downlink direction in the PDCP layer.
When carrier aggregation is used, a PDCP SDU can be sent over multiple cells (PCell/SCell(s)). The total volume (PDCP SDU) on Data Radio Bearers for RLC UM that has been transmitted in the downlink direction in the PDCP layer is measured on PCell.
attribute.condition: Continuous measurement after Robust Header Compression for DRBs aggregated to cell level
attribute.scanner: Primary

attribute.name: pmPdcpVolDlHdrQci
attribute.description:
The total volume of uncompressed PDCP SDU headers that has been received in the Robust Header Compression entity in the downlink direction per QCI.
When carrier aggregation is used, a PDCP SDU can be sent over multiple cells (PCell/SCell(s)). The total volume of uncompressed PDCP SDU headers that has been received in the Robust Header Compression entity in the downlink direction per QCI is measured on PCell.
Compressed: True
attribute.condition: Continuous measurement for DRBs aggregated to cell level.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmPdcpVolDlSrb
attribute.description:
The total number of bits (PDCP SDU) on Signalling Radio Bearers that has been transferred (acknowledged by the UE) in the downlink direction.
SRB0 volume is not included in this counter.
When carrier aggregation is used, a PDCP SDU can be sent over multiple cells (PCell/SCell(s)). The total number of bits (PDCP SDU) on Signalling Radio Bearers that has been transferred (acknowledged by the UE) in the downlink direction is measured on PCell.
attribute.condition: Continuous measurement for SRBs aggregated to cell level.
attribute.scanner: Primary

attribute.name: pmPdcpVolDlSrbTrans
attribute.description:
The total volume (PDCP SDU) on Signalling Radio Bearers that has been transmitted in the downlink direction in the PDCP layer.
When carrier aggregation is used, a PDCP SDU can be sent over multiple cells (PCell/SCell(s)). The total volume (PDCP SDU) on Signalling Radio Bearers that has been transmitted in the downlink direction in the PDCP layer is measured on PCell.
attribute.condition: Continuous measurement for SRBs aggregated to cell level.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmPdcpPktTransDl
attribute.description:
Total number of DRB packets (PDCP SDUs) successfully transmitted (RLC acknowledged by UE) in the downlink.
When carrier aggregation is used, a PDCP SDU can be sent over multiple cells (PCell/SCell(s)). Total number of DRB packets (PDCP SDUs) successfully transmitted (RLC acknowledged by UE) in the downlink is measured on PCell.
attribute.condition: Continuous measurement for UEs aggregated to cell level.
attribute.scanner: Primary

attribute.name: pmPdcpPktTransDlQci
attribute.description:
Total number of DL packets (PDCP SDUs) transmitted successfully per QCI.
When carrier aggregation is used, a PDCP SDU can be sent over multiple cells (PCell/SCell(s)). Total number of DL packets (PDCP SDUs) transmitted successfully per QCI is measured on PCell.
Compressed: True
attribute.condition: The bin accumulates the number of DL PDCP SDUs that are transmitted successfully per QCI.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmPdcpPktReceivedDl
attribute.description:
Total number of DRB packets (PDCP SDUs) received by RBS in PDCP in the downlink.
When carrier aggregation is used, a PDCP SDU can be sent over multiple cells (PCell/SCell(s)). Total number of DRB packets (PDCP SDUs) received by RBS in PDCP in the downlink is measured on PCell.
attribute.condition: Continuous measurement for UEs aggregated to cell level.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmPdcpPktReceivedDlQci
attribute.description:
Total number of DL packets (PDCP SDUs) received in PDCP in the RBS per QCI.
When carrier aggregation is used, a PDCP SDU can be sent over multiple cells (PCell/SCell(s)). Total number of DL packets (PDCP SDUs) received in PDCP in the RBS per QCI is measured on PCell.
Compressed: True
attribute.condition: The bin accumulates the number of DL PDCP SDUs received per QCI.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmPdcpPktDiscDlAqm
attribute.description:
Total number of packets (PDCP SDUs) discarded due to Active Queue Management (AQM).
When carrier aggregation is used, a PDCP SDU can be sent over multiple cells (PCell/SCell(s)). Total number of packets (PDCP SDUs) discarded due to AQM is measured on PCell.
attribute.condition: When a packet is discarded due to AQM
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmPdcpPktDiscDlAqmQci
attribute.description:
Total number of packets (PDCP SDUs) per QCI discarded due to Active Queue Management (AQM).
When carrier aggregation is used, a PDCP SDU can be sent over multiple cells (PCell/SCell(s)). Total number of packets (PDCP SDUs) per QCI discarded due to AQM is measured on PCell.
Compressed: True
attribute.condition: When a packet is discarded due to AQM
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmPdcpPktDiscDlHo
attribute.description:
Number of DRB packets (PDCP SDUs) discarded due to handover in the downlink.
When carrier aggregation is used, a PDCP SDU can be sent over multiple cells (PCell/SCell(s)). Total number of packets (PDCP SDUs) discarded due to handover in the downlink is measured on PCell.
attribute.condition: The counter can be incremented from both source and target point of view in the handover functionality. Discards in the target eNB could be due to out of order sequence. Discards in the source eNB includes discards of packets not positively acknowledged PDCP SDU for which it was decided that no more transmission attempts on either Uu, X2 or S1 interface will be done. Only applicable to DRB packets.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmPdcpPktDiscDlHoQci
attribute.description:
Total number of DL packets (PDCP SDUs) discarded due to HO per QCI.
When carrier aggregation is used, a PDCP SDU can be sent over multiple cells (PCell/SCell(s)). Total number of DL packets (PDCP SDUs) discarded due to HO per QCI is measured on PCell.
Compressed: True
attribute.condition: The counter can be incremented from both source and target point of view in the handover functionality. Discards in the target eNB could be due to out of order sequence. Discards in the source eNB includes discards of packets not positively acknowledged PDCP SDU for which it was decided that no more transmission attempts on either Uu, X2 or S1 interface will be done. Only applicable to DRB packets.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmPdcpPktDiscDlPelr
attribute.description:
Total number of DRB packets (PDCP SDUs) for which no part has been transmitted over the air in the downlink that are discarded due to reasons other than handover or active queue management.
When carrier aggregation is used, a PDCP SDU can be sent over multiple cells (PCell/SCell(s)). Total number of DRB packets (PDCP SDUs) discarded due to reasons other than handover or active queue management is measured on PCell.
attribute.condition: Continuous measurement for UEs aggregated to cell level.
attribute.scanner: Primary

attribute.name: pmPdcpPktDiscDlPelrQci
attribute.description:
Total number of DL packets (PDCP SDUs) per QCI that are discarded in the PDCP layer due to reasons other than handover or active queue management. No part of these packets has been transmitted over the air.
When carrier aggregation is used, a PDCP SDU can be sent over multiple cells (PCell/SCell(s)). Total number of DL packets (PDCP SDUs) per QCI discarded due to reasons other than handover or active queue management is measured on PCell.
Compressed: True
attribute.condition: The bin accumulates the number of DL PDCP SDUs discarded not due to HO or active queue management per QCI.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmPdcpPktDiscDlPelrUu
attribute.description:
Total number of packets (PDCP SDUs) for which at least a part has been transmitted over the air in the downlink direction but not positively acknowledged, and it was decided that no more transmission attempts will be done, due to reasons other than handover. Only applicable to DRB packets.
When carrier aggregation is used, a PDCP SDU can be sent over multiple cells (PCell/SCell(s)). Total number of packets (PDCP SDUs) for which at least a part has been transmitted over the air in the downlink direction but not positively acknowledged, and it was decided that no more transmission attempts will be done, due to reasons other than handover, is measured on PCell.
attribute.condition: Continuous measurement for UEs aggregated to cell level.
attribute.scanner: Primary

attribute.name: pmPdcpPktDiscDlPelrUuQci
attribute.description:
Total number of DL packets (PDCP SDUs) per QCI for which at least a part has been transmitted over the air but not positively acknowledged due to reasons other than handover, and it was decided that no more transmission attempts will be done.
When carrier aggregation is used, a PDCP SDU can be sent over multiple cells (PCell/SCell(s)). Total number of DL packets (PDCP SDUs) per QCI for which at least a part has been transmitted over the air but not positively acknowledged due to reasons other than handover, and it was decided that no more transmission attempts will be done, is measured on PCell.
Compressed: True
attribute.condition: The bin accumulates the number of DL PDCP SDUs that are not successfully transmitted due to reasons other than HO per QCI.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmPdcpLatTimeDl
attribute.description:
Aggregated DL Latency for a measurement period. The effective DL Latency time comprises the time from PDCP DRB SDU entering the buffer until the first data has been transmitted to the UE.
When carrier aggregation is used, the DL Latency for all component carriers is registered on the UE's primary component carrier (PCell).
attribute.condition: Measurement for UEs aggregated to cell level. Only PDCP SDUs that enters an empty buffer are measured. Samples during handover are excluded since they can distort the interpretation of the result (due to packet forwarding, the target cell might have to buffer data before it is possible to schedule the UE in the target cell, hence it would be an increased Latency measurement if it would be included. It would however not lead to a degraded performance for the end-user, due to packet forwarding).
attribute.scanner: Primary

attribute.name: pmPdcpLatTimeDlDrxNoSync
attribute.description:
Aggregated DL Latency when DRX is active and the UE has UL synchronization status "NOT synchronized".
When carrier aggregation is used, the DL Latency for all component carriers is registered on the UE's primary component carrier (PCell).
attribute.condition: The effective DL Latency time comprises the time from PDCP DRB SDU entering the buffer until the first data has been transmitted to the UE. Measurement for UEs aggregated to cell level. Only PDCP SDUs that enters an empty buffer are measured. Samples during handover are excluded since they can distort the interpretation of the result (due to packet forwarding, the target cell might have to buffer data before it is possible to schedule the UE in the target cell, hence it would be an increased Latency measurement if it would be included. It would however not lead to a degraded performance for the end-user, due to packet forwarding).
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmPdcpLatTimeDlDrxSync
attribute.description:
Aggregated DL Latency when DRX is active and the UE has UL synchronization status "synchronized".
When carrier aggregation is used, the DL Latency for all component carriers is registered on the UE's primary component carrier (PCell).
attribute.condition: The effective DL Latency time comprises the time from PDCP DRB SDU entering the buffer until the first data has been transmitted to the UE. Measurement for UEs aggregated to cell level. Only PDCP SDUs that enters an empty buffer are measured. Samples during handover are excluded since they can distort the interpretation of the result (due to packet forwarding, the target cell might have to buffer data before it is possible to schedule the UE in the target cell, hence it would be an increased Latency measurement if it would be included. It would however not lead to a degraded performance for the end-user, due to packet forwarding).
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmPdcpLatTimeDlNoDrxSync
attribute.description:
Aggregated DL Latency when DRX is NOT active and the UE has UL synchronization status "synchronized".
When carrier aggregation is used, the DL Latency for all component carriers is registered on the UE's primary component carrier (PCell).
attribute.condition: The effective DL Latency time comprises the time from PDCP DRB SDU entering the buffer until the first data has been transmitted to the UE. Measurement for UEs aggregated to cell level. Only PDCP SDUs that enters an empty buffer are measured. Samples during handover are excluded since they can distort the interpretation of the result (due to packet forwarding, the target cell might have to buffer data before it is possible to schedule the UE in the target cell, hence it would be an increased Latency measurement if it would be included. It would however not lead to a degraded performance for the end-user, due to packet forwarding).
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmPdcpLatTimeDlQci
attribute.description:
Aggregated DL Latency for a measurement period per QCI. When carrier aggregation is used, the DL Latency for all component carriers is registered on the UE's primary component carrier (PCell).
Compressed: True
attribute.condition: The counter represents DL latency per QCI. The effective DL Latency time comprises the time from PDCP SDU entering the buffer until the first data has been transmitted to the UE. Only latency for PDCP SDUs that enters an empty buffer is measured. Samples during handover are excluded.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmPdcpLatPktTransDl
attribute.description:
Number of DRB packets for downlink Latency measurements.
When carrier aggregation is used, the DL Latency for all component carriers is registered on the UE's primary component carrier (PCell).
attribute.condition: Measurement for UEs aggregated to cell level. Only PDCP SDUs that enters an empty buffer are measured. Samples during handover are excluded since they can distort the interpretation of the result (due to packet forwarding, the target cell might have to buffer data before it is possible to schedule the UE in the target cell, hence it would be an increased Latency measurement if it would be included. It would however not lead to a degraded performance for the end-user, due to packet forwarding).
attribute.scanner: Primary

attribute.name: pmPdcpLatPktTransDlDrxNoSync
attribute.description:
Number of DRB packets for downlink Latency measurements when DRX is active and the UE has UL synchronization status "NOT synchronized".
When carrier aggregation is used, the DL Latency for all component carriers is registered on the UE's primary component carrier (PCell).
attribute.condition: Measurement for UEs aggregated to cell level. Only PDCP SDUs that enters an empty buffer are measured. Samples during handover are excluded since they can distort the interpretation of the result (due to packet forwarding, the target cell might have to buffer data before it is possible to schedule the UE in the target cell, hence it would be an increased Latency measurement if it would be included. It would however not lead to a degraded performance for the end-user, due to packet forwarding). The samples are included
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmPdcpLatPktTransDlDrxSync
attribute.description:
Number of DRB packets for downlink Latency measurements when DRX is active and the UE has UL synchronization status "synchronized".
When carrier aggregation is used, the DL Latency for all component carriers is registered on the UE's primary component carrier (PCell).
attribute.condition: Measurement for UEs aggregated to cell level. Only PDCP SDUs that enters an empty buffer are measured. Samples during handover are excluded since they can distort the interpretation of the result (due to packet forwarding, the target cell might have to buffer data before it is possible to schedule the UE in the target cell, hence it would be an increased Latency measurement if it would be included. It would however not lead to a degraded performance for the end-user, due to packet forwarding). The samples are included
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmPdcpLatPktTransDlNoDrxSync
attribute.description:
Number of DRB packets for downlink Latency measurements when DRX is NOT active and the UE has UL synchronization status "synchronized".
When carrier aggregation is used, the DL Latency for all component carriers is registered on the UE's primary component carrier (PCell).
attribute.condition: Measurement for UEs aggregated to cell level. Only PDCP SDUs that enters an empty buffer are measured. Samples during handover are excluded since they can distort the interpretation of the result (due to packet forwarding, the target cell might have to buffer data before it is possible to schedule the UE in the target cell, hence it would be an increased Latency measurement if it would be included. It would however not lead to a degraded performance for the end-user, due to packet forwarding). The samples are included
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmPdcpLatPktTransDlQci
attribute.description:
Number of samples for DL Latency measurements during measurement period per QCI.
When carrier aggregation is used, the DL Latency for all component carriers is registered on the UE's primary component carrier (PCell).
Compressed: True
attribute.condition: The counter registers the number of samples for DL Latency measurements during measurement period per QCI.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmPdcpBitrateDlDrbMin
attribute.description:
Minimum cell DL bit rate. One cell bit rate sample is obtained by dividing the total volume (PDCP SDU) on Data Radio Bearers aggregated to cell level, that has been transmitted in the downlink direction in the PDCP layer, with the time (in seconds) of the sample gathering period.
When carrier aggregation is used, a PDCP SDU can be sent over multiple cells (PCell/SCell(s)). The total volume (PDCP SDU) is measured on PCell.
attribute.condition: The counter is set equal to the low mark sample at the end of each Recording Output Period (ROP).
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmPdcpBitrateDlDrbMax
attribute.description:
Peak cell DL bit rate. One cell bit rate sample is obtained by dividing the total volume (PDCP SDU) on Data Radio Bearers aggregated to cell level, that has been transmitted in the downlink direction in the PDCP layer, with the time (in seconds) of the sample gathering period.
When carrier aggregation is used, a PDCP SDU can be sent over multiple cells (PCell/SCell(s)). The total volume (PDCP SDU) is measured on PCell.
attribute.condition: The counter is set equal to the peak sample at the end of each Recording Output Period (ROP).
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmDrbThpTimeDlQci
attribute.description:
The DL transmission time used for DL DRB Throughput per QCI. It comprises of time periods from when the first piece of data in a data burst is transmitted until the second last piece of data in the data burst is transmitted.
When carrier aggregation is used, the DL transmission time used for DL DRB Throughput per QCI is registered on the UE's primary component carrier (PCell).
Compressed: True
attribute.condition: The bin accumulates the DL transmission time per QCI for each large data burst that needs to be transmitted across multiple TTIs.
attribute.scanner: Primary

attribute.name: EUtranCellFDDId
attribute.description: The value component of the RDN.

attribute.name: earfcndl
attribute.description:
The channel number for the central downlink frequency. The mapping from channel number to physical frequency for specified E-UTRA bands is described in 3GPP TS 36.104. The values that can be used depend on national, operator-specific frequency allocation as well as on the supported frequency band(s) in the RBS.
Note: Use the MO-action changeFrequency if the DL frequency shall be changed after the cell is initally setup. This attribute is dependent on and set together with earfcnul, the values are dependent and relate accoring to the form earfcnul=earfcndl+18000.

attribute.name: earfcnul
attribute.description:
The channel number for the central uplink frequency. The mapping from channel number to physical frequency for specified E-UTRA bands is described in 3GPP TS 36.104. The values that can be used depend on national, operator specific frequency allocation as well as on the supported frequency band(s) of the RBS.
Note: This attribute is dependent on and set together with earfcndl, the values are dependent and relate accoring to the form earfcnul=earfcndl+18000.

attribute.name: frameStartOffset
attribute.description: The frame start offset of the cell.

attribute.name: noOfPucchCqiUsers
attribute.description: The number of Channel Quality Indicator (CQI) resources available on the PUCCH channel. For 1.4 MHz system bandwidth the recommended value is 50.
attribute.takesEffect: Object unlocked. Note: The parameter will take effect when System Information is updated.

attribute.name: noOfPucchSrUsers
attribute.description: The number of Scheduling Request (SR) resources available on the PUCCH channel. For 1.4 MHz system bandwidth the recommended value is 50.
attribute.takesEffect: Object unlocked. Note: The parameter will take effect when System Information is updated.

attribute.name: dlChannelBandwidth
attribute.description:
The downlink channel bandwidth in the cell.
Valid values: 1400, 3000, 5000, 10000, 15000, 20000
attribute.dependencies: This attribute is dependent on and shall be set to the same as ulChannelBandwidth.

attribute.name: ulChannelBandwidth
attribute.description:
The uplink channel bandwidth in the cell.
Valid values: 1400, 3000, 5000, 10000, 15000, 20000
attribute.dependencies: This attribute is dependent on and shall be set to the same as dlChannelBandwidth.

attribute.name: symbolOffsetTest
attribute.description: Frame synch offset measured in symbols.

attribute.name: timeOffsetTest
attribute.description: Frame synch offset measured in nano seconds.

attribute.name: cellRange
attribute.description: Defines the maximum distance from the base station where a connection to a UE can be setup and/or maintained.

attribute.name: commonSrPeriodicity
attribute.description: Common SR periodicity, used for all UEs.
attribute.dependencies: For FDD 1.4 MHz: Only valid inputs are 10 and 20.

attribute.name: nrOfTransmissionsSib1
attribute.description: Controls the number of times a SIB1 message will be repeated within the siPeriodicy.

attribute.name: transmissionMode
attribute.description: Defines the Transmission Mode (e.g. Transmit Diversity and Closed-Loop Spatial Multiplexing) that shall be used for the UEs that are connected to the cell. See 3GPP TS 36.213 table 7.1-5 for a definition of Transmission Mode.

attribute.name: pmRadioTxRankDistr
attribute.description:
The transmission mode / rank distributions gives more detailed information on how much each transmission mode and rank is used.
PDF ranges: [0]: Transmit diversity [1]: Open Loop SM Rank 1 [2]: Open Loop SM Rank 2 [3]: Closed Loop SM rank 1 [4]: Closed Loop SM rank 2
attribute.condition: The corresponding sub-counter is stepped whenever a UE is scheduled (new data transmission or retransmission). If the single antenna port (port 0) is used, no samples will be collected.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmTtiBundlingUeSum
attribute.description: Sum of all sample values recorded for number of UEs using TTI Bundling.
attribute.condition: The counter accumulates values of the number of UEs using TTI Bundling from each sampling occasion.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmTtiBundlingUeSamp
attribute.description: Counts the number of times the corresponding pmTtiBundlingUeSum has been incremented.
attribute.condition: The counter is incremented by one each time a sample value is accumulated in pmTtiBundlingUeSum.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmTtiBundlingUeMax
attribute.description: Maximum sample value of number of UEs using TTI Bundling.
attribute.condition: The counter is set to the peak value of samples of number of UEs using TTI Bundling.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: caUsageLimit
attribute.description:
Usage limit capacity
The value configures how much of the total capacity can be used by carrier aggregation (total capacity means maximum number of RRC connected users). A secondary component carrier (SCell) costs in memory the same as a primary component carrier (PCell) for each UE.
attribute.dependencies: The value must be set to a value lower than the value set for parameter caPreemptionThreshold, otherwise this value will have no effect.

attribute.name: caPreemptionThreshold
attribute.description:
Preemption threshold capacity
The value configures the threshold when secondary component carriers (SCell) start to be deallocated for primary component carrier (PCell) usage only.

attribute.name: pmCaCapableDlSum
attribute.description:
Number of supported secondary component carriers (SCell), for UE using this cell as their primary component carrier (PCell)
[0] Number of UE that are not carrier aggregation capable at all (i.e. PCell only) [1] Number of UE that are capable of PCell plus one SCell [2] Number of UE that are capable of PCell plus two SCells [3] Number of UE that are capable of PCell plus three SCells [4] Number of UE that are capable of PCell plus four SCells Compressed: True
attribute.condition: This measurement provides the mean number of UEs capable of downlink carrier aggregation, counted per the number of component carriers (PCell and SCells).
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmCaCapableDlSamp
attribute.description: The number of carrier aggregation capable UE measurement samples.
attribute.condition: The counter is stepped for each carrier aggregation capable UE measurement sample.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmCaConfiguredDlSum
attribute.description:
Number of configured secondary component carriers (SCell) for UE using this cell as their primary component carrier (PCell)
[0] Number of carrier aggregation capable UE that are not configured with any SCell [1] Number of carrier aggregation capable UE that are configured with one SCell [2] Number of carrier aggregation capable UE that are configured with two SCells [3] Number of carrier aggregation capable UE that are configured with three SCells [4] Number of carrier aggregation capable UE that are configured with four SCells Compressed: True
attribute.condition: This measurement provides the mean number of UEs configured for downlink carrier aggregation, out of the number of carrier aggregation capable UEs, counted per the number of component carriers (PCell and SCells) configured in each UE.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmCaConfiguredDlSamp
attribute.description: The number of carrier aggregation configured UE measurement samples.
attribute.condition: The counter is stepped for each carrier aggregation configured UE measurement sample.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmCaActivatedDlSum
attribute.description:
Number of activated secondary component carriers (SCell), for UE using this cell as their primary component carrier (PCell)
[0] Number of carrier aggregation configured UE that have no activated SCells [1] Number of carrier aggregation configured UE that have one activated SCell [2] Number of carrier aggregation configured UE that have two activated SCells [3] Number of carrier aggregation configured UE that have three activated SCells [4] Number of carrier aggregation configured UE that have four activated SCells Compressed: True
attribute.condition: Stepped in each subframe (TTI) for UEs using this cell as a primary component carrier (PCell) and which are configured with at least one secondary component carrier (SCell).
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmCaScheduledDlSum
attribute.description:
Mean number of UE that have data scheduled on downlink, counted by the number of component carriers simultaneously scheduled. UE is considered scheduled for carrier aggregation if the eNodeB has sent a PDCCH assignment indicating a PDSCH assignment
[0] Number of carrier aggregation activated UE that have one scheduled cell [1] Number of carrier aggregation activated UE that have two simultaneously scheduled cells [2] Number of carrier aggregation activated UE that have three simultaneously scheduled cells [3] Number of carrier aggregation activated UE that have four simultaneously scheduled cells [4] Number of carrier aggregation activated UE that have five simultaneously scheduled cells Compressed: True
attribute.condition: Stepped in each subframe (TTI) for UEs using this cell as a primary component carrier (PCell) and which are activated with at least one secondary component carrier (SCell).
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmRadioThpVolDlSCell
attribute.description: The total successfully transferred data volume on MAC level in the downlink for secondary cell traffic (i.e. the UE has another cell as its primary component carrier (PCell)). This counter includes possible padding bits.
attribute.condition: The counter is incremented when a downlink transmission is acknowledged on HARQ level (only stepped for secondary component carrier (SCell) traffic).
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmPrbUsedDlAilgHighPrio
attribute.description: The total number of PRB pairs generated by Air Interface Load Generator in the DL direction for load of higher priority than the real UEs load
attribute.condition: Continuous measurement on TTI granularity on cell level
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmPrbUsedDlAilgTot
attribute.description: The total number of PRB pairs generated by Air Interface Load Generator in DL for artificial load, both for high and low priority load.
attribute.condition: Continuous measurement on TTI granularity on cell level
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmPrbUsedUlAilgTot
attribute.description: The total number of PRB pairs generated by Air Interface Load Generator in UL for artificial load, both for high and low priority load
attribute.condition: Continuous measurement on TTI granularity on cell level
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmUeCtxtRelCsfbWcdma
attribute.description: The number of RRC Connection Release with redirect to WCDMA triggered by CS Fallback.
attribute.condition: A CS Fallback attempt is performed towards a WCDMA Frequency, defined as a RRC Connection Release with redirect information, due to a received CS Fallback Indicator set to CS Fallback Required in Initial Context Setup Request or UE Context Modification Request.
attribute.scanner: Primary

attribute.name: pmUeCtxtRelCsfbWcdmaEm
attribute.description: The number of RRC Connection Release with redirect to WCDMA triggered by CS Fallback Emergency.
attribute.condition: An Emergency CS Fallback attempt is performed towards a WCDMA Frequencies, defined as a RRC Connection Release with redirect information, due to a received CS Fallback Indicator set to CS Fallback High Priority in Initial Context Setup Request or UE Context Modification Request.
attribute.scanner: Primary

attribute.name: pmUeCtxtRelCsfbGsmEm
attribute.description: The number of RRC Connection Release with redirect to GSM triggered by CS Fallback Emergency.
attribute.condition: An Emergency CS Fallback attempt is performed towards a GSM Frequency Group, defined as a RRC Connection Release with redirect information, due to a received CS Fallback Indicator set to CS Fallback High Priority in Initial Context Setup Request or UE Context Modification Request.
attribute.scanner: Primary

attribute.name: pmUeCtxtRelCsfbGsm
attribute.description: The number of RRC Connection Release with redirect to GSM triggered by CS Fallback.
attribute.condition: A CS Fallback attempt is performed towards a GSM Frequency Group, defined as a RRC Connection Release with redirect information, due to a received CS Fallback Indicator set to CS Fallback Required in Initial Context Setup Request or UE Context Modification Request.
attribute.scanner: Primary

attribute.name: ailgRef
attribute.description: Refers to an instance of AirIfLoadProfile. Assigns a AirIfLoadProfile to a cell.

attribute.name: ailgActive
attribute.description: The state of the feature Air Interface Load Generator. Indicates if it is running or stopped.

attribute.name: pmErabEstabFailGbrDlEnb
attribute.description: The total number of failed E-RAB setup attempts due to downlink GBR overload for resources common to the eNodeB.
attribute.condition: Shall be stepped for each failed E-RAB Establishment attempt due to downlink GBR overload for resources common to the eNodeB.
attribute.scanner: Primary

attribute.name: pmErabEstabFailGbrUlEnb
attribute.description: The total number of failed E-RAB setup attempts due to uplink GBR overload for resources common to the eNodeB.
attribute.condition: Shall be stepped for each failed E-RAB Establishment attempt due to uplink GBR overload for resources common to the eNodeB.
attribute.scanner: Primary

attribute.name: pmRaSuccTa
attribute.condition: When a successful random is done (RA Msg3 received) the counter covering the measured TA shall be incremented. Example: When a sample is measured at 50% it means that a successfull random acces has been done at 50% of the configured cell range. In this case bin 6 for the range 50..59% shall be increased.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmUeCtxtTa
attribute.condition: Periodically the actual TA of the UEs that are UL synchronized is monitored, one scan performed every 5 seconds. Example: When a sample is measured at 50% it means that an UL synchronized UE has a TA value at 50% of the configured cell range. In this case bin 6 for 50%..59% is increased.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: changeNotification
attribute.description: For each System Information Block (SIB), indicates when the SIB content is changed, if system information change notification is broadcast prior to broadcast of updated system information.

attribute.name: mappingInfo
attribute.description:
The System Information (SI) message to which each System Information Block (SIB) is mapped.
Note: SIB2 is always mapped to the SI message 1 according to 3GPP TS 36.331.

attribute.name: modificationPeriodCoeff
attribute.description: The modification period, expressed in number of radio frames = modificationPeriodCoeff * defaultPagingCycle. See MO Paging for information about defaultPagingCycle.
attribute.dependencies: modificationPeriodCoeff * defaultPagingCycle must be equal or less than 1024 radio frames. See MO Paging for information about defaultPagingCycle.

attribute.name: siPeriodicity
attribute.description: The periodicity of System Information (SI) messages. If a System Information Block (SIB) is not mapped to a SI message, the SI message is not transmitted.

attribute.name: siWindowLength
attribute.description:
Length of the System Information (SI) window within which each SI message is transmitted. Applies to all SI messages.
Note: An SI window of 1 ms may be configured only when a maximum of 5 SI messages is configured for broadcast by attribute mappingInfo, to avoid collision with SIB1 transmission in subframe #5.
attribute.dependencies: siWindowLength * ‘transmitted number of SI-messages’ <= MIN(siPeriodicitySIx), i.e it must be possible schedule all SI messages within the shortest siPeriodicity time used.

attribute.name: qRxLevMin
attribute.description: The required minimum received Reference Symbol Received Power (RSRP) level in the E-UTRA frequency for cell reselection. Corresponds to parameter Qrxlevmin in 3GPP TS 36.304. This attribute is broadcast in SIB1.

attribute.name: pmDrxSleepTime
attribute.description: Contains the DRX sleep time in number of subframes for all UEs in the cell.
attribute.condition: Counter should be incremented every subframe for every UE in the cell for which DRX functionality in RRC_CONNECTED state is configured and the UE is in DRX sleep time.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmDrxTotalTime
attribute.description: Contains the DRX total time in number of subframes for all UEs in the cell.
attribute.condition: Counter should be incremented every subframe for every UE in the cell for which DRX functionality in RRC_CONNECTED state is configured.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmPdcpDelayTimeDl
attribute.description: Aggregated time for the downlink delay measure. One sample per successful transmission of a packet (PDCP SDU). The time for each sample is between reception of a packet (PDCP SDU) until the successful transmission of the corresponding MAC SDU.
attribute.deprecated: Since L10B. Has no functional behaviour.
attribute.condition: Continuous measurement for UEs aggregated to cell level.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmRrcConnEstabAttEm
attribute.description: The total number of RRC Connection Request attempts with establishment cause emergency.
attribute.condition: Stepped at reception of RRC message RRC Connection Request with establishment cause emergency.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmRrcConnEstabAttHpa
attribute.description: The total number of RRC Connection Request attempts with establishment cause highPriorityAccess
attribute.condition: Stepped at reception of RRC message RRC Connection Request with establishment cause highPriorityAccess
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmRrcConnEstabAttMod
attribute.description: The total number of RRC Connection Request attempts with Establishment cause Mobile Originating Data.
attribute.condition: Stepped at reception of RRC message RRC Connection Request with Establishment cause Mobile Originating Data.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmRrcConnEstabAttMos
attribute.description: The total number of RRC Connection Request attempts with Establishment cause Mobile Originating Signaling.
attribute.condition: Stepped at reception of RRC message RRC Connection Request with Establishment cause Mobile Originating Signaling.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmRrcConnEstabAttMta
attribute.description: The total number of RRC Connection Request attempts with Establishment cause Mobile Terminating Access.
attribute.condition: Stepped at reception of RRC message RRC Connection Request with Establishment cause Mobile Terminating Access.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmSessionTimeDrb
attribute.description: This counters shows the accumulated active session time for all DRBs in a cell.
attribute.condition: Number of session seconds aggregated for DRBs in a cell. A DRB is said to be ´in session´ if data on a DRB (UL or DL) has been transferred during the last 100 ms.
attribute.scanner: Primary

attribute.name: pmActiveDrbDlSum
attribute.description: The sum of the contributions from each UE in the cell of the number of active DRBs in the downlink direction.
attribute.condition: Each TTI, the counter shall be increased wih the number of DRBs that are considered active (i.e. that have data in the downlink buffer).
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmActiveDrbUlSum
attribute.description: The sum of the contributions from each UE in the cell of the number of active DRBs in the uplink direction.
attribute.condition: Each TTI, the counter shall be increased wih the number of DRBs that are considered active (i.e. that are considered to have data in the uplink buffer).
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmUeCtxtEstabAtt
attribute.description: The total number of Initial Context Setup Establishment attempts.
attribute.condition: Stepped for each S1 message Initial Context Setup Request.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmUeCtxtEstabSucc
attribute.description: The total number of Initial Context Setup Establishment successes
attribute.condition: Stepped for each Initial Context that is successfully established.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmUeCtxtRelSCCdma
attribute.description: The number of Session Continuity RRC Connection Release with redirect to CDMA2000.
attribute.condition: A RRC Connection Release with redirect information to CDMA2000.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmUeCtxtRelSCGsm
attribute.description: The number of Session Continuity RRC Connection Release with redirect to GERAN.
attribute.condition: A RRC Connection Release with redirect information to GERAN.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmUeCtxtRelSCWcdma
attribute.description: The number of Session Continuity RRC Connection Release with redirect to UTRA FDD.
attribute.condition: A RRC Connection Release with redirect information to UTRA FDD.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: minBestCellHoAttempts
attribute.description: Number of attempts for handover to a cell better than the serving cell, before handover is attempted to the next best cell. If there is no next best cell in the UE report, handover to the best cell is attempted repeatedly.
attribute.deprecated: Since L13A. Has no functional behavior. Planned to be removed.

attribute.name: redirectionInfoRefPrio1
attribute.description: Reference to an Managed Object instance containing redirection information for this EUtranCell. This reference should be set to a Cdma2000Freq, EUtranFrequency, UtranFrequency or GeranFrequencyGroup instance. Redirect to the same frequency is possible.
attribute.deprecated: Since L11B. Planned to be removed.

attribute.name: redirectionInfoRefPrio2
attribute.description: Reference to an Managed Object instance containing redirection information for this EUtranCell. This reference should be set to a Cdma2000Freq, EUtranFrequency, UtranFrequency or GeranFrequencyGroup instance. Redirect to the same frequency is possible.
attribute.deprecated: Since L11B. Planned to be removed.

attribute.name: redirectionInfoRefPrio3
attribute.description: Reference to an Managed Object instance containing redirection information for this EUtranCell. This reference should be set to a Cdma2000Freq, EUtranFrequency, UtranFrequency or GeranFrequencyGroup instance. Redirect to the same frequency is possible.
attribute.deprecated: Since L11B. Planned to be removed.

attribute.name: systemInformationBlock6
attribute.description: Contains cell re-selection information common for cell re-selection towards UTRAN.

attribute.name: systemInformationBlock7
attribute.description: Contains cell re-selection information common for cell re-selection towards GERAN.

attribute.name: systemInformationBlock8
attribute.description: Contains cell re-selection information common for cell re-selection towards CDMA2000. This is controlled by the licensing MO Cdma2000SessionContinuity. The SIB8 distribution and information is also controlled by other licenses.

attribute.name: reservedBy
attribute.description: Contains a list of managed object instances that reserves this managed object instance.
attribute.dependencies: The managed object cannot be deleted if it is reserved.

attribute.name: srbTableRef
attribute.description:
Reference to an instance of SrbTable. Assigns a SrbTable for a cell.
Reference to the SrbTable instance corresponding to LDN= "ManagementElement=1, ENodeBFunction=1, SrbTable=default”
attribute.dependencies: It is assumed that the SrbTable MO has been created.

attribute.name: systemInformationBlock3
attribute.description: Contains cell re-selection information common for intra-frequency, inter-frequency and/ or inter-RAT cell re-selection.

attribute.name: ulCyclicPrefix
attribute.description: Type of cyclic prefix used for uplink.

attribute.name: ulInterferenceManagementActive
attribute.description: Specifies if uplink interference management is enabled or disabled.

attribute.name: ulInterferenceManagementDuration
attribute.description: Specifies the time for which a randomly selected start frequency will be valid before a new start frequency is allocated. Setting it to "0" means that it will be randomly selected once, but never updated.
attribute.dependencies: ulInterferenceManagementActive shall be enabled before this parameter takes effect.

attribute.name: acBarringInfo
attribute.description: Contains all access barring information.
attribute.deprecated: Since L12B. Replaced by attributes on cell level. See struct AcBarringInfo for details.

attribute.name: activeMtdMeasurements
attribute.description: Array with all active Local Measurements on this MO. Measurement types for this attribute are TBD. Up to 10 measurements can be active.

attribute.name: cellBarred
attribute.description: Indicates if the cell is barred and should not be accessible to random UEs.

attribute.name: cellReservedForOperatorUse
attribute.description:
Indicates if the cell is reserved for operator use.
The first index is for the primary Public Land Mobile Network (PLMN) of the cell.
attribute.deprecated: Since L11A. Replaced by: primaryPlmnReserved and additionalPlmnReservedList

attribute.name: cellSimulated
attribute.description: This attribute indicates if the specific cell is configured to be simulated in an external test tool. The attribute will be set by the Tester at configuration of the cell.

attribute.name: configurableFrequencyStart
attribute.description: The start frequency offset for allocating resources when the downlink interference management is disabled. Expressed as a percentage of the available bandwidth.
attribute.deprecated: Replaced by dlConfigurableFrequencyStart. Since L11B.

attribute.name: dlCyclicPrefix
attribute.description: Type of cyclic prefix used for downlink.

attribute.name: dlInterferenceManagementActive
attribute.description: Specifies if the downlink interference management is enabled or disabled.

attribute.name: dlInterferenceManagementDuration
attribute.description: Specifies the time for which a randomly selected start frequency will be valid before a new start frequency is allocated. Setting it to "0" means that it will be randomly selected once, but never updated.
attribute.dependencies: dlInterferenceManagementActive shall be enabled before this parameter takes effect.

attribute.name: nrOfRaPreambles
attribute.description: This parameter corresponds to RRC parameter numberOfRA-Preambles and controls the number random access preambles that are allocated for contention-based random access (CBRA).
attribute.deprecated: Since L13A. Has no functional behavior. Planned to be removed.

attribute.name: nrOfSymbolsPdcch
attribute.description: The number of Orthogonal Frequency-Division Multiplexing (OFDM) symbols used for the Physical Downlink Control Channel (PDCCH).
attribute.deprecated: Since L12A. Planned to be removed.

attribute.name: pMaxServingCell
attribute.description:
Limits UE uplink transmission power in the serving cell and calculates the parameter Pcompensation (defined in 3GPP TS 36.304) for cell selection. The attribute is broadcast in SIB1.
Value 1000 means the parameter is not included in system information.

attribute.name: pZeroNominalPucch
attribute.description: The nominal component of the UE transmit power for Physical Uplink Control Channel (PUCCH).

attribute.name: pZeroNominalPusch
attribute.description: The nominal component of the UE transmit power for Physical Uplink Shared Channel (PUSCH).

attribute.name: qciTableRef
attribute.description:
Refers to an instance of QciTable and assigns a QciTable to a cell. The QciTable defines Quality of Service Class Indicator (QCI) to use in the cell.
Refers to the QciTable instance corresponding to Local Distinguished Name (LDN) = ManagementElement=1, ENodeBFunction=1, QciTable=default
attribute.dependencies: It is assumed that the QciTable MO has been created.

attribute.name: rachNoOfAllocationsPerFrame
attribute.description:
Defines the number of subframes per radio frame where PRACH is allocated. The PRACH configuration is broadcasted as part of system information.
Valid values: 5, 10, 20, 30, 50, 100
Value mapping: 5 = 0.5 (0ne every second radio frame) 10 = 1 20 = 2 30 = 3 50 = 5 100 = 10

attribute.name: rachPreambleRepetition
attribute.description: Defines if RACH preamble repetition shall be used for preamble sequence generation and detection. Defines the preamble format (format 0 or 2). Preamble format is broadcasted as part of system information.

attribute.name: rachRootSequence
attribute.description: The first root sequence number for Random Access Channel (RACH) preamble generation. RACH root sequence is broadcast as a part of system information distribution and used for preamble detection. See definition for logical root sequence number in 3GPP TS 36.211.

attribute.name: radioBearerTableRef
attribute.description:
Reference to an instance of RadioBearerTable. Assigns a RadioBearerTable for a cell.
Reference to the RadioBearerTable instance corresponding to LDN= "ManagementElement=1, ENodeBFunction=1, RadioBearerTable =default”
attribute.dependencies: It is assumed that the RadioBearerTable MO has been created.

attribute.name: pmZtemporary1
attribute.description: Normally this counter is not used, it can however sometimes be temporarily used for very late additions in a release. If so, for description see Network Impact Report in the CPI.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmZtemporary10
attribute.description: Normally this counter is not used, it can however sometimes be temporarily used for very late additions in a release. If so, for description see Network Impact Report in the CPI.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmZtemporary11
attribute.description: Normally this counter is not used, it can however sometimes be temporarily used for very late additions in a release. If so, for description see Network Impact Report in the CPI.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmZtemporary12
attribute.description: Normally this counter is not used, it can however sometimes be temporarily used for very late additions in a release. If so, for description see Network Impact Report in the CPI.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmZtemporary13
attribute.description: Normally this counter is not used, it can however sometimes be temporarily used for very late additions in a release. If so, for description see Network Impact Report in the CPI.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmZtemporary14
attribute.description: Normally this counter is not used, it can however sometimes be temporarily used for very late additions in a release. If so, for description see Network Impact Report in the CPI.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmZtemporary15
attribute.description: Normally this counter is not used, it can however sometimes be temporarily used for very late additions in a release. If so, for description see Network Impact Report in the CPI.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmZtemporary2
attribute.description: Normally this counter is not used, it can however sometimes be temporarily used for very late additions in a release. If so, for description see Network Impact Report in the CPI.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmZtemporary3
attribute.description: Normally this counter is not used, it can however sometimes be temporarily used for very late additions in a release. If so, for description see Network Impact Report in the CPI.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmZtemporary4
attribute.description: Normally this counter is not used, it can however sometimes be temporarily used for very late additions in a release. If so, for description see Network Impact Report in the CPI.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmZtemporary5
attribute.description: Normally this counter is not used, it can however sometimes be temporarily used for very late additions in a release. If so, for description see Network Impact Report in the CPI.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmZtemporary6
attribute.description: Normally this counter is not used, it can however sometimes be temporarily used for very late additions in a release. If so, for description see Network Impact Report in the CPI.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmZtemporary7
attribute.description: Normally this counter is not used, it can however sometimes be temporarily used for very late additions in a release. If so, for description see Network Impact Report in the CPI.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmZtemporary8
attribute.description: Normally this counter is not used, it can however sometimes be temporarily used for very late additions in a release. If so, for description see Network Impact Report in the CPI.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmZtemporary9
attribute.description: Normally this counter is not used, it can however sometimes be temporarily used for very late additions in a release. If so, for description see Network Impact Report in the CPI.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmS1SigConnEstabAtt
attribute.description: This measurement provides the number of S1 Signalling connection establishment attempts for any establishment cause.
attribute.condition: Stepped at transmission of Initial UE message.
attribute.scanner: Primary

attribute.name: pmS1SigConnEstabSucc
attribute.description: The total number of successful S1 signalling connection establishments.
attribute.condition: Stepped at the first occurrence of reception of any message on this S1 logical connection.
attribute.scanner: Primary

attribute.name: pmSchedActivityCellDl
attribute.description: The aggregated number of ms in which DRB data was required to be scheduled in the downlink.
attribute.condition: Each TTI, the counter shall be incremented when there was a need to schedule DRB data in the downlink.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmSchedActivityCellUl
attribute.description: The aggregated number of ms in which DRB data was required to be scheduled in the uplink.
attribute.condition: Each TTI, the counter shall be incremented when there was a need to schedule DRB data in the uplink.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmSchedActivityUeDl
attribute.description: Total UEs scheduling activity in the downlink.
attribute.condition: The counter shall be increased with 1 for each UE that was scheduled with SRB/DRB data in the downlink.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmSchedActivityUeUl
attribute.description: Total UEs scheduling activity in the uplink.
attribute.condition: The counter shall be increased with 1 for each UE that was scheduled with SRB/DRB data in the uplink.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmSchedRestrictUeCatDl
attribute.description: The sum of the contributions from each UE of the number of ms where respective UE is limited in the downlink direction by its UE capability.
