attribute.description: Says whether a blind Handover from this cell can be initiated when a UE reports bad coverage, or not. Note that even if the value is True, the eNB will only initate a blind handover if it finds a suitable cell.

attribute.name: pmRrcConnReconfAttNoMob
attribute.description: Number of RRC connection reconfiguration attempts (excluding attempt done for mobility purpose).
attribute.condition: At the transmission of RRCConnectionReconfiguration message and it does not include the mobilityControlInfo.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmRrcConnReconfSuccNoMob
attribute.description: Successful number of RRC connection reconfiguration attempts (excluding attempt done for mobility purpose).
attribute.condition: When RRCConnectionReconfigurationComplete is received succeeding transmission of RRCConnectionReconfiguration message that did not include the mobilityControlInfo.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmHoPrepRejInLicRlcUm
attribute.description: The number of non-admitted E-RABs at an incoming handover preparation procedure, due to lack of license for RLC UM.
attribute.condition: At transmission by the target eNB of the Handover Request Acknowledge message to the MME or to the source eNB
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmPdcpPktFwdDl
attribute.description: Total number of DRB packets (PDCP SDUs) forwarded to target cell at handover for downlink sessions.
attribute.condition: Packet forwarding is started when source cell transmit RRCConnectionReconfiguration and is stopped when source receives the end marker or when the source receives UE Context Release from target or timer tHODataFwdReordering has expiered.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: dlConfigurableFrequencyStart
attribute.description: Specifies the start frequency offset for the allocation of resources when the downlink interference management is disabled expressed as a percentage of the configured bandwidth.
attribute.dependencies: dlInterferenceManagementActive shall be disabled before this parameter takes effect.

attribute.name: ulConfigurableFrequencyStart
attribute.description: Specifies the start frequency offset for the allocation of resources when the uplink interference management is disabled expressed as a percentage of the configured bandwidth.
attribute.dependencies: ulInterferenceManagementActive shall be disabled before this parameter takes effect.

attribute.name: dlFrequencyAllocationProportion
attribute.description: Specifies the amount of frequency resources that is allocated in DL expressed as a percentage of the configured bandwidth.

attribute.name: ulFrequencyAllocationProportion
attribute.description: Specifies the amount of frequency resources that is allocated in UL expressed as a percentage of the configured bandwidth.

attribute.name: pmErabEstabAttInitQci
attribute.description:
The total number of initial E-RAB setup attempts per QCI.
Compressed: True
attribute.condition: Shall be stepped for each E-RAB Establishment attempt per QCI at reception of S1-AP message Initial Context Setup Request.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmErabEstabSuccInitQci
attribute.description:
The total number of successful initial E-RAB setup per QCI.
Compressed: True
attribute.condition: Shall be stepped for each successful E-RAB Establishment attempt per QCI at transmission of S1-AP message Initial Context Setup Response.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmErabEstabAttAddedQci
attribute.description:
The total number of additional E-RAB setup attempts per QCI.
Compressed: True
attribute.condition: Shall be stepped for each E-RAB Establishment attempt per QCI at reception of S1-AP message E-RAB Setup Request.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmErabEstabSuccAddedQci
attribute.description:
The total number of successful additional E-RAB setup per QCI.
Compressed: True
attribute.condition: Shall be stepped for each successful E-RAB Establishment attempt per QCI at transmission of S1-AP message E-RAB Setup Response.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmPdcpVolUlDrbQci
attribute.description:
The total volume (PDCP SDU) that has been received on Data Radio Bearers in the uplink direction per QCI.
Compressed: True
attribute.condition: The counter accumulates received UL PDCP volume per QCI.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmRlcDelayTimeDlQci
attribute.description:
Aggregated DL RLC delay for a measurement period per QCI.
Compressed: True
attribute.condition: The counter represents DL delay per QCI. The DL delay is the time between reception of a PDCP SDU until it has been scheduled and sent to the MAC layer for transmission over the air.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmRlcDelayPktTransDlQci
attribute.description:
Number of samples for DL RLC delay measurements during a measurement period per QCI.
Compressed: True
attribute.condition: The counter registers the number of samples for DL delay measurements during a measurement period per QCI.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmRrcConnEstabSuccEm
attribute.description: The total number of successful RRC Connection Establishments for Establishment cause Emergency.
attribute.condition: Stepped at reception of RRC message RRC Connection Setup Complete if the corresponding RRC Connection Request had Establishment cause Emergency
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmErabAdmissionAttArp0
attribute.description: The total number of E-RAB admission attempts for ARP (Allocation Retention Priority)=0
attribute.deprecated: Since L11B. Has no functional behavior, planned to be removed.
attribute.condition: Stepped for each E-RAB with ARP=0 at reception of E-RAB SETUP REQUEST, INITIAL CONTEXT SETUP REQUEST or HANDOVER REQUEST.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmErabAdmissionSuccArp0
attribute.description: The total number of admitted E-RAB Establishment for ARP (Allocation Retention Priority)=0
attribute.deprecated: Since L11B. Has no functional behavior, planned to be removed.
attribute.condition: Stepped for each admitted E-RAB with ARP=0 at transmission of E-RAB SETUP RESPONSE, INITIAL CONTEXT SETUP RESPONSE or HANDOVER REQUEST ACKNOWLEDGE .
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: eutranCellPolygon
attribute.description: Models the manageable characteristics for the cell polygon used for UE positioning. Each polygon corner is described by a latitude and longitude pair. Each polygon corner is represented with one position in the sequence. The other configured polygon corners follow in sequence. There must at least be three corners configured in a polygon when the function is active/used. The points shall be connected in the order that they are given. The last point is connected to the first point.

attribute.name: prsConfigIndexMapped
attribute.description: This parameter holds the resulting prsConfigIndex value. If prsPeriod is used by the operator then prsConfigIndexMapped will be set by the system. If prsConfigIndex is used by the operator then prsConfigIndexMapped will be a copy of the entered value.

attribute.name: pmUeCtxtRelCsfbLimitedDualRadioUeCdma
attribute.description: The number of RRC Connection Release triggered by CS Fallback for Limited Dual Radio UE LTE/1xRTT.
attribute.condition: A CS Fallback attempt is performed for a limited Dual Radio UE towards CDMA2000 1xRTT, defined as a RRC Connection Release, due to a received CS Fallback Indicator set to CS Fallback Required in Initial Context Setup Request or UE Context Modification Request.
attribute.scanner: Primary

attribute.name: partOfSectorPower
attribute.description:
The requested part of the total power in the Sector that should be allocated for the cell. The output power is evenly distributed over the antenna connectors used for TX transmission that are allocated for the cell.
If the total amount of power per antenna connector is over 100% when the cell is unlocked, an alarm will be generated.
attribute.deprecated: Since L13A. Planned to be removed. Replaced by SectorCarrier::partOfSectorPower. The value from the first SectorCarrier in the EUtranCellFDD/EUtranCellTDD::sectorCarrierRef will be mapped to this deprecated attribute.

attribute.name: pmErabEstabAttAddedPa
attribute.description: The total number of added E-RAB Establishment attempts with Privileged Access. Added E-RABs are all E-RABs present in S1 message E-RAB Setup Request.
attribute.condition: Stepped at reception of E-RAB Setup Request for each E-RAB that have the given ARP Priority Level equal to or below AdmissionControl::paArpOverride.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmErabEstabSuccAddedPa
attribute.description: The total number of successfully added E-RABs with Privileged Access. Added E-RABs are all E-RABs present in S1 message E-RAB Setup Request.
attribute.condition: Stepped at sending of E-RAB Setup Response for each successfully setup E-RAB that have the given ARP Priority Level equal to or below AdmissionControl::paArpOverride.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmErabEstabAttInitPa
attribute.description: The total number of initial E-RAB Establishment attempts with Privileged Access. Initial E-RABs are all E-RABs present in the S1 message Initial Context Setup Request.
attribute.condition: Stepped at reception of Initial Context Setup Request for each E-RAB that have the given ARP Priority Level equal to or below AdmissionControl::paArpOverride.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmErabEstabSuccInitPa
attribute.description: The total number of successful initial E-RAB Establishments with Privileged Access. Initial E-RABs are all E-RABs present in the S1 message Initial Context Setup Request.
attribute.condition: Stepped at sending of Initial Context Setup Response for each successfully setup E-RAB that have the given ARP Priority Level equal to or below AdmissionControl::paArpOverride.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmRrcConnEstabSuccHpa
attribute.description: The total number of successful RRC Connection Establishments for Establishment cause High Priority.
attribute.condition: Stepped at reception of RRC message RRC Connection Setup Complete if the corresponding RRC Connection Request had Establishment cause High Priority.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: eutranCellCoverage
attribute.description:
Models the cell coverage area used for UE positioning. The cell coverage area is defined by the cell bearing, cell opening angle and cell radius.
This attribute has no operational impact.

attribute.name: pmRrcConnLevSumUlOutOfSync
attribute.description: The number of UEs in RRC_CONNECTED that have UL sync state 'out-of-sync'.
attribute.condition: This counter is based on an internal level counter that counts the number of RRC_CONNECTED UEs that have UL synchronization state: out-of-sync. Values are read periodically and accumulated.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmUeThpVolUl
attribute.description: The UL DRB volume used for UL UE Throughput. It comprises of the MAC SDU volume received on Uu, excluding the volume received in the first 4 data receptions of an UL buffer transfer and the TTI emptying the UL buffer.
attribute.condition: Continuous measurement for UEs aggregated to cell level.
attribute.scanner: Primary

attribute.name: pmRrcConnEstabAttReatt
attribute.description: The total number of RRC Connection Request attempts that are considered as re-attempts.
attribute.condition: Stepped at reception of RRC message RRC Connection Request while an RRC Connection Setup is already ongoing for that S-TMSI.
attribute.scanner: Primary

attribute.name: qQualMin
attribute.description:
Specifies the minimum required quality level (RSRQ) in the cell in dB.
Corresponds to qQualMin in TS 36.304, sent in SIB1.
attribute.dependencies: The field is mandatory present if the Struct Member threshServingLowQ in SIB3 is used in systemInformationBlockType3.

attribute.name: qQualMinOffset
attribute.description:
The offset applied to the signalled qQualMin.
Corresponds to Qqualminoffset in TS 36.304.
Value 0 means that it is not sent in SIB1 and UE applies in such case the (default) value of 0 dB for Qqualminoffset.
attribute.dependencies: If the value of qQualMin is set to 0 the parameter qQualMinOffset will not be broadcasted.

attribute.name: pmUeCtxtRelSCTdScdma
attribute.description: The number of Session Continuity RRC Connection Release with redirect to UTRA TDD
attribute.condition: A RRC Connection Release with redirect information to UTRA TDD
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmRadioRecInterferencePwrPrb
attribute.description:
The accumulated interference power per PRB.
PDF range: [0]: 1st Prb starting from the low part of the spectrum [1]: 2nd Prb starting from the low part of the spectrum ..... [99]: 100th Prb starting from the low part of the spectrum
attribute.deprecated: Since L12A. Has no functional behavior, planned to be removed.
attribute.condition: Samples summed over the measurement period. Measurements are averaged over receive antennas.One sample per TTI
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pdcchCfiMode
attribute.description: Controls the CFI (Control Format Indicator) used for the control region. cfiMode maps to CFI as described under enumerations. For DL BW of 1400 kHz, values of CFI = 1, 2 and 3 map to 2, 3, and 4 control region symbols respectively. Other BW, CFI maps directly to number of control region symbols.
attribute.dependencies: pdcchCfiMode cannot equal CFI_STATIC_1 while dlChannelBandwidth = 1400, 3000, or 5000 kHz since there would be insufficient CCEs to transmit a PDCCH for common channel messages such as SIB1 or SI. Certain values of pdcchCfiMode that allow high CFI values may be disallowed when the combination of attributes pdcchCfiMode, dlChannelBandwidth, noOfPucchCqiUsers, and noOfPucchSrUsers require too many corresponding PUCCH HARQ-ARQ resources.

attribute.name: pmPdcchCceUtil
attribute.description: PDF of % of CCEs utilized compared with total CCEs available (at the maximum CFI permitted by pdcchCfiMode) each subframe, considering bandwidth and antenna configuration. [0]: utilization <= 5% [1]: 5% < utilization <= 10% [2]: 10% < utilization <= 15% [3]: 15% < utilization <= 20% [4]: 20% < utilization <= 25% [5]: 25% < utilization <= 30% [6]: 30% < utilization <= 35% [7]: 35% < utilization <= 40% [8]: 40% < utilization <= 45% [9]: 45% < utilization <= 50% [10]: 50% < utilization <= 55% [11]: 55% < utilization <= 60% [12]: 60% < utilization <= 65% [13]: 65% < utilization <= 70% [14]: 70% < utilization <= 75% [15]: 75% < utilization <= 80% [16]: 80% < utilization <= 85% [17]: 85% < utilization <= 90% [18]: 90% < utilization <= 95% [19]: 95% < utilization <= 100%
attribute.condition: Appropriate bin is incremented every radio subframe.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmPdcchCceActivity
attribute.description: Counter of how often the PDCCH has 1 or more CCEs used. To re-normalize pmPdcchCceUtil for subframes containing traffic, use this counter compute and remove idle subframes.
attribute.condition: Pegs when 1 or more CCEs utilized in a subframe.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmPdcchCfiUtil
attribute.description: PDF of number of subframes each CFI value was assigned [0]: CFI = 1 [1]: CFI = 2 [2]: CFI = 3
attribute.condition: Appropriate bin is incremented every radio subframe.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: ulSrsEnable
attribute.description: This parameter controls whenever sounding shall be enabled or not. When enabled, cell resources are configured for sounding.
attribute.dependencies: Only relevant if the license for frequency selective scheduling is present and active

attribute.name: pmRrcConnReestAtt
attribute.description: The number of RRC Connection Reestablishment attempts.
attribute.condition: A RRC Connection Reestablishment Request message is received.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmRrcConnReestSucc
attribute.description: The number of successful RRC Connection Reestablishments.
attribute.condition: A RRC Connection Reestablishment Complete messages is received.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: rateShapingActive
attribute.description: Indicates if End-user bitrate shaping functionality is activated in this cell.
attribute.dependencies: Only relevant if the license for End-user bitrate shaping is present and the feature is active.

attribute.name: pmUeThpTimeUlRs
attribute.description: The time where the UE have uplink data in a buffer and End-user bitrate shaping functionality will prohibit transmission in the uplink.
attribute.deprecated: Since L12A. Has no functional behaviour. Planned to be removed.
attribute.condition: Data in uplink buffer, according to the Buffer Status Report (BSR) and Token Bucket Counter (TBC) less than 0. Continuous measurement for UEs aggregated to cell level.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmErabModAttQci
attribute.description:
The number of E-RAB Modify attempts per QCI. Note: since the QCI itself can be modified, if an E-RAB on QCI x is modified to QCI y, bin [x] would be used (and for subsequent E-RAB Modify attempts, bin [y] would be used).
Compressed: True
attribute.condition: Shall be stepped for each E-RAB modification attempt per QCI at reception of S1-AP message E-RAB Modify Request.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmErabModSuccQci
attribute.description:
The number of successful E-RAB Modify attempts per QCI. Note: since the QCI itself can be modified, if an E-RAB on QCI x is modified to QCI y, bin [x] would be used (and for subsequent E-RAB Modify attempts, bin [y] would be used).
Compressed: True
attribute.condition: Shall be stepped for each successful E-RAB modification attempt per QCI at transmission of S1-AP message E-RAB Modify Response.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmErabModFailLic
attribute.description: The number of E-RAB Modify attempts initiated from the MME which failed due to license reject.
attribute.condition: Stepped for each E-RAB for which modification failed due to license reject.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmVoipQualityUeUlOk
attribute.description: The number of UE that are satisfied with their VoIP quality.
attribute.condition: The counter is incremented when it has been determined that a UE is satisfied with its VoIP quality. This means that at least the minimume amount of VoIP packets is available for the measurement and that at least 99% of the VoIP packets of the UE had an air interface delay within the packet delay budget.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmVoipQualityUeUlNok
attribute.description: The number of UE that are not satisfied with their VoIP quality.
attribute.condition: The counter is incremented when it has been determined that a UE is not satisfied with its VoIP quality. This can be caused due to two conditions: (1) At least the minimume amount of VoIP packets is available for the measurement and less than 99% of the VoIP packets of the UE had an air interface delay within the packet delay budget. (2) 50% or less of the VoIP packets of the UE had an air interface delay within the packet delay budget, regardless of the amount of VoIP packets for measurement.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmPdcpPktPdbUlOkVoip
attribute.description: The number of RLC SDU (PDCP SDU) in UL that are received within the Packet Delay Budget in Uplink. Only applicable for VoIP.
attribute.condition: Incremented when a VoIP packet has an air interface delay within the packet delay budget.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmVoipQualityUeUlLowSampl
attribute.description: The number of VoIP quality measurements that can not determine the VoIP satisfaction of a UE due to insufficient statistics. These measurements are excluded when the VoIP integrity KPI is calculated.
attribute.condition: The counter is incremented when less then the minimum amount of VoIP packets is available for the measurement and at least 50% of the VoIP packets of the UE have an air interface delay within the packet delay budget.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: cellSubscriptionCapacity
attribute.description: Normalized subscription capacity of the cell. The value represents the total capacity of the cell used for traffic load balancing purposes.

attribute.name: threshServingLow
attribute.description: Specifies the threshold that the signal strength of the serving cell must be below for cell reselection towards a lower priority Inter-Frequency or Inter-RAT frequency. Corresponds to ThreshServingLowP in TS 36.304.

attribute.name: pmLcgThpVolUlLcg
attribute.description: The UL volume used for UL DRB Throughput per LCG. It comprises of the MAC SDU volume received on Uu per LCG, excluding the volume received in the first 4 data transmissions and the data transmission emptying the UL buffer.
attribute.condition: The bin accumulates the UL volume per LCG for large data bursts that needs to be transmitted across multiple TTIs.
attribute.scanner: Primary

attribute.name: pmLcgThpTimeUlLcg
attribute.description: The UL transmission time used for UL DRB Throughput per LCG. It comprises of time periods from when the 5th data transmission is received on Uu until the second last data transmission is received.
attribute.condition: The bin accumulates the UL transmission time per LCG for large data bursts that need to be transmitted across multiple TTIs.
attribute.scanner: Primary

attribute.name: pmPrbUsedDlDtchFirstTransQci
attribute.description:
The total number of PRB pairs used in DL per QCI for HARQ initial transmissions.
Compressed: True
attribute.condition: The bin accumulates the number of PRB pairs used in DL per QCI for HARQ initial transmissions.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmPrbUsedUlDtchQci
attribute.description:
The total number of PRB pairs used in UL per QCI.
Compressed: True
attribute.condition: The bin accumulates the number of PRB pairs used in UL per QCI.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmPdcchMaxCceAvail
attribute.description: The total maximum number of CCEs available determined based on the bandwidth and antenna configuration.
attribute.condition: The counter accumulates the maximum number of CCEs available.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmPdcchCceUsedDlQci
attribute.description: The total number of CCEs used for DL grants per QCI. Compressed: True
attribute.condition: The bin accumulates the number of CCEs used for DL grants corresponding to TBs with bits belonging to a specific QCI.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmPdcchCceUsedUlQci
attribute.description: The total number of CCEs used for UL grants per QCI. When a single UE is associated with multiple QCIs, only QCI that has highest priority ( logical group with highest priority) contribute to the CCE count. Compressed: True
attribute.condition: The bin accumulates the number of CCEs used for UL grants corresponding to TBs with bits belonging to a specific QCI.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmUeCtxtRelAbnormalEnbActPe
attribute.description: The total number of abnormal UE context releases initiated by the RBS due to pre-emption and that there was data in either the UL or DL buffer (i.e. active).
attribute.condition: Stepped for each UE that is released due to to pre-emption when data was in either the UL or DL buffer.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmUeCtxtRelAbnormalEnbPe
attribute.description: The total number of abnormal UE Context releases initiated by the RBS due to pre-emption. The counter is stepped regardless of whether data was or was not lost in UL/DL buffers.
attribute.condition: Stepped for each UE that is released due to to pre-emption.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmErabRelAbnormalEnbActPe
attribute.description: The total number of abnormal E-RAB releases per cell, initiated by the RBS due to UE pre-emption with the pre-condition that the Initial Context Establishment procedure must first have been successfully completed and when data was in either the UL or DL buffer (i.e. active).
attribute.condition: Stepped for each ERAB that is released due to pre-emption when data was in either the UL or DL buffer. In the UL case when a UE has multiple bearers co-existing and sharing the same LCG, the bearers share a single packet queue. If one of the bearers is released and there is data in the queue, the bearer's associated counter is incremented, regardless of whether or not the data belongs to the released bearer.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmErabRelAbnormalEnbPe
attribute.description: The total number of abnormal E-RAB Releases per cell, initiated by the RBS due to UE pre-emption with the pre-condition that the Initial Context Establishment procedure must first have been successfully completed. The counter is stepped regardless of whether data was or was not lost in UL/DL buffers.
attribute.condition: abnormal E-RAB Release due to UE pre-emption
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmPrbUsedDlFirstTrans
attribute.description: The total number of PRB pairs used in DL for HARQ initial transmissions.
attribute.condition: The counter accumulates the number of PRB pairs used in DL for HARQ initial transmissions.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmPrbUsedDlReTrans
attribute.description: The total number of PRB pairs used in DL for HARQ retransmissions.
attribute.condition: The counter accumulates the number of PRB pairs used in DL for HARQ retransmissions.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.description: Normally this counter is not used, it can however sometimes be temporarily used for very late additions in a release. If so, for description see Network Impact Report in the CPI.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmZtemporary16Qci
attribute.description: Compressed: True
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmZtemporary17Qci
attribute.description: Compressed: True
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmZtemporary18Qci
attribute.description: Compressed: True
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmPrbUsedDlSrbFirstTrans
attribute.description: The total number of Physical Resource Block (PRB) pairs for HARQ initial transmissions used for Signaling Radio Bearers (SRB) in the downlink.
attribute.condition: This measurement is applicable to Dedicated Control Channels (DCCH) and Common Control Channels (CCCH) on the Physical Downlink Shared Channel (PDSCH).
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmRachPreambleDist
attribute.description: This measurement provides the distribution of number of RACH preambles sent by the UE as reported by the UEs inside the UEInformationResponse message according to 32.425 [0]: 1 preamble [1]: 2 preambles [2]: 3 preambles [3]: 4 preambles [4]: 5 preambles [5]: 6 preambles [6]: 7 preambles [7]: 8 preambles [8]: 9 preambles [9]: >= 10 preambles
attribute.condition: Stepped at reception of UE INFORMATION RESPONSE message.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmRachNumContentionReport
attribute.description: This measurement provides the number of UEInformationResponse messages received with contentionDetected IE set to TRUE.
attribute.condition: Stepped at reception of UE INFORMATION RESPONSE message.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmMeasMissingNeighRel
attribute.description: This counter is being stepped when a best cell evaluation is received in eNB from UE on a PCI where the CGI is unknown, i.e. no neighbour relation to the cell is available in the eNB.
attribute.condition: This counter is being stepped when a best cell evaluation is received in eNB from UE on a PCI where the CGI is unknown, i.e. no neighbour relation to the cell is available in the eNB.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pciConflict
attribute.description: A PCI confusion exists if a source cell has relations to two neighbours cells where both neighbours cells have the same PCI and frequency. A PCI collision exists if a source cell has a relation to a neighbour cell where both the source cell and neighbour cell has the same PCI and frequency.

attribute.name: lastModification
attribute.description: Indicates whether the MO was last modified by the operator or if the MO has been modified by the PCI conflict detection application.

attribute.name: pciConflictCell
attribute.description: Indicates the CGI of the other cell that is involved in the PCI collision/confusion. This value is only valid if the attribute pciConflict is "YES" or "YES_CONFLICTING_CELL".

attribute.name: timeOfLastModification
attribute.description: Indicates the time and date when the MO was last modified. Format: YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS

attribute.description: The accumulated interference power for PRB1
attribute.condition: Samples summed over the measurement period. Measurements are averaged over receive antennas.One sample per TTI
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmRadioUeRepCqiSubband0Sum
attribute.description: The accumulated sum of all sub-band 0 CQI reported by UEs in the cell for rank 1 transmissions. The average value of the reported sub-band 0 CQI within the measurement period can be obtained in conjunction with counter pmRadioUeRepCqiSubbandSamp. The counter is defined according to 32.425.
attribute.condition: Samples summed over the measurement period. One sample per UE aperiodic rank 1 CQI report. This counter is for rank 1 (one codeword) CQI reports. The counter is defined according to 32.425 Section 4.10.1.2 Valid UE reported CQI values range from 0 to 15
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmRadioUeRepCqi2Subband0Sum
attribute.description: The accumulated sum of all sub-band 0 CQI reported by UEs in the cell for rank 2 transmissions. The average value of the reported sub-band 0 CQI within the measurement period can be obtained in conjunction with counter pmRadioUeRepCqi2SubbandSamp. The counter is defined according to 32.425.
attribute.condition: Samples summed over the measurement period. One sample per UE aperiodic rank 2 CQI report. This counter is for rank 2 (two codewords) CQI reports. The counter is defined according to 32.425 Section 4.10.1.2 Valid UE reported CQI values range from 0 to 15 Note for CQI/PMI/RI reporting mode 3-1 or 2-1, there will be a different Sub-band CQI value for each codeword. In this case both CQI values shall be added to the counter and are counted as two samples.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner
