attribute.name: pmRadioUeRepCqi2Subband9Sum
attribute.description: The accumulated sum of all sub-band 9 CQI reported by UEs in the cell for rank 2 transmissions. The average value of the reported sub-band 9 CQI within the measurement period can be obtained in conjunction with counter pmRadioUeRepCqi2SubbandSamp. The counter is defined according to 32.425.
attribute.condition: Samples summed over the measurement period. One sample per UE aperiodic rank 2 CQI report. This counter is for rank 2 (two codewords) CQI reports. The counter is defined according to 32.425 Section 4.10.1.2 Valid UE reported CQI values range from 0 to 15 Note for CQI/PMI/RI reporting mode 3-1 or 2-1, there will be a different Sub-band CQI value for each codeword. In this case both CQI values shall be added to the counter and are counted as two samples.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmRadioUeRepCqi2Subband10Sum
attribute.description: The accumulated sum of all sub-band 10 CQI reported by UEs in the cell for rank 2 transmissions. The average value of the reported sub-band 10 CQI within the measurement period can be obtained in conjunction with counter pmRadioUeRepCqi2SubbandSamp. The counter is defined according to 32.425.
attribute.condition: Samples summed over the measurement period. One sample per UE aperiodic rank 2 CQI report. This counter is for rank 2 (two codewords) CQI reports. The counter is defined according to 32.425 Section 4.10.1.2 Valid UE reported CQI values range from 0 to 15 Note for CQI/PMI/RI reporting mode 3-1 or 2-1, there will be a different Sub-band CQI value for each codeword. In this case both CQI values shall be added to the counter and are counted as two samples.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmRadioUeRepCqi2Subband11Sum
attribute.description: The accumulated sum of all sub-band 11 CQI reported by UEs in the cell for rank 2 transmissions. The average value of the reported sub-band 11 CQI within the measurement period can be obtained in conjunction with counter pmRadioUeRepCqi2SubbandSamp. The counter is defined according to 32.425.
attribute.condition: Samples summed over the measurement period. One sample per UE aperiodic rank 2 CQI report. This counter is for rank 2 (two codewords) CQI reports. The counter is defined according to 32.425 Section 4.10.1.2 Valid UE reported CQI values range from 0 to 15 Note for CQI/PMI/RI reporting mode 3-1 or 2-1, there will be a different Sub-band CQI value for each codeword. In this case both CQI values shall be added to the counter and are counted as two samples.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmRadioUeRepCqi2Subband12Sum
attribute.description: The accumulated sum of all sub-band 12 CQI reported by UEs in the cell for rank 2 transmissions. The average value of the reported sub-band 12 CQI within the measurement period can be obtained in conjunction with counter pmRadioUeRepCqi2SubbandSamp. The counter is defined according to 32.425.
attribute.condition: Samples summed over the measurement period. One sample per UE aperiodic rank 2 CQI report. This counter is for rank 2 (two codewords) CQI reports. The counter is defined according to 32.425 Section 4.10.1.2 Valid UE reported CQI values range from 0 to 15 Note for CQI/PMI/RI reporting mode 3-1 or 2-1, there will be a different Sub-band CQI value for each codeword. In this case both CQI values shall be added to the counter and are counted as two samples.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmRadioUeRepCqiSubbandSamp
attribute.description: The total sample count of rank 1 aperiodic CQI reported by UEs in the cell within the measurement period. It is used to compute the average CQI value for each sub-band. The counter is defined according to 32.425.
attribute.condition: Incremented for each UE aperiodic rank 1 CQI report within the measurement period. This counter is for rank 1 (one codeword) CQI reports. The counter is defined according to 32.425 Section 4.10.1.2
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmRadioUeRepCqi2SubbandSamp
attribute.description: The total sample count of rank 2 aperiodic CQI reported by UEs in the cell within the measurement period. It is used to compute the average CQI value for each sub-band. The counter is defined according to 32.425.
attribute.condition: Incremented for each UE aperiodic rank 2 CQI report within the measurement period. This counter is for rank 2 (two codewords) CQI reports. The counter is defined according to 32.425 Section 4.10.1.2 Note for CQI/PMI/RI reporting mode 3-1 or 2-1, there will be a different Sub-band CQI value for each codeword. In this case, the counter is incremented twice.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: cfraEnable
attribute.description: This parameter controls if Contention Free Random Access (CFRA, known as non-contention based random access in 3GPP term) shall be enabled or not. When enabled, a portion of random access preambles should be allocated for CFRA and CFRA can be used for incmoing HO and PDCCH ordered uplink re-sync.

attribute.name: pmRaUnassignedCfraFalse
attribute.description: The number of detected Contention Free Random Access (CFRA, known as non-contention based random access in 3GPP term) preambles that are not allocated to any UE
attribute.condition: This counter should be incremented when an RA msg 1 is received by eNB with a CFRA preamble which is not allocated to any UE.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmRaUnassignedCfraSum
attribute.description: The total number of unassigned Contention Free Random Access (CFRA, known as non-contention based random access in 3GPP term) preambles at each PRACH occasion during the reporting period.
attribute.condition: This counter should be incremented at each PRACH occasion by the number of unassigned CFRA preambles at that given PRACH occasion during the reporting period.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: noOfUsedRxAntennas
attribute.description: The number of used receive antennas. The value -1 indicates that the number of used antennas is undefined. The maximum number of this parameter is determined by the parameter noOfRxAntennas.
attribute.deprecated: Since L13A. Planned to be removed. Replaced by SectorCarrier::noOfUsedRxAntennas. The value from the first SectorCarrier in the EUtranCellFDD/EUtranCellTDD::sectorCarrierRef will be mapped to this deprecated attribute.

attribute.name: acBarringInfoPresent
attribute.description: Specifies presence of Information Element ac-BarringInfo in SIB2.

attribute.name: acBarringForMoSignallingPresent
attribute.description: Specifies presence of Information Element ac-BarringForMO-Signalling in SIB2.

attribute.name: acBarringForMoDataPresent
attribute.description: Specifies presence of Information Element ac-BarringForMO-Data in SIB2.

attribute.name: acBarringForMoSignalling
attribute.description: Access class barring parameters for mobile originating signalling. The information in broadcasted in SIB2.

attribute.name: acBarringForMoData
attribute.description: Access class barring parameters for mobile originating calls. The information in broadcasted in SIB2.

attribute.name: ssacBarringForMMTELVoicePresent
attribute.description: Specifies presence of Information Element ssac-BarringForMMTEL-Voice-r9 in SIB2.

attribute.name: ssacBarringForMMTELVideoPresent
attribute.description: Specifies presence of Information Element ssac-BarringForMMTEL-Video-r9 in SIB2.

attribute.name: ssacBarringForMMTELVoice
attribute.description: Service specific access class barring parameters for MMTEL voice originating calls. The information in broadcasted in SIB2.

attribute.name: ssacBarringForMMTELVideo
attribute.description: Service specific access class barring parameters for MMTEL video originating calls. The information in broadcasted in SIB2.

attribute.name: acBarringForEmergency
attribute.description: Access class barring for AC 10

attribute.name: pciDetectingCell
attribute.description: Indicates the CGI of the cell that detected the PCI collision/confusion. This value is only valid if the corresponding attribute pciConflict is "YES" or "YES_CONFLICTING_CELL". The first cell in the pciDetectingCell list corresponds to the first cell in the pciConflictCell list and the first value of pciConflict. The second cell in the pciDetectingCell list corresponds to the second cell in the pciConflictCell list and the first value of pciConflict.

attribute.name: emergencyAreaId
attribute.description: A cell supporting broadcast of warning messages may belong to one to four Emergency Areas. Such an area is identified by an Emergency Area Id, set by the operator. Value -1 means identity not set.

attribute.name: noOfDefPagCyclPrim
attribute.description: Number of consecutive "DefaultPagingCycles" in which paging for Earthquake and Tsunami Warning System (ETWS) Primary Notification shall be transmitted in the cell.
attribute.deprecated: Since L12B. Replaced by Paging::noOfDefPagCyclPrim

attribute.name: maxNoConcurrSib12
attribute.description: Maximum number of concurrent System Information messages carrying SIB12, i.e carrying Commercial Mobile Alert System (CMAS) notifications.
attribute.deprecated: Since L12B. Planned to be removed.

attribute.name: pmRateShapeTimeUl
attribute.description: The time where the UE have uplink data in a buffer and End-user bitrate shaping functionality will prohibit transmission in the uplink.
attribute.condition: Data in uplink buffer, according to the Buffer Status Report (BSR) and Token Bucket Counter (TBC) less than 0. Continuous measurement for UEs aggregated to cell level.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmErabRelMmeActEutra
attribute.description: The total number of E-RAB Releases per cell, initiated by the MME with the pre-condition that the Initial Context Establishment procedure must first have been successfully completed and that there was data in either the UL or DL buffer (i.e. active) and the cause was "Release due to Eutran generated reason".
attribute.condition: Stepped at reception of S1 message E-RAB Release Command or UE Context Release Command. The release must also have been MME initiated and cause was "Release due to Eutran generated reason". In the UL case when a UE has multiple bearers co-existing and sharing the same LCG, the bearers share a single packet queue. If one of the bearers is released and there is data in the queue, the bearer's associated counter is incremented, regardless of whether or not the data belongs to the released bearer.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmErabRelMmeActUnspecified
attribute.description: The total number of E-RAB Releases per cell, initiated by the MME with the pre-condition that the Initial Context Establishment procedure must first have been successfully completed and that there was data in either the UL or DL buffer (i.e. active) and the cause was "Unspecified".
attribute.condition: Stepped at reception of S1 message E-RAB Release Command or UE Context Release Command. The release must also have been MME initiated and cause was "Unspecified". In the UL case when a UE has multiple bearers co-existing and sharing the same LCG, the bearers share a single packet queue. If one of the bearers is released and there is data in the queue, the bearer's associated counter is incremented, regardless of whether or not the data belongs to the released bearer.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmErabRelMmeActUserInactivity
attribute.description: The total number of E-RAB Releases per cell, initiated by the MME with the pre-condition that the Initial Context Establishment procedure must first have been successfully completed and that there was data in either the UL or DL buffer (i.e. active) and the cause was "User Inactivity".
attribute.condition: Stepped at reception of S1 message E-RAB Release Command or UE Context Release Command. The release must also have been MME initiated and cause was "User Inactivity". In the UL case when a UE has multiple bearers co-existing and sharing the same LCG, the bearers share a single packet queue. If one of the bearers is released and there is data in the queue, the bearer's associated counter is incremented, regardless of whether or not the data belongs to the released bearer.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmPdcpVolUlHdrQci
attribute.description:
The total volume of decompressed PDCP SDU headers that has been transmitted from the Robust Header Compression entity in the uplink direction per QCI.
Compressed: True
attribute.condition: Continuous measurement for DRBs aggregated to cell level.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmPdcpVolUlCmpHdrQci
attribute.description:
The total volume of compressed PDCP SDU headers that has been received in the Robust Header Compression entity in the uplink direction per QCI.
Compressed: True
attribute.condition: Continuous measurement for DRBs aggregated to cell level.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmRohcEstabFailCid
attribute.description: Number of setups of Robust Header Compression failed due to BBM limit.
attribute.condition: Triggered at failed activation of Robust Header Compression for a data radio bearer.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmRohcEstabFailLic
attribute.description: Number of setups Robust Header Compression failed due to missing or inoperable license.
attribute.condition: Triggered at failed activation of Robust Header Compression for a data radio bearer.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmRohcEstabFailUeCap
attribute.description: Number of setups Robust Header Compression failed due UE Capabilities
attribute.condition: Triggered at failed activation of Robust Header Compression for a data radio bearer.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmUeCtxtRelAbnormalEnbLic
attribute.description: The total number of abnormal UE Contexts Releases initiated by the RBS due to license reject.
attribute.condition: Stepped at reception of S1 message UE Context Release Command when internal cause codes considered abnormal (license Limited Service Mode Emergency Call Support is not operable) when the RBS initiated the release.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmErabRelAbnormalEnbLic
attribute.description: The total number of abnormal E-RAB Releases initiated by the RBS due to license reject (per cell).
attribute.condition: Stepped at reception of S1 message E-RAB Release Command or UE Context Release Command, with the pre-condition that the Initial Context Establishment procedure must first have been successfully completed, when internal cause codes considered abnormal (license Limited Service Mode Emergency Call Support is not operable) and when the RBS initiated the release.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: hostingDigitalUnit
attribute.description: Shows the DU on which baseband processing for the cell is located

attribute.name: highSpeedUEActive
attribute.description: Indicates if the feature High Speed UE is activated in the cell

attribute.name: pmUeCtxtRelCsfbTdScdma
attribute.description: The number of RRC Connection Release with redirect to TD-SCDMA triggered by CS Fallback.
attribute.condition: A RRC Connection Release with redirect information to TD-SCDMA triggered by CS Fallback. Counter includes Release with Redirect including NACC.
attribute.scanner: Primary

attribute.name: pmUeCtxtRelCsfbTdScdmaEm
attribute.description: The number of RRC Connection Release with redirect to TD-SCDMA triggered by CS Fallback Emergency.
attribute.condition: A RRC Connection Release with redirect information to TD-SCDMA triggered by CS Fallback Emergency. Counter includes Release with Redirect including NACC.
attribute.scanner: Primary

attribute.name: pmLbSubRatioSum
attribute.description: Records the subscription ratio as the result of the traffic load assessment at every load balancing cycle. Those values are accumulated each ROP, allowing the average subscription ratio to be presented for each period.
attribute.condition: Accumulated at every EAB cell resource status report period. The current load based on the subscription ratio is the accumulated value to be used.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmLbSubRatioSamp
attribute.description: The number of load balancing cycles during the ROP. This together with the counter pmAvSubRatioSum can be used to calculate an average subscription ratio.
attribute.condition: Stepped once at every EAB cell resource status report period.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmErabLevRopStartQci
attribute.description:
The number of Established ERABs per QCI at the end of the measurement period.
Compressed: True ROP snapshot: True
attribute.condition: This counter is based on an internal level counter maintained by eNB. The internal level counter maintains the current number of ERABs per QCI. pmErabLevRopStartQci is updated with the current value at the measurement period end.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmRrcConnEstabSuccMod
attribute.description: The total number of successful RRC Connection Establishments for Establishment cause Mobile Originating Data.
attribute.condition: Stepped at reception of RRC message RRC Connection Setup Complete if the corresponding RRC Connection Request had Establishment cause Mobile Originating Data.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmRrcConnEstabSuccMos
attribute.description: The total number of successful RRC Connection Establishments for Establishment cause Mobile Originating Signaling.
attribute.condition: Stepped at reception of RRC message RRC Connection Setup Complete if the corresponding RRC Connection Request had Establishment cause Mobile Originating Signaling.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmRrcConnEstabSuccMta
attribute.description: The total number of successful RRC Connection Establishments for Establishment cause Mobile Terminating Access.
attribute.condition: Stepped at reception of RRC message RRC Connection Setup Complete if the corresponding RRC Connection Request had Establishment cause Mobile Terminating Access.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmRrcConnEstabAttReattEm
attribute.description: The total number of RRC Connection Request attempts that are considered as re-attempts for Establishment cause Emergency.
attribute.condition: Stepped at reception of RRC message RRC Connection Setup Complete if the corresponding RRC Connection Request had Establishment cause Emergency AND while an RRC Connection Setup is already ongoing for that S-TMSI.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmRrcConnEstabAttReattHpa
attribute.description: The total number of RRC Connection Request attempts that are considered as re-attempts for Establishment cause High Priority Access.
attribute.condition: Stepped at reception of RRC message RRC Connection Setup Complete if the corresponding RRC Connection Request had Establishment cause High Priority Access AND while an RRC Connection Setup is already ongoing for that S-TMSI.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmRrcConnEstabAttReattMod
attribute.description: The total number of RRC Connection Request attempts that are considered as re-attempts for Establishment cause Mobile Originating Data.
attribute.condition: Stepped at reception of RRC message RRC Connection Setup Complete if the corresponding RRC Connection Request had Establishment cause Mobile Originating Data AND while an RRC Connection Setup is already ongoing for that S-TMSI.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmRrcConnEstabAttReattMos
attribute.description: The total number of RRC Connection Request attempts that are considered as re-attempts for Establishment cause Mobile Originating Signaling.
attribute.condition: Stepped at reception of RRC message RRC Connection Setup Complete if the corresponding RRC Connection Request had Establishment cause Mobile Originating Signaling AND while an RRC Connection Setup is already ongoing for that S-TMSI.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmRrcConnEstabAttReattMta
attribute.description: The total number of RRC Connection Request attempts that are considered as re-attempts for Establishment cause Mobile Terminating Access.
attribute.condition: Stepped at reception of RRC message RRC Connection Setup Complete if the corresponding RRC Connection Request had Establishment cause Mobile Terminating Access AND while an RRC Connection Setup is already ongoing for that S-TMSI.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmHoExeSuccQci
attribute.description:
The number of ERABs per QCI that was succesfully handovered to the target cell.
Compressed: True
attribute.deprecated: Since L12B. Has no functional behaviour. Planned to be removed.
attribute.condition: UE CONTEXT RELEASE COMMAND received in the source eNodeB from the MME with the cause Handover Triggered (S1 handover) or UE CONTEXT RELEASE received in the source eNodeB from the target eNodeB (X2 handover) or Internal eNodeB trigger (corresponding to UE CONTEXT RELEASE) received when the UE has changed cell during a intra eNodeB handover
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmHoExeAttQci
attribute.description:
The number of handover execution attempt for ERABs per QCI towards target cell.
Compressed: True
attribute.deprecated: Since L12B. Has no functional behaviour. Planned to be removed.
attribute.condition: RRC CONNCECTION RECONFIGURATION including the mobilityControlInformation is sent to the UE from the source cell.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmSessionTimeDrbQci
attribute.description: The session time aggregated for DRBs mapping to a QCI. Compressed: True
attribute.condition: The bin accumulates session seconds aggregated for DRBs with a certain QCI. The DRBs for a UE is said to be "in session" if any data on any DRB (UL or DL) has been transferred during the last 100 ms for that QCI.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmActiveUeDrbSamp
attribute.description: The total number of active UE or active DRB measurement samples. (Due to implementation, there are either 9052 or 9053 samples per ROP)
attribute.condition: The counter is stepped for each active UE or active DRB measurement.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmActiveUeDlSumQci
attribute.description: The sum of number of DL active UE per QCI. A DL active UE for a QCI is a UE that has buffered DL data for the QCI. (Due to implementation, there are either 9052 or 9053 samples per ROP) Compressed: True
attribute.condition: The bin accumulates the number of active UE in DL per QCI.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmActiveDrbDlSumQci
attribute.description: The sum of number of DL active DRBs per QCI. A DL DRB is active if there are buffered DL data for the DRB. (Due to implementation, there are either 9052 or 9053 samples per ROP) Compressed: True
attribute.condition: The bin accumulates the number of active DRBs in DL per QCI.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmActiveUeUlSumLcg
attribute.description: The sum of number of UL active UE per LCG (Logical Channel Group). An UL active UE for a LCG is a UE that has buffered UL data for the LCG. (Due to implementation, there are either 9052 or 9053 samples per ROP)
attribute.condition: The bin accumulates the number of active UE in UL per LCG. There are 4 LCG (Logic Channel Group) new.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmPdcpPktReceivedUlQci
attribute.description: Total number of UL packets (PDCP SDUs) received per QCI. Compressed: True
attribute.condition: The bin accumulates the number of UL PDCP SDUs that are successfully received per QCI.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmPdcpPktLostUlQci
attribute.description: Total number of UL packets (PDCP SDUs) lost per QCI. Compressed: True
attribute.condition: The bin accumulates the number of UL PDCP SDUs that are lost per QCI.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmErabQciLevSum
attribute.description:
The sum of the number of simultaneous E-RABs per QCI within the measurement period.
Compressed: True
attribute.condition: The bin accumulates the number of simultaneous E-RABs per QCI.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmErabQciMax
attribute.description:
The maximum number of simultaneous E-RABs per QCI among all measured values within the measurement period.
Compressed: True
attribute.condition: The bin represents the max number of simultaneous E-RABs per QCI among all measured values within the measurement period.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmErabRelNormalEnbActQci
attribute.description:
The total number of active E-RABs released normally (per cell per QCI) for requests initiated by eNB, except active E-RABs released due to successful HO. An E-RAB is considered to be active when there are data in the DL or UL queues for the E-RAB.
Compressed: True
attribute.condition: The bin is stepped for each released active E-RAB that maps to a certain QCI when the release is triggered by an UE CONTEXT RELEASE REQUEST message and has a normal release cause code, except active E-RABs released due to a successful HO. In the UL case when a UE has multiple bearers co-existing and sharing the same LCG, the bearers share a single packet queue. If one of the bearers is released and there is data in the queue, the bearer's associated counter is incremented, regardless of whether or not the data belongs to the released bearer.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmErabRelAbnormalEnbActQci
attribute.description:
The total number of active E-RABs released abnormally per cell per QCI for requests initiated by eNB (per cell per QCI). , except active E-RABs released due to successful HO. An E-RAB is considered to be active when there are data in the DL or UL queues for the E-RAB.
Compressed: True
attribute.condition: The bin is steped for each released active E-RAB that maps to a certain QCI when the release is triggered by an E-RAB Release Indication, UE Context Release Request or Reset message and has a internal abnormal cause code, except active E-RABs released due to a successful HO. In the UL case when a UE has multiple bearers co-existing and sharing the same LCG, the bearers share a single packet queue. If one of the bearers is released and there is data in the queue, the bearer's associated counter is incremented, regardless of whether or not the data belongs to the released bearer.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmErabRelMmeActQci
attribute.description:
The total number of active E-RABs released per QCI for requests initiated by MME, except active E-RABs released due to successful HO. An E-RAB is considered to be active when there are data in the DL or UL queues for the E-RAB.
Compressed: True
attribute.condition: The bin is stepped for each released active E-RAB that maps to a certain QCI when the release is triggered by MME through an E-RAB RELEASE COMMAND or UE CONTEXT RELEASE COMMAND message, except active E-RABs released due to a successful HO. In the UL case when a UE has multiple bearers co-existing and sharing the same LCG, the bearers share a single packet queue. If one of the bearers is released and there is data in the queue, the bearer's associated counter is incremented, regardless of whether or not the data belongs to the released bearer.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmErabRelNormalEnbQci
attribute.description:
The total number of E-RABs released normally (per cell per QCI) for requests initiated by eNB.
Compressed: True
attribute.condition: The bin is stepped for each released E-RAB that maps to a certain QCI when the release is triggered by an UE CONTEXT RELEASE REQUEST message and has an internal normal cause code and with the pre-condition that the Initial Context Establishment procedure must first have been successfully completed.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmErabRelAbnormalEnbQci
attribute.description:
The total number of E-RABs released abnormally per cell per QCI for requests initiated by eNB.
Compressed: True
attribute.condition: The bin is stepped for each released E-RAB that maps to a certain QCI when the release is triggered by an UE CONTEXT RELEASE REQUEST message and has an internal abnormal cause code and with the pre-condition that the Initial Context Establishment procedure must first have been successfully completed.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmErabRelMmeQci
attribute.description:
The total number of E-RAB Releases (per cell per QCI) initiated by the MME excluding successful handover. The counter is stepped regardless of whether data was or was not lost in UL/DL buffers.
Compressed: True
attribute.condition: The corresponding QCI bin is stepped for each released E-RAB at reception of S1 message E-RAB Release Command or UE Context Release Command (except if the cause was successful handover) and with the pre-condition that the Initial Context Establishment procedure must first have been successfully completed. The release must also have been MME initiated.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmS1SigConnEstabSuccEm
attribute.description: The total number of successful S1 signalling connection establishments with Establishment cause Emergency.
attribute.condition: Stepped at the first occurrence of reception of any message on this S1 logical connection, if the RRC Connection Request Establishment cause was Establishment cause Emergency.
attribute.scanner: Primary

attribute.name: pmS1SigConnEstabSuccHpa
attribute.description: The total number of successful S1 signalling connection establishments with Establishment cause High Priority Access.
attribute.condition: Stepped at the first occurrence of reception of any message on this S1 logical connection, if the RRC Connection Request Establishment cause was Establishment cause High Priority Access.
attribute.scanner: Primary

attribute.name: pmS1SigConnEstabSuccMod
attribute.description: The total number of successful S1 signalling connection establishments with Establishment cause Mobile Originating Data.
attribute.condition: Stepped at the first occurrence of reception of any message on this S1 logical connection, if the RRC Connection Request Establishment cause was Establishment cause Mobile Originating Data.
attribute.scanner: Primary

attribute.name: pmS1SigConnEstabSuccMta
attribute.description: The total number of successful S1 signalling connection establishments with Establishment cause Mobile Terminating Access.
attribute.condition: Stepped at the first occurrence of reception of any message on this S1 logical connection, if the RRC Connection Request Establishment cause was Establishment cause Mobile Terminating Access.
attribute.scanner: Primary

attribute.name: pmS1SigConnEstabSuccMos
attribute.description: The total number of successful S1 signalling connection establishments with Establishment cause Mobile Originating Signalling.
attribute.condition: Stepped at the first occurrence of reception of any message on this S1 logical connection, if the RRC Connection Request Establishment cause was Establishment cause Mobile Originating Signalling.
attribute.scanner: Primary

attribute.name: pmS1SigConnEstabAttEm
attribute.description: This measurement provides the number of S1 Signalling connection establishment attempts with RRC Connection Request Establishment cause Emergency.
attribute.condition: Stepped at transmission of Initial UE message with RRC Connection Request Establishment cause Emergency.
attribute.scanner: Primary

attribute.name: pmS1SigConnEstabAttHpa
attribute.description: This measurement provides the number of S1 Signalling connection establishment attempts with RRC Connection Request Establishment cause High Priority Access.
attribute.condition: Stepped at transmission of Initial UE message with RRC Connection Request Establishment cause High Priority Access.
attribute.scanner: Primary

attribute.name: pmS1SigConnEstabAttMod
attribute.description: This measurement provides the number of S1 Signalling connection establishment attempts with RRC Connection Request Establishment cause Mobile Originating Data.
attribute.condition: Stepped at transmission of Initial UE message with RRC Connection Request Establishment cause Mobile Originating Data.
attribute.scanner: Primary

attribute.name: pmS1SigConnEstabAttMta
attribute.description: This measurement provides the number of S1 Signalling connection establishment attempts with RRC Connection Request Establishment cause Mobile Terminating Access.
attribute.condition: Stepped at transmission of Initial UE message with RRC Connection Request Establishment cause Mobile Terminating Access.
attribute.scanner: Primary

attribute.name: pmS1SigConnEstabAttMos
attribute.description: This measurement provides the number of S1 Signalling connection establishment attempts with RRC Connection Request Establishment cause Mobile Originating Signalling.
attribute.condition: Stepped at transmission of Initial UE message with RRC Connection Request Establishment cause Mobile Originating Signalling.
attribute.scanner: Primary

attribute.name: pmErabEstabAttInitArp
attribute.description:
The total number of initial E-RAB Establishment attempts per ARP value. Initial E-RABs are all E-RABs present in the S1 message Initial Context Setup Request.
[0]: N/A (unallowed ARP value) [1]: Sum of initial E-RAB Establish Attempts with ARP priority value 1 ... [15]: Sum of initial E-RAB Establish Attempts with ARP priority value 15
attribute.condition: Stepped at reception of Initial Context Setup Request for each E-RAB that has the given ARP Priority Level.
attribute.scanner: Primary

attribute.name: pmErabEstabSuccInitArp
attribute.description:
The total number of successful initial E-RAB Establishments per ARP value.
[0]: N/A (unallowed ARP value) [1]: Sum of successful initial E-RAB Establishment with ARP priority value 1 ... [15]: Sum of successful initial E-RAB Establishment with ARP priority value 15
attribute.condition: Stepped at sending of Initial Context Setup Response for each successfully setup E-RAB that have the given ARP Priority Level.
attribute.scanner: Primary

attribute.name: pmErabEstabAttAddedArp
attribute.description:
The total number of added E-RAB Establishment attempts per ARP value. Added E-RABs are all E-RABs present in S1 message E-RAB Setup Request.
[0]: N/A (unallowed ARP value) [1]: Sum of added E-RAB Establish Attempts with ARP priority value 1 ... [15]: Sum of added E-RAB Establish Attempts with ARP priority value 15
attribute.condition: Stepped at reception of E-RAB Setup Request for each E-RAB that has the given ARP Priority Level.
attribute.scanner: Primary

attribute.name: pmErabEstabSuccAddedArp
attribute.description:
The total number of successfully added E-RABs per ARP value. Added E-RABs are all E-RABs present in S1 message E-RAB Setup Request.
[0]: N/A (unallowed ARP value) [1]: Sum of successful added E-RABs established with ARP priority value 1 ... [15]: Sum of successful added E-RABs established with ARP priority value 15
attribute.condition: Stepped at sending of Initial Context Setup Response for each successfully setup E-RAB that have the given ARP Priority Level.
attribute.scanner: Primary

attribute.name: pmErabRelNormalEnbActArp
attribute.description:
The total number of normal E-RAB Releases initiated by the RBS (per cell per ARP). The counter is stepped if there was data lost in UL/DL buffers. Type: Compressed PDF [0]: Sum of E-RABs released with ARP priority value 0 [1]: Sum of E-RABs released with ARP priority value 1 …. [15]: Sum of E-RABs released with ARP priority value 15
Compressed: True
attribute.condition: If there was data in the buffer at the time of release, then stepped at reception of S1 message E-RAB Release Command or UE Context Release Command, for E-RAB/s with the specific ARP Priority Level, when internal cause codes considered normal and the RBS initiated the release. In the UL case when a UE has multiple bearers co-existing and sharing the same LCG, the bearers share a single packet queue. If one of the bearers is released and there is data in the queue, the bearer's associated counter is incremented, regardless of whether or not the data belongs to the released bearer.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmErabRelAbnormalEnbArp
attribute.description:
The total number of abnormal E-RAB Releases initiated by the RBS (per cell per ARP). The counter is stepped regardless of whether data was or was not lost in UL/DL buffers. Type: Compressed PDF [0]: Sum of E-RABs released with ARP priority value 0 [1]: Sum of E-RABs released with ARP priority value 1 …. [15]: Sum of E-RABs released with ARP priority value 15
Compressed: True
attribute.condition: Stepped at reception of S1 message E-RAB Release Command or UE Context Release Command, with the pre-condition that the Initial Context Establishment procedure must first have been successfully completed, for E-RAB/s with the specific ARP Priority Level, when internal cause codes considered abnormal (Radio Connection with UE is lost; Handover failure for the UE; Non admitted E-RABs by target cell at successful handover for the UE; UE pre-emption; Bearer pre-emption) when the RBS initiated the release. It can also be stepped at transmission of Reset message by the RBS, or when a cell owned by that RBS is disabled (and that leads to internal RBS UE Context Release).
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmErabRelAbnormalEnbActArp
attribute.description:
The total number of abnormal E-RAB Releases initiated by the RBS (per cell per ARP). The counter is stepped if data was present in the UL or DL buffers. Type: Compressed PDF [0]: Sum of active E-RABs released with ARP priority value 0 [1]: Sum of active E-RABs released with ARP priority value 1 …. [15]: Sum of active E-RABs released with ARP priority value 15
Compressed: True
attribute.condition: If there was data in the buffer at the time of release, then stepped at reception of S1 message E-RAB Release Command or UE Context Release Command, for E-RAB/s with the specific ARP Priority Level, when internal cause codes considered abnormal (Radio Connection with UE is lost; Handover failure for the UE; Non admitted E-RABs by target cell at successful handover for the UE; UE pre-emption; Bearer pre-emption) when the RBS initiated the release. It can also be stepped at transmission of Reset message by the RBS, or when a cell owned by that RBS is disabled (and that leads to internal RBS UE Context Release). In the UL case when a UE has multiple bearers co-existing and sharing the same LCG, the bearers share a single packet queue. If one of the bearers is released and there is data in the queue, the bearer's associated counter is incremented, regardless of whether or not the data belongs to the released bearer.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmErabRelMmeArp
attribute.description:
The total number of E-RAB Releases initiated by the MME excluding successful handover per cell per ARP Level. The counter is stepped regardless of whether data was or was not lost in UL/DL buffers. Type: Compressed PDF [0]: Sum of E-RABs released with ARP priority value 0 (unallowed ARP level) [1]: Sum of E-RABs released with ARP priority value 1 …. [15]: Sum of E-RABs released with ARP priority value 15
Compressed: True
attribute.condition: Stepped at reception of S1 message E-RAB Release Command or UE Context Release Command (except if the cause was successful handover) and with pre-condition that the Initial Context Establishment procedure must first have been successfully completed. The release must also have been MME initiated.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmErabRelAbnormalMmeAct
attribute.description: The total number of E-RAB Releases initiated by the MME considered as abnormal. The counter is stepped if if there was data in either the UL or DL buffer (i.e. active).
attribute.condition: Stepped at reception of S1 message E-RAB Release Command or UE Context Release with none of the causes Normal Release, Handover Successful, User Inactivity, Detach, CS Fallback Triggered, Inter-RAT Redirection, UE Not available for PS Service or Redirection towards 1xRTT and there was data in either the UL or DL buffer (i.e. active). The release must also have been MME initiated. In the UL case when a UE has multiple bearers co-existing and sharing the same LCG, the bearers share a single packet queue. If one of the bearers is released and there is data in the queue, the bearer's associated counter is incremented, regardless of whether or not the data belongs to the released bearer.
attribute.scanner: Primary

attribute.name: pmErabRelAbnormalMmeActQci
attribute.description:
The total number of E-RAB Releases (per cell per QCI) initiated by the MME considered as abnormal. The counter is stepped if data was lost in either the UL or DL buffers. Type: Compressed PDF [0]: N/A [1]: Abnormal active E-RAB releases for E-RABs with QCI 1 …. [255]: Abnormal active E-RAB releases for E-RABs with QCI 255
Compressed: True
attribute.condition: The bin corresponding to the QCI of the E-RAB is stepped at reception of S1 message E-RAB Release Command or UE Context Release with none of the causes Normal Release, Handover Successful, User Inactivity, Detach, CS Fallback Triggered, Inter-RAT Redirection, UE Not available for PS Service or Redirection towards 1xRTT and there was data in either the UL or DL buffer (i.e. active). The release must also have been MME initiated. In the UL case when a UE has multiple bearers co-existing and sharing the same LCG, the bearers share a single packet queue. If one of the bearers is released and there is data in the queue, the bearer's associated counter is incremented, regardless of whether or not the data belongs to the released bearer.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmErabRelAbnormalMmeActArp
attribute.description:
The total number of E-RAB Releases initiated by the MME considered as abnormal per cell per ARP Level. The counter is stepped if there was data in either the UL or DL buffer (i.e. active). Type: Compressed PDF [0]: Sum of E-RABs released with ARP priority value 0 [1]: Sum of E-RABs released with ARP priority value 1 …. [15]: Sum of E-RABs released with ARP priority value 15
Compressed: True
attribute.condition: The bin corresponding to the ARP level is stepped at reception of S1 message E-RAB Release Command or UE Context Release Command with none of the causes Normal Release, Detach, CS Fallback Triggered or Redirection towards 1xRTT and there was data in either the UL or DL buffer (i.e. active). The release must also have been MME initiated. In the UL case when a UE has multiple bearers co-existing and sharing the same LCG, the bearers share a single packet queue. If one of the bearers is released and there is data in the queue, the bearer's associated counter is incremented, regardless of whether or not the data belongs to the released bearer.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmUeCtxtRelAbnormalMmeAct
attribute.description: The total number of UE Context Releases initiated by the MME with a cause regarded as abnormal and that there was data in either the UL or DL buffer (i.e. active).
attribute.condition: there was data in the buffer at the time of release, then stepped at reception of S1 message UE Context Release Command , if the cause was regarded as abnormal, and the release is MME initiated.
attribute.scanner: Primary

attribute.name: pmServiceTimeDrb
attribute.description: Number of service seconds aggregated for DRBs in a cell. A DRB is said to be ´in service´ from the first data on a DRB (UL or DL) until the last on the DRB is sent/received.
attribute.condition: Count the time from the first data on the DRB until the last data on the DRB and sum on the cell level.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmServiceTimeDrbQci
attribute.description:
Number of service seconds aggregated for DRBs mapping to a specific QCI in a cell. A DRB is said to be ´in service´ from the first data on a DRB (UL or DL) until the last on the DRB is sent/received.
[0]: N/A [1]: Service Time for DRBs mapping to QCI 1 ... [255]: Service Time for DRBs mapping to QCI 255
Compressed: True
attribute.condition: Count the time from the first data on the DRB until the last data on the DRB associated with the specific QCI and sum on the cell level.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmServiceTimeUe
attribute.description: Number of service seconds aggregated for UEs in a cell. A UE is said to be ´in service´ if any of its associated DRBs are.
attribute.condition: Count the time when any DRB, associated with the UE, is in service.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmPucchSr
attribute.description: The total number of received Scheduling Requests on PUCCH.
attribute.condition: The counter aggregates the number of received scheduling requests on PUCCH.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmPucchSrMax
attribute.description: Peak number of received Scheduling Requests on PUCCH during a TTI.
attribute.condition: The counter is set to peak sample recognized at the end of each Recording Output Period (ROP).
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmRaSuccSrInSync
attribute.description: The total number of received Scheduling Requests on RACH from In-Synch UEs.
attribute.condition: The counter aggregates the number of received scheduling requests on RACH. The counter is stepped only for Ues that were In Synch prior to the RACH and were not part of a handover procedure.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmRaSuccSrOutOfSync
attribute.description: The total number of received Scheduling Request on RACH from Out-Of-Synch UEs.
attribute.condition: The counter is increased every time a raMsg3 is received for a UE when all of the following conditions are met: 1) The UE was outOfSynch prior to the random access transmission. 2) The UE has data in its transmission buffer. 3) The RACH procedure was not part of a handover procedure.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmPdcchResyncAtt
attribute.description: The total number of attempted 3GPP procedure "PDCCH ordered resynchronization", see 3GPP TS 36.321 and TS 36.212.
attribute.condition: The counter is increased when a pdcch ordered re-synchronization is sent in downlink.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmPdcchResyncSucc
attribute.description: The total number of successful 3GPP procedures "PDCCH ordered resynchronization", see 3GPP TS 36.321 and TS 36.212.
attribute.condition: The counter contains both successful Contention Based Random Access (CBRA) and Contention Free Random Access (CFRA). The counter is stepped each time a raMsg3 is received from a UE which was outOfSynch prior to the RACH and had triggered UL resynchronization over PDCCH.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmPucchFailSr
attribute.description: Counts the number of received Scheduling Requests (SR) over RACH due to a failure from the UE to access the node by means of SR over PUCCH.
attribute.condition: The counter is increased each time a raMsg3 is received from a UE which has SR resources on PUCCH and is in-synch.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmDrxSleepTimeCfgIdx
attribute.description:
To count the number of subframes where all UEs in a cell, differentiated by DRX configuration index, are in DRX sleep. Each DRX profile is associated with two DRX configurations - one for UEs with long DRX capability only, and the other for UEs that have short and long DRX capability.
Compressed: True
attribute.deprecated: Since L13B. Has no functional behavior. Planned to be removed.
attribute.condition: Counter should be incremented every subframe for every UE in the cell for which DRX functionality is in RRC_CONNECTED state, differentiated by DRX configuration index, and the UE is in DRX sleep time. Time during ANR operation for a specific UE is excluded.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmDrxTotalTimeCfgIdx
attribute.description:
To count the number of subframes where all UEs in a cell, differentiated by DRX configuration index, are in DRX mode. Each DRX profile is associated with two DRX configurations - one for UEs with long DRX capability only, and the other for UEs that have short and long DRX capability.
Compressed: True
attribute.deprecated: Since L13B. Has no functional behavior. Planned to be removed.
attribute.condition: Counter should be incremented every subframe for every UE in the cell for which DRX functionality is in RRC_CONNECTED state, differentiated by DRX configuration index. Time during ANR operation for a specific UE is excluded.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmDrxSleepTimeAvailDataDlCfgIdx
attribute.description:
To count the number of subframes where all UEs in a cell, differentiated by DRX configuration index, are in DRX sleep and DL data is available in the RLC buffers. Each DRX profile is associated with two DRX configurations - one for UEs with long DRX capability only, and the other for UEs that have short and long DRX capability.
Compressed: True
attribute.deprecated: Since L13B. Has no functional behavior. Planned to be removed.
attribute.condition: Counter should be incremented every subframe for every UE in the cell for which DRX functionality is in RRC_CONNECTED state, differentiated by DRX configuration index, where the UE is in DRX sleep time and DL data is available in the RLC buffers. Time during ANR operation for a specific UE is excluded.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmRrcConnEstabFailHighLoad
attribute.description: The total number of failed RRC Connection Establishments due to high load.
attribute.condition: Stepped at transmission of RRC message RRC Connection Reject when Load Control function in the RBS indicates that the load is too high.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmRrcConnEstabFailOverload
attribute.description: The total number of failed RRC Connection Establishments due to overload.
attribute.condition: Stepped at transmission of RRC message RRC Connection Reject when Load Control function in the RBS indicates overload.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmHoPrepRejInHighLoad
attribute.description: The number of Handover Preparation Failure messages sent by the target eNB due to high load.
attribute.condition: Handover preparation fail due to Load Control function in the RBS indicates that the load is too high.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmHoPrepRejInOverload
attribute.description: The number of Handover Preparation Failure messages sent by the target eNB due to overload.
attribute.condition: Handover preparation fail due to Load Control function in the RBS indicates overload.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmErabMax
attribute.description: The peak number of simultaneous E-RAB usage.
attribute.condition: This counter is set equal to the peak value (high water mark) of the number of simultaneous E-RABs used at the end of each Recording Output Period (ROP).
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmRrcConnEstabFailBearerAdmissionRej
attribute.description: The total number of failed establishment of RRC Connection due to the fact that all the UE's bearers are rejected during bearer admission.
attribute.condition: Stepped for each UE that fails to establish an RRC Connection due to the fact that the all the UE's bearers are rejected during bearer admission.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmHoPrepRejInBearerAdmissionRej
attribute.description: The number of Incoming Handover Preparation Failure messages sent by the target eNB due to the fact that all the UE's bearers are rejected during bearer admission.
attribute.condition: Stepped for each UE that is rejected within an incoming handover preparation due to the fact that the all the UE's bearers are rejected during bearer admission.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmHoExeOutSuccQci
attribute.description:
The number of ERABs per QCI that was succesfully handovered to the target cell.
Compressed: True
attribute.condition: UE CONTEXT RELEASE COMMAND received in the source eNodeB from the MME with the cause Handover Triggered (S1 handover) or UE CONTEXT RELEASE received in the source eNodeB from the target eNodeB (X2 handover) or Internal eNodeB trigger (corresponding to UE CONTEXT RELEASE) received when the UE has changed cell during a intra eNodeB handover
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmHoExeOutAttQci
attribute.description:
The number of handover execution attempt for ERABs per QCI towards target cell.
Compressed: True
attribute.condition: RRC CONNCECTION RECONFIGURATION including the mobilityControlInformation is sent to the UE from the source cell.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmPrbAvailDlMbms
attribute.description: The total number of Physical Resource Blocks (PRB) available for MBMS transmission in the downlink.
attribute.condition: This measurement is applicable for the Physical Multicast Channel (PMCH).
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmPrbUsedDlMbms
attribute.description: The total number of Physical Resource Blocks (PRB) used by MBMS transmission in the downlink
attribute.condition: This measurement is applicable to the Multicast Channel (MCH) on the Physical Multicast Channel (PMCH).
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmRrcConnReestFailLicMtReest
attribute.description: The number of RRC Connection Reestablishments attempts that failed due to feature "Multi-Target RRC Connection Reestablishment" not being OPERABLE
attribute.condition: The RRC Connection Reestablishment (attempted during an ongoing handover or in an unprepared cell) fails for this UE due to the serviceState value is INOPERABLE for the optional feature "Multi-Target RRC Connection Reestablishment"
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmRrcConnReestAttHo
attribute.description: The number of RRC Connection Reestablishments attempted during an ongoing handover
attribute.condition: An RRCConnectionReestablishmentRequest message is received by an UE for which there is an ongoing handover.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmRrcConnReestSuccHo
attribute.description: The number of successful RRC Connection Reestablishments attempted during an ongoing handover
attribute.condition: An RRCConnectionReestablishmentRequest message is received by an UE for which there is an ongoing handover and the reestablishment procedure is successfully completed for the UE.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: advCellSupSensitivity
attribute.description: Indicates the sensitivity of the Advanced Cell Supervision function. A higher value will make ACS detect a sleeping cell faster, but with higher risk for false detection. A lower value will make ACS detect a sleeping cell slower, but with lower risk for false detection.

attribute.name: advCellSupAction
attribute.description: Controls which recovery actions to be performed when ACS detects a sleeping cell.

attribute.name: hoOptStatTime
attribute.description: The minimal duration handover statistics is collected before evaluation by the handover optimization function.
attribute.dependencies: In L13A this parameter is used only when CMCC FT specific SW is enabled.

attribute.name: hoOptStatNum
attribute.description: The minimal number of handovers required by the handover optimization function before adjusting handover parameters.
attribute.dependencies: In L13A this parameter is used only when CMCC FT specific SW is enabled.

attribute.name: hoOptAdjThreshold
attribute.description: The threshold value for adjusted handover failure rate required to adjust handover parameters.
attribute.dependencies: In L13A this parameter is used only when CMCC FT specific SW is enabled.

attribute.name: anrHoDisStatTime
attribute.description: The minimal duration handover statistics is collected before evaluation by the handover disabling function before disabling handover for a relation.
attribute.dependencies: In L13A this parameter is used only when CMCC FT specific SW is enabled.

attribute.name: anrHoDisStatNum
attribute.description: The minimal number of handovers required by the handover disabling function before disabling handover for a relation.
attribute.dependencies: In L13A this parameter is used only when CMCC FT specific SW is enabled.

attribute.name: anrHoDisThreshold
attribute.description: The threshold value for handover failure rate required to disable handover for a relation.
attribute.dependencies: In L13A this parameter is used only when CMCC FT specific SW is enabled.

attribute.name: mobCtrlAtPoorCovActive
attribute.description: Specifies if the feature Mobility Control at Poor Coverage is enabled or disabled in the cell.

attribute.name: pmCriticalBorderEvalReport
attribute.description: The total number of A2 measurement reports received due to critical threshold is reached. This counter is used instead of pmBadCovEvalReport when the feature Mobility Control at Poor Coverage is activated.
attribute.condition: Stepped at reception of traffic measurement report from UE indicating bad coverage due to Event A2_Critical (either RSRP or RSRQ triggered).
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmBadCovSearchEvalReport
attribute.description: The total number of A2 measurement reports received due to entering the Search zone. This counter is used when the feature Mobility Control at Poor Coverage is activated.
attribute.condition: Stepped at reception of traffic measurement report from UE indicating bad coverage due to Event A2_Search (either RSRP or RSRQ triggered).
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: sdmActive
attribute.description: Specifies if SDM (Spatial Division Multiplexing) for CombinedCell configuration is activated or not. If SDM is activated, it is possible to multiplex multiple Ues in different sectors in the same time and same frequency resource.

attribute.name: sectorCarrierRef
attribute.description: Reference to a list of instances of SectorCarrier MO. In L13A, it is not allowed to have more than one SectorCarrier referred by a Cell. Multiple SectorCarrier in a cell will be supported in L13B.

attribute.name: pmActiveUeUlSectorCarrierDistr
attribute.description:
The counter shows the distribution of UL UEs that are in 1 to N sectors.
[0]: Sum of active UL UEs that is connected to 1 sector [1]: Sum of active UL UEs that is connected to 2 sectors ----- [5]: Sum of active UL UEs that is connected to 6 sectors or more.
attribute.condition: Accumulate with the number of UL UEs in 1 to N sectorsCarrier per TTI.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmActiveUeDlSectorCarrierDistr
attribute.description:
The counter shows the distribution of DL UEs that are in 1 to N sectors.
[0]: Sum of active DL UEs that is connected to 1 sector [1]: Sum of active DL UEs that is connected to 2 sectors ----- [5]: Sum of active DL UEs that is connected to 6 sectors or more.
attribute.condition: Accumulate with the number of DL UEs in 1 to N sectorsCarrier per TTI.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmErabRelNormalEnbArp
attribute.description:
The total number of normal E-RAB Releases initiated by the RBS. Type: Compressed PDF [0]: [0]: N/A (unallowed ARP value) [1]: Sum of E-RABs released with ARP priority value 1 .... [15]: Sum of E-RABs released with ARP priority value 15
Compressed: True
attribute.condition: Stepped at reception of S1 message E-RAB Release Command or UE Context Release Command, for E-RAB/s with the specific ARP Priority Level, when internal cause codes considered normal and the RBS initiated the release and with the pre-condition that the Initial Context Establishment procedure must first have been successfully completed.
attribute.scanner: Primary

attribute.name: pmUeCtxtRelNormalEnbTuneOut
attribute.description: The total number of normal UE Context Releases initiated by the RBS for Tune-out UEs. The counter is stepped regardless of whether data was or was not lost in UL/DL buffers
attribute.condition: Stepped at reception of S1 message UE Context Release Command when internal cause codes considered normal (Successful Handover, User Inactivity, Inter-RAT redirection, CS Fallback Triggered) when the RBS initiated the release. Stepped in case UE type is Tune-out
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmUeCtxtRelAbnormalEnbTuneOut
attribute.description: The total number of abnormal UE Contexts Releases for Tune-out UEs initiated by the RBS. The counter is stepped regardless of whether data was or was not lost in UL/DL buffers.
attribute.condition: Stepped at reception of S1 message UE Context Release Command with internal cause codes considered abnormal (Radio Connection with UE is lost; Handover failure for the UE; UE pre-emption) when the RBS initiated the release. It can also be stepped at transmission of UE Context Release Request or Reset message by the RBS, or when a cell owned by that RBS is disabled (and that leads to internal RBS UE Context Release). Stepped in case UE type is Tune-out
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmRrcConnTuneOutLevSamp
attribute.description: Number of times the corresponding Sum counter has been incremented. Associated ACC pmCounter pmRrcConnTuneOutLevSum.
attribute.condition: The counter is increased at every occasion when the corresponding sum counter is increased.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmRrcConnTuneOutLevSum
attribute.description: Sum of all sample values recorded for "number of Tune-out UEs in RRC_CONNECTED mode".
attribute.condition: This counter is based on an internal level counter maintaining the current number of Tune-out UEs in RRC_CONNECTED mode. Values are read periodically and accumulated.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmCompUlDeltaSinrPuschDistr
attribute.condition: Appropriate bin incremented when DeltaSinr is within certain bounds
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: lbUtranOffloadThreshold
attribute.description: Threshold for eNodeB The value applies for offload towards UTRAN target cells. The eNodeB attempts to offload traffic from the source cell corresponding to the subscription ratio above the threshold.

attribute.name: externalCdma20001xRttCellRef
attribute.description: Reference to a ExternalCdma20001xRttCell

attribute.name: pmUeCtxtRelCsfbCdma1xRtt
attribute.description: Number of RRC Connection Release with redirect to CDMA2000 1xRTT triggered by CS Fallback
attribute.condition: A CS Fallback attempt is performed towards a CDMA2000 1xRTT Carrier Frequency defined as a RRC Connection Release with redirect information, due to a received CS Fallback Indicator set to CS Fallback in Initial Context Setup Request or UE Context Modification Request.
attribute.scanner: Primary

attribute.name: pmUeCtxtRelCsfbCdma1xRttEm
attribute.description: Number of RRC Connection Release with redirect to CDMA2000 1xRTT triggered by CS Fallback Emergency
attribute.condition: A CS Fallback attempt is performed towards a CDMA2000 1xRTT Carrier Frequency defined as a RRC Connection Release with redirect information, due to a received CS Fallback Indicator set to CS Fallback High Priority in Initial Context Setup Request or UE Context Modification Request.
attribute.scanner: Primary

attribute.name: pmUeCtxtRelCsfbMeasTO1xRtt
attribute.description: Number of times a CS Fallback has been triggered where the UE should be doing a handover to a cell found by measurements, the measurement failed to find a target cell, and the UE was redirected to a CDMA2000 1xRTT frequency
attribute.condition: CS Fallback has been initiated for the UE and the UE has searched for, but failed to find, a target cell for handover and the measurement has timed out.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmUeCtxtRelCsfbMeasTO1xRttEm
attribute.description: Number of times a CS Fallback Emergency Call has been triggered where the UE should be doing a handover to a cell found by measurements, the measurement failed to find a target cell, and the UE was redirected to a CDMA2000 1xRTT frequency
attribute.condition: CS Fallback Emergency Call has been initiated for the UE and the UE has searched for, but failed to find, a target cell for handover and the measurement has timed out.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmUeCtxtRelCsfbHoPrepFail1xRtt
attribute.description: Number of times a CS Fallback has been triggered where the UE should be doing a handover to a cell found by measurements, the handover preparation failed and the UE was redirected to a CDMA2000 1xRTT frequency
attribute.condition: CS Fallback has been initiated and a target cell for handover has been determined, but handover preparation has failed.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmUeCtxtRelCsfbHoPrepFail1xRttEm
attribute.description: Number of times a CS Fallback Emergency Call has been triggered where the UE should be doing a handover to a cell found by measurements, the handover preparation failed and the UE was redirected to a CDMA2000 1xRTT frequency
attribute.condition: CS Fallback Emergency Call has been initiated and a target cell for handover has been determined, but handover preparation has failed.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmRrcConnEstabSuccGummeiNative
attribute.description: The total number of successful RRC Connection Establishments for GUMMEI type equal to native.
attribute.condition: Stepped at reception of every RRC message RRC Connection Setup Complete indicating GUMMEI type equal to native.
attribute.scanner: Primary

attribute.name: pmRrcConnEstabSuccDta
attribute.description: The total number of successful RRC Connection Establishments for Establishment Cause Delay Tolerant Access.
attribute.condition: Stepped at reception of RRC message RRC Connection Setup Complete if the corresponding RRC Connection Request had Establishment Cause Delay Tolerant Access.
attribute.scanner: Primary

attribute.name: pmRrcConnEstabAttDta
attribute.description: The total number of RRC Connection Request attempts with Establishment Cause Delay Tolerant Access.
attribute.condition: Stepped at reception of every RRC message RRC Connection Request with Establishment Cause Delay Tolerant Access.
attribute.scanner: Primary

attribute.name: pmRrcConnEstabAttReattDta
attribute.description: The total number of RRC Connection Request attempts that are considered as re-attempts for Establishment Cause Delay Tolerant Access.
attribute.condition: Stepped at reception of RRC message RRC Connection Setup Complete if the corresponding RRC Connection Request had Establishment Cause Delay Tolerant Access AND while an RRC Connection Setup is already ongoing for that S-TMSI.
attribute.scanner: Primary

attribute.name: pmS1SigConnEstabSuccDta
attribute.description: The total number of successful S1 signalling connection establishments with Establishment cause Delay Tolerant Access.
attribute.condition: Stepped at the first occurrence of reception of any message on this S1 logical connection, if the RRC Connection Request Establishment cause was Delay Tolerant Access.
attribute.scanner: Primary

attribute.name: pmS1SigConnEstabAttDta
attribute.description: This measurement provides the number of S1 Signalling connection establishment attempts with RRC Connection Request Establishment cause Delay Tolerant Access.
attribute.condition: Stepped at transmission of Initial UE message with RRC Connection Request Establishment cause Delay Tolerant Access.
attribute.scanner: Primary

attribute.name: acBarringForCsfbPresent
attribute.description: Specifies presence of ac-BarringForCSFB in SIB2.

attribute.name: acBarringForCsfb
attribute.description: Access class barring parameters for mobile originating CSFB calls. The information is broadcasted in SIB2.

attribute.name: zzzTemporary13
attribute.description: Temporary attributes are intended for temporary solutions, and their usage may vary depending on the installed software. It is strongly recommended to only set the attributes that correspond to a desired functionality and leave all other temporary attributes set to default value. Information in the descriptions about what attributes are in use may be overridden by the information in CPI Info documents. Note that a later release may use another attribute to control the functionality previously provided by a temporary attribute, or may remove the functionality altogether. In these cases, the change is documented in the NIR.
