attribute.name: pmUlGrantsTrans
attribute.description: The total number of unicast UL grants transmitted.
attribute.condition: It is pegged when an unicast UL grant is transmitted excluding the UL grants for message 3.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmUlGrantsWithDetectedPusch
attribute.description: The total number of unicast UL grants that are confirmed by detecting a corresponding PUSCH transmission.
attribute.condition: It is pegged when an unicast UL grant is confirmed by detecting a corresponding PUSCH transmission (excluding message 3).
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmDlAssigsTrans
attribute.description: The total number of unicast DL assignments transmitted.
attribute.condition: It is pegged when a unicast DL assignment to a specific UE is transmitted excluding DL assignments for message 2.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmDlAssigsWithDetectedHarqAck
attribute.description: The total number of unicast DL assignments that are confirmed by detecting a corresponding HARQ-ACK.
attribute.condition: It is pegged when a unicast DL assignment is confirmed by detecting a corresponding HARQ-ACK.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmDlAssigsWithUnknownReception
attribute.description: The total number of unicast DL assignments for which the reception is unknown.
attribute.condition: It is pegged if eNB can't determine if a HARQ-ACK associated with a unicast DL assignment is detected or not.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmPdcchTxConservative
attribute.description: The total number of conservative unicast PDCCH transmissions.
attribute.condition: It is pegged if a unicast PDCCH transmission (excluding that for message 2 or 3) is conservative (the number of allocated CCEs is much more than the number of required CCEs).
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmPdcchTxAggressive
attribute.description: The total number of aggressive unicast PDCCH transmissions.
attribute.condition: It is pegged if a unicast PDCCH transmission (excluding that for message 2 or 3) is aggressive (the number of allocated CCEs is less than the number of required CCEs).
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

action.name: changeFrequency
action.description:
Changes the frequency of the cell. The attribute earfcndl is changed. This MO action includes the following steps:
- An instance of EUtranFrequency with correct frequency is created (if not already existing).
- For neigbouring cells with existing cell relations to the cell, create new EUtranFreqRelation instances (if not already existing) and new EUtranCellRelation instances (with the same attribute values as the existing EUtranFreqRelation and EUtranCellRelation MOs).
- For the changed cell an instance of EUtranFreqRelation with reference to the correct instance of EUtranFrequency is created, if not already existing (with the same attribute values as the existing EUtranFreqRelation MO).
Note that changing frequency of a EUtranCellFDD will imply that all other eNBs that have this cell configured as an ExternaEUtranCellFDD will be updated with the new frequency. This means that new EUtranFreqRelation and corresponding EUtranFrequency MOs might be created.

parameter.name: earfcn
parameter.description: The new DL frequency for this cell.

action.disturbances: Changes may affect traffic. The cell will be automatic locked/unlocked if needed.

action.name: stopAilg
action.description: Stops the execution of the optional feature Air Interface Load Generation.

action.name: startAilg
action.description: Starts the execution of the optional feature Air Interface Load Generation.

action.name: sendSIChangeNotification
action.description: This action is intended for test and troubleshooting and will trigger transmission of SI Change Notification (RRC Paging) during the whole next modifcation period no matter the content of the SI has been changed or not.
action.disturbances: No

class.name: EUtranCellRelation
class.description: This managed object represents the handover relationship between two neighboring EUTRAN cells.

attribute.name: pmHoPrepSuccLteIntraF
attribute.description: The number of successful intra LTE intra frequency handover preparations.
attribute.condition: HANDOVER COMMAND message is received by the source eNodeB from the MME (S1 handover) or HANDOVER REQUEST ACKNOWLEDGE message is received by the source eNodeB from the target eNodeB (X2 handover) or Internal eNodeB trigger (corresponding to HANDOVER REQUEST ACKNOWLEDGE) received when target cell informs source cell that UE resources has been reserved (intra eNodeB handover)
attribute.scanner: Primary

attribute.name: pmHoPrepAttLteIntraF
attribute.description: The number of attempts to start intra LTE intra frequency handover preparation.
attribute.condition: A better LTE cell is reported by the UE.
attribute.scanner: Primary

attribute.name: pmHoExeSuccLteIntraF
attribute.description: The number of successful intra LTE intra frequency handovers.
attribute.condition: UE CONTEXT RELEASE COMMAND received in the source eNodeB from the MME with the cause Handover Triggered (S1 handover) or UE CONTEXT RELEASE received in the source eNodeB from the target eNodeB (X2 handover) or Internal eNodeB trigger (corresponding to UE CONTEXT RELEASE) received when the UE has changed cell during a intra eNodeB handover
attribute.scanner: Primary

attribute.name: pmHoExeAttLteIntraF
attribute.description: The number of intra LTE intra frequency handover execution attempts.
attribute.condition: RRC CONNCECTION RECONFIGURATION including the mobilityControlInformation is sent to the UE from the source cell.
attribute.scanner: Primary

attribute.name: EUtranCellRelationId
attribute.description: The value component of the Relative Distinguished Name (RDN).

attribute.name: cellIndividualOffsetEUtran
attribute.description: Offset value for the neighbor cell. Used when UE is in connected mode. This attribute is modified by SON function HoOscCtrlRel.

attribute.name: neighborCellRef
attribute.description: Reference to an instance of EUtranCellFDD, ExternalEUtranCellFDD, EUtranCellTDD or ExternalEUtranCellTDD managed object.

attribute.name: isHoAllowed
attribute.description: Specifies if handover between the cells in this relation is allowed.

attribute.name: qOffsetCellEUtran
attribute.description: Offset value applied to a specific cell in idle mode mobility state.

attribute.name: anrCreated
attribute.description: Indicates if the MO was created by the Automated Neighbor Relations (ANR) function.
attribute.deprecated: Since L11B. Replaced by createdBy.

attribute.name: isRemoveAllowed
attribute.description: Indicates if the Automated Neighbor Relations (ANR) function is allowed to remove this object. It does not restrict operator removal of the object. Objects created by ANR have this parameter set to true initially.

attribute.name: timeOfAnrCreation
attribute.description: The date and time when the MO was created by the Automated Neighbor Relations (ANR) function. Format: YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS
attribute.deprecated: Replaced by timeOfCreation. Since L11B.

attribute.name: timeOfAnrModification
attribute.description: The date and time when the MO was last modified by the Automated Neighbor Relations (ANR) function. Format: YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS
attribute.deprecated: Replaced by timeOfLastModification. Since L11B.

attribute.name: ctrlMode
attribute.description:
Indicates permission to change attributes on the object and to delete the object.
When set to Manual, the operator can change and delete, and the Automated Neighbor Relations (ANR) function cannot make changes.
When set to Auto, the ANR function can change and delete, and the operator cannot, except to change the settings of this parameter.
When the object is created by the ANR function, the value is set to Auto. The value may be changed only by the operator. The setting of this parameter controls the object itself, but not related objects.
attribute.deprecated: Since L11B. Planned to be removed.

attribute.name: supportedMobilityRelationType
attribute.description: Type of the mobility relation.
attribute.deprecated: Since L11B. Has no functional behaviour. Planned to be removed.

attribute.name: removingMonitoringStart
attribute.description: Indicates the time and date when the MO was started for monitoring for automatc removal by the (automatic neighbor relation) function. Format: YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS

attribute.name: timesLeftToCheckRel
attribute.description:
This parameter holds the number of checks that remain until the neigbour relation is not regarded as suspected any longer.
When the RBS knows more than one cell, internal or external, with the same PCI, and a neighbour relation exists to at least one of them, these neighbour relations are marked as suspected. Suspected relations are checked, using CGI reports, a number of times according to nrOfTimesToCheckRel. If one CGI report holds another CGI, than the current one for the relation, the operator is notified.

attribute.name: includeInSystemInformation
attribute.description:
Indicates if the referred cell is included in System Information.
When the attribute is set to false, the cell is not included in either freqNeighList or blackCellList in SIB4 or SIB5.

attribute.name: coverageIndicator
attribute.description: Indicates whether the coverage area of the cell indicated by the relation has approximately the same coverage area (overlap) as this cell, or whether it fully covers this cell, or if it is fully contained in this cell.

attribute.name: pmHoExeAttLteInterF
attribute.description: The number of outgoing intra LTE inter frequency handover execution attempts.
attribute.condition: RRC CONNCECTION RECONFIGURATION including the mobilityControlInformation is sent to the UE from the source cell
attribute.scanner: Primary

attribute.name: pmHoExeSuccLteInterF
attribute.description: The number of successful outgoing intra LTE inter frequency handovers.
attribute.condition: UE CONTEXT RELEASE COMMAND received in the source eNodeB from the MME with the cause Handover Triggered (S1 handover) or UE CONTEXT RELEASE received in the source eNodeB from the target eNodeB (X2 handover) or Internal eNodeB trigger (corresponding to UE CONTEXT RELEASE) received when the UE has changed cell during a intra eNodeB handover
attribute.scanner: Primary

attribute.name: pmHoPrepAttLteInterF
attribute.description: The number of attempts to start outgoing intra LTE inter frequency handover preparation.
attribute.condition: A better LTE cell is reported by the UE.
attribute.scanner: Primary

attribute.name: pmHoPrepSuccLteInterF
attribute.description: The number of successful outgoing intra LTE inter frequency handover preparations.
attribute.condition: HANDOVER COMMAND message is received by the source eNodeB from the MME (S1 handover) or HANDOVER REQUEST ACKNOWLEDGE message is received by the source eNodeB from the target eNodeB (X2 handover) or Internal eNodeB trigger (corresponding to HANDOVER REQUEST ACKNOWLEDGE) received when target cell informs source cell that UE resources has been reserved (intra eNodeB handover)
attribute.scanner: Primary

attribute.name: createdBy
attribute.description: Indicates whether the MO has been created by the Automated Neighbor Relations (ANR) function or operator or X2

attribute.name: timeOfCreation
attribute.description: Indicates the time and date when the MO was created . Format: YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS

attribute.name: lastModification
attribute.description: Indicates whether the MO was last modified by the Automated Neighbor Relations (ANR) function or operator or X2 and if the MO is to be deleted who triggered the deletion

attribute.name: timeOfLastModification
attribute.description: Indicates the time and date when the MO was last modified. Format: YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS

attribute.name: pmHoOscIntraF
attribute.description: Counter pmHoOscIntraF counts every intra-frequency HO that is considered to be an oscillating HO. pmHoOscIntraF is incremented when handover preparation is attempted.
attribute.condition: When a UE measurement has resulted in a HO attempt decision, and the HO is classified as an oscillating HO, and the HO is an intra-LTE intra-frequency HO, then the counter is stepped. The HO is classified as an oscillating HO, if the time since the incoming HO to the current cell is less than the time period indicated by parameter oscPeriodLimit.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmHoOscInterF
attribute.description: Counter pmHoOscInterF counts every inter-frequency HO that is considered to be an oscillating HO. pmHoOscInterF is incremented when handover preparation is attempted.
attribute.condition: When a UE measurement has resulted in a HO attempt decision, and the HO is classified as an oscillating HO, and the HO is an intra-LTE inter-frequency HO, then the counter is stepped. The HO is classified as an oscillating HO, if the time since the incoming HO to the current cell is less than the time period indicated by parameter oscPeriodLimit.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmHoPrepTNotAllowedLteIntraF
attribute.deprecated: Since L12A. Has no functional behaviour. Planned to be removed.
attribute.condition: Stepped at reception of message S1: HANDOVER PREPARATION FAILURE or X2: HANDOVER PREPARATION FAILURE with the cause "Handover Target not allowed".
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmHoPrepTNotAllowedLteInterF
attribute.deprecated: Since L12A. Has no functional behaviour. Planned to be removed.
attribute.condition: Stepped at reception of message S1: HANDOVER PREPARATION FAILURE or X2: HANDOVER PREPARATION FAILURE with the cause "Handover Target not allowed".
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: imLoadBalancingActive
attribute.description: Idle Mode Load balancing function is activated by setting this parameter to true. Idle mode load balancing function is deactivated by setting this parameter to false. Idle mode load balancing can only be sucessfully activated by the cell with the higher cell reselection priority (HPC), but either cell can disable the load balancing (HPC and LPC).
attribute.deprecated: Since L12B. Has no functional behaviour. Planned to be removed.
attribute.dependencies: Activation of the idle mode load balancing feature (value "true") requires that the ImLoadBalancing::serviceStateImLoadBalancing is "operable". Idle mode loadbalancing can only be activated between two co-located cells.

attribute.name: pmHoTooEarlyHoIntraF
attribute.description: Counts every detected event of too early HO on an intra frequency relation.
attribute.condition: The counter is stepped when a too early handover from the cell to the neighbor cell of the relation is detected in accordance to 3GPP TS 36.300, if the cell relation is an intra-frequency cell relation.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmHoTooEarlyHoInterF
attribute.description: Counts every detected event of too early HO on an inter frequency relation.
attribute.condition: The counter is stepped when a too early handover from the cell to the neighbor cell of the relation is detected in accordance to 3GPP TS 36.300, if the cell relation is an inter-frequency cell relation.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmHoTooLateHoIntraF
attribute.description: Counts every detected event of too late HO on an intra frequency relation.
attribute.condition: The counter is stepped when a too late handover from the cell to the neighbor cell of the relation is detected in accordance to 3GPP TS 36.300, if the cell relation is an intra-frequency cell relation.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmHoTooLateHoInterF
attribute.description: Counts every detected event of too late HO on an inter frequency relation.
attribute.condition: The counter is stepped when a too late handover from the cell to the neighbor cell of the relation is detected in accordance to 3GPP TS 36.300, if the cell relation is an inter-frequency cell relation.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmHoWrongCellIntraF
attribute.description: Counts every detected event of HO to the wrong cell on an intra frequency relation, when this neighbor cell is the attempted target cell.
attribute.condition: The counter is stepped when a "handover to wrong cell" is detected in accordance to 3GPP TS 36.300, if this cell is the source cell, and the neighbor cell of the relation is the target cell of the failed handover, and the cell relation is an intra frequency cell relation.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmHoWrongCellInterF
attribute.description: Counts every detected event of HO to the wrong cell on an inter frequency relation, when this neighbor cell is the attempted target cell.
attribute.condition: The counter is stepped when a "handover to wrong cell" is detected in accordance to 3GPP TS 36.300, if this cell is the source cell, and the neighbor cell of the relation is the target cell of the failed handover, and the cell relation is an inter frequency cell relation.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmHoWrongCellReestIntraF
attribute.description: Counts every detected event of HO to the wrong cell on an intra frequency relation, when this neighbor cell is where the UE reestablished connection after the failed HO.
attribute.condition: The counter is stepped when a "handover to wrong cell" is detected in accordance to 3GPP TS 36.300, if this cell is the source cell, and the neighbor cell of the relation is the cell where the UE attempted reestablishment after RLF, and the cell relation is an intra frequency cell relation.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmHoWrongCellReestInterF
attribute.description: Counts every detected event of HO to the wrong cell on an inter frequency relation, when this neighbor cell is where the UE reestablished connection after the failed HO.
attribute.condition: The counter is stepped when a "handover to wrong cell" is detected in accordance to 3GPP TS 36.300, if this cell is the source cell, and the neighbor cell of the relation is the cell where the UE attempted reestablishment after RLF, and the cell relation is an intra frequency cell relation.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmZtemporary36
attribute.description: Normally this counter is not used, it can however sometimes be temporarily used for very late additions in a release. If so, for description see Network Impact Report in the CPI.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: hoSuccessRateLpFilt
attribute.description: This parameter specifies the low-pass filtered handover success rate.

attribute.name: loadBalancing
attribute.description: Indicates if Inter-frequency Load Balancing is ALLOWED or NOT_ALLOWED from the current cell and towards the cell indicated by the cell relation.

attribute.name: lbUeMeasScaling
attribute.description: Scaling factor for the required number of UE candidates needed for load balancing measurements to meet the load balancing target. Special value: 0 means automatic scaling factor.

attribute.name: pmLbQualifiedUe
attribute.description: Records the number of UEs qualified for load balancing action towards the related cell. Those values are accumulated each ROP. Used to calculate the LB measurement success rate for the related cell.
attribute.condition: Accumulated every load balancing cycle. The number of UEs reporting the related cell as the cell with highest RSRP is the value to be used. Increment by zero if no UE qualifies.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmHoExeAttLteInterFLb
attribute.description: The number of outgoing intra LTE inter frequency handover execution attempts due to load balancing.
attribute.condition: RRC CONNCECTION RECONFIGURATION including the mobilityControlInformation is sent to the UE from the source cell and the reason for the handover is load balancing
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmHoExeSuccLteInterFLb
attribute.description: The number of successful outgoing intra LTE inter frequency handovers that was performed for load balancing reasons.
attribute.condition: UE CONTEXT RELEASE COMMAND received in the source eNodeB from the MME with the cause Handover Triggered (S1 handover) and the source eNB initiated the handover due to load balancing. or UE CONTEXT RELEASE received in the source eNodeB from the target eNodeB (X2 handover) and the source eNB initiated the handover due to load balancing. or Internal eNodeB trigger (corresponding to UE CONTEXT RELEASE) received when the UE has changed cell during a intra eNodeB handover and the source cell initiated the handover due to load balancing.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmHoPrepAttLteInterFLb
attribute.description: The number of attempts to start outgoing intra LTE inter frequency handover preparation due to load balancing.
attribute.condition: The source cell performs a load balancing action.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmHoPrepSuccLteInterFLb
attribute.description: The number of successful outgoing intra LTE inter frequency handover preparations that was performed for load balancing reasons.
attribute.condition: HANDOVER COMMAND message is received by the source eNodeB from the MME (S1 handover) and the source eNB initiated the handover due to load balancing. or HANDOVER REQUEST ACKNOWLEDGE message is received by the source eNodeB from the target eNodeB (X2 handover) and the source eNB initiated the handover due to load balancing. or Internal eNodeB trigger (corresponding to HANDOVER REQUEST ACKNOWLEDGE) received when target cell informs source cell that UE resources has been reserved (intra eNodeB handover) and the source cell initiated the handover due to load balancing.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: sCellCandidate
attribute.description:
Secondary component carrier (SCell) candidate status
The value indicates whether the cell indicated by parameter cellrelation may be used as secondary component carrier (SCell) for UE using this cell as their primary component carrier (PCell).

attribute.name: isMroAllowed
attribute.description: Indicates whether the Handover-associated configurations could be optimized automatically or not.

attribute.name: pmHoExeAttLteIntraFTuneOut
attribute.description: The number of intra LTE intra frequency handover execution attempts made by Tune-out UEs
attribute.condition:
RRC CONNCECTION RECONFIGURATION including the mobilityControlInformation is sent to the UE from the source cell.
Stepped in case UE type is Tune-out
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmHoExeSuccLteIntraFTuneOut
attribute.description: The number of successful outgoing intra LTE intra frequency handovers made by Tune-out UEs.
attribute.condition:
UE CONTEXT RELEASE COMMAND received in the source eNodeB from the MME with the cause Handover Triggered (S1 handover) or UE CONTEXT RELEASE received in the source eNodeB from the target eNodeB (X2 handover) or Internal eNodeB trigger (corresponding to UE CONTEXT RELEASE) received when the UE has changed cell during a intra eNodeB handover.
Stepped in case UE type is Tune-out
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmZtemporary72
attribute.description: Normally this counter is not used, it can however sometimes be temporarily used for very late additions in a release. If so, for description see Network Impact Report in the CPI.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmZtemporary73
attribute.description: Normally this counter is not used, it can however sometimes be temporarily used for very late additions in a release. If so, for description see Network Impact Report in the CPI.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.description: Normally this counter is not used, it can however sometimes be temporarily used for very late additions in a release. If so, for description see Network Impact Report in the CPI.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmZtemporary75
attribute.description: Normally this counter is not used, it can however sometimes be temporarily used for very late additions in a release. If so, for description see Network Impact Report in the CPI.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmZtemporary76
attribute.description: Normally this counter is not used, it can however sometimes be temporarily used for very late additions in a release. If so, for description see Network Impact Report in the CPI.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.description: Normally this counter is not used, it can however sometimes be temporarily used for very late additions in a release. If so, for description see Network Impact Report in the CPI.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmZtemporary78
attribute.description: Normally this counter is not used, it can however sometimes be temporarily used for very late additions in a release. If so, for description see Network Impact Report in the CPI.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmZtemporary79
attribute.description: Normally this counter is not used, it can however sometimes be temporarily used for very late additions in a release. If so, for description see Network Impact Report in the CPI.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

class.name: EUtranFreqRelation
class.description:
This MO represents a mobility relation between a EUtranCellFDD and a EUtranFrequency. It contains parameters that are specific for this relation. To include SIB3 in System Information, one instance of this MO must be created which refers to a EUtranFrequency MO with the parameter arfcnValueEUtranDl set to the same value as the parent EUtranCellFDD/EUtranCellTDDs parameter earfcndl.
It is only allowed to remove the EUtranFreqRelation, refering to the same frequency as the parent MO EUtranCellFDD/EUtranCellTDD has, when the EUtranCellFDD/EUtranCellTDD is locked.
Deleting this MO while the parent EUtranCellFDD/EUtranCellTDD has operationalState set to ENABLED is not recommended as it may affect traffic.

attribute.name: EUtranFreqRelationId
attribute.description: The value component of the Relative Distinguished Name (RDN).

attribute.name: userLabel
attribute.description: Label for free use.

attribute.name: eutranFrequencyRef
attribute.description: Refers to the EUTRAN frequency MO, EUtranFrequency.

attribute.name: qRxLevMin
attribute.description: The required minimum received Reference Symbol Received Power (RSRP) level in the (E-UTRA) frequency for cell reselection. Corresponds to parameter Qrxlevmin in 3GPP TS 36.304. This attribute is broadcast in SIB3 or SIB5, depending on whether the related frequency is intra- or inter-frequency.

attribute.name: pMax
attribute.description: Calculates the parameter Pcompensation (defined in 3GPP TS 36.304), at cell reselection to an E-UTRAN Cell. Corresponds to parameter PEMAX in 3GPP TS 36.101. Value 1000 means the parameter is not sent in the system information block.

attribute.name: tReselectionEutra
attribute.description: The cell reselection timer TreselectionRAT for E-UTRA. Value in seconds.

attribute.name: tReselectionEutraSfHigh
attribute.description: The attribute t-ReselectionEUTRA is multiplied with this factor if the UE is in high mobility state. Corresponds to the parameter Speed dependent ScalingFactor for TreselectionEUTRAN for medium high state in 3GPP TS 36.304. Value mapping: 25 = 0.25 50 = 0.5 75 = 0.75 100 = 1.0

attribute.name: tReselectionEutraSfMedium
attribute.description: The attribute t-ReselectionEUTRA is multiplied with this factor if the UE is in medium mobility state. Corresponds to the parameter Speed dependent ScalingFactor for TreselectionEUTRAN for medium mobility state in 3GPP TS 36.304. Value mapping: 25 = 0.25 50 = 0.5 75 = 0.75 100 = 1.0

attribute.name: cellReselectionPriority
attribute.description:
The absolute priority of the carrier frequency used by the cell reselection procedure. Corresponds to the parameter priority in 3GPP TS 36.304.
Value 0 means: lowest priority. The UE behavior when no value is entered is specified in 3GPP TS 36.304.
attribute.dependencies: The value must be uniqe and not already used by other RAT, i.e. equal priorities between RATs are not supported.

attribute.name: threshXHigh
attribute.description: The threshold used by the UE when reselecting towards the higher priority frequency X from the current serving frequency. Each frequency of E-UTRAN can have a specific threshold. Refer to the parameter Thresx,high in 3GPP TS 36.304.

attribute.name: threshXLow
attribute.description: The threshold used in reselection towards frequency X priority from a higher priority frequency. Each frequency of E-UTRAN can have a specific threshold. Corresponds to parameter Thresx,low in 3GPP TS 36.304.

attribute.name: allowedMeasBandwidth
attribute.description: The maximum allowed measurement bandwidth on a carrier frequency.

attribute.name: qOffsetFreq
attribute.description: Frequency specific offset for E-UTRAN frequencies used in idle and connected mode. See 36.331.

attribute.name: presenceAntennaPort1
attribute.description: Indicates if all the neighboring cells use Antenna Port 1. When set to TRUE, the UE expects that at least two cell-specific antenna ports are used in all neighboring cells.

attribute.name: allowedPlmnList
attribute.description:
Lists all Public Land Mobile Network (PLMN) IDs allowed for this frequency relation.
A UE that does not support a PLMN included in allowedPlmnList does not measure on this frequency according to the UE Handover Restriction List.
No values in allowedPlmnList imply that the frequency has no restrictions for PLMN.
The PLMN identity consists of the following parts: 1. MobileCountryCode, MCC, 3 digits 2. MobileNetworkCode, MNC, 2 or 3 digits (the correct number of digits is set in the mncLength member of this Struct)
For example, if MCC=125 and MNC=46, then plmnId=12546.

attribute.name: includeInSystemInformation
attribute.description:
States if the referred frequency is included in System Information.
When the includeInSystemInformation is set to false for a EUtranFreqRelation that points at an inter-frequency EUtranFrequency MO, the frequency is not included in SIB5. The maximum number of frequencies that can be included in SIB5 is 8.
For the EUtranFreqRelation that points to the intra frequency EUtranFrequency MO, the attribute is invalid, that is, this attribute does not affect SIB3.
attribute.deprecated: L11A. Has no functional behaviour.

attribute.name: connectedModeMobilityPrio
attribute.description: Prioritizes EUTRAN frequencies among all frequencies related to the cell for UEs in connected mode. (0 means the lowest priority. -1 means the frequency is excluded.)

attribute.name: mobilityAction
attribute.description: The preferred way to transfer a UE in connected mode to this EUTRA frequency.

attribute.name: createdBy
attribute.description: Indicates whether the MO has been created by the Automated Neighbor Relations (ANR) function or operator or X2

attribute.name: timeOfCreation
attribute.description: Indicates the time and date when the MO was created. Format: YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS

attribute.name: lastModification
attribute.description: Indicates whether the MO was last modified by the Automated Neighbor Relations (ANR) function or operator or X2 and if the MO is to be deleted who triggered the deletion

attribute.name: timeOfLastModification
attribute.description: Indicates the time and date when the MO was last modified. Format: YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS

attribute.name: threshXHighQ
attribute.description:
Parameter "ThreshX, HighQ" in TS 36.304.
For the EUtranFreqRelation that points to the intra frequency EUtranFrequency MO, the attribute is invalid, that is, this attribute does not affect SIB3.
attribute.dependencies: The field is mandatory present if the Struct Member threshServingLowQ in SIB3 is used in systemInformationBlockType3.

attribute.name: threshXLowQ
attribute.description:
Parameter "ThreshX, LowQ" in TS 36.304.
For the EUtranFreqRelation that points to the intra frequency EUtranFrequency MO, the attribute is invalid, that is, this attribute does not affect SIB3.
attribute.dependencies: The field is mandatory present if the Struct Member threshServingLowQ in SIB3 is used in systemInformationBlockType3.

attribute.name: qQualMin
attribute.description:
Parameter "Qqualmin" in TS 36.304.
Value 0 means that it is not sent and UE applies in such case the (default) value of negative infinity for Qqualmin. Sent in SIB3 or SIB5.

attribute.name: neighCellConfig
attribute.description:
Provides to the UE information related to MBSFN and TDD UL/DL configuration of neighbour cells.
For TDD, the values DIFF_MBSFN_SUBFRAMES, SAME_MBSFN_SUBFRAMES and NO_MBSFN_SUBFRAMES indicates same UL/DL allocation in neighbouring cells compared to the serving cell
The value is included in SIB3, SIB5 and MeasObjectEUTRA

attribute.name: pmLbMeasuredUe
attribute.description: Records the number of UEs selected for measurements qualifying for load balancing action towards cells on the related frequency. Those values are accumulated each ROP. Used to calculate the LB measurement success rate for the related cells.
attribute.condition: Accumulated every load balancing cycle. The number of UEs selected to perform LB qualification measurements on the related frequency is the value to be used. Increment by zero if no UE is selected.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: voicePrio
attribute.description: Prioritizes EUTRAN frequencies among all frequencies related to the cell for UEs in connected mode. Sets the priority to which frequency to perform mobility to for a voice session. The value -1 means the the frequency is excluded. The value 0 means the lowest priority. The value 7 means the highest priority.

attribute.name: blackListEntry
attribute.description: This parameter specifies a list of PCI that are blacklisted in EUTRAN measurements as described in 3GPP TS 36.331.

attribute.name: interFreqMeasType
attribute.description: The type of event based measurements on other LTE frequencies.

attribute.name: eutranFreqToQciProfileRelation
attribute.description: Encapsulates parameters for service specific load management for a certain QCI profile.

attribute.name: blackListEntryIdleMode
attribute.description: This parameter specifies blacklisted cells in SIB4 and SIB5.

class.name: EUtranFrequency
class.description: This Managed Object contains information of a specific EUtran frequency.

attribute.name: EUtranFrequencyId
attribute.description: The value component of the Relative Distinguished Name (RDN).

attribute.name: reservedBy
attribute.description: Contains a list of MO instances that reserve this MO instance.

attribute.name: userLabel
attribute.description: Label for free use.

attribute.name: arfcnValueEUtranDl
attribute.description: Indicates the ARFCN applicable for a downlink E-UTRA carrier frequency, as defined in 3GPP TS 36.104 for specified E-UTRA bands. For TDD this also indicate the ARFCN for uplink. The values that can be used depends on national operator specific frequency allocation as well as from the supported frequency band(s) of the equipment in the eNodeB.

class.name: Cdma2000CellRelation
class.description: This Managed Object represents a mobility relation between a EUtranCellFDD or an EUtranCellTDD and an Cdma2000Cell. It contains parameters that are specific for this relation.

attribute.name: Cdma2000CellRelationId
attribute.description: The value component of the Relative Distinguished Name (RDN).

attribute.name: userLabel
attribute.description: Label for free use.

attribute.name: externalCdma2000CellRef
attribute.description: Reference to a ExternalCdma2000Cell.

attribute.name: includeInSystemInformation
attribute.description:
Indicates if the CDMA2000 cell shall be included in System Information or not.
When the includeInSystemInformation is set to false, the CDMA2000 cell is not included in SIB8. A maximum of 16 CDMA2000 cells can be included per frequency. A maximum of 32 CDMA2000 cells can be included in SIB8.

attribute.name: includeInSystemInformationRel9
attribute.description:
Indicates if the CDMA2000 cell shall be included in the Release 9 part of System Information or not.
When the includeInSystemInformationRel9 is set to false, the CDMA2000 cell is not included in the Release 9 part of SIB8. A maximum of 16 CDMA2000 cells can be included per frequency in the Release 9 part. A total maximum of 32 CDMA2000 cells can be included in SIB8.
attribute.dependencies: In 3GPP rel9, the possiblity to add 16 additional CDMA2000 cells on the same frequency, was added. The additional CDMA2000 cells are controled by the parameter includeInSystemInformationRel9.

class.name: Cdma2000Freq
class.description: This Managed Object contains information of a specific CDMA2000 frequency within a Bandclass.

attribute.name: freqCdma
attribute.description: Identifies the carrier frequency within a CDMA2000 Band.

attribute.name: Cdma2000FreqId
attribute.description: The value component of the Relative Distinguished Name (RDN).

attribute.name: reservedBy
attribute.description: Contains a list of MO instances that reserve this MO instance.

attribute.name: userLabel
attribute.description: Label for free use.

class.name: Cdma2000FreqBand
class.description: This Managed Object holds information on a CDMA2000 Bandclass.

attribute.name: Cdma2000FreqBandId
attribute.description: The value component of the Relative Distinguished Name (RDN).

attribute.name: hrpdBandClass
attribute.description: The CDMA-HRPD frequency band in which the HRPD carrier is located.
attribute.deprecated: Since L13B. Replaced by cdmaBandClass. Either cdmaBandClass or hrpdBandClass must be specified at creation of a Cdma2000FreqBand MO.

attribute.name: userLabel
attribute.description: Label for free use.

attribute.name: reservedBy
attribute.description: Contains a list of MO instances that reserve this MO instance.
attribute.dependencies: The MO may not be deleted if it is reserved.

attribute.name: cdmaBandClass
attribute.description: The CDMA frequency band in which the HRPD or 1xRTT carrier is located

class.name: Cdma2000FreqBandRelation
class.description:
This Managed Object represents a mobility relation between an EUtranCellFDD or an EUtranCellTDD and a Cdma2000FreqBand. It contains parameters that are specific for this relation.
Deleting this MO while the parent EUtranCellFDD/EUtranCellTDD has operationalState set to ENABLED is not recommended as it may affect traffic.

attribute.name: Cdma2000FreqBandRelationId
attribute.description: The value component of the Relative Distinguished Name (RDN).

attribute.name: userLabel
attribute.description: Label for free use.

attribute.name: cdma2000FreqBandRef
attribute.description: Reference to the Cdma2000 frequency band MO, Cdma2000FreqBand.

attribute.name: threshXHighHrpd
attribute.description:
The threshold used in reselection towards a high priority CDMA2000 HRPD band class, expressed as an unsigned binary number equal to FLOOR ([-2 x 10 x log10 Ec/Io]) in units of 0.5 db.
If sNonServingCell > threshXHighHrpd, reselection is considered towards the band class with higher priority. The condition must be valid during the period defined by attribute tReselectionCdmaHrpd.
sNonServingCell is the RX-level value of a neighboring cell.

attribute.name: threshXLowHrpd
attribute.description:
The threshold used in reselection towards a low priority CDMA2000 HRPD band class expressed as an unsigned binary number equal to FLOOR ([-2 x 10 x log10 Ec/Io]) in units of 0.5 db.
If sServingCell < threshServingLow and sNeighbor > threshXLow (see corresponding attribute), reselection towards this lower prioritized band class is considered. The condition must be valid during the period defined by attribute tReselectionCdmaHrpd.
sServingCell is the RX level value of the serving cell and sNeighborCell is the RX level value of a neighbor frequency.

attribute.name: cellReselectionPriority
attribute.description: Absolute priority of the RAT (0 means: lowest priority).
attribute.dependencies: The value must be uniqe and not already used by other RAT, i.e. equal priorities between RATs are not supported.

class.name: Cdma2000Network
class.description: This Managed Object is a container for CDMA2000 related Managed Objects.

attribute.name: Cdma2000NetworkId
attribute.description: The value component of the Relative Distinguished Name (RDN).

attribute.name: userLabel
attribute.description: Label for free use.

class.name: EUtranCellTDD
class.description: This MO represents a TDD cell and contains parameters needed by the cell. It also contains parameters for the mandatory common channels. The cell need to have the same duplex mode (FDD or TDD) as the already existing intra-RBS cells, if any.

attribute.name: pmRadioRecInterferencePwrSf1
attribute.description: Monitors the UL interference level for subframe 1 (UpPTS part).
attribute.condition: The aggregated measured UL interference and noise corresponding to subframe 1 (UpPTS part).
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmRadioRecInterferencePwrSf2
attribute.description: Monitors the UL interference level for subframe 2.
attribute.condition: The aggregated measured UL interference and noise corresponding to subframe 2.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmRadioRecInterferencePwrSf3
attribute.description: Monitors the UL interference level for subframe 3.
attribute.condition: The aggregated measured UL interference and noise corresponding to subframe 3.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmRadioRecInterferencePwrSf6
attribute.description: Monitors the UL interference level for subframe 6 (UpPTS part).
attribute.condition: The aggregated measured UL interference and noise corresponding to subframe 6 (UpPTS part).
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmRadioRecInterferencePwrSf7
attribute.description: Monitors the UL interference level for subframe 7.
attribute.condition: The aggregated measured UL interference and noise corresponding to subframe 7.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmRadioRecInterferencePwrSf8
attribute.description: Monitors the UL interference level for subframe 8.
attribute.condition: The aggregated measured UL interference and noise corresponding to subframe 8.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmRadioRecInterferencePwrSfSamp
attribute.description: The aggregated number of radio frames during which the UL interference and noise per subframe is measured.
attribute.condition: Once per radio frame.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: subframeAssignment
attribute.description: The assignment of uplink and downlink subframes for the TDD frame structure (called UL/DL configuration in 3GPP TS 36.211). All TDD cells must have the same uplink and downlink subframe assignment.
attribute.dependencies: For cellRange greater than 15 subframeAssignment must be set to 1.

attribute.name: specialSubframePattern
attribute.description: The special subframe pattern configuration for Downlink Part of Time Slot (DwPTS), Guard Period (GP), and Uplink Part of Time Slot (UpPTS). All TDD cells must have the same special subframe pattern configuration.
attribute.dependencies: specialSubframePattern = 5 can not be used in combination with nB=T4 on MO Paging, see 3GPP TS 36.213. The round trip time at the cellRange together with switching time must be less than the time available in special subframe.

attribute.name: channelBandwidth
attribute.description: The channel bandwidth in the cell.

attribute.name: earfcn
attribute.description:
The E-UTRA Absolute Radio Frequency Channel Number (EARFCN) for the TDD cell. The mapping from EARFCN to physical frequency is for E-UTRA bands is described in 3GPP TS 36.104. The values depend on national, operator specific frequency allocation, as well as from the supported frequency band(s) of the equipment in the RBS.
Note: Use the MO-action changeFrequency if the frequency shall be changed after the cell is initally setup.

attribute.name: EUtranCellTDDId
attribute.description: The value component of the Relative Distinguished Name (RDN).

attribute.name: frameStartOffset
attribute.description: The frame start offset of the cell. All TDD cells must have the same frame start offset.

attribute.name: noOfPucchCqiUsers
attribute.description: The number of Channel Quality Indicator (CQI) resources available on the PUCCH channel. For TDD Subframe Assignment 1 the recommended value is 64.

attribute.name: noOfPucchSrUsers
attribute.description: The number of Scheduling Request (SR) resources available on the PUCCH channel. For TDD Subframe Assignment 1 the recommended value is 64.

attribute.name: cellRange
attribute.description: The maximum distance from the base station where a connection to a UE can be setup and maintained.
attribute.dependencies: For cellRange greater than 15 subframeAssignment must be set to 1. The round trip time at the cellRange together with switching time must be less than the time available in special subframe.

attribute.name: transmissionMode
attribute.description: Defines the Transmission Mode (e.g. Transmit Diversity and Closed-Loop Spatial Multiplexing) that shall be used for the UEs that are connected to the cell. See 3GPP TS 36.213 table 7.1-5 for a definition of Transmission Mode.

attribute.name: zzzTemporary1
attribute.description: Temporary attributes are intended for temporary solutions, and their usage may vary depending on the installed software. It is strongly recommended to only set the attributes that correspond to a desired functionality and leave all other temporary attributes set to default value. Information in the descriptions about what attributes are in use may be overridden by the information in CPI Info documents. Note that a later release may use another attribute to control the functionality previously provided by a temporary attribute, or may remove the functionality altogether. In these cases, the change is documented in the NIR.

attribute.description: Temporary attributes are intended for temporary solutions, and their usage may vary depending on the installed software. attribute.name: pmRadioTxRankDistr
attribute.description:
The transmission mode / rank distributions gives more detailed information on how much each transmission mode and rank is used.
PDF ranges: [0]: Transmit diversity [1]: Open Loop SM Rank 1 [2]: Open Loop SM Rank 2 [3]: Closed Loop SM rank 1 [4]: Closed Loop SM rank 2 [5]: Single Layer Beamforming [6]: Dual Layer Beamforming rank 1 [7]: Dual Layer Beamforming rank 2
attribute.condition: The corresponding sub-counter is stepped whenever a UE is scheduled (new data transmission or retransmission). If the single antenna port (port 0) is used, no samples will be collected.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmRadioCalibAttFail
attribute.description:
The Counter is incremented every time a calibration attempt is unsuccessful. A set of measurements are preformed every calibration occasion. If the calibration is successful or not is determined by two tests:
1: A test to check if the level of the received calibration measurement signal is to low.
2: A test to check if the signal is disturbed or corrupted in a way that it is not possible to estimate the calibration parameters.
If at least one of the tests are failing the calibration is considered unsuccessful and the counter is incremented. If calibration is unsuccessful a new calibration attempt is immediately started. After several unsuccessful calibration attempts an alarm is issued.
attribute.condition: The counter is incremented for each unsuccessful calibration attempt.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmDrbThpTimeDlQci
attribute.description:
The DL transmission time used for DL DRB Throughput per QCI. It comprises of time periods from when the first piece of data in a data burst is transmitted until the second last piece of data in the data burst is transmitted.
Compressed: True
attribute.condition: The bin accumulates the DL transmission time per QCI for each large data burst that needs to be transmitted across multiple TTIs.
attribute.scanner: Primary

attribute.name: pmPdcpBitrateDlDrbMax
attribute.description: Peak cell DL bit rate. One cell bit rate sample is obtained by dividing the total volume (PDCP SDU) on Data Radio Bearers aggregated to cell level, that has been transmitted in the downlink direction in the PDCP layer, with the time (in seconds) of the sample gathering period.
attribute.condition: The counter is set equal to the peak sample at the end of each Recording Output Period (ROP).
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmPdcpBitrateDlDrbMin
attribute.description: Minimum cell DL bit rate. One cell bit rate sample is obtained by dividing the total volume (PDCP SDU) on Data Radio Bearers aggregated to cell level, that has been transmitted in the downlink direction in the PDCP layer, with the time (in seconds) of the sample gathering period.
attribute.condition: The counter is set equal to the low mark sample at the end of each Recording Output Period (ROP).
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmPdcpLatPktTransDl
attribute.description: Number of DRB packets for downlink Latency measurements.
attribute.condition: Measurement for UEs aggregated to cell level. Only PDCP SDUs that enters an empty buffer are measured. Samples during handover are excluded since they can distort the interpretation of the result (due to packet forwarding, the target cell might have to buffer data before it is possible to schedule the UE in the target cell, hence it would be an increased Latency measurement if it would be included. It would however not lead to a degraded performance for the end-user, due to packet forwarding).
attribute.scanner: Primary

attribute.name: pmPdcpLatPktTransDlDrxNoSync
attribute.description: Number of DRB packets for downlink Latency measurements when DRX is active and the UE has UL synchronization status "NOT synchronized".
attribute.condition: Measurement for UEs aggregated to cell level. Only PDCP SDUs that enters an empty buffer are measured. Samples during handover are excluded since they can distort the interpretation of the result (due to packet forwarding, the target cell might have to buffer data before it is possible to schedule the UE in the target cell, hence it would be an increased Latency measurement if it would be included. It would however not lead to a degraded performance for the end-user, due to packet forwarding). The samples are included
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmPdcpLatPktTransDlDrxSync
attribute.description: Number of DRB packets for downlink Latency measurements when DRX is active and the UE has UL synchronization status "synchronized".
attribute.condition: Measurement for UEs aggregated to cell level. Only PDCP SDUs that enters an empty buffer are measured. Samples during handover are excluded since they can distort the interpretation of the result (due to packet forwarding, the target cell might have to buffer data before it is possible to schedule the UE in the target cell, hence it would be an increased Latency measurement if it would be included. It would however not lead to a degraded performance for the end-user, due to packet forwarding). The samples are included
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmPdcpLatPktTransDlNoDrxSync
attribute.description: Number of DRB packets for downlink Latency measurements when DRX is NOT active and the UE has UL synchronization status "synchronized".
attribute.condition: Measurement for UEs aggregated to cell level. Only PDCP SDUs that enters an empty buffer are measured. Samples during handover are excluded since they can distort the interpretation of the result (due to packet forwarding, the target cell might have to buffer data before it is possible to schedule the UE in the target cell, hence it would be an increased Latency measurement if it would be included. It would however not lead to a degraded performance for the end-user, due to packet forwarding). The samples are included
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmPdcpLatPktTransDlQci
attribute.description:
Number of samples for DL Latency measurements during measurement period per QCI.
Compressed: True
attribute.condition: The counter registers the number of samples for DL Latency measurements during measurement period per QCI.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmPdcpLatTimeDl
attribute.description: Aggregated DL Latency for a measurement period. The effective DL Latency time comprises the time from PDCP DRB SDU entering the buffer until the first data has been transmitted to the UE.
attribute.condition: Measurement for UEs aggregated to cell level. Only PDCP SDUs that enters an empty buffer are measured. Samples during handover are excluded since they can distort the interpretation of the result (due to packet forwarding, the target cell might have to buffer data before it is possible to schedule the UE in the target cell, hence it would be an increased Latency measurement if it would be included. It would however not lead to a degraded performance for the end-user, due to packet forwarding).
attribute.scanner: Primary

attribute.name: pmPdcpLatTimeDlDrxNoSync
attribute.description: Aggregated DL Latency when DRX is active and the UE has UL synchronization status "NOT synchronized".
attribute.condition: The effective DL Latency time comprises the time from PDCP DRB SDU entering the buffer until the first data has been transmitted to the UE. Measurement for UEs aggregated to cell level. Only PDCP SDUs that enters an empty buffer are measured. Samples during handover are excluded since they can distort the interpretation of the result (due to packet forwarding, the target cell might have to buffer data before it is possible to schedule the UE in the target cell, hence it would be an increased Latency measurement if it would be included. It would however not lead to a degraded performance for the end-user, due to packet forwarding).
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmPdcpLatTimeDlDrxSync
attribute.description: Aggregated DL Latency when DRX is active and the UE has UL synchronization status "synchronized".
attribute.condition: The effective DL Latency time comprises the time from PDCP DRB SDU entering the buffer until the first data has been transmitted to the UE. Measurement for UEs aggregated to cell level. Only PDCP SDUs that enters an empty buffer are measured. Samples during handover are excluded since they can distort the interpretation of the result (due to packet forwarding, the target cell might have to buffer data before it is possible to schedule the UE in the target cell, hence it would be an increased Latency measurement if it would be included. It would however not lead to a degraded performance for the end-user, due to packet forwarding).
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmPdcpLatTimeDlNoDrxSync
attribute.description: Aggregated DL Latency when DRX is NOT active and the UE has UL synchronization status "synchronized".
attribute.condition: The effective DL Latency time comprises the time from PDCP DRB SDU entering the buffer until the first data has been transmitted to the UE. Measurement for UEs aggregated to cell level. Only PDCP SDUs that enters an empty buffer are measured. Samples during handover are excluded since they can distort the interpretation of the result (due to packet forwarding, the target cell might have to buffer data before it is possible to schedule the UE in the target cell, hence it would be an increased Latency measurement if it would be included. It would however not lead to a degraded performance for the end-user, due to packet forwarding).
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmPdcpLatTimeDlQci
attribute.description:
Aggregated DL Latency for a measurement period per QCI.
Compressed: True
attribute.condition: The counter represents DL latency per QCI. The effective DL Latency time comprises the time from PDCP SDU entering the buffer until the first data has been transmitted to the UE. Only latency for PDCP SDUs that enters an empty buffer is measured. Samples during handover are excluded.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmPdcpPktDiscDlAqm
attribute.description: Total number of packets (PDCP SDUs) discarded due to Active Queue Management (AQM).
attribute.condition: When a packet is discarded due to AQM
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmPdcpPktDiscDlAqmQci
attribute.description:
Total number of packets (PDCP SDUs) per QCI discarded due to Active Queue Management (AQM).
Compressed: True
attribute.condition: When a packet is discarded due to AQM
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmPdcpPktDiscDlHo
attribute.description: Number of DRB packets (PDCP SDUs) discarded due to handover in the downlink.
attribute.condition: The counter can be incremented from both source and target point of view in the handover functionality. Discards in the target eNB could be due to out of order sequence. Discards in the source eNB includes discards of packets not positively acknowledged PDCP SDU for which it was decided that no more transmission attempts on either Uu, X2 or S1 interface will be done. Only applicable to DRB packets.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmPdcpPktDiscDlHoQci
attribute.description:
Total number of DL packets (PDCP SDUs) discarded due to HO per QCI.
Compressed: True
attribute.condition: The counter can be incremented from both source and target point of view in the handover functionality. Discards in the target eNB could be due to out of order sequence. Discards in the source eNB includes discards of packets not positively acknowledged PDCP SDU for which it was decided that no more transmission attempts on either Uu, X2 or S1 interface will be done. Only applicable to DRB packets.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmPdcpPktDiscDlPelr
attribute.description: Total number of DRB packets (PDCP SDUs) for which no part has been transmitted over the air in the downlink that are discarded due to reasons other than handover or active queue management.
attribute.condition: Continuous measurement for UEs aggregated to cell level.
attribute.scanner: Primary

attribute.name: pmPdcpPktDiscDlPelrQci
attribute.description:
Total number of DL packets (PDCP SDUs) per QCI that are discarded in the PDCP layer due to reasons other than handover or active queue management. No part of these packets has been transmitted over the air.
Compressed: True
attribute.condition: The bin accumulates the number of DL PDCP SDUs discarded not due to HO or active queue management per QCI.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmPdcpPktDiscDlPelrUu
attribute.description: Total number of packets (PDCP SDUs) for which at least a part has been transmitted over the air in the downlink direction but not positively acknowledged, and it was decided that no more transmission attempts will be done, due to reasons other than handover. Only applicable to DRB packets.
attribute.condition: Continuous measurement for UEs aggregated to cell level.
attribute.scanner: Primary

attribute.name: pmPdcpPktDiscDlPelrUuQci
attribute.description:
Total number of DL packets (PDCP SDUs) per QCI for which at least a part has been transmitted over the air but not positively acknowledged due to reasons other than handover, and it was decided that no more transmission attempts will be done.
Compressed: True
attribute.condition: The bin accumulates the number of DL PDCP SDUs that are not successfully transmitted due to reasons other than HO per QCI.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmPdcpPktReceivedDl
attribute.description: Total number of DRB packets (PDCP SDUs) received by RBS in PDCP in the downlink.
attribute.condition: Continuous measurement for UEs aggregated to cell level.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmPdcpPktReceivedDlQci
attribute.description:
Total number of DL packets (PDCP SDUs) received in PDCP in the RBS per QCI.
Compressed: True
attribute.condition: The bin accumulates the number of DL PDCP SDUs received per QCI.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmPdcpPktTransDl
attribute.description: Total number of DRB packets (PDCP SDUs) successfully transmitted (RLC acknowledged by UE) in the downlink.
attribute.condition: Continuous measurement for UEs aggregated to cell level.
attribute.scanner: Primary

attribute.name: pmPdcpPktTransDlQci
attribute.description:
Total number of DL packets (PDCP SDUs) transmitted successfully per QCI.
Compressed: True
attribute.condition: The bin accumulates the number of DL PDCP SDUs that are transmitted successfully per QCI.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmPdcpVolDlCmpHdrQci
attribute.description:
The total volume of compressed PDCP SDU headers that has been transmitted from the Robust Header Compression entity in the downlink direction per QCI.
Compressed: True
attribute.condition: Continuous measurement for DRBs aggregated to cell level.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmPdcpVolDlDrb
attribute.description: The total volume (PDCP SDU) on Data Radio Bearers that has been transferred (acknowledged by the UE) in the downlink direction.
attribute.condition: Continuous measurement for DRBs aggregated to cell level.
attribute.scanner: Primary

attribute.name: pmPdcpVolDlDrbLastTTI
attribute.description: The total volume (PDCP SDU) on Data Radio Bearers that has been transferred (acknowledged by the UE) in the downlink direction in the last TTI when a buffer is emptied.
attribute.condition: Continuous measurement for UEs aggregated to cell level.
attribute.scanner: Primary

attribute.name: pmPdcpVolDlDrbLastTTIQci
attribute.description:
The total DL PDCP SDU volume per QCI that is transmitted in the last TTI when the buffer for a DRB that maps to the given QCI is emptied.
Compressed: True
attribute.condition: The bin accumulates the DL PDCP SDU volume per QCI that is transmitted in the last TTI when the buffer for a DRB that maps to the given QCI is emptied.
attribute.scanner: Primary

attribute.name: pmPdcpVolDlDrbQci
attribute.description:
The total volume (PDCP SDU) that has been transferred (acknowledged by the UE) on Data Radio Bearers in the downlink direction per QCI.
Compressed: True
attribute.condition: The counter accumulates acknowledged DL PDCP volume per QCI.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmPdcpVolDlDrbTrans
attribute.description: The total volume (PDCP SDU) on Data Radio Bearers that has been transmitted in the downlink direction in the PDCP layer.
attribute.condition: Continuous measurement for DRBs aggregated to cell level.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmPdcpVolDlDrbTransPlmn0
attribute.description:
The total volume (PDCP SDU) on Data Radio Bearers that has been transmitted in the downlink direction in the PDCP layer for the UEs served by PLMN0.
PLMN0 refers to the PLMN configured in the attribute eNodeBPlmnId located on ENodeBFunction.
attribute.condition: Traffic volume counter accumulates transferred volume from PDCP to RLC layer for Plmn0.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmPdcpVolDlDrbTransPlmn1
attribute.description:
The total volume (PDCP SDU) on Data Radio Bearers that has been transmitted in the downlink direction in the PDCP layer for the UEs served by PLMN1.
PLMN1 refers to the PLMN configured in the attribute additionalPlmnList[0] located on EUtranCellFDD or EUtranCellTDD.
attribute.condition: Traffic volume counter accumulates transferred volume from PDCP to RLC layer for Plmn1.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmPdcpVolDlDrbTransPlmn2
attribute.description:
The total volume (PDCP SDU) on Data Radio Bearers that has been transmitted in the downlink direction in the PDCP layer for the UEs served by PLMN2.
PLMN2 refers to the PLMN configured in the attribute additionalPlmnList[1] located on EUtranCellFDD or EUtranCellTDD.
attribute.condition: Traffic volume counter accumulates transferred volume from PDCP to RLC layer for Plmn2.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmPdcpVolDlDrbTransPlmn3
attribute.description:
The total volume (PDCP SDU) on Data Radio Bearers that has been transmitted in the downlink direction in the PDCP layer for the UEs served by PLMN3.
PLMN3 refers to the PLMN configured in the attribute additionalPlmnList[2] located on EUtranCellFDD or EUtranCellTDD.
attribute.condition: Traffic volume counter accumulates transferred volume from PDCP to RLC layer for Plmn3.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmPdcpVolDlDrbTransPlmn4
attribute.description:
The total volume (PDCP SDU) on Data Radio Bearers that has been transmitted in the downlink direction in the PDCP layer for the UEs served by PLMN4.
PLMN4 refers to the PLMN configured in the attribute additionalPlmnList[3] located on EUtranCellFDD or EUtranCellTDD.
attribute.condition: Traffic volume counter accumulates transferred volume from PDCP to RLC layer for Plmn4.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmPdcpVolDlDrbTransPlmn5
attribute.description:
The total volume (PDCP SDU) on Data Radio Bearers that has been transmitted in the downlink direction in the PDCP layer for the UEs served by PLMN5.
PLMN5 refers to the PLMN configured in the attribute additionalPlmnList[4] located on EUtranCellFDD or EUtranCellTDD.
attribute.condition: Traffic volume counter accumulates transferred volume from PDCP to RLC layer for Plmn5.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmPdcpVolDlDrbTransPlmn6
attribute.description:
The total volume (PDCP SDU) on Data Radio Bearers that has been transmitted in the downlink direction in the PDCP layer for the UEs served by PLMN6.
PLMN6 refers to an unexpected PLMN, that is, a PLMN that cannot be associated with any PLMN configured in the ENodeBFunction or cell.
attribute.condition: Traffic volume counter accumulates transferred volume from PDCP to RLC layer for Plmn6.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmPdcpVolDlDrbTransQci
attribute.description:
The total volume (PDCP SDU) on Data Radio Bearers that has been transmitted in the downlink direction in the PDCP layer per QCI.
Compressed: True
attribute.condition: Continuous measurement after Robust Header Compression for DRBs aggregated to cell level.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmPdcpVolDlDrbTransUm
attribute.description: The total volume (PDCP SDU) on Data Radio Bearers for RLC UM that has been transmitted in the downlink direction in the PDCP layer.
attribute.condition: Continuous measurement after Robust Header Compression for DRBs aggregated to cell level
attribute.scanner: Primary

attribute.name: pmPdcpVolDlHdrQci
attribute.description:
The total volume of uncompressed PDCP SDU headers that has been received in the Robust Header Compression entity in the downlink direction per QCI.
Compressed: True
attribute.condition: Continuous measurement for DRBs aggregated to cell level.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmPdcpVolDlSrb
attribute.description:
The total number of bits (PDCP SDU) on Signalling Radio Bearers that has been transferred (acknowledged by the UE) in the downlink direction.
SRB0 volume is not included in this counter.
attribute.condition: Continuous measurement for SRBs aggregated to cell level.
attribute.scanner: Primary

attribute.name: pmPdcpVolDlSrbTrans
attribute.description: The total volume (PDCP SDU) on Signalling Radio Bearers that has been transmitted in the downlink direction in the PDCP layer.
attribute.condition: Continuous measurement for SRBs aggregated to cell level.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmRlcArqDlAck
attribute.description: The total number of successful RLC PDU transmissions (ACKs) in the downlink direction.
attribute.condition: Continuous measurement for Radio Bearers aggregated to cell level.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmRlcArqDlNack
attribute.description: The total number of unsuccessful RLC PDU and RLC PDU segment transmissions (NACKs) in the downlink direction.
attribute.condition: Continuous measurement for Radio Bearers aggregated to cell level.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmUeThpTimeDl
attribute.description: The effective DL transport time comprises those periods from when the first part of the PDCP SDU of the DL buffer was transmitted on Uu until the buffer is emptied, excluding the TTI emptying the buffer
attribute.condition: Continuous measurement for UEs aggregated to cell level.
attribute.scanner: Primary

attribute.name: pmPrbUsedDlAilgHighPrio
attribute.description: The total number of PRB pairs generated by Air Interface Load Generator in the DL direction for load of higher priority than the real UEs load
attribute.condition: Continuous measurement on TTI granularity on cell level
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmPrbUsedDlAilgTot
attribute.description: The total number of PRB pairs generated by Air Interface Load Generator in DL for artificial load, both for high and low priority load.
attribute.condition: Continuous measurement on TTI granularity on cell level
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmPrbUsedUlAilgTot
attribute.description: The total number of PRB pairs generated by Air Interface Load Generator in UL for artificial load, both for high and low priority load
attribute.condition: Continuous measurement on TTI granularity on cell level
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmUeCtxtRelCsfbWcdma
attribute.description: The number of RRC Connection Release with redirect to WCDMA triggered by CS Fallback.
attribute.condition: A CS Fallback attempt is performed towards a WCDMA Frequency, defined as a RRC Connection Release with redirect information, due to a received CS Fallback Indicator set to CS Fallback Required in Initial Context Setup Request or UE Context Modification Request.
attribute.scanner: Primary

attribute.name: pmUeCtxtRelCsfbWcdmaEm
attribute.description: The number of RRC Connection Release with redirect to WCDMA triggered by CS Fallback Emergency.
attribute.condition: An Emergency CS Fallback attempt is performed towards a WCDMA Frequencies, defined as a RRC Connection Release with redirect information, due to a received CS Fallback Indicator set to CS Fallback High Priority in Initial Context Setup Request or UE Context Modification Request.
attribute.scanner: Primary

attribute.name: pmUeCtxtRelCsfbGsmEm
attribute.description: The number of RRC Connection Release with redirect to GSM triggered by CS Fallback Emergency.
attribute.condition: An Emergency CS Fallback attempt is performed towards a GSM Frequency Group, defined as a RRC Connection Release with redirect information, due to a received CS Fallback Indicator set to CS Fallback High Priority in Initial Context Setup Request or UE Context Modification Request.
attribute.scanner: Primary

attribute.name: pmUeCtxtRelCsfbGsm
attribute.description: The number of RRC Connection Release with redirect to GSM triggered by CS Fallback.
attribute.condition: A CS Fallback attempt is performed towards a GSM Frequency Group, defined as a RRC Connection Release with redirect information, due to a received CS Fallback Indicator set to CS Fallback Required in Initial Context Setup Request or UE Context Modification Request.
attribute.scanner: Primary

attribute.name: ailgRef
attribute.description: Refers to an instance of AirIfLoadProfile. Assigns a AirIfLoadProfile to a cell.

attribute.name: ailgActive
attribute.description: The state of the feature Air Interface Load Generator. Indicates if it is running or stopped.

attribute.name: pmErabEstabFailGbrDlEnb
attribute.description: The total number of failed E-RAB setup attempts due to downlink GBR overload for resources common to the eNodeB.
attribute.condition: Shall be stepped for each failed E-RAB Establishment attempt due to downlink GBR overload for resources common to the eNodeB.
attribute.scanner: Primary

attribute.name: pmErabEstabFailGbrUlEnb
attribute.description: The total number of failed E-RAB setup attempts due to uplink GBR overload for resources common to the eNodeB.
attribute.condition: Shall be stepped for each failed E-RAB Establishment attempt due to uplink GBR overload for resources common to the eNodeB.
attribute.scanner: Primary

attribute.name: pmRaSuccTa
attribute.condition: When a successful random is done (RA Msg3 received) the counter covering the measured TA shall be incremented. Example: When a sample is measured at 50% it means that a successfull random acces has been done at 50% of the configured cell range. In this case bin 6 for the range 50..59% shall be increased.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmUeCtxtTa
attribute.condition: Periodically the actual TA of the UEs that are UL synchronized is monitored, one scan performed every 5 seconds. Example: When a sample is measured at 50% it means that an UL synchronized UE has a TA value at 50% of the configured cell range. In this case bin 6 for 50%..59% is increased.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: changeNotification
attribute.description: For each System Information Block (SIB), indicates when the SIB content is changed, if system information change notification is broadcast prior to broadcast of updated system information.

attribute.name: mappingInfo
attribute.description:
The System Information (SI) message to which each System Information Block (SIB) is mapped.
Note: SIB2 is always mapped to the SI message 1 according to 3GPP TS 36.331.

attribute.name: modificationPeriodCoeff
attribute.description: The modification period, expressed in number of radio frames = modificationPeriodCoeff * defaultPagingCycle. See MO Paging for information about defaultPagingCycle.
attribute.dependencies: modificationPeriodCoeff * defaultPagingCycle must be equal or less than 1024 radio frames. See MO Paging for information about defaultPagingCycle.

attribute.name: siPeriodicity
attribute.description: The periodicity of System Information (SI) messages. If a System Information Block (SIB) is not mapped to a SI message, the SI message is not transmitted.

attribute.name: siWindowLength
attribute.description:
Length of the System Information (SI) window within which each SI message is transmitted. Applies to all SI messages.
Note: An SI window of 1 ms may be configured only when a maximum of 5 SI messages is configured for broadcast by attribute mappingInfo, to avoid collision with SIB1 transmission in subframe #5.
attribute.dependencies: siWindowLength * ‘transmitted number of SI-messages’ <= MIN(siPeriodicitySIx), i.e it must be possible schedule all SI messages within the shortest siPeriodicity time used.

attribute.name: qRxLevMin
attribute.description: The required minimum received Reference Symbol Received Power (RSRP) level in the E-UTRA frequency for cell reselection. Corresponds to parameter Qrxlevmin in 3GPP TS 36.304. This attribute is broadcast in SIB1.

attribute.name: pmDrxSleepTime
attribute.description: Contains the DRX sleep time in number of subframes for all UEs in the cell.
attribute.condition: Counter should be incremented every subframe for every UE in the cell for which DRX functionality in RRC_CONNECTED state is configured and the UE is in DRX sleep time.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmDrxTotalTime
attribute.description: Contains the DRX total time in number of subframes for all UEs in the cell.
attribute.condition: Counter should be incremented every subframe for every UE in the cell for which DRX functionality in RRC_CONNECTED state is configured.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmPdcpDelayTimeDl
attribute.description: Aggregated time for the downlink delay measure. One sample per successful transmission of a packet (PDCP SDU). The time for each sample is between reception of a packet (PDCP SDU) until the successful transmission of the corresponding MAC SDU.
attribute.deprecated: Since L10B. Has no functional behaviour.
attribute.condition: Continuous measurement for UEs aggregated to cell level.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmRrcConnEstabAttEm
attribute.description: The total number of RRC Connection Request attempts with establishment cause emergency.
attribute.condition: Stepped at reception of RRC message RRC Connection Request with establishment cause emergency.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmRrcConnEstabAttHpa
attribute.description: The total number of RRC Connection Request attempts with establishment cause highPriorityAccess
attribute.condition: Stepped at reception of RRC message RRC Connection Request with establishment cause highPriorityAccess
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmRrcConnEstabAttMod
attribute.description: The total number of RRC Connection Request attempts with Establishment cause Mobile Originating Data.
attribute.condition: Stepped at reception of RRC message RRC Connection Request with Establishment cause Mobile Originating Data.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmRrcConnEstabAttMos
attribute.description: The total number of RRC Connection Request attempts with Establishment cause Mobile Originating Signaling.
