attribute.condition: Stepped at reception of RRC message RRC Connection Request with Establishment cause Mobile Originating Signaling.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmRrcConnEstabAttMta
attribute.description: The total number of RRC Connection Request attempts with Establishment cause Mobile Terminating Access.
attribute.condition: Stepped at reception of RRC message RRC Connection Request with Establishment cause Mobile Terminating Access.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmSessionTimeDrb
attribute.description: This counters shows the accumulated active session time for all DRBs in a cell.
attribute.condition: Number of session seconds aggregated for DRBs in a cell. A DRB is said to be ´in session´ if data on a DRB (UL or DL) has been transferred during the last 100 ms.
attribute.scanner: Primary

attribute.name: pmActiveDrbDlSum
attribute.description: The sum of the contributions from each UE in the cell of the number of active DRBs in the downlink direction.
attribute.condition: Each TTI, the counter shall be increased wih the number of DRBs that are considered active (i.e. that have data in the downlink buffer).
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmActiveDrbUlSum
attribute.description: The sum of the contributions from each UE in the cell of the number of active DRBs in the uplink direction.
attribute.condition: Each TTI, the counter shall be increased wih the number of DRBs that are considered active (i.e. that are considered to have data in the uplink buffer).
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmUeCtxtEstabAtt
attribute.description: The total number of Initial Context Setup Establishment attempts.
attribute.condition: Stepped for each S1 message Initial Context Setup Request.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmUeCtxtEstabSucc
attribute.description: The total number of Initial Context Setup Establishment successes
attribute.condition: Stepped for each Initial Context that is successfully established.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmUeCtxtRelSCCdma
attribute.description: The number of Session Continuity RRC Connection Release with redirect to CDMA2000.
attribute.condition: A RRC Connection Release with redirect information to CDMA2000.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmUeCtxtRelSCGsm
attribute.description: The number of Session Continuity RRC Connection Release with redirect to GERAN.
attribute.condition: A RRC Connection Release with redirect information to GERAN.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmUeCtxtRelSCWcdma
attribute.description: The number of Session Continuity RRC Connection Release with redirect to UTRA FDD.
attribute.condition: A RRC Connection Release with redirect information to UTRA FDD.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: minBestCellHoAttempts
attribute.description: Number of attempts for handover to a cell better than the serving cell, before handover is attempted to the next best cell. If there is no next best cell in the UE report, handover to the best cell is attempted repeatedly.
attribute.deprecated: Since L13A. Has no functional behavior. Planned to be removed.

attribute.name: redirectionInfoRefPrio1
attribute.description: Reference to an Managed Object instance containing redirection information for this EUtranCell. This reference should be set to a Cdma2000Freq, EUtranFrequency, UtranFrequency or GeranFrequencyGroup instance. Redirect to the same frequency is possible.
attribute.deprecated: Since L11B. Planned to be removed.

attribute.name: redirectionInfoRefPrio2
attribute.description: Reference to an Managed Object instance containing redirection information for this EUtranCell. This reference should be set to a Cdma2000Freq, EUtranFrequency, UtranFrequency or GeranFrequencyGroup instance. Redirect to the same frequency is possible.
attribute.deprecated: Since L11B. Planned to be removed.

attribute.name: redirectionInfoRefPrio3
attribute.description: Reference to an Managed Object instance containing redirection information for this EUtranCell. This reference should be set to a Cdma2000Freq, EUtranFrequency, UtranFrequency or GeranFrequencyGroup instance. Redirect to the same frequency is possible.
attribute.deprecated: Since L11B. Planned to be removed.

attribute.name: systemInformationBlock6
attribute.description: Contains cell re-selection information common for cell re-selection towards UTRAN.

attribute.name: systemInformationBlock7
attribute.description: Contains cell re-selection information common for cell re-selection towards GERAN.

attribute.name: systemInformationBlock8
attribute.description: Contains cell re-selection information common for cell re-selection towards CDMA2000. This is controlled by the licensing MO Cdma2000SessionContinuity. The SIB8 distribution and information is also controlled by other licenses.

attribute.name: reservedBy
attribute.description: Contains a list of managed object instances that reserves this managed object instance.
attribute.dependencies: The managed object cannot be deleted if it is reserved.

attribute.name: srbTableRef
attribute.description:
Reference to an instance of SrbTable. Assigns a SrbTable for a cell.
Reference to the SrbTable instance corresponding to LDN= "ManagementElement=1, ENodeBFunction=1, SrbTable=default”
attribute.dependencies: It is assumed that the SrbTable MO has been created.

attribute.name: systemInformationBlock3
attribute.description: Contains cell re-selection information common for intra-frequency, inter-frequency and/ or inter-RAT cell re-selection.

attribute.name: ulCyclicPrefix
attribute.description: Type of cyclic prefix used for uplink.

attribute.name: ulInterferenceManagementActive
attribute.description: Specifies if uplink interference management is enabled or disabled.

attribute.name: ulInterferenceManagementDuration
attribute.description: Specifies the time for which a randomly selected start frequency will be valid before a new start frequency is allocated. Setting it to "0" means that it will be randomly selected once, but never updated.
attribute.dependencies: ulInterferenceManagementActive shall be enabled before this parameter takes effect.

attribute.name: acBarringInfo
attribute.description: Contains all access barring information.
attribute.deprecated: Since L12B. Replaced by attributes on cell level. See struct AcBarringInfo for details.

attribute.name: activeMtdMeasurements
attribute.description: Array with all active Local Measurements on this MO. Measurement types for this attribute are TBD. Up to 10 measurements can be active.

attribute.name: cellBarred
attribute.description: Indicates if the cell is barred and should not be accessible to random UEs.

attribute.name: cellReservedForOperatorUse
attribute.description:
Indicates if the cell is reserved for operator use.
The first index is for the primary Public Land Mobile Network (PLMN) of the cell.
attribute.deprecated: Since L11A. Replaced by: primaryPlmnReserved and additionalPlmnReservedList

attribute.name: cellSimulated
attribute.description: This attribute indicates if the specific cell is configured to be simulated in an external test tool. The attribute will be set by the Tester at configuration of the cell.

attribute.name: configurableFrequencyStart
attribute.description: The start frequency offset for allocating resources when the downlink interference management is disabled. Expressed as a percentage of the available bandwidth.
attribute.deprecated: Replaced by dlConfigurableFrequencyStart. Since L11B.

attribute.name: dlCyclicPrefix
attribute.description: Type of cyclic prefix used for downlink.

attribute.name: dlInterferenceManagementActive
attribute.description: Specifies if the downlink interference management is enabled or disabled.

attribute.name: dlInterferenceManagementDuration
attribute.description: Specifies the time for which a randomly selected start frequency will be valid before a new start frequency is allocated. Setting it to "0" means that it will be randomly selected once, but never updated.
attribute.dependencies: dlInterferenceManagementActive shall be enabled before this parameter takes effect.

attribute.name: nrOfRaPreambles
attribute.description: This parameter corresponds to RRC parameter numberOfRA-Preambles and controls the number random access preambles that are allocated for contention-based random access (CBRA).
attribute.deprecated: Since L13A. Has no functional behavior. Planned to be removed.

attribute.name: nrOfSymbolsPdcch
attribute.description: The number of Orthogonal Frequency-Division Multiplexing (OFDM) symbols used for the Physical Downlink Control Channel (PDCCH).
attribute.deprecated: Since L12A. Planned to be removed.

attribute.name: pMaxServingCell
attribute.description:
Limits UE uplink transmission power in the serving cell and calculates the parameter Pcompensation (defined in 3GPP TS 36.304) for cell selection. The attribute is broadcast in SIB1.
Value 1000 means the parameter is not included in system information.

attribute.name: pZeroNominalPucch
attribute.description: The nominal component of the UE transmit power for Physical Uplink Control Channel (PUCCH).

attribute.name: pZeroNominalPusch
attribute.description: The nominal component of the UE transmit power for Physical Uplink Shared Channel (PUSCH).

attribute.name: qciTableRef
attribute.description:
Refers to an instance of QciTable and assigns a QciTable to a cell. The QciTable defines Quality of Service Class Indicator (QCI) to use in the cell.
Refers to the QciTable instance corresponding to Local Distinguished Name (LDN) = ManagementElement=1, ENodeBFunction=1, QciTable=default
attribute.dependencies: It is assumed that the QciTable MO has been created.

attribute.name: rachNoOfAllocationsPerFrame
attribute.description:
Defines the number of subframes per radio frame where PRACH is allocated. The PRACH configuration is broadcasted as part of system information.
Valid values: 5, 10, 20, 30, 50, 100
Value mapping: 5 = 0.5 (0ne every second radio frame) 10 = 1 20 = 2 30 = 3 50 = 5 100 = 10

attribute.name: rachPreambleRepetition
attribute.description: Defines if RACH preamble repetition shall be used for preamble sequence generation and detection. Defines the preamble format (format 0 or 2). Preamble format is broadcasted as part of system information.

attribute.name: rachRootSequence
attribute.description: The first root sequence number for Random Access Channel (RACH) preamble generation. RACH root sequence is broadcast as a part of system information distribution and used for preamble detection. See definition for logical root sequence number in 3GPP TS 36.211.

attribute.name: radioBearerTableRef
attribute.description:
Reference to an instance of RadioBearerTable. Assigns a RadioBearerTable for a cell.
Reference to the RadioBearerTable instance corresponding to LDN= "ManagementElement=1, ENodeBFunction=1, RadioBearerTable =default”
attribute.dependencies: It is assumed that the RadioBearerTable MO has been created.

attribute.name: pmZtemporary1
attribute.description: Normally this counter is not used, it can however sometimes be temporarily used for very late additions in a release. If so, for description see Network Impact Report in the CPI.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmZtemporary10
attribute.description: Normally this counter is not used, it can however sometimes be temporarily used for very late additions in a release. If so, for description see Network Impact Report in the CPI.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmZtemporary11
attribute.description: Normally this counter is not used, it can however sometimes be temporarily used for very late additions in a release. If so, for description see Network Impact Report in the CPI.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmZtemporary12
attribute.description: Normally this counter is not used, it can however sometimes be temporarily used for very late additions in a release. If so, for description see Network Impact Report in the CPI.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmZtemporary13
attribute.description: Normally this counter is not used, it can however sometimes be temporarily used for very late additions in a release. If so, for description see Network Impact Report in the CPI.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmZtemporary14
attribute.description: Normally this counter is not used, it can however sometimes be temporarily used for very late additions in a release. If so, for description see Network Impact Report in the CPI.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmZtemporary15
attribute.description: Normally this counter is not used, it can however sometimes be temporarily used for very late additions in a release. If so, for description see Network Impact Report in the CPI.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmZtemporary2
attribute.description: Normally this counter is not used, it can however sometimes be temporarily used for very late additions in a release. If so, for description see Network Impact Report in the CPI.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmZtemporary3
attribute.description: Normally this counter is not used, it can however sometimes be temporarily used for very late additions in a release. If so, for description see Network Impact Report in the CPI.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmZtemporary4
attribute.description: Normally this counter is not used, it can however sometimes be temporarily used for very late additions in a release. If so, for description see Network Impact Report in the CPI.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmZtemporary5
attribute.description: Normally this counter is not used, it can however sometimes be temporarily used for very late additions in a release. If so, for description see Network Impact Report in the CPI.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmZtemporary6
attribute.description: Normally this counter is not used, it can however sometimes be temporarily used for very late additions in a release. If so, for description see Network Impact Report in the CPI.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmZtemporary7
attribute.description: Normally this counter is not used, it can however sometimes be temporarily used for very late additions in a release. If so, for description see Network Impact Report in the CPI.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmZtemporary8
attribute.description: Normally this counter is not used, it can however sometimes be temporarily used for very late additions in a release. If so, for description see Network Impact Report in the CPI.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmZtemporary9
attribute.description: Normally this counter is not used, it can however sometimes be temporarily used for very late additions in a release. If so, for description see Network Impact Report in the CPI.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmS1SigConnEstabAtt
attribute.description: This measurement provides the number of S1 Signalling connection establishment attempts for any establishment cause.
attribute.condition: Stepped at transmission of Initial UE message.
attribute.scanner: Primary

attribute.name: pmS1SigConnEstabSucc
attribute.description: The total number of successful S1 signalling connection establishments.
attribute.condition: Stepped at the first occurrence of reception of any message on this S1 logical connection.
attribute.scanner: Primary

attribute.name: pmSchedActivityCellDl
attribute.description: The aggregated number of ms in which DRB data was required to be scheduled in the downlink.
attribute.condition: Each TTI, the counter shall be incremented when there was a need to schedule DRB data in the downlink.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmSchedActivityCellUl
attribute.description: The aggregated number of ms in which DRB data was required to be scheduled in the uplink.
attribute.condition: Each TTI, the counter shall be incremented when there was a need to schedule DRB data in the uplink.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmSchedActivityUeDl
attribute.description: Total UEs scheduling activity in the downlink.
attribute.condition: The counter shall be increased with 1 for each UE that was scheduled with SRB/DRB data in the downlink.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmSchedActivityUeUl
attribute.description: Total UEs scheduling activity in the uplink.
attribute.condition: The counter shall be increased with 1 for each UE that was scheduled with SRB/DRB data in the uplink.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmSchedRestrictUeCatDl
attribute.description: The sum of the contributions from each UE of the number of ms where respective UE is limited in the downlink direction by its UE capability.
attribute.condition: Each TTI, the counter shall be increased by the number of UEs in the cell that are limited by their UE capability.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmSchedRestrictUeCatUl
attribute.description: The sum of the contributions from each UE of the number of ms where respective UE is limited in the uplink direction by its UE capability.
attribute.condition: Each TTI, the counter shall be increased by the number of UEs in the cell that are limited by their UE capability.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmSessionTimeUe
attribute.description: This counters shows the accumulated active session time for all UEs in a cell.
attribute.condition: Number of session seconds aggregated for all UEs in a cell. A UE is said to be ´in session´ if any data on a DRB (UL or DL) has been transferred during the last 100 ms
attribute.scanner: Primary

attribute.name: pmUeCtxtRelAbnormalEnb
attribute.condition: Stepped at reception of S1 message UE Context Release Command with internal cause codes considered abnormal (Radio Connection with UE is lost; Handover failure for the UE; UE pre-emption) when the RBS initiated the release. It can also be stepped at transmission of UE Context Release Request or Reset message by the RBS, or when a cell owned by that RBS is disabled (and that leads to internal RBS UE Context Release).
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmUeCtxtRelAbnormalEnbAct
attribute.description: The total number of abnormal UE Contexts Releases initiated by the RBS and that there was data in either the UL or DL buffer (i.e. active).
attribute.condition: If there was data in the buffer at the time of release, then at reception of S1 message UE Context Release Command with internal cause codes considered abnormal (Radio Connection with UE is lost; Handover failure for the UE; UE pre-emption) when the RBS initiated the release. It can also be stepped at transmission of UE Context Release Request or Reset message by the RBS, or when a cell owned by that RBS is disabled (and that leads to internal RBS UE Context Release).
attribute.scanner: Primary

attribute.name: pmUeCtxtRelAbnormalEnbActCdt
attribute.description: Counts the total number of abnormal UE context releases by the eNodeB due to cell down time (manual intervention) when data was in either the UL or DL buffer (i.e. active).
attribute.condition: Stepped for each UE that is lost due to cell down time (manual intervention).
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmUeCtxtRelAbnormalEnbActHo
attribute.description: The total number of abnormal UE Context Releases initiated by the eNB due to handover execution failure and that there was data in either the UL or DL buffer (i.e. active).
attribute.condition: If there was data in the buffer at the time of release, and the release is due to that executed handover fails and the UE is considered dropped.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmUeCtxtRelAbnormalEnbActTnFail
attribute.description: The total number of abnormal UE Context releases initiated by the eNB due to S1 interface down, S1 bearer error indication, and SGW failure detection, and that there was data in either the UL or DL buffer (i.e. active).
attribute.condition: If there was data in the buffer at the time of release of an E-RAB and due to that the S1 interface is lost, S1 bearer error indication is received or SGW failure is detected.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmUeCtxtRelAbnormalEnbActUeLost
attribute.description: The total number of abnormal UE Context releases by the RBS due that the radio connection with the UE is lost and that there was data in either the UL or DL buffer (i.e. active).
attribute.condition: If there was data in the buffer at the time of release and if there was a release of an UE due to that the radio connection towards the UE is lost (i.e. UE unreachable by the RBS).
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmUeCtxtRelMme
attribute.description: The total number of UE Context Releases initiated by the MME excluding successful handover. The counter is stepped regardless of whether data was or was not lost in UL/DL buffers.
attribute.condition: Stepped at reception of S1 message UE Context Release Command (except if the cause was successful handover) and the release is MME initiated.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmUeCtxtRelMmeAct
attribute.description: The total number of UE Context Releases initiated by the MME excluding successful handover and that there was data in either the UL or DL buffer (i.e. active).
attribute.condition: If there was data in the buffer at the time of release, then stepped at reception of S1 message UE Context Release Command (except if the cause was successful handover). The release must also have been MME initiated.
attribute.scanner: Primary

attribute.name: pmUeCtxtRelNormalEnb
attribute.description: The total number of normal UE Context Releases triggered by RBS. The counter is stepped regardless of whether data was or was not lost in UL/DL buffers.
attribute.condition: Stepped at reception of S1 message UE Context Release Command when internal cause codes considered normal (Successful Handover, User Inactivity, Inter-RAT redirection, CS Fallback Triggered) when the RBS initiated the release.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmUeThpTimeUl
attribute.description: The UL volume transfer time used for UL UE Throughput. It comprises of time periods from when the 5th MAC SDU data reception of an UL buffer transfer on Uu until the buffer is emptied, excluding the TTI emptying the buffer.
attribute.condition: Continuous measurement for UEs aggregated to cell level.
attribute.scanner: Primary

attribute.name: pmPrbAvailDl
attribute.description: The total number of Physical Resource Block (PRB) pairs available for transmission in the downlink.
attribute.condition: This measurement is applicable for the Physical Downlink Shared Channel (PDSCH)
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmPrbAvailUl
attribute.description: The total number of Physical Resource Block (PRB) pairs available for transmission in the uplink.
attribute.condition: This measurement is applicable for the Physical Uplink Shared Channel (PUSCH).
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmPrbUsedDl
attribute.description: The total number of PRBs used in the downlink direction.
attribute.deprecated: Since L11A. Has no functional behaviour.
attribute.condition: Continuous measurement on TTI granularity on cell level.
attribute.scanner: Primary

attribute.name: pmPrbUsedDlCcch
attribute.description: The total number of PRBs used for Common Control Channels in the downlink direction.
attribute.deprecated: Since L11A. Has no functional behaviour.
attribute.condition: Continuous measurement on TTI granularity aggregated to cell level. This measurement is applicable to Broadcast Control Channel (BCCH) and Paging Control Channel (PCCH).
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmPrbUsedDlSrb
attribute.description: The total number of Physical Resource Blocks (PRB) used for Signaling Radio Bearers (SRB) in the downlink.
attribute.deprecated: Since L12A. Replaced by pmPrbUsedDlSrbFirstTrans. Has no functional behaviour.
attribute.condition: This measurement is applicable to Dedicated Control Channels (DCCH) and Common Control Channels (CCCH) on the Physical Downlink Shared Channel (PDSCH).
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmPrbUsedUl
attribute.description: The total number of PRBs used in the uplink direction.
attribute.deprecated: Since L11A. Has no functional behaviour.
attribute.condition: Continuous measurement on TTI granularity on cell level.
attribute.scanner: Primary

attribute.name: pmPrbUsedUlCcch
attribute.description: The total number of PRBs used for Common Control Channels in the uplink direction.
attribute.deprecated: Since L11A. Has no functional behaviour.
attribute.condition: Continuous measurement on TTI granularity aggregated to cell level. This measurement is applicable to Random Access Channel (RACH) and Physical Uplink Control Channel (PUCCH).
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmPrbUsedUlSrb
attribute.description: The total number of Physical Resource Block (PRB) pairs used for Signaling Radio Bearers (SRB) in the uplink.
attribute.condition: This measurement is applicable to Dedicated Control Channels (DCCH) and Common Control Channels (CCCH) on the Physical Uplink Shared Channel (PUSCH).
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmPucchSrCqiResAllocAtt
attribute.description: Aggregated number of attempts to allocate PUCCH resources.
attribute.condition: In a typical case each allocation request is for one CQI resource AND one SR resource; The counter is then increased with one for the combined allocation request, not one for each resource requested. One allocation request may also contain request for resources for more than one UE (a bundled allocation request); Also in this case the counter is only incremented with one.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmPucchSrCqiResCongCqi
attribute.description: The number of times a PUCCH allocation request for CQI resource(s) could not be granted
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmPucchSrCqiResCongSr
attribute.description: The number of times a PUCCH allocation request for SR resource(s) could not be granted.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmRaAllocCfra
attribute.description: The number of allocated CFRA preambles.
attribute.condition: This counter should be incremented whenever a CFRA preamble is allocated in the Cell.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmRaAttCbra
attribute.description: The number of detected contention-based random access preambles.
attribute.condition: This counter should be incremented whenever a CBRA preamble is detected in the Cell.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmRaAttCfra
attribute.description: The number of detected contention-free (explicitly signalled) random access preambles.
attribute.condition: This counter should be incremented whenever a CFRA preamble that has been allocated to a UE is detected in the Cell.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmRadioRecInterferencePwr
attribute.condition: A wideband value for the frequency domain is measured on a TTI basis
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmRadioTbsPwrRestricted
attribute.description: The number of Transport Blocks on MAC level scheduled in uplink where the UE was considered to be power limited.
attribute.condition: A Transport Block is considered to be power limited when the estimated required transmit power is higher than the UE maximum transmit power.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmRadioTbsPwrUnrestricted
attribute.description: The number of Transport Blocks on MAC level scheduled in uplink where the UE was NOT considered to be power limited.
attribute.condition: A Transport Block is considered to be power limited when the estimated required transmit power is higher than the UE maximum transmit power.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmRadioThpResDl
attribute.description: The total amount of physical resources used for transmission in the downlink. Both successful and unsuccessful transmissions are counted.
attribute.condition: The counter is incremented when HARQ feedback for a downlink transmission is received, regardless of the feedback received (ACK or NACK).
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmRadioThpResDlSelTbs
attribute.description: The total amount of physical resources used for transmission in the downlink for UEs that are considered to be in true radio conditions. Both successful and unsuccessful transmissions are counted.
attribute.deprecated: Since L11A. Has no functional behaviour.
attribute.condition: The counter is incremented when HARQ feedback for a downlink transmission is received, regardless of the feedback received (ACK or NACK). To the subset of UEs that are considered to be in true radio conditions are UEs for which CQI has been received, are not buffer limited and scheduled with sufficient transport block size.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmRadioThpResUl
attribute.description: The total amount of physical resources used for transmission in the uplink. Both successful and unsuccessful transmissions are counted.
attribute.condition: The counter is incremented when an uplink transmission is received, regardless of whether the reception was successful or not.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmRadioThpResUlSelTbs
attribute.description: The total amount of physical resources used for transmission in the uplink for UEs that are considered to be in true radio conditions. Both successful and unsuccessful transmissions are counted.
attribute.deprecated: Since L11A. Has no functional behaviour.
attribute.condition: The counter is incremented when an uplink transmission from a UE in true radio conditions is successfully received. To the subset of UEs that are considered to be in true radio conditions are UEs for which CQI has been received, are not buffer limited, not power limited and scheduled with sufficient transport block size.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmRadioThpVolDl
attribute.description: The total successfully transferred data volume on MAC level in the downlink. This counter includes possible padding bits.
attribute.condition: The counter is incremented when a downlink transmission is acknowledged on HARQ level.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmRadioThpVolDlSelTbs
attribute.description: The total successfully transferred data volume on MAC level in the downlink for UEs that are considered to be in true radio condition. This counter includes possible padding bits.
attribute.deprecated: Since L11A. Has no functional behaviour.
attribute.condition: The counter is incremented when a downlink transmission to a UE in true radio condition is acknowledged on HARQ level. To the subset of UEs that are considered to be in true radio conditions are UEs for which CQI has been received, are not buffer limited and scheduled with sufficient transport block size.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmRadioThpVolUl
attribute.description: The total successfully transferred data volume on MAC level in the uplink. This counter includes possible padding bits.
attribute.condition: The counter is incremented when an uplink transmission is successfully received.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmRadioThpVolUlSelTbs
attribute.description: The total successfully transferred data volume on MAC level in the uplink for UEs that are considered to be in true radio condition. This counter includes possible padding bits.
attribute.deprecated: Since L11A. Has no functional behaviour.
attribute.condition: The counter is incremented when an uplink transmission from a UE in true radio conditions is received, regardless of whether the reception was successful or not. To the subset of UEs that are considered to be in true radio conditions are UEs for which CQI has been received, are not buffer limited, not power limited and scheduled with sufficient transport block size.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmRadioUeRepCqiDistr
attribute.description:
The reported CQI value from UEs in a distribution.
PDF ranges: [0]: CQI = 0 [1]: CQI = 1 [2]: CQI = 2 [3]: CQI = 3 [4]: CQI = 4 [5]: CQI = 5 [6]: CQI = 6 [7]: CQI = 7 [8]: CQI = 8 [9]: CQI = 9 [10]: CQI = 10 [11]: CQI = 11 [12]: CQI = 12 [13]: CQI = 13 [14]: CQI = 14 [15]: CQI = 15
attribute.condition: The corresponding sub-counter is stepped whenever a CQI report is received from a UE
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmRadioUeRepRankDistr
attribute.description:
The reported rank distribution indicates the rank of UEs that are in a Open and Closed Loop Spatial Multiplexing mode (where rank is reported).
PDF ranges: [0]: Rank = 1 [1]: Rank = 2
attribute.condition: The corresponding sub-counter is stepped whenever a rank report is received from a UE
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmRaFailCbraMsg2Disc
attribute.description: The number of CBRA preambles for which no random access response (RA Msg2) was sent due to expiration of the random access response window.
attribute.condition: This counter should be incremented when the RA response window expires before an RA response has been sent for a detected CBRA preamble.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmRaFailCfraMsg2Disc
attribute.description: The number of CFRA preambles for which no random access response (RA Msg2) was sent due to expiration of the random access response window.
attribute.condition: This counter should be incremented when the RA response window expires before an RA response has been sent for a detected CFRA preamble.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmRaSuccCbra
attribute.description: The number of successfully detected RA Msg3 for CBRA
attribute.condition: This counter should be incremented when an RA msg3 is successfully detected (i.e. when the CRC is OK) in the Cell.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmRaSuccCfra
attribute.description: The number of successfully completed CFRA procedures. Measured when first UL-SCH message is received after detection of the CFRA preamble.
attribute.condition: This counter should be incremented when an UL-SCH message is successfully detected after a CFRA preamble has been received.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmRlcArqUlAck
attribute.description: The total number of successful RLC PDU transmissions (ACKs) in the uplink direction.
attribute.condition: Continuous measurement for Radio Bearers aggregated to cell level.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmRlcArqUlNack
attribute.description: The total number of unsuccessful RLC PDU and RLC PDU segment transmissions (NACKs) in the uplink direction.
attribute.condition: Continuous measurement for Radio Bearers aggregated to cell level.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmRrcConnEstabAtt
attribute.description: The total number of RRC Connection Request attempts.
attribute.condition: Stepped at reception of RRC message RRC Connection Request.
attribute.scanner: Primary

attribute.name: pmRrcConnEstabFailLic
attribute.description: The total number of failed RRC Connection Establishments due to lack of connected users license.
attribute.condition: Stepped at transmission of RRC message RRC Connection Reject due to lack of connected users license.
attribute.scanner: Primary

attribute.name: pmRrcConnEstabSucc
attribute.description: The total number of successful RRC Connection Establishments.
attribute.condition: Stepped at reception of RRC message RRC Connection Setup Complete.
attribute.scanner: Primary

attribute.name: pmActiveUeDlSum
attribute.description: Number of UEs considered active in the downlink direction.
attribute.condition: The counter aggregates for each TTI the number of UEs with DRB data to send.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmActiveUeUlSum
attribute.description: Number of UEs considered active in the uplink direction.
attribute.condition: The counter aggregates for each TTI the number of UEs with buffer status reports indicating DRB data to be sent in the uplink direction.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmAnrNeighbrelAdd
attribute.description: Number of neighbour relations added by the ANR function.
attribute.condition: Stepped when the ANR function establishes a neighbour relation.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmAnrNeighbrelRem
attribute.description: Number of neighbour relations removed by the ANR function.
attribute.condition: Stepped when the ANR function deletes a neighbour relation.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmBadCovEvalReport
attribute.description: The total number of traffic Bad Coverage measurement reports received.
attribute.condition: Stepped at reception of traffic measurement report from UE indicating that bad coverage due to Event A2, 'Serving becomes worse than absolute threshold'.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmBestCellEvalReport
attribute.description: The total number of traffic Best Cell measurement reports received.
attribute.condition: Stepped at reception of traffic measurement report indicating a better cell due to Event A3, 'Neighbor becomes amount of offset better than serving'.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmCellDowntimeAuto
attribute.description: Length of time the cell has been disabled due to a fault (system has set cell MO OperationalState to Disabled). The counter is only incremented when the RBS is operational.
attribute.condition: Incremented by one each second.
attribute.scanner: Primary

attribute.name: pmCellDowntimeMan
attribute.description: Length of time the cell has been disabled due to: - AdministrativeState of the cell MO or another MO the cell depends on has been set to Locked by the operator or - the operator has performed a reconfiguration request on an Unlocked cell which requires the cell to be taken down temporarily. The counter is only incremented when the RBS is operational.
attribute.condition: Incremented by one each second.
attribute.scanner: Primary

attribute.name: pmContDl
attribute.description: The counter aggregates the number of ms for which contention has occurred in the downlink direction due to lack of eNodeB resources.
attribute.condition: Any TTI for which contention (i.e. data not scheduled for a Radio Bearer) occurs due to lack of DL capacity license, hardware capacity or PDCCH resources is counted. Note that result is dependent on the configuration of Subframe assignment (i.e. How many TTIs are available to scheduling).
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmContDlCapLic
attribute.description: The counter aggregates the number of ms for which contention has occurred in the downlink direction due to lack of DL capacity license.
attribute.condition: Any TTI for which contention (i.e. data not scheduled for a Radio Bearer) occurs due to lack of DL capacity license is counted. Note that result is dependent on the configuration of Subframe assignment (i.e. How many TTIs are available to scheduling).
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmContDlHw
attribute.description: The counter aggregates the number of ms for which contention has occurred in the downlink direction due to lack of hardware resources.
attribute.condition: Any TTI for which contention (i.e. data not scheduled for a Radio Bearer) occurs due to lack of hardware resources is counted. Note that result is dependent on the configuration of Subframe assignment (i.e. How many TTIs are available to scheduling).
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmContDlPdcch
attribute.description: The counter aggregates the number of ms for which contention has occurred in the downlink direction due to lack of PDCCH resources.
attribute.condition: Any TTI for which contention (i.e. data not scheduled for a Radio Bearer) occurs due to lack of PDCCH resources is counted. Note that result is dependent on the configuration of Subframe assignment (i.e. How many TTIs are available to scheduling).
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmContUl
attribute.description: The counter aggregates the number of ms for which contention has occurred in the uplink direction due to lack of eNodeB resources.
attribute.condition: Any TTI for which contention (i.e. data not scheduled for a Radio Bearer) occurs due to lack of UL capacity license, hardware capacity or PDCCH resources is counted. Note that result is dependent on the configuration of Subframe assignment (i.e. How many TTIs are available to scheduling).
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmContUlCapLic
attribute.description: The counter aggregates the number of ms for which contention has occurred in the uplink direction due to lack of license resources.
attribute.condition: Any TTI for which contention (i.e. data not scheduled for a Radio Bearer) occurs due to lack of UL capacity license is counted. Note that result is dependent on the configuration of Subframe assignment (i.e. How many TTIs are available to scheduling).
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmContUlHw
attribute.description: The counter aggregates the number of ms for which contention has occurred in the uplink direction due to lack of hardware resources.
attribute.condition: Any TTI for which contention (i.e. data not scheduled for a Radio Bearer) occurs due to lack of hardware resources is counted. Note that result is dependent on the configuration of Subframe assignment (i.e. How many TTIs are available to scheduling).
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmContUlPdcch
attribute.description: The counter aggregates the number of ms for which contention has occurred in the uplink direction due to lack of PDCCH resources.
attribute.condition: Any TTI for which contention (i.e. data not scheduled for a Radio Bearer) occurs due to lack of PDCCH resources is counted. Note that result is dependent on the configuration of Subframe assignment (i.e. How many TTIs are available to scheduling).
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmErabEstabAttAdded
attribute.description: The total number of added E-RAB Establishment attempts. Added E-RABs are all E-RABs present in S1 message E-RAB Setup Request.
attribute.condition: Stepped for each bearer received in the S1 message E-RAB Setup Request.
attribute.scanner: Primary

attribute.name: pmErabEstabAttInit
attribute.description: The total number of initial E-RAB Establishment attempts. Initial E-RABs are all E-RABs present in the S1 message Initial Context Setup Request.
attribute.condition: Stepped for each E-RAB received in the S1 message Initial Context Setup Request.
attribute.scanner: Primary

attribute.name: pmErabEstabFailAddedLic
attribute.description: The total number of failed establishment of added E-RABs due to license rejects (Multiple Radio Bearer per user or RLC UM). Added E-RABs are all E-RABs present in S1 message E-RAB Setup Request.
attribute.condition: Stepped for each added E-RAB that fails to be established due to a license reject (Multiple Radio Bearer per user or RLC UM). The specific license will be indicated in the PM event triggered by this counter.
attribute.scanner: Primary

attribute.name: pmErabEstabFailInitLic
attribute.description: The total number of failed establishment of initial E-RABs due to license rejects (Multiple Radio Bearer per user or RLC UM). Initial E-RABs are all E-RABs present in the S1 message Initial Context Setup Request.
attribute.condition: Stepped for each initial E-RAB that fails to be established due to a license reject (Multiple Radio Bearer per user or RLC UM).The specific license will be indicated in the PM event triggered by this counter.
attribute.scanner: Primary

attribute.name: pmErabEstabSuccAdded
attribute.description: The total number of successfully added E-RABs. Added E-RABs are all E-RABs present in S1 message E-RAB Setup Request.
attribute.condition: Stepped for each added bearer that is successfully established.
attribute.scanner: Primary

attribute.name: pmErabEstabSuccInit
attribute.description: The total number of successful initial E-RAB Establishments. Initial E-RABs are all E-RABs present in the S1 message Initial Context Setup Request.
attribute.condition: Stepped for each initial E-RAB that is successfully established.
attribute.scanner: Primary

attribute.name: pmErabLevSamp
attribute.description: Counts the number of times the corresponding Sum counters has been incremented. Associated ACC pmCounter pmErabLevSum.
attribute.condition: The counter is increased at every occasion when the corresponding sum counter is increased.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmErabLevSum
attribute.description: Sum of all sample values recorded for Number of simultaneous E-RABs
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmErabRelAbnormalEnb
attribute.description: The total number of abnormal E-RAB Releases triggered by eNB per cell.
attribute.condition: Stepped at reception of S1 message E-RAB Release Command or UE Context Release Command where the cause value indicates system (abnormal) release with the pre-condition that the Initial Context Establishment procedure must first have been successfully completed. The release must also have been eNB initiated.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmErabRelAbnormalEnbAct
attribute.description: The total number of abnormal E-RAB Releases per cell initiated by the eNB and that there was data in either the UL or DL buffer (i.e. active).
attribute.condition: If there was data in the buffer at the time of release, then stepped at reception of S1 message E-RAB Release Command or UE Context Release Command when internal cause codes considered abnormal (Radio Connection with UE is lost; Handover failure for the UE; Non admitted E-RABs by target cell at successful handover for the UE; UE pre-emption) when the RBS initiated the release. It can also be stepped at transmission of E-RAB Release Indication, UE Context Release Request or Reset message by the RBS, or when a cell owned by that RBS is disabled (and that leads to internal RBS UE Context Release). In the UL case when a UE has multiple bearers co-existing and sharing the same LCG, the bearers share a single packet queue. If one of the bearers is released and there is data in the queue, the bearer's associated counter is incremented, regardless of whether or not the data belongs to the released bearer.
attribute.scanner: Primary

attribute.name: pmErabRelAbnormalEnbActCdt
attribute.description: The total number of abnormal ERAB releases by the eNB per cell due cell down time (manual intervention) with the pre-condition that the Initial Context Establishment procedure must first have been successfully completed and that there was data in either the UL or DL buffer (i.e. active).
attribute.condition: Stepped for each ERAB that is lost due to cell down time (manual intervention) when data was in either the UL or DL buffer. In the UL case when a UE has multiple bearers co-existing and sharing the same LCG, the bearers share a single packet queue. If one of the bearers is released and there is data in the queue, the bearer's associated counter is incremented, regardless of whether or not the data belongs to the released bearer.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmErabRelAbnormalEnbActHo
attribute.description: The total number of abnormal ERAB releases per cell by the eNB due to handover execution failure and that there was data in either the UL or DL buffer (i.e. active).
attribute.condition: If there was data in the buffer at the time of release, and the release is due to that executed handover fails and the UE is considered dropped. In the UL case when a UE has multiple bearers co-existing and sharing the same LCG, the bearers share a single packet queue. If one of the bearers is released and there is data in the queue, the bearer's associated counter is incremented, regardless of whether or not the data belongs to the released bearer.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmErabRelAbnormalEnbActHpr
attribute.description: The total number of abnormal ERAB releases by the eNB per cell due to handover preparation and that there was data in either the UL or DL buffer (i.e. active).
attribute.condition: If there was data in the buffer at the time of release of an E-RAB, due to that an executed handover excludes the E-RAB (admission reject in target). In the UL case when a UE has multiple bearers co-existing and sharing the same LCG, the bearers share a single packet queue. If one of the bearers is released and there is data in the queue, the bearer's associated counter is incremented, regardless of whether or not the data belongs to the released bearer.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmErabRelAbnormalEnbActTnFail
attribute.description: The total number of abnormal ERAB releases per cell due to S1 interface down, "X2 interface down" or "Transport Resource Unavailable", with the pre-condition that the Initial Context Establishment procedure must first have been successfully completed and that there was data in either the UL or DL buffer (i.e. active).
attribute.condition: If there was data in the buffer at the time of release of an E-RAB and due to that the S1 interface is lost or S1 bearer error indication is received. In the UL case when a UE has multiple bearers co-existing and sharing the same LCG, the bearers share a single packet queue. If one of the bearers is released and there is data in the queue, the bearer's associated counter is incremented, regardless of whether or not the data belongs to the released bearer.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmErabRelAbnormalEnbActUeLost
attribute.description: The total number of abnormal ERAB releases by the eNB per cell due that the contact with the UE is lost with the pre-condition that the Initial Context Establishment procedure must first have been successfully completed and that there was data in either the UL or DL buffer (i.e. active).
attribute.condition: If there was data in the buffer at the time of release and if there was a release of an UE due to that the radio connection towards the UE is lost (i.e. UE unreachable by the RBS). In the UL case when a UE has multiple bearers co-existing and sharing the same LCG, the bearers share a single packet queue. If one of the bearers is released and there is data in the queue, the bearer's associated counter is incremented, regardless of whether or not the data belongs to the released bearer.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmErabRelMme
attribute.description: The total number of normal E-RAB Releases triggered by MME (per cell).
attribute.condition: Stepped at reception of S1 message E-RAB Release Command or UE Context Release Command where the cause value indicates normal release with the pre-condition that the Initial Context Establishment procedure must first have been successfully completed. The release must also have been MME initiated.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmErabRelMmeAct
attribute.description: The total number of E-RAB Releases initiated by the MME (per cell) and that there was data in either the UL or DL buffer (i.e. active).
attribute.condition: If there was data in the buffer at the time of release, then stepped at reception of S1 message E-RAB Release Command or UE Context Release Command (except if the cause was successful handover). The release must also have been MME initiated. In the UL case when a UE has multiple bearers co-existing and sharing the same LCG, the bearers share a single packet queue. If one of the bearers is released and there is data in the queue, the bearer's associated counter is incremented, regardless of whether or not the data belongs to the released bearer.
attribute.scanner: Primary

attribute.name: pmErabRelNormalEnb
attribute.description: The total number of normal E-RAB Releases triggered by eNB per cell.
attribute.condition: Stepped at reception of S1 message E-RAB Release Command or UE Context Release Command where the cause value indicates normal release with the pre-condition that the Initial Context Establishment procedure must first have been successfully completed. The release must also have been eNB initiated.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmHoPrepRejInLicConnUsers
attribute.description: The number of Handover Preparation Failure messages sent by the target eNB due to license for connected users being exceeded.
attribute.condition: Handover preparation fail due to license for connected users being exceeded.
attribute.scanner: Primary

attribute.name: pmHoPrepRejInLicMob
attribute.description: The number of Incoming Handover Preparation Failure messages sent by the target eNB due to lack of license for handover.
attribute.condition: Handover preparation fail due to the serviceState value is INOPERABLE for the optional feature, "Intra LTE inter frequency handover" in the target eNB.
attribute.scanner: Primary

attribute.name: pmMacHarqDlAck
attribute.description: The total number of successful HARQ transmissions (ACKs) in the downlink direction.
attribute.deprecated: Since L10B. Has no functional behaviour.
attribute.condition: Continuous measurement for UEs aggregated to cell level.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmMacHarqDlNack
attribute.description: The total number of unsuccessful HARQ transmissions (NACKs) in the downlink direction.
attribute.deprecated: Since L10B. Has no functional behaviour.
attribute.condition: Continuous measurement for UEs aggregated to cell level.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmMacHarqUlAck
attribute.description: The total number of successful HARQ transmissions (ACKs) in the uplink direction.
attribute.deprecated: Since L10B. Has no functional behaviour.
attribute.condition: Continuous measurement for UEs aggregated to cell level.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmMacHarqUlNack
attribute.description: The total number of unsuccessful HARQ transmissions (NACKs) in the uplink direction.
attribute.deprecated: Since L10B. Has no functional behaviour.
attribute.condition: Continuous measurement for UEs aggregated to cell level.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmPagDiscarded
attribute.description: This counter counts the number of S1AP Paging messages discarded and not broadcasted in this cell. This counter is a subset of pmPagReceived.
attribute.condition: When the cell fails to broadcast an RRC Paging within a certain time (pagingDiscardTimer), e.g. due to congestion, the Paging is discarded and this counter is incremented by the number of included Paging Records in the discarded Paging message.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmPagReceived
attribute.description: This counter counts the number of S1AP Paging messages routed to this cell.
attribute.condition: When an S1AP Paging is routed to this cell which is correct and complete. An S1AP Paging message discarded as part of pmPagS1Discarded will not cause this counter to be pegged.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmPdcchResUtil
attribute.deprecated: Since L12A. Replaced by pmPdcchCceUtil. Planned to be removed.
attribute.condition: The PDF shall be updated each TTI with the percentage of PDCCH resources used.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmPdcpPktLostUl
attribute.description: Total number of DRB packets (PDCP SDUs) lost in the uplink.
attribute.condition: Continuous measurement for UEs aggregated to cell level.
attribute.scanner: Primary

attribute.name: pmPdcpPktReceivedUl
attribute.description: Total number of DRB packets (PDCP SDUs) received in the uplink.
attribute.condition: Continuous measurement for UEs aggregated to cell level.
attribute.scanner: Primary

attribute.name: pmPdcpVolUlDrb
attribute.description: The total volume (PDCP SDU) on Data Radio Bearers that has been received in the uplink direction.
attribute.condition: Continuous measurement for DRBs aggregated to cell level.
attribute.scanner: Primary

attribute.name: pmPdcpVolUlDrbLastTTI
attribute.description: The total volume (PDCP SDU) on Data Radio Bearers that has been received in the uplink direction in the last TTI when a buffer is emptied.
attribute.deprecated: Since L12A. Replaced by pmUeThpVolUl.
attribute.condition: Continuous measurement for UEs aggregated to cell level.
attribute.scanner: Primary

attribute.name: pmPdcpVolUlSrb
attribute.description:
The total number of bits (PDCP SDU) on Signaling Radio Bearers that has been transferred (acknowledged by the RBS) in the uplink direction.
SRB0 volume is not included in this counter.
attribute.condition: Continuous measurement for SRBs aggregated to cell level.
attribute.scanner: Primary

attribute.name: availabilityStatus
attribute.description: The availability status. It contains details about operationalState. This attribute is set by the application in the RBS.

attribute.name: operationalState
attribute.description: The operational state. This attribute is set by the application in the RBS.

attribute.name: administrativeState
attribute.description: The administrative state.

attribute.name: cellId
attribute.description:
RBS internal ID attribute for EUtranCell. Must be unique in the RBS. Together with the Node ID and Public Land Mobile Network (PLMN) this is a universally unique cell ID.
Range 0-255.

attribute.name: noOfRxAntennas
attribute.description: The number of antennas that can be used for uplink beamforming/MIMO A parameter value of 0 means that the available configured resources will be used.
attribute.deprecated: Since L13A. Planned to be removed. Replaced by SectorCarrier::noOfRxAntennas. The value from the first SectorCarrier in the EUtranCellFDD/EUtranCellTDD::sectorCarrierRef will be mapped to this deprecated attribute.
attribute.dependencies: Dependent on optional features that enable usage of multiple Rx antennas.

attribute.name: noOfTxAntennas
attribute.description: The number of antennas that can be used for downlink beamforming/MIMO A parameter value of 0 means that the available configured resources will be used.
attribute.deprecated: Since L13A. Planned to be removed. Replaced by SectorCarrier::noOfTxAntennas. The value from the first SectorCarrier in the EUtranCellFDD/EUtranCellTDD::sectorCarrierRef will be mapped to this deprecated attribute.
attribute.dependencies: Dependent on optional features that enable usage of multiple Tx antennas.

attribute.name: physicalLayerCellIdGroup
attribute.description:
The physical layer cell ID group. Physical-layer cell IDs are grouped into 168 unique physical-layer cell-identity groups, each group containing 3 unique subidentities.
This attribute together with physicalLayerSubCellId is used to calculate physical layer cell ID (see 3GPP TS 36.211) that is sent as part of the system information (see 3GPP TS 36.331).

attribute.name: physicalLayerSubCellId
attribute.description:
The subidentity within the physical layer cell ID group. Physical-layer cell IDs are grouped into 168 unique physical-layer cell-identity groups, each group containing 3 unique subidentities.
This attribute together with physicalLayerCellIdGroup is used to calculate physical layer cell identity (see 3GPP TS 36.211) which is sent as part of the system information (see 3GPP TS 36.331).

attribute.name: sectorFunctionRef
attribute.description: Reference to an instance of SectorEquipmentFunction MO.
attribute.deprecated: Since L13A. Planned to be removed. Replaced by SectorCarrier::sectorFunctionRef. The value of sectorFunctionRef from the first SectorCarrier in the EUtranCellFDD/EUtranCellTDD::sectorCarrierRef will be mapped to this deprecated attribute.

attribute.name: userLabel
attribute.description: Label for free use.

attribute.name: tac
attribute.description: Tracking Area Code for the EUtran Cell. All cells within an eNodeB must have equal tac values. If tac needs to be changed, then the change must be performed on all cells in the eNodeB within a transaction.

attribute.name: bPlmnList
attribute.description:
The Public Land Mobile Network (PLMN) ID of the cell.
The PLMN ID consists of:
1. MobileCountryCode, MCC, 3 digits 2. MobileNetworkCode, MNC, 2 or 3 digits (the correct number of digits is set in the mncLength member of this Struct)
Example: If MCC=125 and MNC=46, then plmnId=12546.
attribute.deprecated: Since L11A. Replaced by: ENodeBFunction::eNodeBPlmnId and additionalPlmnList

attribute.name: partOfRadioPower
attribute.description:
The requested part of the total radio power in the Sector that should be allocated for the cell. The output power is evenly distributed over the antenna connectors used for TX transmission that are allocated for the cell.
If the total amount of power per antenna connector is over 100% when the cell is unlocked, an alarm will be generated.
attribute.deprecated: Replaced by partOfSectorPower. Since L11B.

attribute.name: maximumTransmissionPower
attribute.description:
Maximum possible power at the antenna reference point, for all downlink channels in all TX branches used simultaneously in the cell.
-1 is used as an undefined value.
Note: Setting partOfSectorPower or confOutputPower (MO SectorEquipmentFunction) has an impact on this attribute. See Radio Network Configuration user guide 11/1553-HSC 105 50/1.
attribute.deprecated: Since L13A. Planned to be removed. Replaced by SectorCarrier::MaximumTransmissionPower. The value from the first SectorCarrier in the EUtranCellFDD/EUtranCellTDD::sectorCarrierRef will be mapped to this deprecated attribute.

attribute.name: noOfUsedTxAntennas
attribute.description: The number of used receive antennas. The value -1 indicates that the number of used antennas is undefined. The maximum number of this parameter is determined by the parameter noOfTxAntennas.
attribute.deprecated: Since L13A. Planned to be removed. Replaced by SectorCarrier::noOfUsedTxAntennas.The value from the first SectorCarrier in the EUtranCellFDD/EUtranCellTDD::sectorCarrierRef will be mapped to this deprecated attribute.

attribute.name: drxActive
attribute.description: Indicates if the DRX function in the cell is activated.

attribute.name: networkSignallingValue
attribute.description: Enables additional spectrum emission requirements according to 3GPP TS 36.101, table 6.2.4-1.

attribute.name: initCdma2000SysTimeType
attribute.description: Intended type of CDMA2000 system time to broadcast in SIB8, if applicable.

attribute.name: bcCdma2000SysTimeType
attribute.description: The actual type of CDMA2000 system time that is broadcast in SIB8.

attribute.name: pucchOverdimensioning
attribute.description:
Number of resource blocks outside each Physical Uplink Control Channel (PUCCH) region that are available for scheduling Physical Uplink Shared Channel (PUSCH).
Limited to moving the Physical Random Access Channel (PRACH) frequency allocation (located just after the PUCCH) up to the 5 MHz border at most. The PRACH can never be located at Physical Resource Block (PRB) index 25 and above.

attribute.name: pmMacHarqUlDtx
attribute.description: The total number of occasions when an uplink grant was meant for HARQ transmission in the uplink direction, where DTX is considered the reason for no receiption of HARQ in uplink in the eNB.
attribute.deprecated: Since L10B. Has no functional behaviour.
attribute.condition: Continuous measurement for UEs aggregated to cell level.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmMacHarqDlDtx
attribute.description: The total number of occasions when an downlink HARQ feedback was not received from an UE and DTX is considered the reason.
attribute.deprecated: Since L10B. Has no functional behaviour.
attribute.condition: Continuous measurement for UEs aggregated to cell level.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmMacHarqDlAckQpsk
attribute.description: The total number of successful HARQ transmissions in the downlink direction using a QPSK modulation.
attribute.condition: To decide if it was successful is based on the HARQ ACK from the UE.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmMacHarqUlSuccQpsk
attribute.description: The total number of successful HARQ transmissions in the uplink direction using a QPSK modulation.
attribute.condition: To decide if it was successful is based on the CRC check, not based on if RBS sends HARQ ACK (RBS can use the ACK even if the transport block was not succesfully decoded in a way to control the HARQ).
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmMacHarqDlNackQpsk
attribute.description: The total number of unsuccessful HARQ transmissions in the downlink direction using a QPSK modulation.
attribute.condition: To decide if it was failed is based on the HARQ NACK from the UE.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmMacHarqUlFailQpsk
attribute.description: The total number of unsuccessful HARQ transmissions in the uplink direction using a QPSK modulation.
attribute.condition: To decide if it was failed is based on the CRC check for recieved transport blocks (which results in NACK).
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmMacHarqDlAck16qam
attribute.description: The total number of successful HARQ transmissions in the downlink direction using a 16QAM modulation.
attribute.condition: To decide if it was successful is based on the HARQ ACK from the UE.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmMacHarqUlSucc16qam
attribute.description: The total number of successful HARQ transmissions in the uplink direction using a 16QAM modulation.
attribute.condition: To decide if it was successful is based on the CRC check, not based on if RBS sends HARQ ACK (RBS can use the ACK even if the transport block was not succesfully decoded in a way to control the HARQ).
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmMacHarqDlNack16qam
attribute.description: The total number of unsuccessful HARQ transmissions in the downlink direction using a 16QAM modulation.
attribute.condition: To decide if it was failed is based on the HARQ NACK from the UE.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmMacHarqUlFail16qam
attribute.description: The total number of unsuccessful HARQ transmissions in the uplink direction using a 16QAM modulation.
attribute.condition: To decide if it was failed is based on the CRC check for recieved transport blocks (which results in NACK).
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmMacHarqDlAck64qam
attribute.description: The total number of successful HARQ transmissions in the downlink direction using a 64QAM modulation.
attribute.condition: To decide if it was successful is based on the HARQ ACK from the UE.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmMacHarqDlNack64qam
attribute.description: The total number of unsuccessful HARQ transmissions in the downlink direction using a 64QAM modulation.
attribute.condition: To decide if it was failed is based on the HARQ NACK from the UE.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmMacDelayTimeDl
attribute.description: Aggregated time for the downlink MAC delay measure. The time for each sample shall show the time between reception from RLC until it is successfully received in the UE or HARQ failure occurs.
attribute.condition: Continuous measurement for UEs aggregated to cell level.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmRlcDelayPktTransDl
attribute.description: Number of samples for RLC delay measurements.
attribute.condition: Continuous measurement for UEs aggregated to cell level.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmRlcDelayTimeDl
attribute.description: Aggregated time for the downlink RLC delay measure.
attribute.condition: The time for each sample shall show the time between reception of a PDCP SDU until it is scheduled and sent to the MAC layer for transmission over the air. Only applicable to DRB packets
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmRrcConnMax
attribute.description: Peak number of UE in RRC_CONNECTED mode.
attribute.condition: This counter is based on an internal level counter maintained by eNB. The internal level counter maintains the current number of UEs in RRC_CONNECTED mode. pmRrcConnMax is updated at end of ROP with the max value during the ROP period.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmRrcConnLevSum
attribute.description: Sum of all sample values recorded for "number of UEs in RRC_CONNECTED mode".
attribute.condition: This counter is based on an internal level counter maintaining the current number of UEs in RRC_CONNECTED mode. Values are read periodically and accumulated.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmRrcConnLevSamp
attribute.description: Number of times the corresponding Sum counter has been incremented. Associated ACC pmCounter pmRrcConnLevSum.
attribute.condition: The counter is increased at every occasion when the corresponding sum counter is increased.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: qRxLevMinOffset
attribute.description: The offset applied to the signalled Qrxlevmin. Corresponds to parameter Qrxlevminoffset in 3GPP TS 36.304. Value 1000 means it is not sent and the UE sets Qrxlevminoffset=0dB.

attribute.name: pmUeCtxtRelSCEUtra
attribute.description: The number of RRC Connection Release with redirect to E-Utra.
attribute.condition: A RRC Connection Release with redirect information to E-Utra.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmMacHarqDlDtxQpsk
attribute.description: The total number of occasions when an downlink HARQ feedback for a transport block using QPSK modulation was not received from an UE and DTX is considered the reason.
attribute.condition: To decide if it was DTX is based on not receiving any HARQ feedback on a transport block sent using QPSK modulation.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmMacHarqDlDtx16qam
attribute.description: The total number of occasions when an downlink HARQ feedback for a transport block using 16QAM modulation was not received from an UE and DTX is considered the reason.
attribute.condition: To decide if it was DTX is based on not receiving any HARQ feedback on a transport block sent using 16QAM modulation.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmMacHarqDlDtx64qam
attribute.description: The total number of occasions when an downlink HARQ feedback for a transport block using 64QAM modulation was not received from an UE and DTX is considered the reason.
attribute.condition: To decide if it was DTX is based on not receiving any HARQ feedback on a transport block sent using 64QAM modulation.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmMacHarqUlDtxQpsk
attribute.description: The total number of occasions when an uplink grant was meant for HARQ transmission of a transport block using QPSK modulation in the uplink direction, where DTX is considered the reason for no receiption of HARQ in uplink in the eNB.
attribute.condition: To decide if it was DTX is based on not receiving a granted uplink transmission using QPSK modulation.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmMacHarqUlDtx16qam
attribute.description: The total number of occasions when an uplink grant was meant for HARQ transmission of a transport block using 16QAM modulation in the uplink direction, where DTX is considered the reason for no receiption of HARQ in uplink in the eNB.
attribute.condition: To decide if it was DTX is based on not receiving a granted uplink transmission using 16QAM modulation.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmErabRelNormalEnbAct
attribute.description: The total number of normal E-RAB Releases per cell initiated by the eNB and that there was data in either the UL or DL buffer (i.e. active).
attribute.condition: If there was data in the buffer at the time of release, then stepped at reception of S1 message E-RAB Release Command or UE Context Release Command when internal cause codes considered normal (User Inactivity, Inter-RAT redirection, CS Fallback Triggered) when the RBS initiated the release. In the UL case when a UE has multiple bearers co-existing and sharing the same LCG, the bearers share a single packet queue. If one of the bearers is released and there is data in the queue, the bearer's associated counter is incremented, regardless of whether or not the data belongs to the released bearer.
attribute.scanner: Primary

attribute.name: pmUeCtxtRelNormalEnbAct
attribute.description: The total number of normal UE Context Releases triggered by RBS and that there was data in either the UL or DL buffer (i.e. active).
attribute.condition: If there was data in the buffer at the time of release, then stepped at reception of S1 message UE Context Release Command when internal cause codes considered normal (Successful Handover, User Inactivity, Inter-RAT redirection, CS Fallback Triggered) when the RBS initiated the release.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: estimatedE2ERTT
attribute.description: The estimated end to end round trip time used by Active Queue Management (AQM).

attribute.name: useESST
attribute.description: Use Early Slow Start Termination algorithm in Active Queue Management (AQM).

attribute.name: pmPrbUsedDlPcch
attribute.description: The total number of Physical Resource Block (PRB) pairs used for paging.
attribute.condition: This measurement is applicable to the Paging Control Channel (PCCH) on the Physical Downlink Shared Channel (PDSCH).
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmPrbUsedDlBcch
attribute.description: The total number of Physical Resource Block (PRB) pairs used for System Information.
attribute.condition: This measurement is applicable to the Broadcast Control Channel (BCCH) on the Physical Downlink Shared Channel (PDSCH).
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmPrbUsedUlDtch
attribute.description: The total number of Physical Resource Block (PRB) pairs used for Data Radio Bearers (DRB) in the uplink.
attribute.condition: This measurement is applicable to the Dedicated Traffic Channel (DTCH) on the Physical Uplink Shared Channel (PUSCH).
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmPrbUsedDlDtch
attribute.description: The total number of Physical Resource Block (PRB) pairs used for Data Radio Bearers (DRB) in the downlink.
attribute.condition: This measurement is applicable to the Dedicated Traffic Channel (DTCH) on the Physical Downlink Shared Channel (PDSCH).
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmPrbUtilUl
attribute.description:
A distribution that shows the uplink Physical Resource Block (PRB) pair utilization (total number of used PRB pairs by available PRB pairs) on the Physical Uplink Shared Channel (PUSCH).
PDF ranges: [0]: 0 % <= Utilization < 10 % [1]: 10 % <= Utilization < 20 % [2]: 20 % <= Utilization < 30 % [3]: 30 % <= Utilization < 40 % [4]: 40 % <= Utilization < 50 % [5]: 50 % <= Utilization < 60 % [6]: 60 % <= Utilization < 70 % [7]: 70 % <= Utilization < 80 % [8]: 80 % <= Utilization < 90 % [9]: 90 % <= Utilization
attribute.condition: One sample should be the utilization during the sample gathering period.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmPrbUtilDl
attribute.description:
A distribution that shows the downlink Physical Resource Block (PRB) pair utilization (total number of used PRB pairs by available PRB pairs) on the Physical Downlink Shared Channel (PDSCH).
PDF ranges: [0]: 0 % <= Utilization < 10 % [1]: 10 % <= Utilization < 20 % [2]: 20 % <= Utilization < 30 % [3]: 30 % <= Utilization < 40 % [4]: 40 % <= Utilization < 50 % [5]: 50 % <= Utilization < 60 % [6]: 60 % <= Utilization < 70 % [7]: 70 % <= Utilization < 80 % [8]: 80 % <= Utilization < 90 % [9]: 90 % <= Utilization
attribute.condition: One sample should be the utilization during the sample gathering period.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: agpsSuplActive
attribute.description: Indicates if the feature A-GPS Support in SUPL Environment is ACTIVATED or DEACTIVATED in the cell.
attribute.deprecated: Since L11B. Planned to be removed.
attribute.dependencies: None

attribute.name: otdoaSuplActive
