parameter.name: earfcn
parameter.description: Return type: sequence of struct performedOperation Changes the frequency of the external cell. This means it should change the value of the attribute eutranFrequencyRef to refer to the correct EUtranFrequency MO (creating it if necessary). It also includes moving the EUtranCellRelation MO:s to the corresponding EUtranFrequencyRelation MO. Returns a list of performed operations.

parameter.name: earfcn
parameter.description: Changes the frequency of the external cell. This means it should change the value of the attribute eutranFrequencyRef to refer to the correct EUtranFrequency MO (creating it if necessary). It also includes moving the EUtranCellRelation MO:s to the corresponding EUtranFrequencyRelation MO.

class.name: AirIfLoadProfile
class.description: Contains parameters and constraints for Air Interface Load Generator needed to start the function in a Cell.

attribute.name: reservedBy
attribute.description: Contains a list of managed object instances that reserves this managed object instance.
attribute.dependencies: The MO may not be deleted if it is reserved.

attribute.name: userLabel
attribute.description: Label for free use

attribute.name: AirIfLoadProfileId
attribute.description: The value component of the (Relative Distinguished Name) RDN

attribute.name: dlPrbLoadLevel
attribute.description:
Minimal load level associated with downlink Physical Resource Block (PRB) use.
If the sum of higher priority artificial load defined according to ailgHighPrio and real UE is below this level, lower priority artificial load is generated to reach the minimal load level.
0 means that no minimal load level is defined

attribute.name: ailgLowPrioModType
attribute.description: Supported modulation type for lower priority artificial load.

attribute.name: noOfOcngPrbSeries
attribute.description: The number of series (where each series is defined in ocngPrbSerie) to be allocated for the OFDMA Channel Noise Generator (OCNG) pattern, as defined in 3GPP TS 36.133.
attribute.dependencies: Valid if ailgHighPrio = OCNG

attribute.name: ocngPrbSerie
attribute.description: Contains the attributes required to configure the OFDMA Channel Noise Generator (OCNG) Frequency Division Duplex (FDD) pattern to use for filling the Physical Resource Blocks (PRBs), according to 3GPP TS 36.133.
attribute.dependencies: Valid if ailgHighPrio = OCNG

attribute.name: trafficModelPrb
attribute.description: Contains the attributes required to configure a traffic model pattern to use for filling the Physical Resource Blocks (PRBs).
attribute.dependencies: Valid if ailgHighPrio = TRAFFIC_MODEL

attribute.name: ailgHighPrio
attribute.description: The method used to generate high priority artificial load.

attribute.name: zzzTemporary1
attribute.description: Temporary attributes are intended for temporary solutions, and their usage may vary depending on the installed software. It is strongly recommended to only set the attributes that correspond to a desired functionality and leave all other temporary attributes set to default value. attribute.name: ailgChangePeriod
attribute.description: The pattern for generated artificial load changes periodically after each ailgChangePeriod. The period applies to both PDSCH and PDCCH artificial load. Within each period the same load pattern in terms of positions of PDSCH PRBs and/or PDCCH CCEs within the available bandwidth is used.

attribute.name: minLoadLevelPdcch
attribute.description:
Minimum load level for PDCCH in terms of utilisation of the available Control Channel Elements (CCE). If the PDCCH load from real UE is below this level, lower priority artificial load is generated to reach this minimum load level.
The value "0" means that no minimum load level is defined

attribute.name: ailgLoadType
attribute.description: Decides the type of load to be generated by means of different combinations of PDSCH load, Beam Forming (BF) and PDCCH load.

class.name: ReportConfigA1Prim
class.description: This managed object contains report configuration settings for the primary A1 event measurements. The A1 event is used to detect the Bad Coverage Cease condition. Primary and secondary reporting configuration MOs refer to the option to use different settings for two simultaneous measurements for the event A1.

attribute.name: ReportConfigA1PrimId
attribute.description: The value component of the Relative Distinguished Name (RDN).

attribute.name: a1ThresholdRsrpPrim
attribute.description: The Reference Signal Received Power (RSRP) threshold value for the primary eventA1.
attribute.dependencies: Only used if triggerQuantityA2Prim is set to RSRP.

attribute.name: a1ThresholdRsrqPrim
attribute.description: The Reference Signal Received Quality (RSRQ) threshold value for the primary eventA1.
attribute.dependencies: Only used if triggerQuantityA2Prim is set to RSRQ.

attribute.name: hysteresisA1Prim
attribute.description: The hysteresis value for the primary eventA1 measurement.

attribute.name: timeToTriggerA1Prim
attribute.description: The time-to-trigger value for the primary eventA1 measurement.

attribute.name: reportQuantityA1Prim
attribute.description: The quantities to include in the measurement report for the primary eventA1 measurement. The value 0 - sameAsTriggerQuantity means that the same quantity as triggerQuantity is included in the measurement report. The value 1 – BOTH means that both Reference Signal Received Power (RSRP) and Reference Signal Received Quality (RSRQ) quantities are included in the measurement report.
attribute.deprecated: Since L11B. Has no functional behaviour. Planned to be removed.

attribute.name: reportIntervalA1Prim
attribute.description: The interval for event-triggered periodical reporting for the primary eventA1 measurement.

attribute.name: reportAmountA1Prim
attribute.description: The number of reports for periodical reporting for the primary eventA1 measurement . Value 0 means that reports are sent as long as the event is fulfilled.

class.name: ReportConfigA1Sec
class.description: This managed object contains report configuration settings for the secondary A1 event measurements. The A1 event is used to the detect traffic-related Bad Coverage Cease condition. Primary and secondary reporting configuration MOs refer to the option to use different settings for two simultaneous measurements for the event A1.

attribute.name: ReportConfigA1SecId
attribute.description: The value component of the Relative Distinguished Name (RDN).

attribute.name: a1ThresholdRsrpSec
attribute.description: The Reference Signal Received Power (RSRP) threshold value for the secondary eventA1.
attribute.dependencies: Only used if triggerQuantityA2Sec is set to RSRP.

attribute.name: a1ThresholdRsrqSec
attribute.description: The Reference Signal Received Quality (RSRQ) threshold value for the secondary eventA1.
attribute.dependencies: Only used if triggerQuantityA2Sec is set to RSRQ.

attribute.name: hysteresisA1Sec
attribute.description: The hysteresis value for the secondary eventA1 measurement.

attribute.name: timeToTriggerA1Sec
attribute.description: The time-to-trigger value for the secondary eventA1 measurement.

attribute.name: reportQuantityA1Sec
attribute.description: The quantities to include in the measurement report for the secondary eventA1 measurement. The value 0 - sameAsTriggerQuantity means that the same quantity as triggerQuantity is included in the measurement report. The value 1 – BOTH means that both Reference Signal Received Power (RSRP) and Reference Signal Received Quality (RSRQ) quantities are included in the measurement report.
attribute.deprecated: Since L11B. Has no functional behaviour. Planned to be removed.

attribute.name: reportIntervalA1Sec
attribute.description: The interval for event-triggered periodical reporting for the secondary eventA1 measurement.

attribute.name: reportAmountA1Sec
attribute.description: The number of reports for periodical reporting for the secondary eventA1 measurement . Value 0 means that reports are sent as long as the event is fulfilled.

class.name: ReportConfigA5
class.description: This managed object contains report configuration settings for the A5 event measurements. The A5 event is used to detect when serving cell becomes worse than threshold1, and neighbor cell becomes better than threshold2.

attribute.name: ReportConfigA5Id
attribute.description: The value component of the Relative Distinguished Name (RDN).

attribute.name: a5Threshold1Rsrp
attribute.description: The Reference Signal Received Power (RSRP) threshold1 value for eventA5.
attribute.dependencies: Only used if triggerQuantityA5 is set to RSRP.

attribute.name: a5Threshold2Rsrp
attribute.description: The Reference Signal Received Power (RSRP) threshold2 value for eventA5.
attribute.dependencies: Only used if triggerQuantityA5 is set to RSRP.

attribute.name: a5Threshold1Rsrq
attribute.description: The Reference Signal Received Quality (RSRQ) threshold1 value for eventA5.
attribute.dependencies: Only used if triggerQuantityA5 is set to RSRQ.

attribute.name: a5Threshold2Rsrq
attribute.description: The Reference Signal Received Quality (RSRQ) threshold2 value for eventA5.
attribute.dependencies: Only used if triggerQuantityA5 is set to RSRQ.

attribute.name: hysteresisA5
attribute.description: The hysteresis value for the eventA5 measurement.

attribute.name: timeToTriggerA5
attribute.description: The time-to-trigger value for eventA5. This attribute is modified by SON function HoOscCtrlRel.
attribute.dependencies: Read only if the license for Automatic HO Control on Relation Level is present and the feature is active.

attribute.name: triggerQuantityA5
attribute.description: The quantity that triggers the eventA5 for the eventA5 measurement.

attribute.name: reportQuantityA5
attribute.description: The quantities to include in the measurement report for the eventA5 measurement. The value 0 - sameAsTriggerQuantity means that the same quantity as triggerQuantity is included in the measurement report. The value 1 – BOTH means that both Reference Signal Received Power (RSRP) and Reference Signal Received Quality (RSRQ) quantities are included in the measurement report.
attribute.deprecated: Since L13A. Planned to be removed.

attribute.name: maxReportCellsA5
attribute.description: Maximum number of cells to include in the measurement report for the eventA5 measurement.

attribute.name: reportIntervalA5
attribute.description: The interval for event-triggered periodical reporting for the eventA5 measurement.

attribute.name: reportAmountA5
attribute.description: The number of reports for periodical reporting for the eventA5 measurement . Value 0 means that reports are sent as long as the event is fulfilled.

class.name: ReportConfigB2Utra
class.description: This managed object contains report configuration settings for the B2 event for UTRA measurements. The B2 event is used to detect when a UTRAN cell becomes better than threshold2, and serving cell becomes worse than threshold1.

attribute.name: ReportConfigB2UtraId
attribute.description: The value component of the Relative Distinguished Name (RDN).

attribute.name: b2Threshold1Rsrp
attribute.description: The Reference Signal Received Power (RSRP) threshold1 value for eventB2.
attribute.dependencies: Only used if triggerQuantityB2 is set to RSRP.

attribute.name: b2Threshold1Rsrq
attribute.description: The Reference Signal Received Quality (RSRQ) in the threshold1 value for eventB2.
attribute.dependencies: Only used if triggerQuantityB2 is set to RSRQ.

attribute.name: b2Threshold2RscpUtra
attribute.description: Received Signal Code Power in the ThresholdUTRA, threshold2 value for eventB2.
attribute.dependencies: Used when measQuantityUtraFDD is set to RSCP. Also present for UTRA TDD.

attribute.name: b2Threshold2EcNoUtra
attribute.description: Ratio of energy per modulation bit to noise spectral density in the ThresholdUTRA, threshold2 value for eventB2. Not applicable for UTRA TDD.
attribute.dependencies: Only used when measQuantityUtraFDD is set to ECNO

attribute.name: hysteresisB2
attribute.description: The hysteresis value for the eventB2 measurement

attribute.name: timeToTriggerB2
attribute.description: The time to trigger value for the eventB2 measurement.

attribute.name: triggerQuantityB2
attribute.description: The quantity for threshold1 (serving EUTRAN cell) that is sent to the UE, and is used together with threshold2 to trigger the eventB2.

attribute.name: triggerQuantityUtraB2
attribute.description: The quantity for threshold2 (neighbor UTRA cell) that is sent to the UE, and is used by the UE together with threshold1 to trigger the eventB2.
attribute.deprecated: Since L11B. Has no functional behaviour. Planned to be removed.

attribute.name: maxReportCellsB2
attribute.description: Maximum number of cells to include in the measurement report for the eventB2 measurement.

attribute.name: reportIntervalB2
attribute.description: The interval for event triggered periodical reporting for the eventB2 measurement.

attribute.name: reportAmountB2
attribute.description: The number of reports for periodical reporting for the eventB2 measurement . Value 0 means that reports are sent as long as the event is fulfilled.

class.name: ReportConfigB2Geran
class.description: This managed object contains report configuration settings for the B2 event for GERAN measurements. The B2 event is used to detect when a GERAN cell becomes better than threshold2, and serving cell becomes worse than threshold1.

attribute.name: ReportConfigB2GeranId
attribute.description: The value component of the Relative Distinguished Name (RDN).

attribute.name: b2Threshold1Rsrp
attribute.description: The Reference Signal Received Power (RSRP) threshold1 value for eventB2.
attribute.dependencies: Only used if triggerQuantityB2 is set to RSRP.

attribute.name: b2Threshold1Rsrq
attribute.description: The Reference Signal Received Quality (RSRQ) threshold1 value for eventB2.
attribute.dependencies: Only used if triggerQuantityB2 is set to RSRQ.

attribute.name: b2Threshold2Geran
attribute.description: The Signal Quality in the ThresholdGERAN, threshold2 value for eventB2.

attribute.name: hysteresisB2
attribute.description: The hysteresis value for the eventB2 measurement

attribute.name: timeToTriggerB2
attribute.description: The time to trigger value for the eventB2 measurement.

attribute.name: triggerQuantityB2
attribute.description: The quantity for threshold1 (serving EUTRAN cell) that is sent to the UE, and is used together with threshold2 to trigger the eventB2.

attribute.name: maxReportCellsB2
attribute.description: Maximum number of cells to include in the measurement report for the eventB2 measurement.

attribute.name: reportIntervalB2
attribute.description: The interval for event triggered periodical reporting for the eventB2 measurement.

attribute.name: reportAmountB2
attribute.description: The number of reports for periodical reporting for the eventB2 measurement . Value 0 means that reports are sent as long as the event is fulfilled.

class.name: ReportConfigB2Cdma2000
class.description: This managed object contains report configuration settings for the B2 event for CDMA2000 measurements. The B2 event is used to detect when a CDMA2000 cell becomes better than threshold2, and serving cell becomes worse than threshold1.

attribute.name: ReportConfigB2Cdma2000Id
attribute.description: The value component of the Relative Distinguished Name (RDN).

attribute.name: b2Threshold1Rsrp
attribute.description: The Reference Signal Received Power (RSRP) threshold1 value for eventB2.
attribute.dependencies: Only used if triggerQuantityB2 is set to RSRP.

attribute.name: b2Threshold1Rsrq
attribute.description: The Reference Signal Received Quality (RSRQ) threshold1 value for eventB2.
attribute.dependencies: Only used if triggerQuantityB2 is set to RSRQ.

attribute.name: b2Threshold2Cdma2000
attribute.description: The Signal Quality in the thresholdCDMA2000, threshold2 value for eventB2.

attribute.name: hysteresisB2
attribute.description: The hysteresis value for the eventB2 measurement

attribute.name: timeToTriggerB2
attribute.description: The time to trigger value for the eventB2 measurement.

attribute.name: triggerQuantityB2
attribute.description: The quantity for threshold1 (serving EUTRAN cell) that is sent to the UE, and is used together with threshold2 to trigger the eventB2.

attribute.name: maxReportCellsB2
attribute.description: Maximum number of cells to include in the measurement report for the eventB2 measurement.

attribute.name: reportIntervalB2
attribute.description: The interval for event triggered periodical reporting for the eventB2 measurement.

attribute.name: reportAmountB2
attribute.description: The number of reports for periodical reporting for the eventB2 measurement . Value 0 means that reports are sent as long as the event is fulfilled.

class.name: Cdma2000FreqRelation
class.description:
This Managed Object represents a mobility relation between a EUtranCellFDD or an EUtranCellTDD and a CDMA2000Frequency. It contains parameters that are specific for this relation.
Deleting this MO while the parent EUtranCellFDD/EUtranCellTDD has operationalState set to ENABLED is not recommended as it may affect traffic.

attribute.name: Cdma2000FreqRelationId
attribute.description: The value component of the Relative Distinguished Name (RDN).

attribute.name: userLabel
attribute.description: Label for free use.

attribute.name: connectedModeMobilityPrio
attribute.description: Prioritizes CDMA2000 frequencies among all frequencies related to the cell for UEs in connected mode. (0 means the lowest priority. -1 means the frequency is excluded.)

attribute.name: qOffsetFreq
attribute.description: Indicates a frequency-specific offset to apply when evaluating triggering conditions for measurement reporting.

attribute.name: cdma2000FreqRef
attribute.description: Reference to the Cdma2000Freq MO

class.name: ReportConfigA5Anr
class.description: The Automated Neighbor Relations (ANR) delta report configuration settings for the A5 event measurements as compared to mobility provided in the parent MO class.

attribute.name: ReportConfigA5AnrId
attribute.description: The value component of the Relative Distinguished Name (RDN).

attribute.name: a5Threshold1RsrpAnrDelta
attribute.description: This parameter together with a5Threshold1Rsrp specifies "The Reference Signal Received Power (RSRP) threshold1 value for eventA5." . The equation for calculating the RSRP threshold1 value for ANR is a5Threshold1Rsrp + a5Threshold1RsrpAnrDelta . Only used if triggerQuantityA5 onReportConfigA5 MO is set to RSRP.
attribute.dependencies: Not pure dependence towards parameter on ReportConficA5 Mo, but there should be a check that this attribute and corresponding attribute on ReportConfigA5 MO together sends out a valid number to the UE

attribute.name: a5Threshold2RsrpAnrDelta
attribute.description: This parameter together with a5Threshold2Rsrp specifies "The Reference Signal Received Power (RSRP) threshold2 value for eventA5." . The equation for calculating the RSRP threshold2 value for ANR is a5Threshold2Rsrp - a5Threshold2RsrpAnrDelta . Only used if triggerQuantityA5 onReportConfigA5 MO is set to RSRP.
attribute.dependencies: Not pure dependence towards parameter on ReportConficA5 Mo, but there should be a check that this attribute and corresponding attribute on ReportConfigA5 MO together sends out a valid number to the UE

attribute.name: a5Threshold1RsrqAnrDelta
attribute.description: This parameter together with a5Threshold1Rsrq specifies "The Reference Signal Received Quality (RSRQ) threshold1 value for eventA5." . The equation for calculating the RSRQ threshold1 value for ANR is a5Threshold1Rsrq + a5Threshold1RsrqAnrDelta . Only used if triggerQuantityA5 onReportConfigA5 MO is set to RSRQ.
attribute.dependencies: Not pure dependence towards parameter on ReportConficA5 Mo, but there should be a check that this attribute and corresponding attribute on ReportConfigA5 MO together sends out a valid number to the UE

attribute.name: a5Threshold2RsrqAnrDelta
attribute.description: This parameter together with a5Threshold2Rsrq specifies "The Reference Signal Received Quality (RSRQ) threshold2 value for eventA5." . The equation for calculating the RSRQ threshold2 value for ANR is a5Threshold2Rsrq -a5Threshold2RsrqAnrDelta . Only used if triggerQuantityA5 onReportConfigA5 MO is set to RSRQ.
attribute.dependencies: Not pure dependence towards parameter on ReportConficA5 Mo, but there should be a check that this attribute and corresponding attribute on ReportConfigA5 MO together sends out a valid number to the UE

attribute.name: timeToTriggerA5
attribute.description: The time-to-trigger value for the eventA5 measurement.

attribute.name: hysteresisA5
attribute.description: The hysteresis value for the eventA5 measurement.

class.name: ReportConfigEUtraBestCellAnr
class.description: The ANR delta report configuration settings for the A3 event measurements as compared to mobility provided in the parent MO class.

attribute.name: a3offsetAnrDelta
attribute.description: The offset value for eventA3. Dependent on triggerQuantityA3 on MO ReportConfigEUtraBestCell and is a delta towards a3offset on triggerQuantityA3, The a3offset used in the ANR measure is calculated as a3offset (on ReportConfigEUtraBestCell) - a3offset AnrDelta
attribute.dependencies: Not pure dependence towards parameter on ReportConfigEUtraBestCell Mo, but there should be a check that this attribute and corresponding attribute on ReportConfigEUtraBestCell MO together sends out a valid number to the UE

attribute.name: hysteresisA3
attribute.description: The hysteresis value for eventA3.

attribute.name: ReportConfigEUtraBestCellAnrId
attribute.description: The value component of the Relative Distinguished Name (RDN).

attribute.name: timeToTriggerA3
attribute.description: The time to trigger value for eventA3.

class.name: AdmissionControl
class.description: Contains parameters for the admission control function.

attribute.name: paArpOverride
attribute.description:
The eNB interprets Allocation Retention Priority Levels, received from the Core Network, between 1 and paArpOverride (inclusive) as Privileged Access.
The value zero will disable Privileged Access ARP override.

attribute.name: ulNonGbrRatio
attribute.description:
This parameter sets the wanted uplink resource utilization ratio of Non-GBR bearers, e.g. for Mobile Broadband users, on transport network. The value given in this parameter specifies the Non-GBR part of the total bandwidth and the remaining part (1000 -ulNonGbrRatio) sets the GBR part of the total bandwidth. The parameter will be used by the Admission Control to balance GBR and Non-GBR use of resources.
Unit: 0.001
attribute.dependencies: The uplink transport network bandwidth for LTE needs to be configured into attribute AdmissionControl::ulTransNwBandwidth.

attribute.name: dlNonGbrRatio
attribute.description:
This parameter sets the wanted downlink resource utilization ratio of Non-GBR bearers, e.g. for Mobile Broadband users, on transport network. The value given in this parameter specifies the Non-GBR part of the total bandwidth and the remaining part (1000-dlNonGbrRatio) sets the GBR part of the total bandwidth. The parameter will be used by the Admission Control to balance GBR and Non-GBR use of resources.
Unit: 0.001
attribute.dependencies: The downlink transport network bandwidth for LTE needs to be configured into attribute AdmissionControl::dlTransNwBandwidth.

attribute.name: AdmissionControlId
attribute.description: The value component of the Relative Distinguished Name (RDN).

attribute.name: emergencyArpLimit
attribute.description: ARP (Allocation Retention Priority) value limit used for identifying ARP values that are considered to be part of the emergency (high priority) group. This limit value and all values below are considered to be of high priority. The value zero is introduced to turn off ARP handling.
attribute.deprecated: Since L11B. Has no functional behavior, planned to be removed.

attribute.name: nrOfBearersReserved
attribute.description: Number of bearers reserved for high priority group (bearers with low ARP values, Allocation Retention Priority values). Setting a high value for the reservation means low priority bearers will always be rejected.
attribute.deprecated: Since L11B. Has no functional behavior, planned to be removed.

attribute.name: nrOfRrcConnectedReserved
attribute.description: Number of RRC connections reserved for high priority UEs (handovers and where establishment cause is emergency). Setting a high value means non emergency UEs will always be rejected.
attribute.deprecated: Since L11B. Has no functional behavior, planned to be removed.

attribute.name: dlGbrAdmThresh
attribute.description: Admission threshold for load due to Guaranteed Bit Rate (GBR) bearers in the downlink, expressed as a fraction of the available resources.
attribute.deprecated: Replaced by dlNonGbrRatio. Since L11B.
attribute.dependencies: The downlink transport network bandwidth for LTE needs to be configured into attribute AdmissionControl::dlTransNwBandwidth.

attribute.name: dlTransNwBandwidth
attribute.description: Downlink transport network bandwidth for LTE.

attribute.name: ulGbrAdmThresh
attribute.description: Admission threshold for load due to Guaranteed Bit Rate (GBR) bearers in the uplink, expressed as a fraction of the available resources.
attribute.deprecated: Replaced by ulNonGbrRatio. Since L11B.
attribute.dependencies: The uplink transport network bandwidth for LTE needs to be configured into attribute AdmissionControl::ulTransNwBandwidth.

attribute.name: ulTransNwBandwidth
attribute.description: Uplink transport network bandwidth for LTE.

attribute.name: arpBasedPreEmptionState
attribute.description: Activates or deactivates the Allocation and Retention Priority (ARP) based pre-emption function. The value of the attribute is irrelevant when no valid license key is installed for the Differentiated Admission Control feature.

attribute.name: resourceReservationForPAState
attribute.description: Activates or deactivates the Resource Reservation for Priviliged Access.

attribute.name: zzzTemporary1
attribute.description: Temporary attributes are intended for temporary solutions, and their usage may vary depending on the installed software. It is strongly recommended to only set the attributes that correspond to a desired functionality and leave all other temporary attributes set to default value. Information in the descriptions about what attributes are in use may be overridden by the information in CPI Info documents. Note that a later release may use another attribute to control the functionality previously provided by a temporary attribute, or may remove the functionality altogether. In these cases, the change is documented in the NIR.

Temporary attributes are intended for temporary solutions, and their usage may vary depending on the installed software. It is strongly recommended to only set the attributes that correspond to a desired functionality and leave all other temporary attributes set to default value. Information in the descriptions about what attributes are in use may be overridden by the information in CPI Info documents. Note that a later release may use another attribute to control the functionality previously provided by a temporary attribute, or may remove the functionality altogether. In these cases, the change is documented in the NIR.
Unit: 0.001

attribute.name: dlMbmsGrbRatio
attribute.description: This parameter sets the wanted downlink resource utilization ratio of Mbmb-GBR bearers on transport network. The value given in this parameter specifies the Mbms-GBR part of the total bandwidth and the remaining part (1-dlNonGbrRatio-dlMbmsGrbRatio) sets the non-MBMS GBR part of the total bandwidth. The parameter will be used by the Admission Control to balance GBR, Mbms-GRB and Non-GBR use of resources.
attribute.deprecated: Since L13A. Replaced by AdmissionControl::dlMbmsGbrRatio.
attribute.dependencies: The downlink transport network bandwidth for LTE needs to be configured into attribute AdmissionControl::dlTransNwBandwidth.

attribute.name: dlMbmsGbrRatio
attribute.description:
This parameter sets the wanted downlink resource utilization ratio of Mbms-Gbr bearers on transport network. The value given in this parameter specifies the Mbms-Gbr part of the total bandwidth. The parameter will be used by the Admission Control to balance Gbr, Mbms-Gbr and Non-Gbr use of resources.
Unit: 0.001
attribute.dependencies: The downlink transport network bandwidth for LTE needs to be configured into attribute AdmissionControl::dlTransNwBandwidth.

class.name: ExternalGeranCell
class.description: This Managed Object contains a GERAN cell

attribute.name: ExternalGeranCellId
attribute.description: The value component of the Relative Distinguished Name (RDN).

attribute.name: reservedBy
attribute.description: Contains a list of MO instances that reserve this MO instance.

attribute.name: plmnIdentity
attribute.description: PLMN ID supported by the cell.

attribute.name: lac
attribute.description: The Location Area Code of the external GERAN cell. A fixed-length code identifying the location area within a PLMN. Refer to 3GPP TS 23.003. Special values: The values 0 and 65534 are reserved for special cases where no valid Location Area Identity (LAI) exists in the network.

attribute.name: cellIdentity
attribute.description: Cell Identifier that is unique within the context of the GERAN location area. Refer to 3GPP TS 23.003.

attribute.name: bcc
attribute.description: Base station Colour Code (BCC). BCC and NCC together denote the physical cell identity for the GERAN cell (that is the Base Station Identity Code, BSIC).

attribute.name: ncc
attribute.description: Network Colour Code (NCC). BCC and NCC together denote the physical cell identity for the GERAN cell (that is the Base Station Identity Code, BSIC).

attribute.name: userLabel
attribute.description: Label for free use.

attribute.name: createdBy
attribute.description: Indicates whether the MO has been created by the Automated Neighbor Relations (ANR) function or operator.

attribute.name: timeOfCreation
attribute.description: Indicates the date and time when the MO was created by the Automated Neighbor Relations (ANR) function or operator. Format: YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS

attribute.name: masterGeranCellId
attribute.description: The identity of the GeranCell represented by this MO, particularly for automatically created ExternalGeranCell managed objects. The masterGeranCellId is set to the Full Distinguished Name (FDN).

attribute.name: naccInformation
attribute.description: The Network Assisted Cell Change (NACC) information for this GERAN cell, used for the Release with Redirect Including NACC feature.

attribute.name: rimCapable
attribute.description: This parameter indicates if the external GERAN cell is RIM capable. If the value is RIMIncapable, no attempt will be made to create a RIM association to the external GERAN cell, other values will result in a attempt to create a RIM association.
attribute.disturbances: If the value is other than RIMIncapable the eNB will try to set up a RIM association to the external cell

attribute.name: rimAssociationStatus
attribute.description: This parameter indicates the current status of the RIM association to this external cell.

attribute.name: rimAssociationRetryTimer
attribute.description: This parameter contains the time in minutes until the eNB will retry setting up the association. The value -1 means that the timer is inactive.

attribute.name: rimAssociationRetryValue
attribute.description: This parameter holds the value for the next time-out value. The value -1 means that there is no set Retry Value.

attribute.name: rimSIUpdateTimeOut
attribute.description: This parameter holds the time in minutes until the next SI needs to have arrived. If an update has not arrived when this value reaches 0 the eNB will assume there are some problems with the RIM transmission and try to restart the association. The value -1 means that there is no time out.

attribute.name: zzzTemporary1
attribute.description: Temporary attributes are intended for temporary solutions, and their usage may vary depending on the installed software. It is strongly recommended to only set the attributes that correspond to a desired functionality and leave all other temporary attributes set to default value. Information in the descriptions about what attributes are in use may be overridden by the information in CPI Info documents. Note that a later release may use another attribute to control the functionality previously provided by a temporary attribute, or may remove the functionality altogether. In these cases, the change is documented in the NIR.

attribute.name: isRemoveAllowed
attribute.description: Indicates if the Automated Neighbor Relations (ANR) function is allowed to remove this object. It does not restrict operator removal of the object. Objects created by ANR have this parameter set to true initially.

attribute.name: lastModification
attribute.description: Indicates whether the MO has been last modified by the Automated Neighbor Relations (ANR) function or operator.

attribute.name: timeOfLastModification
attribute.description: The date and time when the MO was last modified by the Automated Neighbor Relations (ANR) function or operator. Format: YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS

attribute.name: rimOperationalState
attribute.description: This parameter indicates the current status of the RIM association to this external cell.

attribute.name: rac
attribute.description: The Routing Area Code of a routing area. The value -1 of the attribute is used to mark that no vaild routing area code has been defined.

attribute.name: removingMonitoringStart
attribute.description: Indicates the date and time when the MO was started for monitoring for automatc removal by the (automatic neighbor relation) function. Format: YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS

action.name: changeFrequency
action.description: Changes the frequency of the external cell. This MO action includes the following steps: - If the GeranFrequency MO (with the specified arfcnValueGeranDl) does not already exist, it will be created under the current GERAN frequency group with the specified arfcnValueGeranDl and bandIndicator (if applicable). - Create the GeranFreqGroupRelation MO (using default values for attributes) if it does not already exist. - Create a new ExternalGeranCell MO (with the same attribute values as the existing ExternalGeranCell MO) under the specified GeranFrequency MO. - For each GeranCellRelation to the old ExternalGeranCell, create a new GeranCellRelation MO (with the same attribute values as the existing GeranCellRelation MO) referring to the new ExternalGeranCell MO. The old GeranCellRelation MOs are then removed. - Remove the old ExternalGeranCell MO. This will be performed after successful execution of this MO action.

parameter.name: arfcnValueGeranDl
parameter.description: The new DL frequency for this cell.

parameter.name: bandIndicator
parameter.description: The attribute indicates the GERAN frequency band in case the ARFCN value can concern either a DCS 1800 or a PCS 1900 carrier frequency. For ARFCN values not associated with one of these bands, the indicator has no meaning.

class.name: GeranCellRelation
class.description: This Managed Object represents a mobility relation between an EUtranCellFDD or an EUtranCellTDD and a GeranCell. It contains parameters that are specific for this relation

attribute.name: GeranCellRelationId
attribute.description: The value component of the Relative Distinguished Name (RDN).

attribute.name: externalGeranCellRef
attribute.description: Reference to the external GERAN cell MO.

attribute.name: createdBy
attribute.description: Indicates whether the MO has been created by the Automated Neighbor Relations (ANR) function or operator.

attribute.name: timeOfCreation
attribute.description: Indicates the date and time when the MO was created by the Automated Neighbor Relations (ANR) function or operator. Format: YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS

attribute.name: coverageIndicator
attribute.description: Defines whether the coverage area of the EUTRAN cell and the GERAN cell are indicated to overlap (has approximately the same coverage area), or whether the coverage area of the GERAN cell is indicated to cover the EUTRAN cell, or if it is contained in the EUTRAN cell.

attribute.name: isRemoveAllowed
attribute.description: Indicates if the Automated Neighbor Relations (ANR) function is allowed to remove this object. It does not restrict operator removal of the object. Objects created by ANR have this parameter set to true initially.

attribute.name: lastModification
attribute.description: Indicates whether the MO has been last modified by the Automated Neighbor Relations (ANR) function or operator.

attribute.name: timeOfLastModification
attribute.description: The date and time when the MO was last modified by the Automated Neighbor Relations (ANR) function or operator. Format: YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS

attribute.name: hoSuccessRateLpFilt
attribute.description: This parameter specifies the low-pass filtered handover success rate.

attribute.name: removingMonitoringStart
attribute.description: Indicates the time and date when the MO was started for monitoring for automatc removal by the (automatic neighbor relation) function. Format: YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS

attribute.name: calculatedUeRelevance
attribute.description: Estimated percentage of UEs that have ranked the associated neighbor cell as the strongest. The parameter is used by the feature best neighbor for redirect with SI.

class.name: UtranCellRelation
class.description: This Managed Object represents a mobility relation between an EUtranCellFDD or an EUtranCellTDD and an UtranCell. It contains parameters that are specific for this relation

attribute.name: UtranCellRelationId
attribute.description: The value component of the Relative Distinguished Name (RDN).

attribute.name: externalUtranCellFDDRef
attribute.description: Reference to the external UTRAN FDD/TDD cell MO.

attribute.name: createdBy
attribute.description: Indicates whether the MO has been created by the Automated Neighbor Relations (ANR) function or operator.

attribute.name: timeOfCreation
attribute.description: Indicates the time and date when the MO was created by the Automated Neighbor Relations (ANR) function or operator. Format: YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS

attribute.name: coverageIndicator
attribute.description: Defines whether the coverage areas of the EUTRAN cell and the UTRAN FDD/TDD cell are indicated to overlap (have approximately the same coverage area), or whether the coverage area of the UTRAN FDD/TDD cell is indicated to cover the EUTRAN cell, or if it is contained in the EUTRAN cell.

attribute.name: isHoAllowed
attribute.description: Specifies if handover between the cells in this relation is allowed.

attribute.name: pmHoExeAttWcdma
attribute.description: The number of LTE to WCDMA handover execution attempts.
attribute.condition: MobilityFromEUtraCommand including the Information on target RAT and cell is sent to the UE from the source cell
attribute.scanner: Primary

attribute.name: pmHoExeSuccWcdma
attribute.description: The number of successful LTE to WCDMA handovers.
attribute.condition: UE CONTEXT RELEASE COMMAND received in the source eNodeB from the MME with the cause Handover Triggered (S1 handover)
attribute.scanner: Primary

attribute.name: pmHoPrepAttWcdma
attribute.description: The number of attempts to start LTE to WCDMA handover preparation.
attribute.condition: A better WCDMA cell is reported by the UE.
attribute.scanner: Primary

attribute.name: pmHoPrepSuccWcdma
attribute.description: The number of successful LTE to WCDMA handover preparations.
attribute.condition: HANDOVER COMMAND message is received by the source eNodeB from the MME (S1 handover)
attribute.scanner: Primary

attribute.name: pmZtemporary37
attribute.description: Normally this counter is not used, it can however sometimes be temporarily used for very late additions in a release. If so, for description see Network Impact Report in the CPI.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: isRemoveAllowed
attribute.description: Indicates if the Automated Neighbor Relations (ANR) function is allowed to remove this object. It does not restrict operator removal of the object. Objects created by ANR have this parameter set to true initially.

attribute.name: hoSuccessRateLpFilt
attribute.description: This parameter specifies the low-pass filtered handover success rate.

attribute.name: removingMonitoringStart
attribute.description: Indicates the time and date when the MO was started for monitoring for automatc removal by the (automatic neighbor relation) function. Format: YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS

attribute.name: lastModification
attribute.description: Indicates whether the MO has been last modified by the Automated Neighbor Relations (ANR) function or operator.

attribute.name: timeOfLastModification
attribute.description: The date and time when the MO was last modified by the Automated Neighbor Relations (ANR) function or operator. Format: YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS

attribute.name: pmHoExeAttTdScdma
attribute.description: The number of LTE to TD-SCDMA handover execution attempts.
attribute.condition: MobilityFromEUtraCommand including the Information on target RAT and cell is sent to the UE from the source cell
attribute.scanner: Primary

attribute.name: pmHoExeSuccTdScdma
attribute.description: The number of successful LTE to TD-SCDMA handovers.
attribute.condition: UE CONTEXT RELEASE COMMAND received in the source eNodeB from the MME with the cause Handover Triggered (S1 handover)
attribute.scanner: Primary

attribute.name: pmHoPrepAttTdScdma
attribute.description: The number of attempts to start LTE to TD-SCDMA handover preparation.
attribute.condition: A better TD-SCDMA cell is reported by the UE.
attribute.scanner: Primary

attribute.name: pmHoPrepSuccTdScdma
attribute.description: The number of successful LTE to TD-SCDMA handover preparations.
attribute.condition: HANDOVER COMMAND message is received by the source eNodeB from the MME (S1 handover)
attribute.scanner: Primary

attribute.name: pmHoPrepAttWcdmaSrvcc
attribute.description: The number of attempts to start SRVCC handover preparation from LTE to WCDMA
attribute.condition: A better WCDMA cell is reported by the UE and a VoIP bearer is established.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmHoPrepSuccWcdmaSrvcc
attribute.description: The number of successful SRVCC handover preparations from LTE to WCDMA.
attribute.condition: HANDOVER COMMAND message is received by the source eNodeB from the MME (S1 handover), including a VoIP bearer.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: calculatedUeRelevance
attribute.description: Estimated percentage of UEs that have ranked the associated neighbor cell as the strongest. The parameter is used by the feature best neighbor for redirect with SI.

attribute.name: lbUeMeasScaling
attribute.description: Scaling factor for the required number of UE candidates required for measurements to meet a load balancing target Special value: 0 means automatic scaling factor.

attribute.name: loadBalancing
attribute.description: Load balancing The value specifies whether load balancing action to the referenced target UTRAN cell is allowed.

attribute.name: pmHoExeAttLb
attribute.description: Number of handover to UTRAN execution attempts due to load balancing action
attribute.condition: The MobilityFromEUTRACommand message is sent to the UE and the eNodeB initiated the handover due to load balancing action.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmHoExeSuccLb
attribute.description: Number of successful handovers to UTRAN due to load balancing action
attribute.condition: The UE CONTEXT RELEASE COMMAND message is received from the MME with the cause Handover Triggered (S1 handover) and the eNodeB initiated the handover due to load balancing action.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmHoPrepAttLb
attribute.description: Number of handover to UTRAN preparation attempts due to load balancing action
attribute.condition: The eNodeB performs a load balancing action.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmHoPrepAttSrvccLb
attribute.description: Number of SRVCC handover to UTRAN preparation attempts due to load balancing action
attribute.condition: The eNodeB performs a load balancing action and SRVCC handover is required.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmHoPrepSuccLb
attribute.description: Number of successful handover to UTRAN preparations due to load balancing action
attribute.condition: The HANDOVER COMMAND message is received from the MME (S1 handover) and the eNodeB initiated the handover due to load balancing action.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmHoPrepSuccSrvccLb
attribute.description: Number of successful SRVCC handover to UTRAN preparations due to load balancing action
attribute.condition: The HANDOVER COMMAND message is received from the MME (S1 handover) and the eNodeB initiated the handover due to load balancing action and SRVCC handover is required.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmLbQualifiedUe
attribute.description: Number of UE qualified for load balancing action to the related UTRAN cell Values are accumulated in each ROP and used to calculate the LB measurement success rate for the related cell.
attribute.condition: In each load balancing cycle, the number of UE reporting the related cell as the cell with highest RSCP is accumulated. Increment by zero if no UE qualifies.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

class.name: ExternalUtranCellFDD
class.description: This Managed Object contains a UTRAN cell for Frequency Division Duplex (FDD).

attribute.name: ExternalUtranCellFDDId
attribute.description: The value component of the Relative Distinguished Name (RDN).

attribute.name: physicalCellIdentity
attribute.description: Indicates the physical layer identity of the cell, that is, the primary scrambling code.

attribute.name: cellIdentity
attribute.description: UTRAN Cell Identity. Used to identity the cell uniquely within UTRAN Iu mode.

attribute.name: plmnIdentity
attribute.description: PLMN ID supported by the cell

attribute.name: reservedBy
attribute.description: Contains a list of MO instances that reserve this MO instance.

attribute.name: userLabel
attribute.description: Label for free use.

attribute.name: createdBy
attribute.description: Indicates whether the MO has been created by the Automated Neighbor Relations (ANR) function or operator.

attribute.name: timeOfCreation
attribute.description: Indicates the time and date when the MO was created by the Automated Neighbor Relations (ANR) function or operator. Format: YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS

attribute.name: masterUtranCellId
attribute.description: The identity of the UtranCell represented by this MO, particularly for automatically created ExternalUtranCell managed objects. The masterUtranCellId is set to the Full Distinguished Name (FDN).

attribute.name: lac
attribute.description: The Location Area Code of the external UTRAN cell. A fixed-length code identifying the location area within a PLMN. Refer to 3GPP TS 23.003. The value 0 of the attribute is used to mark invalid/unusable lac information for the cell. For example, handover to an external UTRAN cell (that is part of a Utran cell relation) can be considered only if the value of the lac attribute is NOT 0.

attribute.name: rac
attribute.description: The Routing Area Code of a routing area. The value -1 of the attribute is used to mark that the optional RAC IE should NOT be sent in the Target ID IE of the HANDOVER REQUIRED S1 message. Refer to 3GPP TS 36.413.

attribute.name: lastModification
attribute.description: Indicates whether the MO has been last modified by the Automated Neighbor Relations (ANR) function or operator.

attribute.name: timeOfLastModification
attribute.description: The date and time when the MO was last modified by the Automated Neighbor Relations (ANR) function or operator. Format: YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS

attribute.name: naccInformation
attribute.description: The Network Assisted Cell Change (NACC) information for this UTRAN FDD cell, used for the Release with Redirect Including NACC feature.

attribute.name: rimCapable
attribute.description: This parameter indicates if the external UTRAN cell is RIM capable. If the value is RIMIncapable, no attempt will be made to create a RIM association to the external UTRAN cell, other values will result in a attempt to create a RIM association.
attribute.disturbances: If the value is other than RIMIncapable the eNB will try to set up a RIM association to the external cell

attribute.name: rimAssociationStatus
attribute.description: This parameter indicates the current status of the RIM association to this external cell.

attribute.name: rimAssociationRetryTimer
attribute.description: This parameter contains the time in minutes until the eNB will retry setting up the association. The value -1 means that the timer is inactive.

attribute.name: rimAssociationRetryValue
attribute.description: This parameter holds the value for the next time-out value. The value -1 means that there is no set Retry Value.

attribute.name: rimSIUpdateTimeOut
attribute.description: This parameter holds the time in minutes until the next SI needs to have arrived. If an update has not arrived when this value reaches 0 the eNB will assume there are some problems with the RIM transmission and try to restart the association. The value -1 means that there is no time out.

attribute.name: isRemoveAllowed
attribute.description: Indicates if the Automated Neighbor Relations (ANR) function is allowed to remove this object. It does not restrict operator removal of the object. Objects created by ANR have this parameter set to true initially.

attribute.name: rimOperationalState
attribute.description: This parameter indicates the current status of the RIM association to this external cell.

attribute.name: srvccCapability
attribute.description: Describes the SRVCC capability of the external cell.

attribute.name: removingMonitoringStart
attribute.description: Indicates the date and time when the MO was started for monitoring for automatc removal by the (automatic neighbor relation) function. Format: YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS

attribute.name: lbUtranCellOffloadCapacity
attribute.description: Offload subscription capacity associated with the UTRAN target cell The value is used to moderate the offload rate to the UTRAN target cell.

action.name: changeFrequency
action.description: Changes the frequency of the external cell. This MO action includes the following steps: - Create the UtranFrequency MO (with the specified arfcnValueUtranDl) if it does not already exist. - Create the UtranFreqRelation MO (with the same attribute values as the existing UtranFreqRelation MO) if it does not already exist. - Create a new ExternalUtranCellFDD MO (with the same attribute values as the existing ExternalUtranCellFDD MO) under the specified UtranFrequency MO. - For each UtranCellRelation to the old ExternalUtranCellFDD, create a new UtranCellRelation MO (with the same attribute values as the existing UtranCellRelation MO) referring to the new ExternalUtranCellFDD MO. The old UtranCellRelation MOs are then removed. - Remove the old ExternalUtranCellFDD MO. This will be performed after successful execution of this MO action.

parameter.name: arfcnValueUtranDl
parameter.description: The new DL frequency for this cell.

class.name: UtranTDDFreqRelation
class.description:
This Managed Object represents a UTRAN TDD mobility relation between a EUtranCellFDD or EUtranCellTDD and a UtranFrequency. It contains parameters that are specific for this relation.
Deleting this MO while the parent EUtranCellFDD/EUtranCellTDD has operationalState set to ENABLED is not recommended as it may affect traffic.

attribute.name: UtranTDDFreqRelationId
attribute.description: The value component of the Relative Distinguished Name (RDN).

attribute.name: userLabel
attribute.description: Label for free use.

attribute.name: utranFrequencyRef
attribute.description: Reference to the UTRAN frequency MO, UtranFrequency.

attribute.name: cellReselectionPriority
attribute.description:
CellReselectionPriority concerns the absolute priority of the concerned carrier frequency, as used by the cell reselection procedure. Corresponds with parameter "priority" in TS 36.304.
Value 0 means: lowest priority. The UE behaviour for the case the field is absent, if applicable, is specified in TS 36.304.
attribute.dependencies: The value must be uniqe and not already used by other RAT, i.e. equal priorities between RATs are not supported.

attribute.name: threshXHigh
attribute.description: This specifies the threshold used by the UE when reselecting towards the higher priority frequency X than current serving frequency. Each frequency of UTRAN might have a specific threshold. Parameter "Threshx,high" in TS 36.304

attribute.name: threshXLow
attribute.description: This specifies the threshold used in reselection towards frequency X priority from a higher priority frequency. Each frequency of UTRAN might have a specific threshold. Parameter "Threshx,low" in TS 36.304.

attribute.name: qRxLevMin
attribute.description: Parameter Qrxlevmin, see TS 25.304. Specifies the minimum required Rx level in the cell expressed in dBm.

attribute.name: pMaxUtra
attribute.description: The maximum allowed transmission power on the (uplink) carrier frequency, see TS 25.304.

attribute.name: allowedPlmnList
attribute.description:
List of all Public Land Mobile Network (PLMN) IDs allowed for this frequency relation.
A UE that does not support one of the IDs included in the allowedPlmnList does not measure on this frequency, according to the UE Handover Restriction List.
No values in allowedPlmnList imply that the frequency has no restrictions for PLMN.
The PLMN ID contains the following parts: 1. MobileCountryCode, MCC, 3 digits 2. MobileNetworkCode, MNC, 2 or 3 digits (the correct number of digits is set in the mncLength member of this Struct)
For example, if MCC=125 and MNC=46, then plmnId=12546.

attribute.name: connectedModeMobilityPrio
attribute.description: Prioritizes UTRA frequencies among all frequencies related to the cell for UEs in connected mode. (0 means the lowest priority. -1 means the frequency is excluded.)

attribute.name: csFallbackPrio
attribute.description: Prioritizes UTRAN frequencies among all frequencies related to the cell for UEs in connected mode. Sets the priority to which frequency/frequency group to make CS Falback to. The value -1 means the the frequency is excluded. The value 0 means the lowest priority. The value 7 means the highest priority.

attribute.name: csFallbackPrioEC
attribute.description: Prioritizes UTRAN frequencies for emergency calls among all frequencies/frequency groups related to the cell for UEs in connected mode. Sets the priority to which frequency to make emergency call CS Fallback to. The value -1 means the the frequency is excluded. The value 0 means the lowest priority. The value 7 means the highest priority.

attribute.name: qOffsetFreq
attribute.description: Indicates a frequency-specific offset to apply when evaluating triggering conditions for measurement reporting.

attribute.name: mobilityAction
attribute.description: The preferred way to transfer a UE in connected mode to a UTRAN TDD frequency in case of coverage triggered mobility.

attribute.name: mobilityActionCsfb
attribute.description: The preferred way to transfer a UE in connected mode to a UTRAN TDD frequency in case of CS Fallback mobility.

attribute.name: anrMeasOn
attribute.description: ANR performs measurement on the referenced frequency if this parameter is set to true. Otherwise, ANR does not perform any measurements on this frequency.

class.name: ExternalUtranCellTDD
class.description: This Managed Object contains a UTRAN cell for TDD (Time Division Duplex).

attribute.name: lac
attribute.description: The Location Area Code of the external UTRAN cell. A fixed-length code identifying the location area within a PLMN. Refer to 3GPP TS 23.003. The value 0 of the attribute is used to mark invalid/unusable lac information for the cell. For example, handover to an external UTRAN cell (that is part of a Utran cell relation) can be considered only if the value of the lac attribute is NOT 0.

attribute.name: rac
attribute.description: The Routing Area Code of a routing area. The value -1 of the attribute is used to mark that the optional RAC IE should NOT be sent in the Target ID IE of the HANDOVER REQUIRED S1 message. Refer to 3GPP TS 36.413.

attribute.name: lastModification
attribute.description: Indicates whether the MO has been last modified by the Automated Neighbor Relations (ANR) function or operator.

attribute.name: timeOfLastModification
attribute.description: The date and time when the MO was last modified by the Automated Neighbor Relations (ANR) function or operator. Format: YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS

attribute.name: timeOfCreation
attribute.description: Indicates the time and date when the MO was created by the Automated Neighbor Relations (ANR) function or operator. Format: "YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS"

attribute.name: masterUtranCellId
attribute.description: The identity of the UtranCell represented by this MO, particularly for automatically created ExternalUtranCell managed objects. The masterUtranCellId is set to the Full Distinguished Name (FDN).

attribute.name: createdBy
attribute.description: Indicates whether the MO has been created by the Automated Neighbor Relations (ANR) function or operator.

attribute.name: naccInformation
attribute.description: The Network Assisted Cell Change (NACC) information for this UTRAN TDD cell, used for the Release with Redirect Including NACC feature.

attribute.name: ExternalUtranCellTDDId
attribute.description: The value component of the Relative Distinguished Name (RDN).

attribute.name: physicalCellIdentity
attribute.description: Indicates the physical layer identity of the cell, that is, the primary scrambling code.

attribute.name: cellIdentity
attribute.description: UTRAN Cell Identity. Used to identity the cell uniquely within UTRAN Iu mode.

attribute.name: plmnIdentity
attribute.description: PLMN ID supported by the cell

attribute.name: reservedBy
attribute.description: Contains a list of MO instances that reserve this MO instance.

attribute.name: userLabel
attribute.description: Label for free use.

attribute.name: rimCapable
attribute.description: This parameter indicates if the external UTRAN cell is RIM capable. If the value is RIMIncapable, no attempt will be made to create a RIM association to the external UTRAN cell, other values will result in a attempt to create a RIM association.
attribute.disturbances: If the value is other than RIMIncapable the eNB will try to set up a RIM association to the external cell

attribute.name: rimAssociationStatus
attribute.description: This parameter indicates the current status of the RIM association to this external cell.

attribute.name: rimAssociationRetryTimer
attribute.description: This parameter contains the time in minutes until the eNB will retry setting up the association. The value -1 means that the timer is inactive.

attribute.name: rimAssociationRetryValue
attribute.description: This parameter holds the value for the next time-out value. The value -1 means that there is no set Retry Value.

attribute.name: rimSIUpdateTimeOut
attribute.description: This parameter holds the time in minutes until the next SI needs to have arrived. If an update has not arrived when this value reaches 0 the eNB will assume there are some problems with the RIM transmission and try to restart the association. The value -1 means that there is no time out.

attribute.name: zzzTemporary1
attribute.description: Temporary attributes are intended for temporary solutions, and their usage may vary depending on the installed software. It is strongly recommended to only set the attributes that correspond to a desired functionality and leave all other temporary attributes set to default value. Information in the descriptions about what attributes are in use may be overridden by the information in CPI Info documents. Note that a later release may use another attribute to control the functionality previously provided by a temporary attribute, or may remove the functionality altogether. In these cases, the change is documented in the NIR.

attribute.name: zzzTemporary2
attribute.description: Temporary attributes are intended for temporary solutions, and their usage may vary depending on the installed software. It is strongly recommended to only set the attributes that correspond to a desired functionality and leave all other temporary attributes set to default value. Information in the descriptions about what attributes are in use may be overridden by the information in CPI Info documents. Note that a later release may use another attribute to control the functionality previously provided by a temporary attribute, or may remove the functionality altogether. In these cases, the change is documented in the NIR.

attribute.description: Temporary attributes are intended for temporary solutions, and their usage may vary depending on the installed software. Information in the descriptions about what attributes are in use may be overridden by the information in CPI Info documents. Note that a later release may use another attribute to control the functionality previously provided by a temporary attribute, or may remove the functionality altogether.
