Note that a later release may use another attribute to control the functionality previously provided by a temporary attribute, or may remove the functionality altogether. In these cases, the change is documented in the NIR.

attribute.name: isRemoveAllowed
attribute.description: Indicates if the Automated Neighbor Relations (ANR) function is allowed to remove this object. It does not restrict operator removal of the object. Objects created by ANR have this parameter set to true initially.

attribute.name: rimOperationalState
attribute.description: This parameter indicates the current status of the RIM association to this external cell.

attribute.name: removingMonitoringStart
attribute.description: Indicates the date and time when the MO was started for monitoring for automatc removal by the (automatic neighbor relation) function. Format: YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS

action.name: changeFrequency
action.description: Changes the frequency of the external cell. This MO action includes the following steps: - Create the UtranFrequency MO (with the specified arfcnValueUtranDl) if it does not already exist. - Create the UtranTDDFreqRelation MO (using default values for attributes) if it does not already exist. - Create a new ExternalUtranCellTDD MO (with the same attribute values as the existing ExternalUtranCellTDD MO) under the specified UtranFrequency MO. - For each UtranCellRelation to the old ExternalUtranCellTDD, create a new UtranCellRelation MO (with the same attribute values as the existing UtranCellRelation MO) referring to the new ExternalUtranCellTDD MO. The old UtranCellRelation MOs are then removed. - Remove the old ExternalUtranCellTDD MO. This will be performed after successful execution of this MO action.

parameter.name: arfcnValueUtranDl
parameter.description: The new DL frequency for this cell.

class.name: SubscriberProfileID
class.description: Parent for all SPID related MOCs

attribute.name: SubscriberProfileIDId
attribute.description: The value component of the RDN

attribute.name: userLabel
attribute.description: Label for free use.

class.name: HoWhiteList
class.description: Contains a whitelist of SPID values that are allowed to perform a incoming handover requests when the cell is in the mode "reserved for operator use"

attribute.name: spidList
attribute.description: A list of UEs, that are allowed to perform incoming handover to a cell that is in mode "reserved for operator use". Note: When value is configured to -1000, the parameter is ignored.

attribute.name: HoWhiteListId
attribute.description: The value component of the RDN

attribute.name: userLabel
attribute.description: Label for free use.

class.name: RATFreqPrio
class.description: Contains data that overrides information in the IdleModeMobilityControlInfo and RedirectedCarrierInfo (sent to UE at RRCConnectionRelease) that is configured for the cell. Only UEs that has a SPID value matching the list in this MOC is affected.

attribute.name: RATFreqPrioId
attribute.description: The value component of the RDN

attribute.name: spidList
attribute.description: A list that includes all UEs that are affected by the RAT priorities specified in this MOC. Note: When value is configured to -1000, the parameter is ignored.

attribute.name: t320
attribute.description: Validity time for cell reselection priority information provided by dedicated signalling. Used by the UE. This parameter is only used in the optional feature 'subscriber triggered mobility' when setting new cell reselection priorities based on SPID value for a specific UE.

attribute.name: freqPrioListEUTRA
attribute.description: Prioritizes EUTRAN frequencies among all frequencies related to the cell for UE cell reselection procedure and for UEs in connected mode.

attribute.name: freqGroupPrioListGERAN
attribute.description: Prioritizes GERAN frequencies among all frequencies related to the cell for UE cell reselection procedure and for UEs in connected mode.

attribute.name: freqPrioListUTRA
attribute.description: Prioritizes UTRAN frequencies among all frequencies related to the cell for UE cell reselection procedure and for Ues in connected mode.

attribute.name: bandClassPrioListCDMA2000
attribute.description: Prioritizes CDMA2000 frequencies among all frequencies related to the cell for UE cell reselection procedure and for Ues in connected mode. It is not possible to create every possible frequency and band relation since that would require to many instances using this representation.

attribute.name: userLabel
attribute.description: Label for free use.

attribute.name: bandClassPrioListCDMA1xRtt
attribute.description: CDMA2000 1xRTT frequency prioritization This attribute prioritizes CDMA2000 1xRTT frequencies among all frequencies related to the cell for UE cell reselection procedure and for UE in connected mode. It is not possible to create every possible frequency and band relation since that would require to many instances using this representation.

class.name: LoadBalancingFunction
class.description: Contains parameters and constraints for Idle Mode Load Balancing functions

attribute.name: threshServingLowHystMin
attribute.description: Specifies the minimum hysteresis between the SIB3:threshServingLow and EUtranFreqReleation:threshXHigh for a High Priority Cell (HPC) when used in load balancing function, otherwise ignored.
attribute.deprecated: Since L12B. Has no functional behaviour. Planned to be removed.

attribute.name: threshServingLowMin
attribute.description: Specifies the lower bound for the SIB3:threshServingLow parameter. Only used by the High Priority Cell (HPC) for idle load balancing function, otherwise ignored.
attribute.deprecated: Since L12B. Has no functional behaviour. Planned to be removed.

attribute.name: threshXHighMax
attribute.description: Specifies the upper bound for the EUtranFreqReleation:threshXHigh parameter. Only used by the Low Priority Cell (LPC) for idle load balancing function, otherwise ignored.
attribute.deprecated: Since L12B. Has no functional behaviour. Planned to be removed.

attribute.name: threshXHighHystMin
attribute.description: Specifies the minimum hysteresis between the EUtranFreqReleation:threshXHigh and SIB3:threshServingLow for a Low Priority Cell (LPC) when used in load balancing function, otherwise ignored.
attribute.deprecated: Since L12B. Has no functional behaviour. Planned to be removed.

attribute.name: LoadBalancingFunctionId
attribute.description: The value component of the RDN.

attribute.name: loadBalancingSRMin
attribute.description: Specifies the minimum subscription ratio (of at least one frequency) at which the idle mode load balancing is operable.
attribute.deprecated: Since L12B. Has no functional behaviour. Planned to be removed.

attribute.name: loadBalancingDBias
attribute.description: Specifies the denominator offset for load difference measure
attribute.deprecated: Since L12B. Has no functional behaviour. Planned to be removed.

attribute.name: imLoadBalancingDStep
attribute.description: Specifies the load integration threshold for stepping the SON parameters the idle mode load balancing controls.
attribute.deprecated: Since L12B. Has no functional behaviour. Planned to be removed.

attribute.name: imLoadBalancingDMin
attribute.description: Specifies the load integration declination factor for the idle mode load balancing function.
attribute.deprecated: Since L12B. Has no functional behaviour. Planned to be removed.

attribute.name: pmAvSubRatioSum
attribute.description: Recording the subscription ratio as the result of the traffic load assessment at every sample rate. Those values are accumulated each ROP, allowing the average subscription ratio to be presented for each period.
attribute.deprecated: Since L12B. Has no functional behaviour. Planned to be removed.
attribute.condition:
Accumulated at every imlbReportPeriod. The current load based on the subscription ratio is the accumulated value to be used.
This counter steps only when the license for Idle Mode Load Balancing is present and the feature is active.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmAvSubRatioSamp
attribute.description: Describes how many samplings that have been performed during the ROP period. This together with the sum counter can be used to calculate an average subscription ratio.
attribute.deprecated: Since L12B. Has no functional behaviour. Planned to be removed.
attribute.condition:
Stepped once at every imlbReportPeriod.
This counter steps only when the license for Idle Mode Load Balancing is present and the feature is active.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: lbThreshold
attribute.description: The minimum load (subscription ratio) difference to trigger load balancing action.

attribute.name: lbCeiling
attribute.description: The maximum load (subscription ratio) difference taken into account in load balancing action.

attribute.name: lbRateOffsetCoefficient
attribute.description: Coefficient of rate dependent load balancing offset.

attribute.name: lbUtranOffloadBackoffTime
attribute.description: Backoff time for eNodeB The value applies to inhibit further offload to a UTRAN target cell that rejects incoming offload.

attribute.name: mbmsDisabledLoadBalancing
attribute.description: Parameter used to specify if load balancing action from a cell shall be disabled due to MBMS. If mbmsDisabledLoadBalancing is TRUE and if mbsfnAreaCellStatus is ACTIVATED for a cell, then load balancing action from the cell is disabled.

class.name: ReportConfigA4
class.description: This managed object contains report configuration settings for the A4 event measurements. The A4 event is used to detect when neighbor cell becomes better than threshold.

attribute.name: ReportConfigA4Id
attribute.description: The value component of the Relative Distinguished Name (RDN).

attribute.name: a4ThresholdRsrp
attribute.description: The Reference Signal Received Power (RSRP) threshold value for eventA4.
attribute.dependencies: Only used if triggerQuantityA4 is set to RSRP.

attribute.name: a4ThresholdRsrq
attribute.description: The Reference Signal Received Quality (RSRQ) threshold value for eventA4.
attribute.dependencies: Only used if triggerQuantityA4 is set to RSRQ.

attribute.name: hysteresisA4
attribute.description: The hysteresis value for the eventA4 measurement.

attribute.name: timeToTriggerA4
attribute.description: The time-to-trigger value for the eventA4 measurement.

attribute.name: triggerQuantityA4
attribute.description: The quantity that triggers the eventA4 for the eventA4 measurement.

attribute.name: reportQuantityA4
attribute.description: The quantities to include in the measurement report for the eventA4 measurement. The value 0 - sameAsTriggerQuantity means that the same quantity as triggerQuantity is included in the measurement report. The value 1 - BOTH means that both Reference Signal Received Power (RSRP) and Reference Signal Received Quality (RSRQ) quantities are included in the measurement report.
attribute.deprecated: Since L13A. Planned to be removed.

attribute.name: maxReportCellsA4
attribute.description: Maximum number of cells to include in the measurement report for the eventA4 measurement.

attribute.name: reportIntervalA4
attribute.description: The interval for event-triggered periodical reporting for the eventA4 measurement.

attribute.name: reportAmountA4
attribute.description: The number of reports for periodical reporting for the eventA4 measurement . Value 0 means that reports are sent as long as the event is fulfilled.

class.name: ReportConfigB1Geran
class.description: This managed object contains report configuration settings for the B1 event for GERAN measurements. The B1 event is used to detect when a GERAN cell becomes better than threshold.

attribute.name: ReportConfigB1GeranId
attribute.description: The value component of the Relative Distinguished Name (RDN).

attribute.name: b1ThresholdGeran
attribute.description: The Signal Quality in the ThresholdGERAN, threshold value for eventB1.

attribute.name: hysteresisB1
attribute.description: The hysteresis value for the eventB1 measurement on GERAN

attribute.name: timeToTriggerB1
attribute.description: The time to trigger value for the eventB1 measurement.

attribute.name: maxReportCellsB1
attribute.description: Maximum number of cells to include in the measurement report for the eventB1 measurement for GERAN.

attribute.name: reportIntervalB1
attribute.description: The interval for event triggered periodical reporting for the eventB1 measurement for GERAN.

attribute.name: reportAmountB1
attribute.description: The number of reports for periodical reporting for the eventB1 measurement . Value 0 means that reports are sent as long as the event is fulfilled.

class.name: ReportConfigB1Utra
class.description: This managed object contains report configuration settings for the B1 event for WCDMA measurements. The B1 event is used to detect when a WCDMA cell becomes better than threshold.

attribute.name: ReportConfigB1UtraId
attribute.description: The value component of the Relative Distinguished Name (RDN).

attribute.name: b1ThresholdEcNoUtra
attribute.description: Ratio of energy per modulation bit to noise spectral density in the ThresholdUTRA, threshold value for eventB1. Not applicable for UTRA TDD.
attribute.dependencies: Only used when measQuantityUtraFDD is set to ECNO

attribute.name: hysteresisB1
attribute.description: The hysteresis value for the eventB1 measurement on UTRAN

attribute.name: timeToTriggerB1
attribute.description: The time to trigger value for the eventB1 measurement on UTRAN.

attribute.name: maxReportCellsB1
attribute.description: Maximum number of cells to include in the measurement report for the eventB1 measurement for UTRA.

attribute.name: reportIntervalB1
attribute.description: The interval for event triggered periodical reporting for the eventB1 measurement for UTRA.

attribute.name: reportAmountB1
attribute.description: The number of reports for periodical reporting for the eventB1 measurement . Value 0 means that reports are sent as long as the event is fulfilled.

attribute.name: b1ThresholdRscpUtra
attribute.description: Received Signal Code Power in the ThresholdUTRA, threshold value for eventB1.
attribute.dependencies: Only used when measQuantityUtraFDD is set to RSCP

class.name: ParameterChangeRequests
class.description: Contains the list of parameter change requests produced by open loop SON functions.

attribute.name: parameterChangeRequestList
attribute.description: The complete list of outstanding parameter change requests.
attribute.dependencies: When a change request is added, updated, rejected, accepted or cancelled, the request is also copied to the latestUpdate parameter. The eNodeB may keep the rejected, accepted or cancelled change requests in this list for an indeterminate time.

attribute.name: latestUpdate
attribute.description: The latest changed parameter change request.
attribute.dependencies: When the eNodeB changes the parameterChangeRequestList, the changed struct is copied to this parameter, with the state field updated.

attribute.name: ParameterChangeRequestsId
attribute.description: The value component of the Relative Distinguished Name (RDN).

action.name: approve
action.description: Approves a set of pending change request.

parameter.name: pcrList
parameter.description: A list of integers matching the seqNo of the change requests. Any integer not matching a pending change request will be ignored.

action.name: reject
action.description: Rejects a set of pending change request.

parameter.name: pcrList
parameter.description: A list of integers matching the seqNo of the change requests. Any integer not matching a pending change request will be ignored.

action.name: addOrModify
action.description: Adds or modifies a change request. If there already exist a change request on the same MO instance and attribute, this change request will be modified. Otherwise a new change request will be added. This action is used internally in the eNB.

parameter.name: objectRef
parameter.description: Reference to the MO Instance

parameter.name: attributeName
parameter.description: Attribute name

parameter.name: originalValue
parameter.description: Original value of the parameter

parameter.name: requestedValue
parameter.description: Requested value of the parameter

parameter.name: causeCode
parameter.description: Cause of the change

parameter.name: causeString
parameter.description: Free-text description of the cause of the change

action.name: cancel
action.description: Cancels a change request. This action is used internally in the eNB.

parameter.name: objectRef
parameter.description: Reference to the MO Instance

parameter.name: attributeName
parameter.description: Attribute name

class.name: ReportConfigEUtraInterFreqLb
class.description: Contains the Report Configuration settings for UE measurements initiated for EUTRA Inter-frequency Load Balancing

attribute.name: a4ThresholdRsrp
attribute.description: The Reference Signal Received Power (RSRP) threshold value for eventA4.

attribute.name: hysteresisA4
attribute.description: The hysteresis value for the eventA4 measurement.

attribute.name: ReportConfigEUtraInterFreqLbId
attribute.description: The value component of the Relative Distinguished Name (RDN).

class.name: DrxProfile
class.description: Contains DRX profiles, DRX parameters, to map towards the different QCIs. The first instance, DrxProfileId 0, is the default DRX profile.

attribute.name: DrxProfileId
attribute.description: The value component of the RDN

attribute.name: onDurationTimer
attribute.description: Specifies the number of consecutive PDCCH-subframe(s) at the beginning of a DRX Cycle. TS36.331 ch. 6.3.2, RRC parameter onDurationTimer.

attribute.name: drxInactivityTimer
attribute.description: Specifies the number of consecutive PDCCH-subframe(s) after successfully decoding a PDCCH indicating an initial UL or DL user data transmission for this UE. TS36.331 ch. 6.3.2, RRC parameter drx-InactivityTimer.

attribute.name: drxRetransmissionTimer
attribute.description: Specifies the maximum number of consecutive PDCCH-subframe(s) for as soon as a DL retransmission is expected by the UE. TS36.331 ch. 6.3.2, RRC parameter drx-RetransmissionTimer.

attribute.name: shortDrxCycle
attribute.description: Specifies the periodic repetition of active time resulting from a started On Duration Timer followed by a possible period of inactivity. Parameter applied when the UE follows the long DRX cycle. TS36.331 ch. 6.3.2, RRC parameter longDRX-CycleStartOffset.

attribute.name: shortDrxCycleTimer
attribute.description: Specifies the number of consecutive cycles the UE shall follow the short DRX cycle after the DRX Inactivity Timer has expired. TS36.331 ch. 6.3.2, RRC parameter drxShortCycleTimer.

attribute.name: longDrxCycle
attribute.description: The value of longDrxCycle is in number of sub-frames. If shortDrxCycle is configured, the value of longDrxCycle shall be a multiple of the shortDrxCycle value.
attribute.dependencies: Needs to be a multiple of shortDrxCycle

attribute.name: longDrxCycleOnly
attribute.description: The longDrxCycleOnly value is used as longDrxCycle when the UE does not support shortDrxCycle. The value of longDrxCycleOnly is in number of sub-frames.

attribute.name: reservedBy
attribute.description: Contains a list of QciProfile instances that reserve this MO instance.

class.name: PwsEtws
class.description: This MO class stores warning information to be broadcast in SIB10 or SIB11

attribute.name: PwsEtwsId
attribute.description: The value component of the Relative Distinguished Name (RDN).

attribute.name: messageIdentifierPrim
attribute.description: Message identifier for SIB10

attribute.name: serialNumberPrim
attribute.description: Serial number for SIB10

attribute.name: cellIdPrim
attribute.description:
Cells in which SIB10 will be broadcast
The cell is defined by its local cell ID.

attribute.name: warningType
attribute.description: Warning type forSIB10

attribute.name: arrivalTimePrim
attribute.description:
Time when SIB10 information arrived in the eNB
Format: YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS

attribute.name: messageIdentifierSec
attribute.description: Message identifier for SIB11

attribute.name: serialNumberSec
attribute.description: Serial number for SIB11

attribute.name: cellIdSec
attribute.description:
Cells in which SIB11 will be broadcast
The cell is defined by its local cell ID.

attribute.name: repetitionPeriod
attribute.description: Repetition period for SIB11

attribute.name: numberOfBroadcastsRequested
attribute.description: Number of requested repetitions of SIB11

attribute.name: dataCodingScheme
attribute.description: Data coding scheme for the message

attribute.name: warningMessageContents
attribute.description: Contents of the message

attribute.name: arrivalTimeSec
attribute.description:
Time when the SIB11 information arrived in the eNB
Format: YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS

class.name: PwsCmas
class.description: This MO class stores warning information to be broadcast in SIB12

attribute.name: PwsCmasId
attribute.description: The value component of the Relative Distinguished Name (RDN).

attribute.name: messageIdentifier
attribute.description: Message identifier for SIB12

attribute.name: serialNumber
attribute.description: Serial number for SIB12

attribute.name: cellId
attribute.description:
Cells in which SIB12 will be broadcast
The cell is defined by its local cell ID.

attribute.name: repetitionPeriod
attribute.description: Repetition period of the SIB12

attribute.name: numberOfBroadcastsRequested
attribute.description: Number of requested repetitions of SIB12

attribute.name: dataCodingScheme
attribute.description: Data coding scheme of the message

attribute.name: warningMessageContents
attribute.description: Contents of the message

attribute.name: arrivalTime
attribute.description:
Time when the SIB12 information arrived in the eNB
Format: YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS

class.name: Mbms
class.description: This MO is the top level MO for Multimedia Broadcast Multicast Service (MBMS). It contains attributes, which are common for all parts of MBMS in the node.

attribute.name: MbmsId
attribute.description: The value component of the Relative Distinguished Name (RDN).

attribute.name: userLabel
attribute.description: Label for free use.

attribute.name: mappingInfoSIB13
attribute.description: Defines to which SI message SIB13 is mapped.
attribute.dependencies: See siWindowLength for further information.

attribute.name: changeNotificationSIB13
attribute.description: Indicates, when the SIB13 content is changed, if SI Change Notification shall be broadcasted prior to broadcast of updated SI.

attribute.name: synchPeriodLength
attribute.description: MBMS synchronisation period length.

attribute.name: syncPayloadPduCrcCheck
attribute.description: Indicates if syncPayloadPduCrcCheck will be performed or not.

attribute.name: tMbmsAuditTimer
attribute.description: The time the eNB waits with the deletion of ongoing MBMS sessions that are not re-started by MBMS SESSION START after a successful M3 SETUP procedure.

class.name: MbsfnArea
class.description: This MO represents a MBMS Single Frequence Network (MBSFN) area and contains MBSFN area related parameters.

attribute.name: MbsfnAreaId
attribute.description: The value component of the Relative Distinguished Name (RDN).

attribute.name: userLabel
attribute.description: Label for free use.

attribute.name: mbsfnAreaIdentity
attribute.description: Specifies the MBSFN area identity.

attribute.name: nonMbsfnRegionLength
attribute.description: Specifies how many symbols from the beginning of the subframe constitute the non-MBSFN region. This value applies in all subframes of the MBSFN area used for PMCH transmission. The values 1 and 2 correspond to 1 and 2 symbols, respectively.

attribute.name: notificationIndicator
attribute.description: Specifies which PDCCH bit is used to notify the UE about change of the MCCH applicable for this MBSFN area. Value 0 corresponds with the least significant bit as defined in TS 36.212 and so on.

attribute.name: mcchRepetitionPeriod
attribute.description: Specifies the interval between transmissions of MCCH information, in radio frames, Value 32 corresponds to 32 radio frames, 64 corresponds to 64 radio frames and so on.
attribute.dependencies: For the MO PmchMch with the smallest value of sfAllocEnd of all PmchMch MOs belonging to a certain MbsfnArea, the mchSchedulingPeriod must be smaller than or equal to mcchRepetitionPeriod.

attribute.name: mcchOffset
attribute.description: Specifies, together with the mcchRepetitionPeriod, the radio frames in which MCCH is scheduled i.e. MCCH is scheduled in radio frames for which: SFN mod mcchRepetitionPeriod = mcch-Offset.

attribute.name: mcchModificationPeriod
attribute.description: Specifies periodically appearing boundaries, i.e. radio frames for which SFN mod mcch-ModificationPeriod = 0, The contents of different transmissions of MCCH information can only be different if there is at least one such boundary in-between them.
attribute.dependencies: The mchSchedulingPeriod in the MO class PmchMch must be smaller than or equal to mcchModificationPeriod.

attribute.name: sfAllocInfo
attribute.description: Indicates the subframes of the radio frames indicated by the mcch-RepetitionPeriod and the mcch-Offset, that may carry MCCH. Value "1" indicates that the corresponding subframe is allocated. Value "0" indicates that the corresponding subframe is notallocated.The following mapping applies: FDD: The first/ leftmost bit defines the allocation for subframe #1 of the radio frame indicated by mcch-RepetitionPeriod and mcch-Offset, the second bit for #2, the third bit for #3 , the fourth bit for #6, the fifth bit for #7 and the sixth bit for #8. TDD: The first/leftmost bit defines the allocation for subframe #3 of the radio frame indicated by mcch-RepetitionPeriod and mcch-Offset, the second bit for #4, third bit for #7, fourth bit for #8, fifth bit for #9. Uplink subframes are not allocated. The last bit is not used.

attribute.name: signallingMCS
attribute.description: Indicates the Modulation and Coding Scheme (MCS) applicable for the subframes indicated by the field sf-AllocInfo and for the first subframe of each MCH scheduling period (which may contain the MCH scheduling information provided by MAC). Value 2 corresponds with the value 2 for parameter I-MCS in TS 36.213, Table 7.1.7.1-1], and so on.

attribute.name: commonSFAlloc
attribute.description: Specifies the subframes that are reserved for MBSFN in downlink.

attribute.name: commonSFAllocPeriod
attribute.description: Specifies the period during which resources corresponding with field commonSFAlloc are divided between the (P)MCH that are configured for this MBSFN area. The subframe allocation patterns, as defined by commonSFAlloc, repeat continously during this period. Value 4 corresponds to 4 radio frames, 8 corresponds to 8 radio frames and so on.
attribute.dependencies: The mchSchedulingPeriod in the MO class PmchMch must be a multiple of commonSFAllocPeriod.

attribute.name: notificationConfiguration
attribute.description: Notification configuration Note: If several MbsfnArea are activated for a cell, the notificationConfiguration of highest notificationConfigurationPriority will be used.

attribute.name: administrativeState
attribute.description: The administrative state.

class.name: PmchMch
class.description: This MO represents configuration related to the Uu physical and transport layers for Multimedia Broadcast Multicast Service (MBMS).

attribute.name: PmchMchId
attribute.description: The value component of the Relative Distinguished Name (RDN).

attribute.name: userLabel
attribute.description: Label for free use.

attribute.name: sfAllocEnd
attribute.description: Specifies the last subframe allocated to this (P)MCH within a period identified by field commonSF-AllocPeriod. The subframes allocated to (P)MCH corresponding with the nth entry in pmch-InfoList are the subsequent subframes starting from either the subframe identified by sf-AllocEnd of the (n-1)th listed (P)MCH or, for n=1, the first subframe, through the subframe identified by sf-AllocEnd of the nth listed (P)MCH. Value 0 corresponds with the first subframe defined by field commonSF-Alloc.

attribute.name: dataMcs
attribute.description: Specifies the value for parameter I-MCS in TS 36.213, Table 7.1.7.1-1, which defines the Modulation and Coding Scheme (MCS) applicable for the subframes of this (P)MCH as indicated by the field commonSF-Alloc. The MCS does however neither apply to the subframes that may carry MCCH i.e. the subframes indicated by the field sf-AllocInfo within SystemInformationBlockType13 nor for the first subframe of each MCH scheduling period (which may contain the MCH scheduling information provided by MAC).

attribute.name: mchSchedulingPeriod
attribute.description: Specifies the MCH scheduling period i.e. the periodicity used for providing MCH scheduling information at lower layers (MAC) applicable for an MCH. Value 8 corresponds to 8 radio frames, 16 corresponds to 16 radio frames and so on.
attribute.dependencies: The mchSchedulingPeriod must be a multiple of commonSFAllocPeriod in the MO class MbsfnArea. For the MO PmchMch with the smallest value of sfAllocEnd of all PmchMch MOs belonging to a certain MbsfnArea, the mchSchedulingPeriod must be smaller than or equal to mcchRepetitionPeriod.

class.name: MbmsService
class.description: This MO represents configuration related to a Multimedia Broadcast Multicast Service (MBMS) Bearer service.

attribute.name: pmMbmsSessionEnd
attribute.description: The total number of MBMS session stopped is incremented each time when the MBMS session duration timeout.
attribute.condition: Stepped for each MBMS session stopped due to MBMS session duration timeout.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmMbmsSessionEstabAtt
attribute.description: The total number of MBMS session establishment attempts is incremented each time when the MBMS SESSON START REQUEST is received.
attribute.condition: Stepped for each MBMS session in the M3 message: MBMS SESSION START REQUEST.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmMbmsSessionEstabFailNotSupp
attribute.description: The total number of MBMS sessions failed to be established due to unsupported configuration in eNB is incremented each time when the MBMS SESSON START FAILED is sent.
attribute.condition: Stepped for each MBMS session that fails to be established due to unsupported configuration in eNB.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmMbmsSessionEstabFailUpdate
attribute.description: The total number of MBMS sessions failed to be established due to unsupported MBMS session updating in eNB is incremented each time when the MBMS SESSON START FAILED is sent for already started session.
attribute.condition: Stepped for each MBMS session that fails to be established due to unsupported configuration updating in eNB.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmMbmsSessionEstabSucc
attribute.description: The total number of MBMS sessions successfully established in eNB is incremented each time when the MBMS SESSON START RESPONSE is sent.
attribute.condition: Stepped for each MBMS session when eNB sends M3 message: MBMS SESSION RESPONSE back to MME.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmMbmsSessionStopAuditTimer
attribute.description: The total number of MBMS session stopped is incremented each time when the Mbms audit timeout.
attribute.condition: Stepped for each MBMS session stopped due to Mbms Audit timeout
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmMbmsSessionStopMme
attribute.description: The total number of MBMS session stopped is incremented each time when eNB receives MBMS SESSION STOP REQUEST.
attribute.condition: Stepped for each MBMS session stopped due to received message: MBMS SESSION STOP REQUEST.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmMbmsSessionStopMmeNoSession
attribute.description: The total number of MBMS session stopped is incremented each time when eNB receives MBMS SESSION STOP REQUEST for already stopped session.
attribute.condition: Stepped for each MBMS session stopped when eNB received: MBMS SESSION STOP REQUEST for already stopped session.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: MbmsServiceId
attribute.description: The value component of the Relative Distinguished Name (RDN).

attribute.name: userLabel
attribute.description: Label for free use.

attribute.name: availabilityStatus
attribute.description: The availability status. It contains details about operationalState. This attribute is set by the application in the RBS.

attribute.name: operationalState
attribute.description: The operational state.

attribute.name: tmgiList
attribute.description: List of Temporary Mobile Group Identities.

attribute.name: sessionIdPresent
attribute.description: Specifies whether the sessionId shall be present for this MBMS service.

attribute.name: sessionId
attribute.description: Identifies the identity of a session of an MBMS service. The field contains one octet string.

attribute.name: clientSessionId
attribute.description: This identifies a MBMS bearer in the BB. The same ID is used by IPGen to map the flow to a bearer.

attribute.name: logicalChannelIdentity
attribute.description: The logical channel identity.

attribute.name: pmMbmsPktRecSynchPayload
attribute.description: Number of received MBMS SYNC PDU type 1 (payload) packets.
attribute.condition: The counter steps when MBMS SYNC packets of PDU type 1 (payload) is received.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmMbmsPktRecSynchCtrl
attribute.description: Number of received MBMS SYNC PDU type 0 or 3 (control) packets.
attribute.condition: The counter steps when MBMS SYNC packets of PDU type 0 or 3 (control) is received.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmMbmsPktLostSynchPayload
attribute.description: The number of MBMS SYNC packets that are lost due to transmission or due to the packet arriving at the eNB too late.
attribute.condition: The counter accumulates the number of MBMS SYNC packets which are missing when making MCH Scheduling Information (MSI).
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmMbmsPktDiscSynchPayloadTooOld
attribute.description: The number of MBMS SYNC packets that are discarded due to the packet too old.
attribute.condition: The counter accumulates the number of MBMS SYNC packets which are too old when making MCH Scheduling Information (MSI).
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmMbmsPktDiscSynchPayloadMuted
attribute.description: The number of MBMS SYNC packets that are muted due to lost of packets.
attribute.condition: The counter accumulates the number of muted MBMS SYNC packets due to lost of packets when making MCH Scheduling Information (MSI)
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmMbmsPktDiscSynchPayloadTooMuch
attribute.description: The number of MBMS SYNC packets that are discarded due to packets too much to fit the subframes in Uu.
attribute.condition: The counter accumulates the number of MBMS SYNC packets which are too much when making MCH Scheduling Information (MSI).
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmMbmsVolReceived
attribute.description: The total volume (SYNC SDU) that is received.
attribute.condition: The counter accumulates the MBMS SYNC SDU's which are received.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmMbmsVolTrans
attribute.description: The total volumes (SYNC SDU's) are transmitted.
attribute.condition: The counter accumulates the MBMS SYNC SDU's which are transmitted when making MSI.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmZtemporary55
attribute.description: Normally this counter is not used, it can however sometimes be temporarily used for very late additions in a release. If so, for description see Network Impact Report in the CPI.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

class.name: MbsfnAreaCellRelation
class.description: This managed object represents the relationship between a MBSFN Area and a EUTRAN cell.

attribute.name: MbsfnAreaCellRelationId
attribute.description: The value component of the Relative Distinguished Name (RDN).

attribute.name: userLabel
attribute.description: Label for free use.

attribute.name: mbsfnAreaCellRef
attribute.description: Reference to an related EUtranCell that supports the MBSFN Area.

attribute.name: isReservedCell
attribute.description: Defines if the related EUtranCell in MBSFN Area reserved cell or not. A Reserved Cell is a unicast cell. No data is sent in the MBSFN subframes. The Cell CSR (cell specific reference) will be sent as a normal unicast cell.

attribute.name: mbsfnAreaCellStatus
attribute.description: The MBSFN area status of the related Cell.

class.name: ReportConfigEUtraIFBestCell
class.description: This managed object contains the report configuration settings for best cell measurements on other LTE frequencies.

attribute.name: ReportConfigEUtraIFBestCellId
attribute.description: The value component of the Relative Distinguished Name (RDN).

attribute.name: a3offset
attribute.description: The offset value for eventA3.

attribute.name: hysteresisA3
attribute.description: The hysteresis value for eventA3.

attribute.name: triggerQuantityA3
attribute.description: The quantity that triggers the event.

attribute.name: timeToTriggerA3
attribute.description: The time-to-trigger value for eventA3

attribute.name: maxReportCellsA3
attribute.description: Max number of cells to include in the measurement report.

class.name: ReportConfigSearch
class.description: This managed object contains the report configuration settings for the measurements in the search area related to the feature Mobility Control at Poor Coverage. This corresponds to parameters needed for A2search, A1Search and A2Critical events.

attribute.name: ReportConfigSearchId
attribute.description: The value component of the Relative Distinguished Name (RDN).

attribute.name: a1a2SearchThresholdRsrp
attribute.description: The Reference Signal Received Power (RSRP) threshold value for events A1Search and A2Search.

attribute.name: a1a2SearchThresholdRsrq
attribute.description: The Reference Signal Received Quality (RSRQ) threshold value for events A1Search and A2Search.

attribute.name: hysteresisA1A2SearchRsrp
attribute.description: The hysteresis value for RSRP in events A1Search and A2Search measurements.

attribute.name: hysteresisA1A2SearchRsrq
attribute.description: The hysteresis value for RSRQ in events A1Search and A2Search measurements.

attribute.name: timeToTriggerA1Search
attribute.description: The time-to-trigger value for measurement in event A1Search.

attribute.name: timeToTriggerA2Search
attribute.description: The time-to-trigger value for measurement in event A2Search.

attribute.name: a2CriticalThresholdRsrp
attribute.description: The Reference Signal Received Power (RSRP) threshold value for event A2Critical.

attribute.name: a2CriticalThresholdRsrq
attribute.description: The Reference Signal Received Quality (RSRQ) threshold value for event A2Critical.

attribute.name: hysteresisA2CriticalRsrp
attribute.description: The hysteresis value for RSRP in event A2Critical measurement.

attribute.name: hysteresisA2CriticalRsrq
attribute.description: The hysteresis value for RSRQ in event A2Critical measurement.

attribute.name: timeToTriggerA2Critical
attribute.description: The time-to-trigger value for measurement in event A2Critical.

class.name: SectorCarrier
class.description: This MO represents the power and frequency usage of the SectorEquipmentFunction that covers an area.

attribute.name: SectorCarrierId
attribute.description: The value component of the RDN.

attribute.name: availabilityStatus
attribute.description: The availability status. It contains details about operationalState. This attribute is set by the application in the RBS.

attribute.name: operationalState
attribute.description: The operational state. This attribute is set by the application in the RBS.

attribute.name: sectorFunctionRef
attribute.description: Reference to an instance of SectorEquipmentFunction MO.

attribute.name: reservedBy
attribute.description: Contains a list of MO instances that reserve this MO instance.

attribute.name: noOfRxAntennas
attribute.description: The number of antennas that can be used for uplink beamforming/MIMO A parameter value of 0 means that the available configured resources will be used.
attribute.dependencies: Dependent on optional features that enable usage of multiple Rx antennas.

attribute.name: noOfTxAntennas
attribute.description: The number of antennas that can be used for downlink beamforming/MIMO A parameter value of 0 means that the available configured resources will be used.
attribute.dependencies: Dependent on optional features that enable usage of multiple Tx antennas.

attribute.name: noOfUsedRxAntennas
attribute.description: The number of used receive antennas. The value -1 indicates that the number of used antennas is undefined. The maximum number of this parameter is determined by the parameter noOfRxAntennas.

attribute.name: noOfUsedTxAntennas
attribute.description: The number of used transmit antennas. The value -1 indicates that the number of used antennas is undefined. The maximum number of this parameter is determined by the parameter noOfTxAntennas.

attribute.name: partOfSectorPower
attribute.description:
The requested part of the total power in the SectorEquipment that should be allocated for the sectorCarrier. The output power is evenly distributed over the antenna connectors used for TX transmission that are allocated for the SectorCarrier.
If the total amount of power per antenna connector of a SectorEquipment is over 100% when the cell using the SectorCarrier is unlocked, an alarm will be generated.

attribute.name: maximumTransmissionPower
attribute.description:
Maximum possible power at the antenna reference point, for all downlink channels in all TX branches used simultaneously in the SectorCarrier. -1 is used as an undefined value.
Note: Setting partOfSectorPower or confOutputPower (MO SectorEquipmentFunction) has an impact on this attribute. See Radio Network Configuration user guide 11/1553-HSC 105 50/1.

attribute.name: prsEnabled
attribute.description: If true, the Positioning Reference Signal will be sent from this sectorCarrier.

attribute.name: pmActiveUeUlSumSectorCarrier
attribute.description: Number of UEs considered active in the uplink direction.
attribute.condition: The counter aggregates for each TTI the number of UEs with buffer status reports indicating DRB data to be sent in the uplink direction.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmActiveUeDlSumSectorCarrier
attribute.description: Number of UEs considered active in the downlink direction.
attribute.condition: The counter aggregates for each TTI the number of UEs with DRB data to be sent in the downlink direction.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmZtemporary56
attribute.description: Normally this counter is not used, it can however sometimes be temporarily used for very late additions in a release. If so, for description see Network Impact Report in the CPI.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

class.name: UcToolFunction
class.description: Includes attributes needed to support functionality related to the UE simulator UcTool-Light.

attribute.name: operationalState
attribute.description: Defines the operational state

attribute.name: initUcToolConnection
attribute.description: Initiates the connection to UCTool
attribute.dependencies: At least one SrioTestPort MO must be created to be able to set the parameter to true.
attribute.disturbances: Requires a node restart to take affect

attribute.name: activateVcXoClock
attribute.description: Indicates that the 30.72 MHz VcXo clock shall be sent out on the production test port by the GIC.
attribute.disturbances: Requires a node restart to take affect

attribute.name: UcToolFunctionId
attribute.description: The value component of the RDN.

class.name: UlCompGroup
class.description: Defines a set of sectorCarriers. Uplink Coordinated multi-point reception of antenna signals is possible only between antenna signals from sectorCarriers within the same set of sectorCarriers.

attribute.name: UlCompGroupId
attribute.description: The value component of the Relative Distinguished Name (RDN).

attribute.name: sectorCarrierRef
attribute.description: Defines a set of sectorCarriers. Uplink Coordinated multi-point reception of antenna signals is possible only between antenna signals from sectorCarriers within the same set of sectorCarriers. There shall be at least one sectorCarrier per UlCompGroup.

attribute.name: administrativeState
attribute.description: The administrative state.

attribute.name: availabilityStatus
attribute.description: The availability status. It contains details about operationalState. This attribute is set by the application in the RBS.

attribute.name: operationalState
attribute.description: The operational state. This attribute is set by the application in the RBS.

class.name: OpProfiles
class.description: This MO Class contains settings for the Operational Profiles Manager. Operational Profiles are used to tune the system for certain deployments.

attribute.name: OpProfilesId
attribute.description: The value component of the RDN.

attribute.name: profileList
attribute.description: The list of available Operational Profiles. The array of Operational Profiles is initialized by the system based on the list of registered Operational Profiles. The profiles configured as active are automatically applied by the system.

action.name: activateProfile
action.description: Activates an Operational Profile from the available list. May result in traffic disturbance - see description of each profile in CPI.

parameter.name: opProfileName
parameter.description: The name of the profile to activate.

action.disturbances: Activation of some profiles may require lock/unlock of cells or other action.

action.name: deactivateProfile
action.description: Deactivates an Operational Profile from the available list. May result in traffic disturbance - see description of each profile in CPI.

parameter.name: opProfileName
parameter.description: The name of the profile to deactivate.

action.disturbances: Deactivation of some profiles may require lock/unlock of cells or other action.

class.name: ReportConfigInterRatLb
class.description: The MO contains the report configuration settings for UE measurements that are initiated for Inter-RAT load balancing actions.

attribute.name: ReportConfigInterRatLbId
attribute.description: Value component of the RDN

attribute.name: utranB1ThresholdRscp
attribute.description: RSCP threshold value for the event B1 measurement

attribute.name: utranHysteresisB1
attribute.description: Hysteresis value for the event B1 measurement

class.name: ExternalCdma20001xRttCell
class.description: The MO represents a CDMA2000 1xRTT cell.

attribute.name: ExternalCdma20001xRttCellId
attribute.description: Value component of the RDN

attribute.name: pnOffset
attribute.description: CDMA physical cell identity

attribute.name: reservedBy
attribute.description: List of MO instances that reserve this MO instance
attribute.dependencies: The MO cannot be deleted if it is reserved.

attribute.name: acBarring1xRttForMoDataPresent
attribute.description: Presence indication in SIB8 of Information Element acBarring1xRttMoData

attribute.name: mscIdentifier
attribute.description: MSC identity in CDMA 1xRTT network If this 1xRTT cell is referred by EUtranCellFDD or EUtranCellTDD, this identifier will be used by eNodeB for tunnelling of 1xRTT signaling messages towards this MSC. It has to be configured for LTE CSFB to 1xRTT features since it is used to fill a field in S1AP message sent to MME.

attribute.name: sid
attribute.description: System unique identifier (15bits) This attribute is used along with the NID as a pair to control when the UE should register or reregister with the CDMA2000 1xRTT network. SID=0 is reserved. It is broadcast on SIB8. It is also used with CellId, SectorNumber and NID for the 1xRTT cell global identity.

attribute.name: nid
attribute.description: Network unique identifier (16 bits) within a system used along with the sid as a pair to control when the UE should register or reregister with the CDMA2000 1xRTT network NID=0 and NID=65535 are reserved.

attribute.name: cellIdentifier
attribute.description: Cell identifier This attribute includes parameters that helps uniquely identify 1xRTT cells. If this 1xRTT cell is referred by EUtranCellFDD or EUtranCellTDD, marketId, switchNumber, cellId, and sectorNumber must be used to set the IE CDMA2000 Sector ID in S1AP message, Uplink S1 CDMA2000 tunneling. For the 1xRTT cell Global Identity, CellId, SectorNumber, SID and NID are used. SID and NID will be sent on SIB8 for preregistration to 1xRTT system.

attribute.name: acBarring1xRttMoData
attribute.description: Access Barring parameters for CDMA2000 1xRTT capable UE originating signaling The information is broadcast in SIB8. This is controlled by the licensing MO CsfbTo1xRtt and acBarring1xRttForMoDataPresent

attribute.name: csfbRegParams1xRttMoData
attribute.description: Information for preregistration to 1xRTT system The information is broadcast in SIB8. This information, together with the information in mobilityParams1xRttMoData, must be used to build IE in RRC messages: CSFBParametersResponseCDMA2000 and HandoverFromEUTRAPreparationRequest. This is controlled by the licensing MO CsfbTo1xRtt.

attribute.name: mobilityParams1xRttMoData
attribute.description: Information for registration/reregistration to 1xRTT system The information, together with the information in csfbRegParams1xRttMoData, is used to build the IE in RRC messages: CSFBParametersResponseCDMA2000 and HandoverFromEUTRAPreparationRequest. This is controlled by the licensing MO CsfbTo1xRtt.

attribute.name: userLabel
attribute.description: Label for free use

class.name: Cdma20001xRttBandRelation
class.description: The MO represents a mobility relation between an EUtranCellFDD or an EUtranCellTDD and a Cdma20001xRTTFreqBand. It contains parameters that are specific for this relation.

attribute.name: cdma2000FreqBandRef
attribute.description: Reference to the CDMA2000 frequency band MO, Cdma2000FreqBand

attribute.name: Cdma20001xRttBandRelationId
attribute.description: Value component of the RDN

attribute.name: cellReselectionPriority
attribute.description: Absolute priority of the RAT (0 means: lowest priority)

attribute.name: threshXHigh1xRtt
attribute.description:
Threshold used in reselection towards a high priority CDMA2000 1xRTT band class, expressed as an unsigned binary number equal to FLOOR ([-2 x 10 x log10 Ec/Io]) in units of 0.5 dB
If sNonServingCell > threshXHigh1xRtt, reselection is considered towards the band class with higher priority. The condition must be valid during the period defined by attribute tReselectionCdma1xRtt.
sNonServingCell is the RX-level value of a neighboring cell.

attribute.name: threshXLow1xRtt
attribute.description:
Threshold used in reselection towards a low priority CDMA2000 1xRTT band class expressed as an unsigned binary number equal to FLOOR ([-2 x 10 x log10 Ec/Io]) in units of 0.5 db.
If sServingCell < threshServingLow and sNeighbor > threshXLow (see corresponding attribute), reselection towards this lower prioritized band class is considered. The condition must be valid during the period defined by attribute tReselectionCdma1xRtt.
sServingCell is the RX level value of the serving cell and sNeighborCell is the RX level value of a neighbor frequency.

attribute.name: userLabel
attribute.description: Label for free use

class.name: Cdma20001xRttFreqRelation
class.description: The MO represents a mobility relation between an EUtranCellFDD or an EUtranCellTDD and a Cdma20001xRTTFreq. It contains parameters that are specific for this relation.

attribute.name: cdma2000FreqRef
attribute.description: Reference to the Cdma2000Freq MO

attribute.name: Cdma20001xRttFreqRelationId
attribute.description: Value component of the RDN

attribute.name: csFallbackPrio
attribute.description: CDMA2000 1xRTT CSFB frequency priority This attribute prioritizes CDMA2000 1xRTT frequencies among all frequencies related to the cell for UEs in connected mode. Sets the priority to which frequency/frequency group to make CS Falback. The value 0 means the lowest priority. The value 7 means the highest priority.

attribute.name: csFallbackPrioEC
attribute.description: CDMA2000 1xRTT frequency priority for emergency calls This attribute prioritizes CDMA2000 1xRTT frequencies for emergency calls among all frequencies/frequency groups related to the cell for UEs in connected mode. Sets the priority to which frequency to make emergency call CS Fallback. The value 0 means the lowest priority. The value 7 means the highest priority.

attribute.name: userLabel
attribute.description: Label for free use

attribute.name: qOffsetFreq
attribute.description: Frequency-specific offset to apply when evaluating triggering conditions for measurement reporting

class.name: Cdma20001xRttCellRelation
class.description: The MO represents a mobility relation between an EUtranCellFDD or an EUtranCellTDD and a Cdma20001xRTTCell. It contains parameters that are specific for this relation.

attribute.name: externalCdma20001xRttCellRef
attribute.description: Reference to a ExternalCdma20001xRttCell

attribute.name: Cdma20001xRttCellRelationId
attribute.description: Value component of the RDN

attribute.name: includeInSystemInformation
attribute.description: CDMA2000 cell inclusion in system information This attribute Indicates whether the CDMA2000 cell is included in System Information. When the value is set to false, the CDMA2000 cell is not included in SIB8. A maximum of 16 CDMA2000 cells can be included per frequency. A maximum of 32 CDMA2000 cells can be included in SIB8.
attribute.dependencies: Restriction: The referred cell shall only set one of the attributes (includeInSystemInformation or includeInSystemInformationRel9) value to true.

attribute.name: includeInSystemInformationRel9
attribute.description: CDMA2000 cell inclusion in Release 9 part of system information This attribute indicates whether the CDMA2000 cell is included in the Release 9 part of System Information. When the value is set to false, the CDMA2000 cell is not included in the Release 9 part of SIB8. A maximum of 16 CDMA2000 cells can be included per frequency in the Release 9 part. A total maximum of 32 CDMA2000 cells can be included in SIB8.
attribute.dependencies: Restriction: The referred cell shall only set one of the attributes (includeInSystemInformation or includeInSystemInformationRel9) value to true. Dependencies: In 3GPP rel9, the possiblity to add 16 additional CDMA2000 cells on the same frequency, was added. The additional CDMA2000 cells are controled by the parameter includeInSystemInformationRel9.

attribute.name: userLabel
attribute.description: Label for free use

attribute.name: pmHoPrepAttCsfb
attribute.description: Number of attempts to start outgoing handover preparation triggered by CS Fallback
attribute.condition: Enhanced CS Fallback has been initiated for the UE and the eNodeB has selected a target cell for handover.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmHoPrepSuccCsfb
attribute.description: Number of successful handover preparations triggered by CS Fallback
attribute.condition: The S1AP message Downlink S1 CDMA Tunnelling is receiveda nd the "HO success" is indicated for enhanced CS fallback.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmHoPrepAttCsfbEm
attribute.description: Number of attempts to start outgoing handover preparation triggered by high priority CS Fallback
attribute.condition: EnhancedCS Fallback for emergency call has been initiated for the UE and the eNodeB has selected a target cell for handover.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmHoPrepSuccCsfbEm
attribute.description: Number of successful handover preparations triggered by high priority CS Fallback
attribute.condition: The S1AP message Downlink S1 CDMA Tunneling is received and the "HO success" is indicated for enhanced CS fallback for emergency call.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

class.name: ReportConfigCsfbCdma2000
class.description: The MO contains report configuration settings for the B1 or B2 event for CDMA2000 1xRTT measurements, used when searching for a suitable target cell when CS Fallback is triggered for the UE.

attribute.name: thresholdCdma20001xRtt
attribute.description: Signal Quality in the thresholdCDMA2000, threshold value for eventB1

attribute.name: hysteresis
attribute.description: Hysteresis value for the eventB1 measurement on CDMA2000

attribute.name: maxReportCells
attribute.description: Maximum number of cells to include in the measurement report for the eventB1 measurement for CDMA2000

attribute.name: minReportPilots
attribute.description: Maximum number of cells to trigger to generate pilot list

attribute.name: reportAmount
attribute.description: Number of reports for periodical reporting for the eventB1 measurement The value 0 means that reports are sent as long as the event is fulfilled.

attribute.name: ReportConfigCsfbCdma2000Id
attribute.description: Value component of the RDN

attribute.name: reportInterval
attribute.description: Interval for event triggered periodical reporting for the eventB1 measurement for CDMA2000

attribute.name: timeToTrigger
attribute.description: Time to trigger value for the eventB1 measurement on CDMA2000

class.name: SchDeviceSet
class.description: This MO is created by the auto-configuration function (attribute autoConfigurationAllowed must be set to TRUE in MO ManagedElementDatafunction) when the grand-parent AuxPlugInUnit or PlugInUnit is created. For the MO to be correctly configured the AuxPlugInUnit or PlugInUnit must refer to a proper PiuType.

attribute.name: SchDeviceSetId
attribute.description: The value component of the RDN.

attribute.name: availabilityStatus
attribute.description: The availability status. It contains details about operationalState.

attribute.name: operationalState
attribute.description: The operational state.

attribute.name: usageState
attribute.description:
Indicates the usage of a device group:
• ACTIVE • BUSY • IDLE

class.name: CellDeviceSet
class.description: This MO is created by the auto-configuration function (attribute autoConfigurationAllowed must be set to TRUE in MO ManagedElementDatafunction) when the grand-parent AuxPlugInUnit or PlugInUnit is created. For the MO to be correctly configured the AuxPlugInUnit or PlugInUnit must refer to a proper PiuType.

attribute.name: CellDeviceSetId
attribute.description: The value component of the RDN.

attribute.name: availabilityStatus
attribute.description: The availability status. It contains details about operationalState.

attribute.name: operationalState
attribute.description: The operational state.

attribute.name: usageState
attribute.description:
Indicates the usage of a device group:
• ACTIVE • BUSY • IDLE

class.name: SchDevice
class.description: This MO is created by the auto-configuration function (attribute autoConfigurationAllowed must be set to TRUE in MO ManagedElementDatafunction) when the grand-parent AuxPlugInUnit or PlugInUnit is created. For the MO to be correctly configured the AuxPlugInUnit or PlugInUnit must refer to a proper PiuType.

attribute.name: SchDeviceId
attribute.description: The value component of the RDN.

attribute.name: reservedBy
attribute.description: Lists the MO instances that reserve this MO instance.

attribute.name: availabilityStatus
attribute.description: The availability status. It contains details about operationalState.

attribute.name: usageState

Indicates the usage of a device group:
• ACTIVE • BUSY • IDLE

class.name: Cpu
class.description: This MO abstracts one CPU on the Plug In Board
class.deprecated: Since L11B. Has no funtional behaviour.

attribute.name: CpuId
attribute.description: The value component of the Relative Distinguished Name (RDN).
attribute.deprecated: Since L11B. Planned to be removed.

attribute.name: pmProcessorLoadDistr
attribute.description:
A distribution of the main processor load.
PDF ranges: [0]: 0 <= Cpu Load < 20 % [1]: 20 <= Cpu Load < 30 % [2]: 30 <= Cpu Load < 40 % [3]: 40 <= Cpu Load < 50 % [4]: 50 <= Cpu Load < 60 % [5]: 60 <= Cpu Load < 70 % [6]: 70 <= Cpu Load < 80 % [7]: 80 <= Cpu Load < 85 % [8]: 85 <= Cpu Load < 90 % [9]: 90 <= Cpu Load < 95 % [10]:95 <= Cpu Load
attribute.deprecated: Since L11B. Planned to be removed.
attribute.condition: Automatic and continuous measurement, where a sample for the distribution is obtained every 10 seconds.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

class.name: ProcessorLoad
class.description: This MO abstracts the Processor Load Measurement

attribute.name: ProcessorLoadId
attribute.description: The value component of the Relative Distinguished Name (RDN).

attribute.name: pmProcessorLoadDistr
attribute.description:
A distribution of the main processor load.
PDF ranges: [0]: 0 <= Cpu Load < 20 % [1]: 20 <= Cpu Load < 30 % [2]: 30 <= Cpu Load < 40 % [3]: 40 <= Cpu Load < 50 % [4]: 50 <= Cpu Load < 60 % [5]: 60 <= Cpu Load < 70 % [6]: 70 <= Cpu Load < 80 % [7]: 80 <= Cpu Load < 85 % [8]: 85 <= Cpu Load < 90 % [9]: 90 <= Cpu Load < 95 % [10]:95 <= Cpu Load
attribute.condition: Automatic and continuous measurement, where a sample for the distribution is obtained every 10 seconds.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: userLabel
attribute.description: Label for free use.

attribute.name: pmZtemporary46
attribute.description: Normally this counter is not used, it can however sometimes be temporarily used for very late additions in a release. If so, for description see Network Impact Report in the CPI.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: piuFroId
attribute.description: The fRO id for the grand parent PlugInUnit MO.

class.name: BbProcessingResource
class.description: Represents the baseband processing resource in a DU used for the eNB application in the RBS

attribute.name: licCapDistr
attribute.description: Used to set the amount of the licensed capacity a baseband processing resource is allowed to use
attribute.dependencies:
Can only be set if licCapDistrMethod is set to OPERATOR. If the sum of all BbProcessingResources isn't 100% the setting will be rejected.
Will show the distribution made by the RBS if licCapDistrMethod is set to SYSTEM.

attribute.name: BbProcessingResourceId
attribute.description: The value component of the RDN.

attribute.name: pmLicDlCapActual
attribute.description: The X percentile of the utilization for downlink baseband capacity during a measurement period. The value for X is set in the parameter licDlBbPercentileConf. Source Data: licDlBbPercentileConf and pmLicDlCapDistr
attribute.condition: Is calculated at the end of a ROP period.
attribute.scanner: Primary

attribute.name: pmLicDlCapDistr
attribute.scanner: Primary

attribute.name: pmLicUlCapActual
attribute.description: The X percentile of the utilization for uplink baseband capacity during a measurement period. The value for X is set in the parameter licUlBbPercentileConf. Source Data: licUlBbPercentileConf and pmLicUlCapDistr
attribute.condition: Is calculated at the end of a ROP period.
attribute.scanner: Primary

attribute.name: pmLicUlCapDistr
attribute.scanner: Primary

attribute.name: pmLicDlPrbCapActual
attribute.description: The X percentile of the utilization for DL PRB capacity during a measurement period. The value for X is set in the parameter licDlBbPercentileConf. Source Data: licDlPrbPercentileConf and pmLicDlPrbCapDistr
attribute.condition: Is calculated at the end of a ROP period.
attribute.scanner: Primary

attribute.name: pmLicDlPrbCapDistr
attribute.scanner: Primary

attribute.name: pmLicUlPrbCapActual
attribute.description: The X percentile of the utilization for UL PRB capacity during a measurement period. The value for X is set in the parameter licUlBbPercentileConf. Source Data: licUlPrbPercentileConf and pmLicUlPrbCapDistr
attribute.condition: Is calculated at the end of a ROP period.
attribute.scanner: Primary

attribute.name: pmLicUlPrbCapDistr
attribute.scanner: Primary

attribute.name: pmRohcCidSamp
attribute.description: Counts the number of times the corresponding Sum counters has been incremented. Associated ACC pmCounter pmRohcCidSum.
attribute.condition: The counter is increased at every occasion when the corresponding sum counter is increased.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmRohcCidSum
attribute.description: Sum of all sample values recorded for the number of Robust Header Compression context Ids.
attribute.condition: At each time sampled measurement, the result is added to the existing aggregated value.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmPdcpPktDiscDlEth
attribute.description: Total number of downlink packets (unicast DRB PDCP SDUs or MBMS SYNC SDUs) discarded in the Ethernet part of the eNB.
attribute.condition: Discarded PDCP SDUs in the Ethernet part between GTP-u and PDCP layer.
attribute.scanner: Primary

attribute.name: pmPdcpPktDiscDlNoUeCtxt
attribute.description: Number of DRB packets (PDCP SDUs) discarded in downlink due to that the specific Tunnel Endpoint Identifier (TEID) is not mapped to any UE context.
attribute.condition: Stepped when a downlink DRB packet (PDCP SDU) is discarded due to that the specific Tunnel Endpoint Identifier (TEID) is not mapped to any UE context.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmZtemporary47
attribute.description: Normally this counter is not used, it can however sometimes be temporarily used for very late additions in a release. If so, for description see Network Impact Report in the CPI.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.description: Normally this counter is not used, it can however sometimes be temporarily used for very late additions in a release. If so, for description see Network Impact Report in the CPI.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.description: Normally this counter is not used, it can however sometimes be temporarily used for very late additions in a release. If so, for description see Network Impact Report in the CPI.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.description: Normally this counter is not used, it can however sometimes be temporarily used for very late additions in a release. If so, for description see Network Impact Report in the CPI.

attribute.description: Normally this counter is not used, it can however sometimes be temporarily used for very late additions in a release. If so, for description see Network Impact Report in the CPI.

attribute.description: Normally this counter is not used, it can however sometimes be temporarily used for very late additions in a release. If so, for description see Network Impact Report in the CPI.

attribute.description: Normally this counter is not used, it can however sometimes be temporarily used for very late additions in a release. If so, for description see Network Impact Report in the CPI.

attribute.description: Normally this counter is not used, it can however sometimes be temporarily used for very late additions in a release. If so, for description see Network Impact Report in the CPI.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: piuFroId
attribute.description: Same value as piuFroId in parent DeviceGroup

attribute.name: pmPdcpPktDiscDlEthFormat
attribute.description: Number of downlink DRB packets (PDCP SDUs) discarded in the Ethernet part of the RBS due to that DL consistency check fails.
attribute.condition: Discarded PDCP SDUs in the Ethernet part between GTP-u and PDCP layer due to that DL consistency check fails.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmPdcpPktDiscDlEthBurst
attribute.description: Number of downlink DRB packets (PDCP SDUs) discarded in the Ethernet part of the RBS due to DL Burst overload control.
attribute.condition: Discarded PDCP SDUs in the Ethernet part between GTP-u and PDCP layer due to DL Burst overload control
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.condition: Discarded PDCP SDUs in the Ethernet part between GTP-u and PDCP layer due to DL X2 Forwarding pacing functionality.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

attribute.name: pmPdcpPktDiscUlEthPacing
attribute.description: Number of uplink DRB packets (PDCP SDUs) discarded in the Ethernet part of the RBS due UL pacing functionality.
attribute.condition: Discarded PDCP SDUs in the Ethernet part between GTP-u and PDCP layer due UL pacing functionality.
attribute.scanner: Primary

attribute.name: pmPdcpPktDiscDlNoMbmsCtxt
attribute.description: Number of MBMS SYNC packets discarded in downlink due to an unidentified MBMS bearer.
attribute.condition: Stepped when a downlink MBMS SYNC packet is discarded due to an unidentified MBMS bearer.
attribute.scanner: Not included in any predefined scanner

class.name: HwUnit
class.description:
This MO represents one Support System HW Unit, e.g. SCU, SAU, PSU.
Dependencies: Can only exist in the node when the attribute supportSystemControl on MO EquipmentSupportFunction is set to true.

attribute.name: piuType
attribute.description: Refers to the corresponding PiuType MO. Indirectly used to control the auto-configuration of HwUnit-contained MOs.

attribute.name: productData
attribute.description: The product data for the hardware unit. Matches the product data on the hardware unit label.

attribute.name: HwUnitId
attribute.description: The value component of the RDN.

attribute.name: userLabel
attribute.description: Label for free use.

attribute.name: unitType
attribute.description: Mirrors the attribute PiuType::productData(productName).

attribute.name: administrativeState
attribute.description: The administrative state.

attribute.name: availabilityStatus
attribute.description: The availability status containing details about operationalState.

attribute.name: operationalState
attribute.description: Defines the operational state.

attribute.name: greenLed
attribute.description: Indicates the operational status of the HW Unit.
attribute.deprecated: Since 11A. Replaced by operationalIndicator.

attribute.name: redLed
attribute.description: Indicates the fault status of the HW unit.
attribute.deprecated: Since 11A. Replaced by faultIndicator.

attribute.name: position
attribute.description: The absolute position of the hardware unit in a shelf. Positions start from left or ground with the first position numbered 1. A board can occupy more than one position, depending on its width. When a board occupies more than one position, its position number is the left-most position it occupies.

attribute.name: positionInformation
attribute.description:
The position of a hardware unit can be:
- In a shelf - Not in a shelf but inside or outside the cabinet - At a remote site
If the hardware is contained in a shelf, the attribute position is used. Otherwise this attribute can be used, for example, to provide the address of a remote site, or to indicate that the hardware unit is installed in connection to a specific shelf.

attribute.name: positionRef
attribute.description: Refers to the cabinet or shelf in which the hardware unit is placed or belongs.

attribute.name: operationalIndicator
attribute.description:
The operational status of the hardware unit as shown by the optical operational indicator on the unit.
Valid values: • NOT_APPLICABLE = This indicator is not supported. • NOT_AVAILABLE = The indicator state is currently not available. • OFF = No power. • STEADY_ON = Operational. • SLOW_BLINK = Dependent resource missing.

attribute.name: faultIndicator
attribute.description:
The fault status of the hardware unit as shown by the optical fault indicator on the unit.
Valid values: • NOT_APPLICABLE = This indicator is not supported. • NOT_AVAILABLE = The indicator state is currently not available. • OFF = No HW fault. • STEADY_ON = HW Fault.

attribute.name: batteryFaultIndicator
attribute.description:
The current fault indicator status of the battery shown by the optical battery fault indicator on the corresponding Battery Fuse Unit (BFU).
Possible values: • NOT_APPLICABLE = The indicator is not supported. • NOT_AVAILABLE = The indicator state is currently unavailable. • OFF = The battery is connected and no fault exists in the unit. • STEADY_ON = The battery is potentially faulty and must be examined. • SLOW_BLINK = The battery is manually disconnected or the circuit breaker has tripped and the battery is disconnected from the system voltage.

attribute.name: powerDistrFaultIndicator
attribute.description:
The current fault indicator status of power distribution. The indicator is lit if any of the e-fuses have been tripped. The indicator is physically located on the corresponding Power Distribution Unit (PDU).
Valid values: • NOT_APPLICABLE = This indicator is not supported. • NOT_AVAILABLE = The indicator state is currently not available. • OFF = No power distribution fault. • SLOW_BLINK = Power distribution fault.

action.name: restartUnit
action.description: Restarts the corresponding HW unit.
action.disturbances: This action may affect traffic.

class.name: Cabinet
class.description: This MO represents the cabinet where the node is hosted.

attribute.name: cabinetIdentifier
attribute.description: Unique identifier of the cabinet. An undefined value is shown as an empty string that indicates no contact with SCU, SUP or support system controlling node.
attribute.dependencies: Reflects the value of attribute productData; productNumber and serialNumber on the HwUnit MO with attribute hwUnitType set to SCU/SUP.

attribute.name: productData
attribute.description: Enclosure Product Information Data (PID). To guarantee that the data survives a main processor replacement, the data is stored persistently in both the database and in the corresponding Support Control Unit (SCU). Mismatches of stored data generate an alarm.
attribute.dependencies: Must match the PID on the enclosure label. Possible to write in the node only when the attribute supportSystemControl on MO EquipmentSupportFunction is set to true.

attribute.name: cabinetParameters
attribute.description: Cabinet specific parameters for fan control and cabinet configuration. Parameter value modification is only intended for Node Verification to determine good values of the cabinet parameter profiles.
attribute.dependencies: Typically reflects the value of cabinetParametersProfileStandard or cabinetParametersProfileExtended, depending on the value of the attribute climateSystem. The parameter values given by the selected profile can be overridden. The attribute cabinetParameters is not mirrored between support system controlling node and support system external nodes. It must be changed both in support system controlling node and support system external nodes. The value given in [1] ( index 1) will result in number of MO FanGroup

attribute.name: cabinetParametersProfileStandard
attribute.description: Cabinet parameters profile for a standard climate system. The specification of each parameter with unit and valid range is pre-defined in document Support System Configuration Data, 1/15502-HRB 105 602.

attribute.name: cabinetParametersProfileExtended
attribute.description: Cabinet parameters profile for an extended climate system. The specification of each parameter with unit and valid range is pre-defined in document Support System Configuration Data, 1/15502-HRB 105 602.

attribute.name: climateSystem
attribute.description: The type of climate system used, and indirectly the number of fan groups in the cabinet.
attribute.dependencies: Only valid in the node where the attribute supportSystemControl in MO EquipmentSupportFunction is set to true.

attribute.name: CabinetId
attribute.description: The value component of the RDN.

attribute.name: reservedBy
attribute.description: Contains a list of MO instances that reserve this MO instance.

attribute.name: climateControlMode
attribute.description: Specifies in which mode to run the climate control. Valid values: • NORMAL (default mode) • BATTERY_LIFE_EXTENSION (Improves battery life time. This mode may cause increased acoustic noise. This mode is only applicable for RBS with internal batteries)
attribute.dependencies: Only valid in the node where the attribute supportSystemControl in MO EquipmentSupportFunction is set to true.

attribute.name: smokeDetector
attribute.description: Specifies if smoke detector is used or not in this cabinet.
attribute.dependencies: Only valid in the node where the attribute supportSystemControl on MO EquipmentSupportFunction is set to true.

class.name: AlarmPort
class.description:
This MO models an Alarm Port. It is used to detect a fault indication from external equipment and report it as external alarm to the Network Management System.
Dependencies: Can only exist in the node when the attribute supportSystemControl on MO EquipmentSupportFunction is set to true.

attribute.name: operationalState
attribute.description: Defines the operational state of the alarm port.

attribute.name: AlarmPortId
attribute.description: The identity of the Alarm Port that matches the number on the physical port and provides the value component of the RDN.

attribute.name: alarmSlogan
attribute.description: Specifies the alarm. Used in additional text in the alarm ExternalAlarm.

attribute.name: activeExternalAlarm
attribute.description: Indicates that an active alarm was sent and an external alarm exists on the port.

attribute.name: normallyOpen
attribute.description: The active state of the alarm port: True = Closing the circuit generates an alarm. False = Opening the circuit generates an alarm.

attribute.name: perceivedSeverity
attribute.description: The severity level code of the alarm ExternalAlarm.
attribute.specification: See 3GPP TS 32.111-2 for the use of severity levels.

attribute.name: probableCause
attribute.description: The probable cause of the alarm ExternalAlarm.
attribute.specification: The 3GPP TS 32.111 describes valid cause codes.

attribute.name: availabilityStatus
attribute.description: The availability status. It contains details about operationalState.

attribute.name: userLabel
attribute.description: Label for free use.

attribute.name: administrativeState
attribute.description: The administrative state.

class.name: FanGroup
class.description:
